output: தகுதி: +2 Biology/Agriculture 50% marks. சேர்க்கை: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) counselling. படிகள்: 1) www.tnau.ac.in-ல் விண்ணப்பம் 2) Merit ranking 3) Counselling 4) Campus allotment (Coimbatore/Madurai/Trichy). கட்டணம்: ₹5,000-10,000/ஆண்டு. படிப்பு காலம்: 4 ஆண்டுகள். Farmers' children-க்கு முன்னுரிமை.

instruction: BP tablet daily edukkanuumaa? Stop pannalaamaa?
output: Usually lifelong! Why: 1) BP medicine controls, doesn't cure, 2) Stopping = BP goes up again, 3) Sudden stop can cause rebound high BP. Safe: 1) Never stop without doctor advice, 2) Regular checkups, 3) Lifestyle changes may reduce dose (weight loss, diet, exercise). Myth: "I feel fine, so I don't need" - BP is silent killer, symptoms come late. Monitoring: Home BP monitor useful.

instruction: Divorce எந்த court-ல் file செய்யணும்?
output: Family Court-ல் file செய்யணும். Jurisdiction: 1) கடைசியாக சேர்ந்து வாழ்ந்த இடம், 2) Marriage நடந்த இடம், 3) Wife தற்போது வசிக்கும் இடம், 4) Husband தற்போது வசிக்கும் இடம். District Family Court-ல் petition போடுங்க.

instruction: Scholarship-ku apply panna enna document vendumay?
output: Aadhaar, bank passbook (student name-la), income certificate, community certificate, marks card, photo, bonafide - ipdi ellam venum. Original + xerox + scan ready-a vechikko/vechikunga.

instruction: ITI Course பற்றி full details தருங்க. Free-யா படிக்கலாமா?
output:
**ITI (Industrial Training Institute) - Complete Guide:**

**என்ன ITI?**
- Technical skill training
- Industry-ready workforce preparation
- NCVT/SCVT certified

**Eligibility:**
- 8th pass: Some trades (Welder, Wireman)
- 10th pass: Most trades (Electrician, Fitter, Turner)

**Duration:**
- 6 months to 2 years (trade based)

**Popular Trades:**

| Trade | Duration | Job Prospects |
|-------|----------|---------------|
| Electrician | 2 years | High demand |
| Fitter | 2 years | Manufacturing |
| COPA (Computer) | 1 year | Office jobs |
| Mechanic (Motor Vehicle) | 2 years | Automobile |
| Welder | 1 year | Construction |
| Plumber | 1 year | Building sector |
| Electronics Mechanic | 2 years | Electronics |

**Fees:**
- Govt ITI: FREE! (Only nominal ₹100-500)
- Private ITI: ₹10,000-50,000/year

**Free Training Schemes:**
- SC/ST: Full free + Stipend ₹500-1,000/month
- BC/MBC: Free tuition
- EWS: Free in Govt ITI

**Admission Process:**
1. Website: itidata.tn.gov.in
2. Online application
3. Merit list based on 10th marks
4. Counselling & Seat allotment

**Timing:** Apply: May-June

**After ITI:**
- Apprenticeship (1 year) - Earn while learn
- Direct job in factories, companies
- Self-employment
- Higher studies: Diploma (Lateral)

**Apprenticeship Sites:**
- apprenticeshipindia.gov.in
- Stipend: ₹5,000-9,000/month

instruction: School dropout-ஆகிவிட்டேன், படிப்பை continue செய்ய என்ன வழி?
output: Options: 1) NIOS (National Institute of Open Schooling) - 10th/12th complete 2) TN State Open School - Tamil medium available 3) Private appearance through Distance Education 4) Skill training + later education. NIOS: www.nios.ac.in, exams twice a year, study at own pace. Age no bar. After 10th/12th: Regular college admission possible. Many successful people are NIOS students.

instruction: Education loan meethana vatti subsidy scheme enna?
output: Central Sector Interest Subsidy Scheme: Padikkum bodhu + 1 year moratorium-la vatti muzhuvathum govt kattum. Eligibility: Family income ₹4.5 lakh/year kizha, Technical/Professional courses. Apply: Vidya Lakshmi Portal moolam. TN State Loan: SC/ST students-ku interest-free education loan available through Adi Dravidar Welfare.

instruction: Resume/CV எப்படி எழுதுவது?
output: Resume essentials: 1) Contact info - email (professional), phone 2) Education - reverse chronological, CGPA 3) Skills - technical + soft skills 4) Projects - 2-3 relevant ones with outcomes 5) Internships/Experience 6) Achievements - quantify where possible 7) Extra-curricular - leadership roles. Format: 1 page for freshers, clean design, no photos (India OK), PDF format. Avoid: Spelling errors, lying, lengthy paragraphs. Templates: Canva, Novoresume free options.

instruction: Aadhaar correction eppadi seivathu?
output: Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in (demographic update). Offline: Aadhaar Enrolment Centre. Documents: Supporting proof for correction. Fee: Rs.50 (biometric update free). Time: 10-30 days. OTP verification required. Address update: Aadhaar app-lum possible.

instruction: YouTube ad: 'AI trading bot - set and forget, automatic profit daily' என்கிறது. இது work ஆகுமா?
output: Automatic profit தரும் bot இல்லை. இவை scam apps. உங்கள் முதலீடு முழுவதும் இழக்கலாம். எந்த trading bot-ம் நம்பாதீர்கள்.

instruction: 10 varushamaa same job panren, career change pannanum, new skill learn panna enge povadhu?
output: Career change options: 1) TNSDC free courses - 100+ skills 2) NSDC skill centers - PMKVY scheme 3) Online: Coursera, edX certificates (many free) 4) Coding: freeCodeCamp, Codecademy 5) Digital marketing: Google certifications free 6) MBA distance - career shift. Trending skills: Data Science, Digital Marketing, Cloud computing, Python. Strategy: Learn while working → Build portfolio → Apply new roles OR Entrepreneurship. Age no barrier - many successful career changes at 35-45.

instruction: Hospital bill puriyala, itemized bill ketkalaamaa?
output: Yes! Right to detailed bill. Must include: 1) Room charges (per day), 2) Doctor fees, 3) Surgery/procedure charges, 4) Medicines (with MRP), 5) Consumables, 6) Lab tests, 7) Nursing charges, 8) Any other charges. Hospital must provide: Written estimate before admission (planned), final itemized bill. Overcharging: Consumer Forum complaint. Compare: Check medicine MRP, verify tests done.

instruction: 'வீட்டிலிருந்தே வேலை, தினமும் 2000 ரூபாய் சம்பாதியுங்கள். பயிற்சிக் கட்டணம் 3000 ரூபாய் மட்டுமே' - இது நம்பகமானதா?
output: இது போலி வேலை வாய்ப்பு. தினமும் 2000 (மாதம் 60,000) சம்பாதிக்க 3000 கட்டணம் என்பது நம்பமுடியாதது. உண்மையான நிறுவனங்கள் பயிற்சிக்கு பணம் கேட்பதில்லை.

instruction: Rent Authority-ல் complaint எப்படி கொடுப்பது?
output: District Collectorate office-ல் written application கொடுக்கணும். Required documents: 1) Rental agreement copy, 2) Rent receipts, 3) Communication proof (notices, messages), 4) ID proof. Online-லும் e-district portal மூலம் apply செய்யலாம். Fee: Nominal (Rs.100-500).

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Teacher's Insurance scheme from State Government. Premium 2000, coverage 10 lakh. Limited period offer, pay now.' Idhu genuine government scheme aa?
output: Government insurance schemes announced through official GOs and school management. Education department never asks direct payment via email. Verify from DPI (Director of Public Instruction) website. Teachers already covered under GIS - check your existing coverage first.

instruction: Infertility treatment government hospital-la available-aa?
output: Limited but available. Government: 1) Basic infertility workup - free at medical college hospitals, 2) Some IUI facilities, 3) Counseling. IVF: 1) Limited government centres (Institute of Obstetrics - Chennai), 2) Subsidized at some, 3) Mostly private (expensive). CMCHIS: Covers some infertility procedures. PM-PMSBY: Assisted reproduction not fully covered yet. Cost: IVF privately Rs.1-3 lakhs per cycle.

instruction: Central Government helpline numbers enna?
output: Aadhaar: 1947, PAN/Income Tax: 1800-180-1961, PM-KISAN: 155261, Ayushman Bharat: 14555, NSP Scholarship: 0120-6619540, PMKVY Skill: 1800-123-9626, Consumer: 1915, Women Helpline: 181, Cyber Crime: 1930

instruction: ATM-ல் யாரோ 'உங்கள் கார்டு stuck ஆனது, PIN சொன்னால் எடுத்து தருகிறேன்' என்கிறார்கள். உதவி செய்யலாமா?
output: PIN சொல்லாதீர்கள்! ATM-ல் யாரையும் நம்பாதீர்கள். கார்டு stuck ஆனால் வங்கியை அழைக்கவும். அந்த நபர் உங்கள் பணத்தை திருடலாம்.

instruction: Consumer-ஆக எனக்கு என்னென்ன rights இருக்கு?
output: Consumer Protection Act 2019-ன் கீழ் 6 முக்கிய rights: 1) Safety right - unsafe products-இல் இருந்து பாதுகாப்பு, 2) Information right - product details தெரிந்துகொள்ள, 3) Choice right - alternatives select செய்ய, 4) Hearing right - complaint கொடுக்க, 5) Redressal right - compensation பெற, 6) Education right - consumer awareness.

instruction: Informed consent என்றால் என்ன? எதுக்கெல்லாம் consent வேணும்?
output: Informed consent = Patient understanding and agreeing to treatment. Required for: 1) Any surgery, 2) Anesthesia, 3) Blood transfusion, 4) Invasive procedures, 5) Clinical trials, 6) HIV testing. Must explain: Procedure, risks, alternatives, success rate. Language: Patient's language (Tamil). Without consent: Medical negligence. Exception: Life-threatening emergency - implied consent.

instruction: Siddha treatment-la enna vagaigal ullana?
output: Treatment types: 1) Internal medicines - Choornam (powder), Lehyam (paste), Kasayam (decoction), Thailam (oil), Maathirai (pills), 2) External - Pattru (poultice), Ottradam (fomentation), Nasiyam (nasal), Kattu (bandage), 3) Surgical - Siddha surgery, 4) Special therapies - Thokkanam (massage), Varmam, Yoga. Panchagavya: Cow products based. Kayakalpa: Rejuvenation therapy.

instruction: Velaikku pogum bodhe padikka mudiyuma?
output: Mudiyum. Evening colleges (5pm-9pm), Sunday classes, correspondence courses, online degree programs (SWAYAM, NPTEL) moolam velai paathukitte padikkalam. UGC approved distance education universities-la seralam.

instruction: Juvenile home-la irundhen. Ippo padikka chance irukkaa?
output: Yes, absolutely! Rehabilitation includes education: 1) Continuation of education during detention 2) NIOS for school completion 3) Skill training provided 4) After release: Regular school/college admission possible 5) No mandatory disclosure of juvenile record. Support: Juvenile Justice Board, NGOs, Social Welfare Department. Records sealed - fresh start possible. Many have rebuilt lives through education. You deserve a second chance!

instruction: Medical negligence-kku evvalavu compensation kidaikkum?
output: Depends on: 1) Severity of injury/death, 2) Age of victim, 3) Earning capacity, 4) Future medical needs, 5) Mental agony. Components: 1) Medical expenses (past + future), 2) Loss of income, 3) Pain and suffering, 4) Disability compensation, 5) Loss of consortium (spouse), 6) Punitive damages (gross negligence). Range: Rs.5 lakhs to Rs.5+ crores. Death: Multiplier method based on age and income.

instruction: Live-in relationship legal-ஆ?
output: ஆம், adult consenting partners-க்கு legal. Supreme Court recognized. DV Act protection apply ஆகும். ஆனால் marriage benefits (inheritance, maintenance as spouse) automatic இல்லை. Long-term live-in partners-க்கு certain rights உண்டு.

instruction: சிவ வாக்கியர் யார்? அவரது பாடல்கள் சிறப்பு என்ன?
output: சிவ வாக்கியர் மிகவும் controversial சித்தர். சமய சடங்குகளை, பூஜைகளை கடுமையாக விமர்சித்தவர். 'சாதி இல்லை, சமயம் இல்லை' என்று பேசியவர். 'நட்ட கல்லை தெய்வம் என்று நாலு பூ சாத்தியே, சுற்றி வந்து முணுமுணுத்தால் சொல்லுமோ முந்தை வினை?' - idol worship-ஐ கேள்வி கேட்கும் வரி. Rational thinking-ஐ 1000 வருடங்களுக்கு முன்பே பேசியவர்!

instruction: Thokkanam massage எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Thokkanam = Traditional Siddha massage therapy. Types: 9 types including Thattal, Irukkal, Pidithal, etc. Where: 1) NIS Tambaram - specialized unit, 2) Government Siddha hospitals, 3) Private Siddha clinics (verify registration). For: Muscular problems, paralysis, rehabilitation, stress relief. Sessions: Usually 7-14 day course. Cost: Free at government, Rs.300-1000 per session private. Trained: Only by certified Thokkanam therapists.

instruction: MRP-க்கு மேல charge பண்றாங்க - complain எப்படி?
output: Illegal! Legal Metrology Act violation. MRP = Maximum Retail Price (inclusive of all taxes). Action: 1) Point out MRP printed on pack, 2) Refuse to pay excess, 3) Complaint: Weights and Measures Department (Legal Metrology), 4) Consumer helpline: 1800-11-4000. Evidence: Bill + photo of MRP on pack. Penalty: Fine on seller. Hospital pharmacy also bound by MRP.

instruction: Passport first time apply pannanum - complete process enna?
output:
Step 1 - Online Registration:
1. passportindia.gov.in → 'New User Registration'
2. Create account
3. Login

Step 2 - Fill Application:
1. 'Apply for Fresh Passport'
2. Select: Normal/Tatkaal
3. Fill: Personal, Family, Address, Emergency contact
4. Save and continue

Step 3 - Book Appointment:
1. Select PSK (Passport Seva Kendra)
2. Choose date/time
3. Pay: Normal 36 pages ₹1,500, 60 pages ₹2,000, Tatkaal +₹2,000
4. Print Application Receipt

Step 4 - PSK Visit:
Documents: Printed application, Aadhaar, PAN, Voter ID/DL, Birth Certificate/SSLC, Address proof (EB bill/Bank statement)

At PSK: Token → Document verification → Biometric → Photo → Final verification → Acknowledgment

Step 5 - Police Verification:
- Police visit address (1-2 weeks)
- Keep documents ready
- Neighbors may be asked

Step 6 - Delivery:
- Speed Post
- Track: passportindia.gov.in
- Normal: 15-30 days
- Tatkaal: 1-7 days

Tips: Same name spelling in all docs, Recent address proof, Reach PSK 15 mins early

instruction: CMCHIS-ல் என்னென்ன treatment cover ஆகும்?
output: Covered: 1) Heart surgery, bypass, stent, 2) Cancer treatment, chemotherapy, 3) Kidney transplant, dialysis, 4) Brain surgery, 5) Joint replacement, 6) Accident/trauma surgery, 7) Maternity (complicated), 8) Eye surgery (cataract), 9) ENT procedures. Not covered: OPD consultation, dental (cosmetic), infertility (basic). Full list: cmchistn.com

instruction: Minor burns/wounds-kku first aid natural remedy?
output: Burns (minor): 1) Cool water (not ice) 10-20 mins, 2) Aloe vera gel (fresh), 3) Honey application (antibacterial), 4) Coconut oil after cooling, 5) Turmeric paste (wound healing). Wounds: 1) Clean with water, 2) Turmeric powder (traditional antiseptic), 3) Neem paste (antibacterial), 4) Honey. Don't use: Toothpaste, egg white, butter on burns - myths! Major burns/wounds: Hospital immediately.

instruction: NEET fail aanaal enna alternatives irukkudhu?
output: Medical field alternatives: 1) B.Sc Nursing - no NEET 2) BDS (Dental) - lower cutoff 3) BAMS/BHMS/BUMS - Ayurveda/Homeopathy 4) B.Sc Allied Health Sciences 5) Pharmacy (B.Pharm) 6) Physiotherapy (BPT) 7) Veterinary (NEET separate cutoff). Other options: 1) Dropper year - many succeed 2) B.Sc Biology → Research 3) Biotechnology. Reality check: 18 lakh applicants, 1 lakh seats - alternatives are not failure, different path.

instruction: Mamallapuram monuments patri sollungal?
output: Mamallapuram (Mahabalipuram) - UNESCO World Heritage Site (1984). Pallavar kaalathil (7th century) kattappattathu. Mukkiya monuments: 1) Kadarkarai Kovil (Shore Temple) - sea-facing, 2) Aindhu Rathangal (Pancha Rathas) - single rock-la sedhukkappattathu, 3) Arjunan Tapasu / Gangai Irangudhall - world's largest bas-relief (96 feet x 43 feet), 4) Krishna Butter Cave, Mahishasuramardhini mandapa. Chennai-lirundhu 60 km. Beach + heritage combo destination.

instruction: Siddhar paadalgalai engge ketkalaam/padikkalaam?
output: Siddhar paadalgal access seiya: 1) Project Madurai - free Tamil texts online (projectmadurai.org), 2) Tamil Virtual Academy - government site, 3) YouTube - vilakkanagalodu paadalgal, 4) Books - Chennai Higginbothams, Pari Nilayam, 5) Apps - Siddhar Paadalgal app, 6) Libraries - University of Madras, Connemara Library. Original palm leaves Saraswathi Mahal Library (Thanjavur)-la preserve seiyappattuLLana.

instruction: Bogar ezhuthiya noolgal enna?
output: Bogaroda mukkiya noolgal: 1) Bogar 7000 - migapperiya nool, 7000 paadalgal, 2) Bogar Karpa Soothiram - rejuvenation medicine, 3) Bogar Vaiththiyam - maruththuvam, 4) Bogar Gnaanam - aanmeegam, 5) Bogar 12000 - virivana version, 6) Bogar Soothiram - formulas. Rasavaadham, maruththuvam, yoga ellam idhil ullana.

instruction: வாட்ஸ்அப்பில் 'SBI customer care' என்று message வந்து, PAN மற்றும் Aadhaar கேட்கிறார்கள்.
output: வங்கி வாட்ஸ்அப்பில் இப்படி கேட்காது. PAN, Aadhaar யாருக்கும் அனுப்பாதீர்கள். இது identity theft scam.

instruction: Telemedicine consultation legal-ஆ? Prescription valid-ஆ?
output: Legal! Telemedicine Practice Guidelines 2020. Valid for: 1) First consultation for non-emergency, 2) Follow-up consultations, 3) Second opinion. Prescription: Valid if signed digitally, has registration number. Limitations: 1) No controlled substances via telemedicine, 2) Physical exam needed cases - refer for in-person, 3) Emergency - not appropriate. Platforms: Practo, Tata 1mg, Apollo 247, government eSanjeevani.

instruction: Vellinaadu padippuku ennenna thervugal ezhudha venum?
output: Important exams: 1) IELTS/TOEFL - English proficiency 2) GRE - MS/PhD (USA, Canada) 3) GMAT - MBA 4) SAT - UG (USA) 5) PTE - Australia, UK. IELTS: 6.5+ score theva mostly. GRE: 300+ nalla score. Chennai-la pala coaching centers irukku. British Council, IDP IELTS nadathukindrana.

instruction: Treatment refuse பண்ணலாமா? Doctor force பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes, can refuse! Patient autonomy respected. Conditions: 1) Must be mentally competent, 2) Must understand consequences, 3) Must sign refusal form (LAMA - Leave Against Medical Advice). Doctor cannot force treatment (except psychiatric emergency). Blood transfusion refusal: Allowed (Jehovah's Witness cases). Children: Parents decide, but court can override for life-saving. Emergency: Implied consent applies.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Fastag KYC update mandatory. Pay 200 or toll charges double.' Fastag use pannuren, KYC pannanum aa?
output: Fastag KYC done through bank that issued tag or NHAI portal - free process. No 200 rupee KYC fee exists. Toll charges don't double for KYC delay. Scammers know drivers fear toll issues. Update KYC through official bank app or ihmcl.in only.

instruction: Neighbour veettu construction en veetukku damage - compensation kidaikkumaa?
output: Aama. Civil Court-la damages claim. Steps: 1) Written notice to neighbour, 2) Photos/videos of damage, 3) Engineer report (damage assessment), 4) Civil suit file. Compensation: Repair cost + inconvenience. Injunction to stop work-um possible.

instruction: DDU-GKY (Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana) என்றால் என்ன?
output: கிராம இளைஞர்களுக்கு Skill Training + Placement. தகுதி: 15-35 வயது (SC/ST-க்கு 45 வரை), BPL/Low income குடும்பம், கிராமப்புற. Training: 576 hours minimum, Residential (உணவு/தங்குமிடம் free). Sectors: IT, Healthcare, Retail, Hospitality, Automotive. Placement: 70% mandatory placement, ₹6,000+ salary. Incentive: Training முடிந்த 3 மாதம் employment-க்கு bonus. Apply: Gram Panchayat, Block office, ddugky.gov.in

instruction: திருக்குறளில் business-க்கு உதவும் குறள்கள் என்ன?
output: பொருட்பாலில் business-க்கு ஏற்ற அதிகாரங்கள்: 1) ஊக்கமுடைமை - motivation, 2) ஆள்வினை உடைமை - leadership, 3) இடனறிதல் - market analysis, 4) காலமறிதல் - timing, 5) வினைத்திட்பம் - focus, 6) வினைத்தூய்மை - ethics, 7) தெரிந்து செயல்வகை - planning. MBA courses-ல் Thirukkural teach பண்றாங்க இப்போ!

instruction: 'இன்றே கட்டுங்கள், இல்லனா offer போய்விடும்' என்கிறார்கள். Trust பண்ணலாமா?
output: Urgency create செய்வது scammer technique. 'இன்றே', 'உடனே', 'last chance' என்று சொன்னால் யோசியுங்கள். Legitimate offers-க்கு time இருக்கும்.

instruction: CMCHIS card எப்படி apply பண்றது?
output: Apply process: 1) Taluk office / Primary Health Centre visit, 2) Documents: Ration card, Aadhar, income certificate, photos, 3) Biometric enrollment, 4) Card delivery: 15-30 days. Online check: cmchistn.com. Already rice card holder: Automatic enrollment - check status online. Missing card: Duplicate apply at same office.

instruction: Trichy-ல் best medical colleges எவை?
output: Medical colleges Trichy region: 1) KAPV Government Medical College Trichy - MBBS, affordable 2) Thanjavur Medical College - Oldest in region 3) Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan Medical College - Private 4) Nursing colleges: Government + private multiple. MBBS admission: NEET + state counselling. Govt college fees: ₹13,500/year. Bond service required. Allied health courses also available.

instruction: Thirukkuralukku vera enna peyargal ullana?
output: Thirukkuralukku pala peyargal undu: 1) Muppaal - moondru pirivugal iruppathaal, 2) Utthara Vedam - therkku-oda vedam, 3) Deiva Nool - deiveega nool, 4) Podhu Marai - ella madhangalukkum podhuvana nool, 5) Tamil Marai - Tamilar-oda punidha nool, 6) Poiyaa Mozhi - unmaiyaana vaarthaikaal.

instruction: Senior Citizen Savings Scheme (SCSS) endraal enna?
output: Best savings for 60+ years. Interest: 8.2% (2024 - very high!). Deposit: ₹1,000 to ₹30 lakh. Term: 5 years (extendable by 3 years). Tax: Section 80C deduction, Interest taxable but TDS threshold ₹50,000. Open: Post Office/Bank (SBI, ICICI, etc.). Early closure: Possible after 1 year, penalty applies. Nomination: Mandatory.

instruction: 'Selvarkku azhagu sezhundhootti' - selvandharkku azhagu enna?
output: Kural related meaning: Panakkaarargalukkku azhagu ennavendral pirarukku uthavuvadhu. Ezhaigalukkku azhagu ennavendral ketkaamal iruppadu. True wealth = giving, True dignity = self-respect even in poverty.

instruction: Online natural remedy videos/tips - trust pannalaamaa?
output: Be careful! Red flags: 1) "Cure for everything" claims, 2) No credentials shown, 3) Extreme claims without evidence, 4) Asking to stop doctor's medicines, 5) Selling expensive products. Trust: 1) Government AYUSH websites, 2) Established medical institutions, 3) Registered practitioners, 4) Research-backed information. Verify: Cross-check with multiple sources. Best: Consult qualified practitioner in person for treatment.

instruction: ஒருத்தன் கடன் வாங்கிட்டு திரும்ப தரல, என்ன பண்றது?
output: Steps: 1) Written reminder அனுப்புங்க, 2) Legal notice (registered post), 3) Response இல்ல = court case. Evidence: Cheque/transfer proof, WhatsApp messages, witnesses. Rs.20 lakh-க்குள்: Summary suit (faster). Criminal: Cheque bounce ஆனா Section 138 case. Limitation: 3 years. Pro tip: Promissory note வாங்கியிருந்தா strong case.

instruction: RTI application eppadi ezhuthuvathu?
output: Format: 1) To: Public Information Officer (PIO), 2) Subject: RTI application under RTI Act 2005, 3) Applicant details (name, address), 4) Questions/Information required - specific-aa kelunga, 5) Period (from date to date), 6) Format preference (copy/inspection), 7) Fee payment details, 8) Signature, date.

instruction: EC (Encumbrance Certificate) endraal enna?
output: Property-kku loan, mortgage, legal dispute irukkaa endru kaattum certificate. Vaangum mun 30 years EC check pannanum. Online: tnreginet.gov.in-la apply. Fee: Rs.120/year. 'Nil EC' = clear property.

instruction: எங்க பசங்களுக்கு free laptop எப்ப கிடைக்கும்?
output: 11th class-ல் சேர்ந்தவுடன் அரசுப் பள்ளி மாணவர்களுக்கு laptop கிடைக்கும். Private பள்ளி மாணவர்களுக்கும் income certificate காட்டினால் கிடைக்கும். September-October மாதத்தில் distribution நடக்கும்.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-ல் Ayurveda hospital எங்கே இருக்கு?
output: TN Ayurveda facilities: 1) Arignar Anna Government Hospital of Indian Medicine, Chennai - Multi-AYUSH, 2) District AYUSH hospitals - Ayurveda unit available in most, 3) Selected Taluk dispensaries. Private: Many Kerala-based chains have branches (Arya Vaidya Sala, AVP). Note: TN has stronger Siddha infrastructure - Ayurveda less than Kerala. Integrated: Some allopathic hospitals have AYUSH wings with Ayurveda.

instruction: Scholarship apply பண்ணேன், status எப்படி check பண்றது?
output: Status check methods: 1) NSP login - dashboard shows status 2) PFMS portal - payment tracking 3) State portal - respective department 4) SMS alerts (if registered) 5) College scholarship cell. Common statuses: Pending verification, Under process, Sanctioned, Disbursed, Rejected. Rejected: Check defect list, re-apply with correct documents. Timeline: 2-6 months from application. Grievance: Portal helpdesk option.

instruction: Great Living Chola Temples என்றால் என்ன?
output: UNESCO World Heritage Site-ஆக declare செய்யப்பட்ட மூன்று சோழர் கோயில்கள்: 1) பிரகதீஸ்வரர் கோயில், தஞ்சாவூர் (1010 CE) - ராஜராஜ சோழன், 2) கங்கைகொண்ட சோழபுரம் கோயில் (1035 CE) - ராஜேந்திர சோழன், 3) ஐராவதேஸ்வரர் கோயில், தாராசுரம் (12th century) - ராஜராஜ சோழன் II. 'Living' என்பது இன்றும் பூஜை நடக்கும் கோயில்கள் என்பதைக் குறிக்கும்.

instruction: Madhiya Unavu Thittam (Mid-day Meal) pathi sollunga. En paiyan saappiduvana?
output: Mid-day Meal Scheme: Government school students-ku free healthy lunch. Class 1-8 varai anaivarukum. Menu: Rice, dal, vegetables, egg (weekly 3 times), fruit. Cooking school-layae. Quality food - district officials inspect pannuvanga. Children grow healthy. Attendance increases. School-la serthaal automatic-aa kidaikkum.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Crop insurance claim settlement ready. Pay 1000 processing fee for direct transfer.' Claim pending irundhuchu, pay pannidlama?
output: Crop insurance claims processed through bank and agriculture department - no processing fee. PMFBY settlements go directly to bank account. Check claim status at pmfby.gov.in. Insurance settlements never need payment from farmer.

instruction: Sleeping pills வாங்க prescription வேணுமா?
output: Yes! Most sleeping pills = Schedule H1/X - strict prescription control. Schedule H1: Alprazolam, Clonazepam, etc. - prescription + ID proof + register entry. Schedule X: Stronger sedatives - even stricter. Why: Addiction potential, misuse risk, suicide risk. Alternative: Melatonin (less restricted), lifestyle changes. Doctor: Will evaluate sleep issue cause first.

instruction: College-ku poga panam illai. Free-ya padikka mudiyumaa?
output: Mudiyum da! Government colleges-la fees romba kammi - yearly ₹1000-5000 only. Scholarship apply pannu - BC/MBC/SC/ST full scholarship kidaikkum. Distance education - IGNOU, TNOU almost free. Skill training - TNSDC 100% free. Padikka aasai irundhaa vazhi irukku!

instruction: Daily immunity-kku Siddha tips enna?
output: Daily practices: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (immune booster), 2) Chukku Kaapi (dry ginger coffee), 3) Turmeric milk, 4) Kabasura Kudineer (respiratory immunity), 5) Oil pulling (Gandusha), 6) Sesame oil application on head, 7) Pranayama. Seasonal: Different recipes for different seasons. Government: Distributed free during dengue, COVID seasons. Home preparation: Simple recipes available online from authentic sources.

instruction: Thirukkuralil eththanai kuralgal ullana?
output: 1330 kuralgal. 133 adhigaarangal, ovvoru adhigaarathilum 10 kuralgal. Indha ennikkayai ninaivil vaikka: 133 x 10 = 1330.

instruction: ரேஷன் அட்டையில் பெயர் சேர்க்க/நீக்க என்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output: சேர்க்க: திருமணம்/பிறப்பு சான்று + ஆதார் தேவை. நீக்க: இறப்பு சான்று / வேறு அட்டையில் சேர்ந்த சான்று. விண்ணப்பம்: tnpds.gov.in அல்லது தாசில்தார் அலுவலகம். காலம்: 15-30 நாட்கள்.

instruction: College-la stress athigamaa irukku. Handle panrathu eppadi?
output: Stress management: 1) Sleep 7-8 hours - non-negotiable 2) Exercise 30 min daily - even walking helps 3) Healthy food - avoid junk during stress 4) Break big tasks into small 5) Talk to friends, family 6) College counsellor - free service 7) Hobbies continue - music, sports, art 8) Social media break 9) Deep breathing when overwhelmed 10) Professional help if severe - no shame. Remember: Grades ≠ Self-worth. You matter more than marks.

instruction: CA (Chartered Accountant) padippu eppadi aarambippathu?
output: ICAI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation (after 10th or +2) 2) Intermediate 3) Final. 3 year Articleship compulsory. Total duration: 4-5 years. Fee: Foundation ₹11,000, Inter ₹27,000, Final ₹32,000. Chennai-la ICAI coaching centers irukku. Work while studying possible.

instruction: Graphic Design course எங்கே படிக்கலாம்? Job opportunity?
output: Training options: 1) Arena Animation 2) MAAC 3) TNSDC multimedia courses 4) Online - Coursera, Skillshare. Tools to learn: Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDraw, Canva. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Graphic designer 2) Social media designer 3) Print designer 4) UI designer 5) Freelancing. Salary: ₹12,000-30,000 starting. Portfolio build பண்ணுங்கள். Freelance platforms: Fiverr, Upwork, 99designs.

instruction: PM Janaushadhi Kendra endraal enna?
output: Affordable medicines store. 50-90% less than MRP. 1,800+ medicines + 285+ Surgical items. Quality: NABL tested, WHO-GMP certified. Find: janaushadhi.gov.in → Store Locator. 1,000+ stores in Tamil Nadu. Example: Paracetamol 500mg (10 tabs) - Market ₹15, Janaushadhi ₹2.50; Metformin 500mg - Market ₹25, Janaushadhi ₹3.50

instruction: Illegal loan app harassment - contacts ku call pannuraanga, morphed photos threat. Enna pannuradhu?
output: Immediate: STOP paying (harassment won't stop), document ALL harassment, warn close contacts. Step 1: RBI Complaint at cms.rbi.org.in - 'Complaint against unauthorized digital lending app'. Step 2: Play Store report - Flag → 'Financial harm'. Step 3: Cyber Crime FIR - Sections 66E IT Act (privacy violation), 506 IPC (criminal intimidation), 509 IPC (insult modesty). Step 4: Legal notice through lawyer. Step 5: Twitter tag @RBI. Legal protection: Courts ruled loan app harassment illegal. Support: Women helpline 181, Legal Services Authority (free aid).

instruction: Wife maintenance evvalavu ketkalaamaa?
output: Fixed formula illa. Consider: 1) Husband income, 2) Wife income/earning capacity, 3) Standard of living, 4) Children custody, 5) Liabilities. Rough guide: Husband income-in 25-30%. Interim maintenance: 20-25%. Court discretion based on facts.

instruction: Jan Aushadhi store endraal enna? Medicines cheap-aa kidaikkumaa?
output: Jan Aushadhi = Government generic medicine stores. Prices: 50-90% cheaper than branded. Quality: Same as branded (WHO-GMP certified). Available: 1,800+ medicines, 280+ surgical items. Locations: Major hospitals, standalone stores. Find: janaushadhi.gov.in or app. Example: Paracetamol 500mg (10 tablets) - Rs.2-3 vs branded Rs.15-20. Prescription needed for schedule drugs.

instruction: Exam mundhina naal enna seiyanum? Enna seiyakkoodaadhu?
output: Do: 1) Light revision - formula sheet, key points only 2) Organize hall ticket, pens, watch 3) Check exam centre route 4) Early dinner, light food 5) Sleep by 10 PM (7-8 hours) 6) Positive thoughts 7) Relaxation - music, walk. Don't: 1) New topics - creates confusion 2) Heavy study - exhaustion 3) Late night - affects performance 4) Junk food, caffeine excess 5) Negative friends/news 6) Panic discussions with peers 7) Social media overthinking. Trust your preparation!

instruction: வங்கி/நிறுவனம் பதிலளிக்கவில்லை, நுகர்வோர் மன்றத்தில் வழக்கு எப்படி தொடுப்பது?
output: அதிகார வரம்பு: ₹50 லட்சம் வரை - மாவட்ட மன்றம், ₹50L-2 கோடி - மாநில ஆணையம், ₹2 கோடிக்கு மேல் - தேசிய ஆணையம். இணைய தாக்கல்: edaakhil.nic.in. ஆவணங்கள்: வடிவமைப்பில் புகார், பணம் செலுத்திய ஆதாரம், கடிதப் போக்குவரத்து, ஆதாரங்கள், முந்தைய புகார் ஒப்புகைகள், அடையாள அட்டை. கட்டணம்: ₹5L வரை = ₹100, ₹5-10L = ₹200, ₹10-20L = ₹300, ₹20-50L = ₹500. செயல்முறை: தாக்கல் → எதிர் தரப்பு நோட்டீஸ் (30 நாட்கள்) → எழுத்துப்பூர்வ அறிக்கை → விசாரணைகள் → தீர்ப்பு (90-150 நாட்கள்). தமிழ்நாடு மாவட்ட மன்றங்கள்: confonet.nic.in இல் பட்டியல்.

instruction: Lawyer fees எவ்வளவு reasonable?
output: Varies: Junior lawyer - Rs.5,000-25,000 per case, Senior - Rs.50,000-5 lakhs+, Supreme Court - Rs.2 lakhs+. Fee agreement writing-ல் வாங்குங்க. Excessive fee: Bar Council complaint. Free legal aid: DLSA (income <Rs.3 lakh). Legal fee insurance available.

instruction: Insurance claim reject ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason written-ஆ கேளுங்க, 2) Insurance company grievance cell, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Consumer forum, 5) MACT (accident claims). Common rejection reasons: Policy lapse, drunk driving, unlicensed driver. Documentation முக்கியம்.

instruction: Important government websites enna?
output: All e-Services: tneservices.tn.gov.in, Property Registration: tnreginet.gov.in, Ration Card: tnpds.gov.in, Vehicle/DL: parivahan.gov.in, Pension: pensionschemes.tn.gov.in, Police: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in, Employment: tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in, Electricity: nsc.tnebnet.org, Land Records: eservices.tn.gov.in/landrecords

instruction: Disability students-kku competitive exam la enna concessions undu?
output: Scribe facility, extra time (1 hour), separate seating, PWD quota (4% reservation), age relaxation (10 years), fee exemption, assistive devices use pannalam. NEET, JEE, TNPSC ellathilum indha concessions kedaikum.

instruction: ஆக்சிடென்ட் ஆயிடுச்சு, insurance company சரியா settle பண்ணல
output: Steps: 1) Written complaint insurance company-க்கு, 2) IRDAI grievance portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (free, Rs.30 lakh வரை), 4) Consumer forum. Documents ready-ஆ வச்சுக்கோங்க - FIR, medical bills, repair estimate, photos.

instruction: Fashion Design padikka Tamil Nadu-la enge povadhu?
output: Top institutes: 1) NIFT Chennai - National level 2) AIFD Chennai 3) JD Institute of Fashion. Admission: NIFT - entrance exam (January). Courses: B.Des Fashion Design (4 years), Diploma (1-2 years). Eligibility: 12th any stream. Fees: NIFT ₹2-3 lakh/year, Private ₹50,000-1.5 lakh/year. Jobs: Fashion houses, Garment industry, Freelance designer. Chennai = garment hub = good placement.

instruction: Free laptop scheme-க்கு எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: TN Government Free Laptop Scheme: College 1st year students-க்கு. Auto-selection based on: 1) Government/Aided college admission 2) +2 marks 3) Community (SC/ST/BC/MBC priority). Process: College அளிக்கும் list அடிப்படையில் distribution. தனியாக apply செய்ய தேவையில்லை. Laptop worth: ₹15,000-20,000. Pre-loaded educational software இருக்கும். Service warranty 3 years.

instruction: OLX la bike sale ku post potten. 'Army Captain' call pannaan, QR code scan pannu advance receive pannu nu. Scan panna okay va machan?
output: Dai QR scan panna RECEIVE aagaadhu - DEBIT aagum! Reverse UPI scam da idhu. 'Army officer' nu solradhu trust build panna. OMR, Thoraipakkam la ipdi romba per maatinanga. Cash on delivery only da, advance vaangaadhae.

instruction: Marriage Assistance Scheme endraal enna? Evvalavu kidaikkum?
output: Assistance for marriage of poor women. Amount: ₹25,000 (BC/MBC) to ₹50,000 (SC/ST) + 1 sovereign (8g) gold. Eligibility: Annual income below ₹72,000, bride 18+ years, extra ₹25,000 for degree holders. Apply: Taluk/DSW office, 40 days before marriage. Documents: Income certificate, Community certificate, Education certificate, Marriage invitation. Convert: Cash option instead of gold available.

instruction: Aviation/Pilot training enge padippathu? Cost evvalavu?
output: Options: 1) Commercial Pilot License (CPL) - Flying schools 2) B.Sc Aviation 3) Air hostess/Cabin crew training. CPL institutes: Madras Flying Club, Rajiv Gandhi Aviation Academy. CPL cost: ₹25-40 lakh (high investment). Duration: 18 months - 2 years. Alternative: IAF through AFCAT/NDA (free training). Cabin crew: 6 months course, ₹1-2 lakh. Jobs with airlines after training.

instruction: Weight loss-க்கு natural-ஆ என்ன பண்ணலாம்? Gym போக time இல்ல
output: No gym needed! Natural weight loss: 1) Morning warm water + lemon + honey, 2) Green tea/Jeera water instead of tea/coffee, 3) Dinner before 7 PM, 4) Walk 30 mins daily (morning/evening), 5) Reduce rice, increase vegetables, 6) No packaged snacks - nuts, fruits instead, 7) Intermittent fasting (16:8) if suitable. Apps: Step counter helps. Consistency: 1-2 kg/month loss is healthy and sustainable. Quick fix: Usually temporary and unhealthy.

instruction: FIR eppadi register seyvadhu?
output: 1. Nearby police station ponga 2. Written complaint kudunga 3. Zero FIR: Any police station-la register pannalam 4. Online: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in (some crimes) 5. FIR copy free-ya vaangalam (your right!) 6. If refused: Complain to SP / District Collector

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'GST compliance issue detected in your business. Pay 20,000 immediately or face notice.' GST officer call pannaaraa, genuine aa?
output: GST notices come through official GST portal and registered email, not phone calls. Officers identify themselves with designation and give written notice. Check gst.gov.in for any actual notices. Never pay anyone calling as 'GST officer'.

instruction: Crypto investment-la double money guarantee-nu friend suggest panraanga
output: Crypto-la guarantee illa sir. Double money scheme ellam Ponzi fraud. Friend-um emaanthurukkalam. SEBI registered platform use pannunga, guaranteed return nambaadheenga.

instruction: LIC la irundhu call vandhudhu, 'Ayya ungal policy mature aairuchu, 5 lakh bonus irukku. Bank details kudunga, direct credit pannidurom' nu. Naan LIC policy vachirukken, namba vendiyaadhu aa?
output: LIC phone la bank details kekaadhu ayya. Policy maturity formal letter varum, signed by branch manager. Bonus irundhaalum branch la poi verify pannunga. Phone la details kuduthaa en account la irukka paisa um pogum. LIC branch ku direct ponga.

instruction: என் Bank Account-ல் இருந்து OTP இல்லாமல் பணம் போய்விட்டது. Cyber fraud-க்கு என்ன செய்வது?
output:
உடனடியாக (Minutes matter!):
1. Bank Helpline Call - Account freeze, Transaction dispute raise
2. cybercrime.gov.in - Financial Fraud complaint
3. 1930 Helpline - National Cyber Crime (24x7)

24 மணி நேரத்திற்குள்:
4. Written Bank Complaint - Acknowledgment வாங்கவும்
5. Police FIR - Cyber Crime Police Station / eservices.tnpolice.gov.in

Bank Liability (RBI Rules):
6. 3 நாட்களுக்குள் report → Full refund
7. 4-7 நாட்கள் → Max loss ₹10,000
8. Bank 90 நாட்களுக்குள் resolve செய்ய வேண்டும்

Escalation:
9. Banking Ombudsman - cms.rbi.org.in

Prevention:
10. SMS alerts enable, Transaction limits set
11. Never share OTP

instruction: Child choking - என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: If can cough: Encourage coughing. If can't cough/breathe: Infant (<1 year) - 5 back blows + 5 chest thrusts. Child (>1 year) - Heimlich maneuver: Stand behind, fist above navel, quick upward thrusts. Unconscious: Start CPR, call 108. Prevention: No small objects, cut food into small pieces, supervise eating. Learn CPR: Red Cross, hospitals conduct training.

instruction: Podhigai Malai yaen siddhargalukkku mukkiyam?
output: Podhigai Malai (Agastyamalai) Western Ghats-la ulladhu. Agathiyar ingge thavam seidhathaaga nambappadugiradhu. Rare herbs niraiya kidaikkum. Indrum Agathiyar ingge iruppathaga silar nambugiraargal. Spiritual seekers ingge yaathirai selgiraargal. Courtallam (Kutralam) aruge. Dense forest enbathaal trekking permits thevai. Biodiversity hotspot-aagavum declared.

instruction: Friend/family member suicidal-ஆ இருக்காங்க - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Dos: 1) Listen without judgment, 2) Take them seriously, 3) Stay with them, 4) Remove means (medicines, sharp objects), 5) Encourage professional help, 6) Call helpline together. Don'ts: 1) Don't leave alone if immediate risk, 2) Don't promise secrecy, 3) Don't argue or lecture, 4) Don't dare them. Emergency: Take to hospital emergency if attempt made or imminent risk. You're not alone - helplines guide you too.

instruction: நான் சிறிய கடை / தொழில் ஆரம்பிக்க விரும்புகிறேன். என்னென்ன license, loan, benefits கிடைக்கும்?
output:
Step 1 - Registration:
1. Udyam Registration (MSME) - udyamregistration.gov.in - இலவசம்
2. GST Registration - ₹40 லட்சம்+ turnover-க்கு கட்டாயம்

Step 2 - Local Licenses:
3. Trade License - நகராட்சி - ₹500-5,000
4. Shop & Establishment - tnlabour.tn.gov.in - ₹150-500
5. FSSAI License - உணவு வணிகம் - fssai.gov.in

Step 3 - Loans & Subsidies:
6. PMEGP - ₹50 லட்சம் வரை - 15-35% subsidy
7. MUDRA Loan - ₹10 லட்சம் வரை - No collateral
8. NEEDS (TN) - ₹25 லட்சம் வரை - 25-30% subsidy
9. Stand Up India (SC/ST/Women) - ₹1 கோடி வரை

Step 4 - Ongoing:
10. GST Returns - Monthly/Quarterly
11. Income Tax - Yearly

instruction: 274 Paadal Petra Sthalangal endraal enna?
output: 63 Nayanmaarkalaal (Saiva bhakthargal) Thevaram, Thiruvasagam aagiyavattril paadappatta 274 Sivan kovilgal. Ivattril perumbaalaanavai Tamil Nadu-la. 'Muththu Thiruppathigam' endru sirappup peyar. Thevaram - Sambandhar, Sundarar, Appar paadiyathu. Thiruvasagam - Manikkavasagar paadiyathu. Ovvoru kovilukkum sirappaana sthalapurana (history) undu.

instruction: Siddhargal udal patri enna solkirargal?
output: 'Udambhar azhiyin uyiraar azhivar' - udal azhindhal aanmaavum munnera mudiyaadhu. 'Udambinai munnam izhukkenru irundhen, udambinukku ulle uruporul kanden' - Thirumoolar. Udalai neglect seiyaamal, adhai karuviyaaga payanpaduththi aanmeega munnetram adaiyalam enbadhu siddhar thaththuvam. Yoga, maruththuvam idhoda adippadaiyilaye.

instruction: 'Gulf job - visa, ticket எல்லாம் free, agent fee 50,000 மட்டும்' என்று offer கிடைத்தது. போகலாமா?
output: Licensed recruitment agency-ஐ MOIA website-ல் verify செய்யுங்கள். Registered agent இல்லாமல் பணம் கொடுக்காதீர்கள். பல Gulf job scams நடக்கின்றன.

instruction: Jan Dhan Account என்றால் என்ன?
output: FREE zero-balance bank account for any Indian. Benefits: Free RuPay card, ₹2 lakh accident insurance, ₹30,000 life insurance (new accounts), overdraft up to ₹10,000, DBT transfer enabled. Open at any bank/Bank Mitra with just Aadhaar or Voter ID.

instruction: என் wife-க்கு WhatsApp வந்தது - 'Work from home, தினமும் 1000 சம்பாதியுங்கள், housewives special offer' என்று.
output: Housewives-ஐ target செய்யும் task scam. ஆரம்பத்தில் சிறிய payment தருவார்கள், பின்பு investment கேட்டு ஏமாற்றுவார்கள். Join ஆகாதீர்கள்.

instruction: 108 Ambulance service eppadi use panradhu?
output: Dial 108 - Free emergency ambulance. Services: 1) BLS (Basic Life Support) ambulance, 2) ALS (Advanced Life Support) for critical cases, 3) Trained paramedics, 4) GPS tracking, 5) Hospital coordination. Response time: 15-20 minutes (urban), 20-30 minutes (rural). Free: No charges for transport. Alternative: 102 for pregnant women transport.

instruction: Father's Day - 'Win smartwatch for dad! Fill survey' link வந்துச்சு. Fill பண்ணலாமா?
output: Survey scam! Personal info collect பண்றாங்க. Father's Day-ல இது common. 'Win' என்று attract பண்ணி data theft. Survey forms-ல sensitive info கொடுக்காதீங்க. No survey gives genuine prizes.

instruction: கிருஷ்ணாவின் வெண்ணெய் உருண்டை (Krishna's Butterball) என்ன?
output: மாமல்லபுரத்தில் உள்ள ஒரு பிரமாண்ட பாறை. 250 ton எடை. Slope-ல் நிற்கிறது - ஆனால் விழாது! Gravity-ஐ மீறுவது போல் தெரிகிறது. 1200+ வருடங்களாக அப்படியே நிற்கிறது. பல்லவர் காலத்திலேயே attraction. Elephants கொண்டு தள்ள முயற்சித்தும் நகரவில்லை என்று கதை. 'Vaan Irai Kal' என்று தமிழில் பெயர். Perfect photo spot - tourists favorite!

instruction: Crypto/Stock trading scam la lakhs poachu. Recovery possible aa?
output: Report to: SEBI (stock related) at scores.sebi.gov.in, ED Economic Offences (>10 lakhs) through Police escalation, cybercrime.gov.in, Platform fraud team (Binance, WazirX). Recovery channels: Bank reversal (within 24-48 hours), Crypto tracing (blockchain traceable, specialized cyber cells), Civil suit if scammer identified, Collective action with other victims. Recovery reality: Crypto 5-10%, Stock scams 10-20% if SEBI acts, Ponzi depends on assets seized.

instruction: திருக்குறள் போட்டிகள் எங்கே நடக்கின்றன? பரிசு என்ன?
output: 1) தமிழ்நாடு அரசு திருக்குறள் போட்டி - ஒவ்வொரு வருடமும் ஜனவரியில், 2) பள்ளி/கல்லூரி போட்டிகள் - திருவள்ளுவர் தினத்தில், 3) All India Thirukkural Competition - various organizations conduct, 4) Online quiz competitions - apps மூலம். பரிசுகள்: பணம், certificates, medals, scholarships கூட உண்டு சில போட்டிகளில்.

instruction: Appointment letter கொடுக்கல - சட்டவிரோதமா?
output: ஆம். Written employment contract கொடுக்கணும். Appointment letter contents: Designation, salary, probation period, notice period, duties. Oral appointment-உம் valid ஆனால் prove பண்றது கஷ்டம். Always insist on written letter + copy வாங்குங்க.

instruction: Pain killers addiction ஆகுமா? Control என்ன?
output: Some can! Opioids (Tramadol, Codeine, Morphine): High addiction potential - Schedule H/X. NSAIDs (Ibuprofen, Diclofenac): Lower risk but long-term issues (stomach, kidney). Paracetamol: Relatively safe but liver damage if overdose. Rules: Opioids = strict prescription, register entry. Chronic pain: Doctor supervision essential. Addiction help: De-addiction centres, psychiatrist.

instruction: கல்வி உதவித்தொகை (Scholarship) எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: BC/MBC/SC/ST மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச கல்வி + உதவித்தொகை. விண்ணப்பம்: tneservices.tn.gov.in. ஆவணங்கள்: Community certificate, Income certificate, Marksheet. முக்கிய திட்டங்கள்: முதலமைச்சர் உயர்கல்வி உதவித்தொகை, BC/MBC Post-Matric Scholarship, SC/ST Scholarship

instruction: Sports quota-la college admission vaanga enna thaguthi venum?
output: State/National level-la participate panniyirukkanum. Sports certificate (SAI/Association certified) venum. District, State, National - edha level-la play panniyirundhalum quota-kku apply pannalam. Trials nadakkum.

instruction: Owner எப்போது வேண்டுமானாலும் rent increase செய்யலாமா?
output: முடியாது. Agreement period-க்குள் rent increase செய்ய முடியாது. Agreement முடிந்த பிறகு, புதிய agreement-ல் mutual consent-உடன் மட்டுமே increase செய்யலாம். Arbitrary increase-க்கு Rent Authority-ல் challenge செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Postmortem report எப்படி challenge பண்றது?
output: Challenge options: 1) Second opinion from forensic expert, 2) Exhumation and re-autopsy (court order needed), 3) Cross-examination of autopsy doctor, 4) Expert witness contradiction. Grounds: 1) Incomplete examination, 2) Wrong conclusions, 3) Procedural violations, 4) Bias. Important: Video recording of autopsy now mandatory in many cases. Evidence: Preserve body photos if possible.

instruction: TNHB (Tamil Nadu Housing Board) வீடு எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: TNHB affordable housing. Types: EWS (Economic Weaker Section), LIG, MIG, HIG flats/plots. Apply: tnhb.tn.gov.in-ல் online. Selection: Lottery/First-come-first-serve (scheme-க்கு ஏற்ப). Cost: Market விலையை விட குறைவு. Loan: Banks-உடன் tie-up, easy EMI. Documents: Income proof, Aadhaar, Address proof. Projects: Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai, other cities. Rental Housing: Low-income-க்கு TNHB rental schemes உண்டு.

instruction: Gym friend introduce pannaan - 'Health supplements, become distributor, recruitment bonus + product sales commission, 25,000 starter kit.'
output: MLM red flags - expensive starter kit, emphasis on recruitment over sales. 'Bonus for recruiting' = pyramid structure. Products usually overpriced, hard to sell. 95%+ MLM participants lose money. Politely decline, friendship maintain pannunga but business avoid.

instruction: Independence Day - 'Freedom sale 99% off on electronics!' suspicious website link. Shop பண்ணலாமா?
output: Fake shopping site! 99% off என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Independence Day-ல fraud sites increase. Money வாங்கிட்டு product அனுப்ப மாட்டாங்க. Amazon/Flipkart official apps மட்டும் use பண்ணுங்க. Unknown sites avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Passport reject aanadhu - enna seivathu?
output: Rejection reason check: passportindia.gov.in. Common reasons: Police verification issue, document mismatch, pending cases. Appeal: Regional Passport Officer. Court case pending: NOC from court required. Reapply with correct documents. Tatkaal for urgent cases.

instruction: Papaya/Pineapple pregnancy-la miscarriage cause pannumaa?
output: Myth (mostly)! Ripe papaya: Safe in moderate amounts. Raw papaya: Contains latex - avoid (may cause contractions). Pineapple: Safe in normal amounts (contains bromelain but too little to cause harm). No food: Scientifically proven to cause miscarriage in normal amounts. Advice: 1) Eat varied diet, 2) Avoid raw/undercooked food, 3) Consult doctor for specific concerns. Miscarriage causes: Usually chromosomal abnormalities, not food.

instruction: Internal assessment marks improve பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Internal marks strategy: 1) Attendance - 75% minimum, aim 90% 2) Assignment submit on time - presentation matters 3) Class participation - ask questions, answer 4) Lab records neat and complete 5) Internal tests - prepare like semester 6) Project work - original effort show 7) Behavior with faculty - respectful interaction. Impact: 20-25% of total marks. Easy marks if consistent throughout semester.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Gold testing certification course. 15,000 for BIS approved tester certificate.' Idhu useful certification aa?
output: BIS Hallmarking centre recognition has specific requirements and process. 'BIS approved tester certificate' through email course is not legitimate certification. Actual assayer training through recognized assaying centres. Check bis.gov.in for genuine training and recognition process.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Maid insurance scheme government. 1000 premium, 2 lakh coverage, accident and health.' Government scheme aa really?
output: PMJJBY (life) and PMSBY (accident) available for Rs 330-430 total through any bank account. No separate 'maid insurance scheme'. Ayushman Bharat for health is free for eligible families. Register for E-Shram card for unorganized workers benefits. Don't pay WhatsApp strangers.

instruction: கோயிலுக்கு போகும்போது என்ன dress code follow பண்ணணும்?
output: Dress code guidelines: 1) Men - வேட்டி/துண்டு preferred, lungdi ok, shorts allowed in some temples, 2) Women - saree/churidar preferred, dress with dupatta ok, 3) No sleeveless, revealing clothes, 4) Remove footwear at entrance, 5) Big temples may rent dhotis if needed. Specific temples like Padmanabhaswamy (Kerala) strict - only traditional dress. Tirumala moderately strict. Most TN temples flexible but modest dress respectful. Carry plastic bag for footwear.

instruction: 'Personal loan 2% interest only' என்று pamphlet பார்த்தேன். மிகவும் குறைவு போல் இருக்கிறதே?
output: 2% per month என்றால் வருடத்திற்கு 24%! அது மிக அதிகம். வட்டி வருடாந்திர rate (p.a.) கேளுங்கள். Hidden charges பற்றி கவனமாக இருங்கள்.

instruction: Diabetes, BP-க்கு free medicine கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! NCD (Non-Communicable Disease) Program. Free at: PHC, CHC, Government hospitals. Services: 1) Screening camps, 2) Blood sugar/BP check, 3) Basic medicines (Metformin, Amlodipine, etc.), 4) Diet counseling, 5) Regular monitoring. NCD clinics: Dedicated clinics at larger centres. Insulin: Available at district hospitals. Register: Health ID (ABHA) helps track records.

instruction: புதிய கடைக்கு Commercial Electricity Connection எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output:
**Commercial Electricity Connection (TANGEDCO):**

**Step 1: Online Application**
- Website: nsc.tnebnet.org
- Select: LT Commercial / HT Commercial
- Fill application form

**Step 2: Documents Upload**
- Ownership proof:
  - Own building: Sale Deed / Patta
  - Rent: Registered Rent Agreement
- Identity: Aadhaar + PAN
- Trade License / GST (if available)
- Building Completion Certificate
- Passport photo

**Step 3: Load Calculation**
- AC, Refrigerator, Lights, etc.
- Select appropriate load (kW)
- Higher load = Higher deposit

**Step 4: Inspection**
- TANGEDCO engineer visit
- Wiring check
- Meter location finalize
- Earthing check

**Step 5: Payment**

| Item | Amount (Approx) |
|------|----------------|
| Security Deposit | ₹1,500-15,000 |
| Service Connection | ₹500-2,000 |
| Meter Cost | ₹1,000-3,000 |
| Test Fee | ₹200-500 |

**Step 6: Connection**
- Meter installation
- Supply start
- **Time: 7-15 days**

**Tariff (Commercial LT):**
- Slab based
- Higher than domestic
- ToD (Time of Day) metering option

**HT Connection (Large Shops/Malls):**
- Load > 112 kW
- Separate application
- Transformer may be needed
- Higher deposit

**Tips:**
- Apply load slightly higher than need
- Load enhancement later is tedious
- Temporary connection available for construction

**Complaints:**
- 94987-94987
- TANGEDCO App
- EB Office visit

instruction: Anger control பண்ண முடியவில்லை - எந்த குறள் உதவும்?
output: 'சினம்என்னும் சேர்ந்தாரைக் கொல்லி இனம்என்னும் ஏமப்புணையை சுடும்'. கோபம் என்பது நம்மை சேர்ந்தவர்களையே (குடும்பம், நண்பர்கள்) அழிக்கும். மேலும்: 'ஆறுவது சினம்' (ஆத்திசூடி) - கோபத்தை ஆறவிடுங்கள். Count to 10, take deep breaths, walk away. Anger hurts YOU more than others.

instruction: Veedu vadakaikku kodukka porein. Rent Agreement register seiyya venduma? Online seyyalamaa?
output:
**Rent Agreement Registration:**

**Mandatory?**
- Above 11 months: Registration mandatory
- Up to 11 months: Notarized enough (but register recommended)

**Why Register?**
- Legal validity, Court proof
- Easier tenant eviction
- Address proof for Passport/Bank

**Online Process:**
1. tnreginet.gov.in
2. E-stamping → Rent Agreement
3. Fill details (Landlord, Tenant, Property, Rent, Duration)
4. Pay stamp duty
5. Download e-stamp
6. Book SRO slot
7. Visit with parties + witnesses

**Costs:**
- Stamp Duty: 1% of (Annual Rent + Advance)
- Registration: 1%

**Example:** ₹15,000/month rent → ~₹4,200 total

**Documents:** Property document, Aadhaar, Photos, EB Bill, Tax receipt

**SRO Visit:** Both parties + 2 witnesses + Biometric

instruction: RTI reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: First Appeal: Appellate Authority-kku 30 days-kkul (PIO-vin senior officer). Second Appeal: State/Central Information Commission-kku 90 days-kkul. No fee for appeals. Commission penalty podalam - Rs.250/day, max Rs.25,000.

instruction: Mental hospital-la abuse nadakkuthu - complain enge?
output: Complaint options: 1) State Mental Health Authority, 2) Mental Health Review Board (district level), 3) Human Rights Commission (SHRC/NHRC), 4) Police (if physical/sexual abuse), 5) Health Department. Types of abuse: Physical restraints misuse, no consent treatment, inhumane conditions, denial of communication with family. Evidence: Photos if possible, witness statements, medical records.

instruction: Diabetes-க்கு Siddha medicine இருக்கா?
output: Yes! Siddha for Madhumegam (diabetes): Medicines: 1) Seenthil Choornam, 2) Neermulli Kudineer, 3) Nilavembu Kudineer, 4) Aavarai Pattai, 5) Sirukurinjan. Research: CCRS has validated formulations. Important: 1) Don't stop allopathic suddenly, 2) Regular monitoring essential, 3) Integrated approach best, 4) Diet + lifestyle crucial. Complication prevention: Siddha foot care for diabetic foot.

instruction: வீடியோ அழைப்பு திரைப்பிடிப்பு எடுத்து மிரட்டுகிறார்கள். புகார் செய்தால் வீடியோ பரவுமா?
output: முக்கிய புரிதல்: பணம் கொடுப்பது மிரட்டலை நிறுத்தாது - அதிகரிக்கும். புகார் செய்வது உள்ளடக்கத்தை பரப்பாது (காவல்துறை பகிராது). மோசடிக்காரர்கள் அரிதாகவே பகிர்வார்கள் (பணம் வேண்டும், பழி அல்ல). நீங்கள் பாதிக்கப்பட்டவர், குற்றவாளி அல்ல. உடனடியாக: பணம் கொடுக்காதீர்கள், தொடர்பு கொள்ளாதீர்கள், எல்லாவற்றையும் ஆவணப்படுத்துங்கள், கணக்குகளைப் பாதுகாக்கவும். புகார்: cybercrime.gov.in → 'பெண்களுக்கு எதிரான சைபர் குற்றம்' (அநாமதேய விருப்பம் உள்ளது), பெண்கள் உதவி எண் 181/1091, தளங்களில் புகார் செய்து உள்ளடக்கத்தை நீக்கவும். FIR பிரிவுகள்: IPC 384 (மிரட்டி பணம் பறித்தல்), IPC 506 (மிரட்டல்), IT சட்டம் 67A (ஆபாச உள்ளடக்கம்). ஆதரவு: IT for Change, Cyber Peace Foundation. உங்கள் படம் உங்கள் சொத்து.

instruction: உண்மை (truth) பற்றி என்ன குறள்கள் உள்ளன?
output: குறள்: 'வாய்மை எனப்படுவது யாதெனின் யாதொன்றும் தீமை இலாத சொலல்'. உண்மை என்பது யாருக்கும் தீங்கு செய்யாத வார்த்தைகளே. மேலும்: 'தன்நெஞ்சு அறிவது பொய்யற்க பொய்த்தபின் தன்நெஞ்சே தன்னைச் சுடும்'. நெஞ்சு அறிந்து பொய் சொன்னால், அந்த நெஞ்சே உன்னை வருத்தும். Conscience never lies!

instruction: நீதி / Justice பற்றி திருக்குறள் என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'செங்கோன்மை வேந்தனை செவ்வி திறவாதவர் நாணணி நாடு'. நீதியுடன் ஆளும் அரசனின் நாட்டில் மக்கள் பயமின்றி வாழ்வார்கள். மேலும்: 'ஓர்ந்துகண் ணோடாது இறைபுரிந்து யார்மாட்டும் தேர்ந்துசெய் வஃதே முறை'. பாரபட்சமின்றி, ஆராய்ந்து நீதி வழங்குவதே சரியான முறை. Impartial justice = foundation of good governance!

instruction: ஔவையார் யார்? எத்தனை ஔவையார்கள் இருந்தார்கள்?
output: ஔவையார் - தமிழின் மிகப் புகழ்பெற்ற பெண் கவிஞர். 'ஔவை' என்றால் 'மூதாட்டி' அல்லது 'தாய்' என்று பொருள். பல காலகட்டங்களில் வெவ்வேறு ஔவையார்கள் இருந்ததாக scholars கருதுகிறார்கள்: 1) சங்க கால ஔவையார் - புறநானூறு பாடியவர், அதியமான் நெடுஞ்செழியனின் நண்பர், 2) பக்தி கால ஔவையார் - ஆத்திசூடி, கொன்றைவேந்தன் எழுதியவர், முருகன் பக்தை. இரண்டாவது ஔவையார் மிகவும் popular - குழந்தைகளுக்கு நீதி கற்பிக்கும் பாடல்கள் எழுதியவர்.

instruction: TNPSC Current Affairs eppadi prepare aavadhu?
output: Current Affairs strategy: 1) Daily newspaper - The Hindu/Indian Express Tamil 2) Monthly magazines - Shankar IAS, Vision 3) PIB daily bulletin 4) TN Government press releases 5) YouTube - free CA classes. Focus areas: TN government schemes, India-international relations, sports, awards, science. Weightage: 25-30% in TNPSC. Last 6 months - most important. Make short notes daily. Revision: Weekly once previous weeks review.

instruction: Concentration improve panna enna seiyanum?
output: Concentration tips: 1) Pomodoro technique - 25 min study, 5 min break 2) Mobile silent/away 3) Study table clean, good lighting 4) One subject at a time 5) Break tasks into smaller parts 6) Reward yourself after targets 7) Sleep 7-8 hours 8) Exercise daily 9) Meditation 10 minutes 10) Healthy food - avoid heavy meals. Environment: Same place, same time daily. Brain trains itself. Start with 30 min, increase gradually.

instruction: கோவையில் engineering படிக்க நல்ல college எது?
output: PSG Tech (autonomous - best ranking), GCT (government), CIT, Amrita, KGISL ஆகியவை முன்னணி colleges. PSG-க்கு TNEA counselling-ல் high cutoff வரும். GCT government college - fees மிகக் குறைவு.

instruction: Online fraud-kku complaint enge poduvadhu?
output: 1) Cyber Crime portal: cybercrime.gov.in (national), 2) Local Cyber Crime police station, 3) 1930 helpline (financial fraud), 4) Bank-kku immediately inform. Screenshots, transaction details, communication records - ellam save pannunga. 24 hours-kkul report panninaal money recover chance adhigam.

instruction: Infertility treatment government hospital-ல் available-ஆ?
output: Limited but available. Government: 1) Basic infertility workup - free at medical college hospitals, 2) Some IUI facilities, 3) Counseling. IVF: 1) Limited government centres (Institute of Obstetrics - Chennai), 2) Subsidized at some, 3) Mostly private (expensive). CMCHIS: Covers some infertility procedures. PM-PMSBY: Assisted reproduction not fully covered yet. Cost: IVF privately Rs.1-3 lakhs per cycle.

instruction: Chennai-ல் புதிய Metro Water Connection எப்படி வாங்குவது? Online apply செய்யலாமா?
output:
**CMWSSB (Chennai Metro Water) - New Connection:**

**Online Application:**
1. Website: chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in
2. Online Services → New Connection
3. Register / Login
4. Fill application
5. Upload documents
6. Pay fee online

**Offline Application:**
- Area Engineer Office
- CMWSSB Head Office

**Documents Required:**
- Property document (Patta / Sale Deed)
- Building Approval Plan
- Property Tax Receipt
- Aadhaar Card
- Passport Photo
- Existing water bill (if any)

**Types of Connection:**

| Type | Monthly Charge |
|------|---------------|
| Domestic | ₹70-400 (based on usage) |
| Commercial | Higher rates |
| Industrial | Highest |

**Process:**

**Step 1:** Application Submit

**Step 2:** Site Inspection
- Feasibility check
- Pipeline proximity
- Road cutting requirement

**Step 3:** Estimate
- Connection charge
- Road cutting charge (if any)
- Deposit

**Approximate Costs:**
| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Connection Charge | ₹500-2,000 |
| Security Deposit | ₹500-1,000 |
| Road Cutting | ₹5,000-20,000 (if needed) |

**Step 4:** Payment

**Step 5:** Connection
- Time: 15-30 days (normal)
- Road cutting: 1-2 months

**No Water Supply Area:**
- Tanker request: chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in
- Borewell permission from CMWSSB

**Complaints:**
- Helpline: 044-4567 4567
- App: CMWSSB Mobile App
- Email: customercare@cmwssb.tn.gov.in

**Bill Payment:**
- Online: chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in
- PayTM, PhonePe, etc.
- Area Office
- Due: Monthly
- Delay penalty applies

instruction: PM-KISAN scheme-ல் எப்படி register செய்வது?
output: pmkisan.gov.in-ல் online register செய்யலாம் அல்லது CSC centre-ல் செய்யலாம். Land records, Aadhaar, bank account தேவை. ஆண்டுக்கு Rs.6,000 (3 installments) கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: 'Loan foreclosure - உங்கள் loan close செய்ய 20,000 transfer செய்யுங்கள்' என்று bank-ல் இருந்து call வந்தது போல் இருக்கிறது.
output: Bank-ஐ நேரடியாக அழைத்து verify செய்யுங்கள். Caller சொல்லும் number-ல் அழைக்காதீர்கள். Foreclosure-க்கு branch visit செய்வது safe.

instruction: UZHAVAN App endraal enna? Enna services ulladhu?
output: Single app for TN farmers. Services: Crop insurance apply, KCC loan status, Subsidy schemes apply, Weather updates, Market prices (UZHAVAR SANDHAI rates), Expert advice. Download: Play Store - UZHAVAN. Registration: Aadhaar + farmer ID. Alerts: SMS/notification for govt schemes, weather warning. Offline: Basic info works offline. Language: Tamil + English.

instruction: 'Flood insurance claim - call this number for quick settlement' SMS வந்துச்சு. Call பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam SMS! Insurance company direct call பண்ணுமே தவிர claim-க்கு SMS அனுப்பாது. Monsoon-ல insurance fraud அதிகம். Your insurer official number-ல நீங்களே call பண்ணுங்க. Unknown numbers avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: 'Nayanilan enbadhu sollum' - selfish person patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Nayanilan enbadhu sollum payanila sollizhuk kuttravar natpu'. Artham: Payanatra pecchu pesupavargaloda natpu, 'ivar selfish' endru kaattiVidum. Quality of friendship shows character. Your friends reflect who you are!

instruction: PF withdrawal eppadi seivathu?
output: Online: EPFO portal → Online Services → Claim. Conditions: Retirement (58 years), 2 months unemployment, medical emergency (partial), home loan (partial), marriage (partial). Full withdrawal: Job quit + 2 months gap. Aadhaar linked UAN venum. 5-10 days-la amount varum.

instruction: RTI reply ethanai naalil kidaikkum?
output: Normal: 30 days. Life/liberty matter: 48 hours. Third party information: 40 days. Transfer to other department: 35 days (5 days transfer + 30 days). Reply illaattal deemed refusal - First Appeal podalam.

instruction: Arul / karunai (kindness) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Arutselvam selvaththul selvam porutselvam pooriyaar kannum ula'. Karunai endra selvamae unmaiyaana selvam. Panam kettavargalidamum irukkum. Melum: 'Maraththalum innaa pirarnenju mannaadha potrum karunai'. Karunai illaadha vaazhkkai vaazhkkaiyae alla. Kindness = true wealth!

instruction: Flash sale-ல் order confirm ஆனது, பிறகு cancel பண்ணிட்டாங்க - legal-ஆ?
output: Unilateral cancellation after confirmation unfair trade practice ஆகும். Consumer forum-ல் complaint போடலாம். Price difference + compensation கேட்கலாம். 'Out of stock' excuse valid அல்ல - stock management seller responsibility.

instruction: Government job salary ranges
output: TNPSC Group 1: ₹56,100-1,77,500 (DSP, DC level). Group 2: ₹35,400-1,12,400 (Assistant level). Group 4: ₹19,500-62,000 (Clerk level). Banking PO: ₹40,000-80,000+. SSC CGL: ₹35,000-1,50,000. Teaching (TRB): ₹35,000-70,000. Note: Includes DA, HRA, benefits.

instruction: Dowry demand-kku enna action edukkalam?
output: Dowry ketpathu/koduppathu illegal (Dowry Prohibition Act). Complaint: Police, Women helpline 181, Protection Officer. Punishment: 5 years imprisonment + fine. Dowry death (304B IPC): 7 years to life imprisonment. Evidence: Messages, recordings, witness statements.

instruction: Free legal aid enga peruvadhu?
output: TNSLSA (Tamil Nadu State Legal Services Authority) provides free legal aid. Eligibility: BPL, SC/ST, women, differently-abled, senior citizens, victims of trafficking. Helpline: 15100 (24x7). Legal Aid Cell at every district court. Lok Adalat for quick settlements.

instruction: Diagnostic lab report-ல் doubt - retest கேட்கலாமா?
output: Yes! Your right. Options: 1) Same lab - request repeat test (may charge or free depending), 2) Different NABL-accredited lab, 3) Hospital lab if admission. Red flags: 1) Result doesn't match symptoms, 2) Drastic change from previous, 3) Clerical errors visible. Lab liability: Wrong report causing harm = negligence. Verify: NABL accreditation for reliability.

instruction: Advance/Security deposit evvalavu ketkalam?
output: Tamil Nadu-la sattapadi maximum 3 months rent mathume advance-aa vaangalam. But practice-la 6-10 months advance kekkuranga. Idhu illegal. Rent Authority-kku complaint seyyalam.

instruction: LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship என்ன?
output: LIC Golden Jubilee Foundation Scholarship: Economically weaker section students-க்கு. Amount: ₹10,000-20,000/ஆண்டு. Eligibility: 10th 60%+ marks, family income ₹2 lakh கீழ். Special quota: LIC employees' children. Apply: Through LIC branch or www.buddy4study.com. Covers: School fees, books, uniform. Renewable annually based on marks.

instruction: Architecture padippu (B.Arch) eppadi seruvathu?
output: NATA exam compulsory. Eligibility: +2 Maths 50%. Duration: 5 years. Chennai Anna University, SAP, SRM nalla colleges. Govt college fee: ₹30,000-50,000/year. JEE Paper 2 moolamum admission kidaikkum. Creative field with good scope.

instruction: Soil Health Card endraal enna? Eppadi peruvadhu?
output: To know soil nutrient status. Card Info: N, P, K levels, pH value, micro nutrients, organic carbon. Testing: Once in 3 years (Govt-free). Benefit: Use right fertilizers, reduce cost, increase yield. Get it: Village Agriculture Officer/Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Check status: soilhealth.dac.gov.in. Sample collection: Agriculture officer collects soil from field.

instruction: Kayakalpa treatment என்ன? எங்கே available?
output: Kayakalpa = Rejuvenation/anti-aging therapy. Purpose: Longevity, vitality, reverse aging effects. Methods: 1) Special medicines (Kayakalpa pills), 2) Dietary regimen, 3) Yoga, pranayama, 4) Lifestyle modifications. Duration: 40-90 days typically (intensive). Where: 1) NIS specialized program, 2) Selected Siddha hospitals, 3) Traditional practitioners. Not for: Acute illness, certain chronic conditions. Preparation: Requires purification therapies first.

instruction: Consumer case-kku time limit irukkaa?
output: Aama. Problem therinja naalilirundhu 2 years-kkul complaint kodukkanum. Special circumstances-la delay condone aagalam - valid reason irukkanum. Medical negligence cases-kku discovery date-la irundhu count aagum.

instruction: Offer letter vanthaachu, joining-ku munnaadi enna check pannanum?
output: Verify before joining: 1) Company registration - MCA website check 2) Glassdoor reviews - employee experiences 3) Offer letter details - CTC breakdown, deductions 4) Bond clause - duration, penalty 5) Notice period - reasonable? 6) Probation period - terms 7) Location confirmation 8) Joining date flexibility. Documents to prepare: Original certificates, bank account, PAN card, Aadhaar, photos. Background verification: Common in MNCs - ensure documents genuine.

instruction: யாரோ போன் செய்து 'நீங்கள் லக்கி winner, 2 லட்சம் கிடைக்கும், GST மட்டும் கட்டுங்கள்' என்றார்கள்.
output: இது மோசடி அழைப்பு. பரிசுக்கு GST கட்ட வேண்டியதில்லை. எந்த பணமும் கொடுக்காதீர்கள். போனை வையுங்கள்.

instruction: அரசு கலை மற்றும் அறிவியல் கல்லூரிகளில் BA/BSc சேர்க்கை எப்படி?
output: படிகள்: 1) www.tngasa.in-ல் ஆன்லைன் விண்ணப்பம் 2) +2 மதிப்பெண் அடிப்படையில் தரவரிசை 3) கவுன்சிலிங் தேதி அறிவிப்பு 4) சான்றிதழ் சரிபார்ப்பு 5) கல்லூரி ஒதுக்கீடு. கட்டணம்: அரசு கல்லூரிகளில் ஆண்டுக்கு ₹500-2000 மட்டுமே. 7.5% இட ஒதுக்கீடு அரசு பள்ளி மாணவர்களுக்கு உள்ளது.

instruction: இடைக்காடர் சித்தர் பற்றி என்ன தெரியும்?
output: இடைக்காடர் ஆடு மேய்க்கும் இடையர் சமூகத்தைச் சேர்ந்தவர் என்று நம்பப்படுகிறது - அதனால் இந்த பெயர். சாதி பேதமின்றி எவரும் சித்தராகலாம் என்பதற்கு example. 'இடைக்காடர் ஞானம்', 'இடைக்காடர் வைத்தியம்' போன்ற நூல்கள் அவர் பெயரில் உள்ளன. எளிய மொழியில் ஆன்மீகத்தை explain பண்ணியவர்.

instruction: 'Ayya, naan unga neighbor Lakshmi pesuren, WhatsApp la problem, OTP oru number ku forward aaiduchu, adha sollunga' nu call vandhudhu. Lakshmi voice maadhiri irukku.
output: WhatsApp OTP sollaadhenga ayya! Idhu account takeover scam. OTP kuduthaa unga WhatsApp account thirudiduvaanga, unga contacts kitta kaasu keppanga unga name la. Lakshmi kitta direct poi pesunga - probably avangooda account already hacked.

instruction: Free contraceptives enge kidaikkum?
output: Free at: 1) PHC, 2) Government hospitals, 3) Anganwadi centres, 4) Urban health centres. Available: 1) Condoms, 2) Oral contraceptive pills (Mala-N, Mala-D), 3) IUD (Copper-T), 4) Injectable contraceptives, 5) Emergency contraceptive pills. Counseling: ANM/health worker will explain options. Choice: Woman's decision - no coercion. Sterilization: Also free but completely voluntary.

instruction: Maintenance kodukkaavittaal enna action edukkalam?
output: Options: 1) Execution petition - salary attachment, property attachment, 2) Contempt of court - imprisonment up to 3 months, 3) Section 125 CrPC - Magistrate can order payment + imprisonment. Arrears + future maintenance ketkalam. Don't delay - act immediately.

instruction: Fake job offer ku processing fee potten, now company traceable illa. Recovery eppidi?
output: Immediate: Collect company details, analyze email headers, note payment beneficiary details. Report to: cybercrime.gov.in (Job fraud category), Labour Department labour.gov.in, Company impersonated (fake TCS/Infosys letter - report to real company), Job portal used, Bank complaint for beneficiary account freeze. Recovery: Police tracing beneficiary, if domestic scammer caught - court recovery, if international - very difficult. Prevention for others: Share fake offer on LinkedIn, report to portals.

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Marriage Registration After Hindu Wedding - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Last month wedding aachu. Marriage certificate vaanganum. Eppadi?

Assistant: Congrats! Marriage registration important - passport, visa, bank, property ellathukum use aagum.

**Quick Questions:**
1. Hindu marriage aa? Other religion?
2. Wedding enga nadandhuchu - TN or other state?
3. Bride & Groom - both TN residents aa?

Indha details sollunga, exact process sollren.

User: Hindu marriage. Chennai-la nadandhuchu. Both TN residents.

Assistant: Perfect! Hindu Marriage Act-la register pannalam:

**Two Options:**

**Option 1: Compulsory Registration (TN Rules)**
- Within 1 year of marriage
- No delay fee
- Easier process

**Option 2: After 1 year**
- Additional affidavit
- Newspaper notice
- More documents

Unga wedding evvalavu days aachu?

User: 3 weeks aachu. Online apply pannalaamaa?

Assistant: **Yes! Online Apply Available:**

**Step 1: tnreginet.gov.in**
1. Go to tnreginet.gov.in
2. Register / Login
3. Select: Marriage Registration
4. Choose: Hindu Marriage Act
5. Fill Form:
   - Husband details
   - Wife details
   - Marriage details (date, place, priest)
6. Upload documents
7. Pay fee online: ₹100-500
8. Book SRO appointment

**Step 2: Gather Documents**

**Both parties:**
- Age Proof (Aadhaar / DOB Certificate / SSLC)
- Address Proof
- Passport size photos (4 each)

**Marriage Proof (Any 2):**
- Wedding Invitation Card
- Wedding Photos (with clear faces)
- Priest's Certificate
- Hall booking receipt

**Witnesses:**
- 2 witnesses with Aadhaar copy
- (Usually parents or relatives)

**Important:** 
- Husband age: 21+
- Wife age: 18+
- Both should be unmarried before this wedding

Documents ready aa?

User: Documents ready. SRO la enna nadakkum? Eppo poganum?

Assistant: **SRO Visit Process:**

**Who Should Come:**
1. Husband (with all original documents)
2. Wife (with all original documents)
3. 2 Witnesses (with Aadhaar original)

**At SRO:**

**Step 1: Token/Appointment**
- Show online booking
- Get token number

**Step 2: Document Verification**
- Officer checks all documents
- Verifies ages
- Checks photos

**Step 3: Signing**
- Husband signs
- Wife signs
- Witnesses sign
- Officer signs

**Step 4: Biometric**
- All 4 persons - fingerprint & photo

**Step 5: Certificate**
- Marriage Certificate issued
- Same day!
- Certified copy: Additional ₹50

**Time:** 1-2 hours (depending on crowd)

**Best Time to Go:**
- Reach by 10:30 AM
- Avoid month-end
- Avoid Fridays (rush)

**After Certificate:**
- Wife can change name in documents
- Aadhaar, PAN, Passport update possible

SRO appointment book panniteengala?

User: Book pannitten. Oru doubt - wife name change pannumaa documents-la?

Assistant: **Wife's Name Change - Optional!**

**Two Options:**

**Option 1: No Name Change**
- Perfectly legal
- Many women keep maiden name
- Marriage certificate shows maiden name
- No issues with any document

**Option 2: Name Change**
- Add husband's surname
- Or completely change to husband's family name
- Requires updating all documents

**If Wife Wants to Change:**

**Documents to Update:**
1. **Aadhaar** - Aadhaar Seva Kendra (₹50)
2. **PAN** - onlineservices.nsdl.com (₹107)
3. **Passport** - passportindia.gov.in (₹1,500)
4. **Voter ID** - voters.eci.gov.in (Free)
5. **Bank Account** - Bank branch (Free)
6. **Driving License** - parivahan.gov.in (₹200-500)

**Order of Update:**
1. Aadhaar first (base document)
2. PAN second (link with Aadhaar)
3. Then others

**Documents Needed for Each:**
- Marriage Certificate
- Old document
- Husband's ID proof (some places)

**Time:** 2-4 weeks for all updates

Wife name change panna plan irukka?

User: Wife name add pannanum. Aadhaar-la eppadi?

Assistant: **Wife Aadhaar Name Change:**

**Can't do fully online - Need to visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra**

**Step 1: Book Appointment (Optional but better)**
- appointments.uidai.gov.in
- Select: Update Aadhaar
- Choose nearby center

**Step 2: Documents to Carry**
- **Original Aadhaar Card** (wife's)
- **Marriage Certificate** (Original + Copy)
- **Husband's Aadhaar** (Copy)
- **Passport Photo** (if photo update needed)

**Step 3: At Aadhaar Center**
1. Fill Update form
2. Select: Name Change + Address Change (if needed)
3. Submit documents
4. Biometric verification
5. Pay: ₹50
6. Get acknowledgment slip

**Step 4: New Aadhaar**
- URN (Update Request Number) on slip
- Track: uidai.gov.in
- New Aadhaar by post: 2-3 weeks
- Download e-Aadhaar: Same time

**Name Format Options:**
- Add surname: "Priya Kumar" → "Priya Ravi Kumar"
- Full change: "Priya Kumar" → "Priya Ravi"
- Both acceptable

**Important:**
- New Aadhaar same number
- Photo can also be updated (recommended)

**After Aadhaar:**
- PAN update becomes easy (Aadhaar OTP)
- Bank update: Just show new Aadhaar

Aadhaar center nearby irukka? Appointment book pannalaamaa?

User: Okay. PAN update automatic aagumaa Aadhaar link irundhaa?

Assistant: **Good Question! No - Not Automatic**

**PAN Won't Auto-Update!**
- PAN-Aadhaar link irundhalum name different irukkalam
- But mismatch irundha problems varum
- So update is MUST

**PAN Name Change Process:**

**After Aadhaar Updated:**

**Step 1: Online Apply**
1. onlineservices.nsdl.com
2. "Changes or Correction in PAN Data"
3. Select: Change in Name
4. Enter: Old PAN details
5. Enter: New name (as per new Aadhaar)
6. Upload: New Aadhaar + Marriage Certificate
7. Pay: ₹107
8. Submit

**Step 2: Verification**
- Aadhaar OTP verification
- Or: Sign & send documents by post

**Step 3: New PAN Card**
- Same PAN number (number doesn't change)
- New card with new name
- Time: 15-20 days

**PAN-Aadhaar Re-linking:**
- After name change, re-verify link
- eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar Status

**Mismatch Problem:**
If names don't match:
- ITR filing issues
- Bank KYC problems
- Mutual Fund issues

**Tip:** Keep both names similar across documents!

Shall I give complete name change checklist?

User: Yes please, complete checklist tharunga

Assistant: **WIFE'S NAME CHANGE - COMPLETE CHECKLIST:**

**ORDER OF UPDATE (Follow this sequence!):**

**STEP 1: Marriage Certificate**
- [ ] tnreginet.gov.in - Apply
- [ ] SRO Visit - Both parties + 2 witnesses
- [ ] Get certified copies (2-3)
- **Time:** 1 day
- **Cost:** ₹100-500

**STEP 2: Aadhaar Card (Do First!)**
- [ ] Book appointment: appointments.uidai.gov.in
- [ ] Visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra
- [ ] Documents: Old Aadhaar + Marriage Certificate + Husband Aadhaar copy
- [ ] Pay ₹50
- [ ] Download e-Aadhaar when ready
- **Time:** 2-3 weeks
- **Cost:** ₹50

**STEP 3: PAN Card**
- [ ] onlineservices.nsdl.com
- [ ] Upload: New Aadhaar + Marriage Certificate
- [ ] Pay ₹107
- [ ] Verify PAN-Aadhaar link after
- **Time:** 15-20 days
- **Cost:** ₹107

**STEP 4: Bank Account**
- [ ] Visit branch
- [ ] Documents: New Aadhaar + PAN + Marriage Certificate
- [ ] Update: Name, Address, Nominee
- [ ] Get new cheque book, debit card
- **Time:** 7 days
- **Cost:** Free

**STEP 5: Voter ID**
- [ ] voters.eci.gov.in → Form 8
- [ ] Upload: New Aadhaar + Marriage Certificate
- [ ] BLO verification
- [ ] New EPIC issued
- **Time:** 2-4 weeks
- **Cost:** Free

**STEP 6: Driving License (if applicable)**
- [ ] parivahan.gov.in
- [ ] Upload: New Aadhaar + Marriage Certificate
- [ ] Pay ₹200-500
- [ ] RTO visit for biometric
- **Time:** 7-15 days
- **Cost:** ₹200-500

**STEP 7: Passport (if needed)**
- [ ] passportindia.gov.in
- [ ] Fresh passport or Re-issue
- [ ] Documents: All updated + Marriage Certificate
- [ ] PSK visit
- [ ] Police verification
- **Time:** 2-4 weeks
- **Cost:** ₹1,500

**OTHER UPDATES:**
- [ ] Insurance policies - Nominee + Name
- [ ] EPF (if employed) - Nomination
- [ ] LIC policies
- [ ] Demat account
- [ ] Property (if joint owner)

**TOTAL ESTIMATED:**
- Time: 4-6 weeks for main documents
- Cost: ~₹2,500-3,000

**TIPS:**
1. Keep 5 copies of Marriage Certificate
2. Scan all documents - digital copies handy
3. Update Aadhaar FIRST - base for everything
4. Inform employer HR for records

**QUICK REFERENCE:**
| Document | Where | Time | Cost |
|----------|-------|------|------|
| Marriage Cert | SRO | 1 day | ₹500 |
| Aadhaar | ASK | 2-3 weeks | ₹50 |
| PAN | NSDL | 15-20 days | ₹107 |
| Bank | Branch | 7 days | Free |
| Voter ID | Online | 2-4 weeks | Free |
| DL | RTO | 7-15 days | ₹500 |
| Passport | PSK | 2-4 weeks | ₹1,500 |

All the best! Happy married life! 🎉

instruction: Chit fund company பணம் தர மறுக்கிறது - complaint எங்கே?
output: Registered chit: Registrar of Chits (District). Unregistered: Police (cheating), Economic Offences Wing. TN Chit Funds Act violation. Consumer forum-உம் possible. Documents: Chit tickets, receipts, agreement. Collective complaint stronger.

instruction: நாலாயிர திவ்ய பிரபந்தம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: நாலாயிர திவ்ய பிரபந்தம் - 12 ஆழ்வார்களால் பாடப்பட்ட வைணவ பக்தி இலக்கியம். 4,000 பாசுரங்கள் (பாடல்கள்). 108 திவ்ய தேசங்களை (விஷ்ணு கோயில்கள்) பாடியது. நாதமுனிகள் தொகுத்தார். முக்கிய பகுதிகள்: திருப்பாவை (ஆண்டாள்), திருவாய்மொழி (நம்மாழ்வார்), பெரிய திருமொழி (திருமங்கை ஆழ்வார்). 'தமிழ் வேதம்' என்று அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.

instruction: NEET-ku prepare aaganum, Telugu medium-la padichirukken, mudiyumaa?
output: Mudiyum! NEET 13 languages-la ezhudhalaam - Telugu option irukku. TN state quota-ku: Native certificate venum OR 10th, 11th, 12th TN-la padichirukka venum. Border areas: Hosur, Krishnagiri students apply pannalam. NCERT Telugu version available. Focus on concepts - language secondary. Many Telugu medium students crack NEET!

instruction: Engal gramathula kudineer prachhanai ulladhu. Government-kitta eppadi complaint seyvadhu? Enna thittangal ullana?
output:
**Rural Drinking Water Problem Solution:**

**Complaint Channels:**
1. Gram Panchayat - Written complaint, Gram Sabha
2. Block Development Officer - If Panchayat doesn't act
3. District Collector - tndistricts.gov.in, CM Cell 1100
4. TWAD Board - twadboard.tn.gov.in, 1800-425-5434

**Government Schemes:**
1. **Jal Jeevan Mission** - Tap water to every house, Free
2. **Combined Water Supply** - Multi-village scheme
3. **Oorani Restoration** - Traditional water body repair
4. **RO Plant** - For high TDS areas

**Individual Connection:**
- Apply at Panchayat
- ₹100-500 charge

**Water Quality Issue:**
- Free testing at District Lab

instruction: Wrongful termination-kku enna seyyalam?
output: Options: 1) Labour Commissioner complaint, 2) Labour Court (Industrial Disputes Act), 3) Civil Court. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Document everything: Termination letter, emails, performance records. Time limit: 3 years from termination date.

instruction: Bank/Company respond pannala, Consumer Forum la case file eppidi?
