output: குறள்: 'மனத்துக்கண் மாசிலன் ஆதல் அனைத்தறன் ஆகுல நீர பிற'. அர்த்தம்: மனம் தூய்மையாக இருப்பதே அறம். மற்ற எல்லா சடங்குகளும், ஆசாரங்களும் வெளிப்படையான show. உள்ளம் சுத்தமாக இருந்தால் போதும். External rituals-ஐ விட internal purity முக்கியம் என்கிறார் வள்ளுவர்.

instruction: 'Arulillaarkku avvulagam illai' - arul patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Arulillaarkku avvulagam illai porulillaarkku ivvulagam illai yaangu'. Artham: Karunai illadhavargalukkku marumai (after-life) illai. Panam illadhavargalukkku immai (indha ulagam) kashtam. Compassion = spiritual wealth, Money = worldly needs. Irandum thevai!

instruction: Heart surgery-க்கு CMCHIS use செய்யலாமா?
output: ஆம், cardiac surgeries CMCHIS-ல் covered. Bypass, valve replacement, angioplasty எல்லாம் cashless. Empaneled cardiac hospitals-ல் treatment பெறலாம். Pre-authorization தேவை.

instruction: Exam time - 'TNPSC question paper leaked! Buy for 10000 Rs' WhatsApp message. Real leak-ஆ?
output: 100% scam and illegal! Paper leak என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Exam time-ல இந்த fraud peak. Money வாங்கி fake paper தருவாங்க. Plus legal trouble for you. Report to cyber crime. Study properly, shortcuts வேண்டாம்.

instruction: Arts padiththaal enna velai kidaikkum?
output: Arts padippin job opportunities: 1) Government jobs - TNPSC, SSC, Banking 2) Teaching - B.Ed seithu teacher 3) Journalism/Media 4) Civil Services - IAS, IPS 5) Law - LLB sernthu lawyer 6) Social work 7) HR/Administration. NET exam ezhudhi Professor aagalam. UPSC-ku Arts background siranthidhu.

instruction: Home remedies safe-ஆ? எப்போது avoid பண்ணணும்?
output: Some safe: Ginger for nausea, turmeric milk, salt water gargle, honey for cough (not <1 year). Avoid home remedies: 1) Serious illness (high fever, breathing difficulty), 2) When already on prescription medicines (interactions), 3) Wounds/burns (infection risk), 4) Children/pregnant (specific risks). Rule: Home remedy not working in 2-3 days = see doctor. Never apply: Cow dung on wounds, kerosene on head lice (dangerous!).

instruction: பொறுமை (patience) பற்றி முக்கிய குறள்கள் என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'அகழ்வாரைத் தாங்கும் நிலம்போல தம்மை இகழ்வார்ப் பொறுத்தல் தலை'. தன்னை இகழ்பவர்களையும் பூமி போல் தாங்குவதே சிறந்த குணம். மேலும்: 'பொறுத்தாரைப் பொன்றாமை காக்கும்'. பொறுமை உள்ளவர்களை failure காக்கும். Patience = shield against failure!

instruction: OLX இல் பொருள் விற்றேன். வாங்குபவர் 'பணம் அனுப்ப QR குறியீடு ஸ்கேன் செய்யுங்கள்' என்று சொன்னார். ஸ்கேன் செய்யலாமா?
output: செய்யாதீர்கள்! பணம் பெற QR ஸ்கேன் தேவையில்லை. QR ஸ்கேன் செய்து PIN போட்டால் பணம் உங்கள் கணக்கிலிருந்து போகும். இது தலைகீழ் UPI மோசடி.

instruction: Bank exam Reasoning section எப்படி crack பண்றது?
output: Reasoning topics: Puzzles & Seating Arrangement (30-40% weightage), Syllogism, Blood Relations, Direction, Coding-Decoding, Inequality. Strategy: 1) Puzzles - daily 10 practice 2) Logic rules memorize 3) Speed improve through timed practice 4) Easy questions first in exam 5) Skip time-consuming Qs. Resources: RS Aggarwal, Rakesh Yadav, Testbook app. Time: 35 questions in 20-25 minutes. Practice = key to success.

instruction: Chennai-ல் Property Tax எப்படி கட்டுவது? Assessment தவறு என்றால் என்ன செய்வது?
output:
**Property Tax Payment (Chennai Corporation):**

**Online Payment:**
1. Website: chennaicorporation.gov.in
2. Click: Property Tax
3. Enter: Zone Number + Division + Bill Number
4. Or: Property Tax Assessment Number
5. View bill details
6. Pay: Net Banking / UPI / Card
7. Download receipt

**Offline Payment:**
- Corporation Zonal Office
- e-Seva Centers
- Common Service Centers

**Due Dates:**
- Half-yearly: April & October
- Advance payment: 5% discount
- Delay: 2% penalty per month

**Assessment Calculation:**
- Annual Rental Value (ARV) method
- Factors: Location, Area, Age, Usage
- Residential vs Commercial rates different

**Assessment தவறு என்றால்:**

**Step 1: Objection Filing**
- எங்கே: Zonal Office / Online
- Within 15 days of assessment
- Form + Supporting documents

**Step 2: Documents for Objection**
- Property document
- Previous tax receipts
- Building plan (approved)
- Area measurement proof
- Usage proof (Residential/Commercial)

**Step 3: Hearing**
- Revenue Inspector verification
- Assistant Revenue Officer hearing
- Your explanation

**Step 4: Revised Assessment**
- If accepted: New assessment
- If rejected: Appeal to Commissioner

**Appeal Process:**
- First Appeal: Commissioner
- Second Appeal: Small Causes Court
- Time limit: 30 days each stage

**Common Issues:**
- Wrong plinth area
- Commercial rate for residential
- Old building shown as new
- Vacant land taxed as building

**Tips:**
- Keep all tax receipts
- Update ownership after purchase
- Inform about demolition/modification
- Check assessment every revision cycle

instruction: 12th exam-la centum vaanga mudiyumaa? Eppadi?
output: Centum possible subjects: Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Accountancy. Tips: 1) NCERT concepts thelivaaga purindhukollunga 2) Formula sheet thayaariyunga 3) Numerical problems: 50+ types practice 4) Diagram neat-aa draw pannunga 5) Answer writing: Steps muzhmaiyaaga 6) Time management: 3 hours mock tests. Centum scorers: 6 AM study, revision before sleep, doubt clearing same day.

instruction: சட்டப் படிப்பு (LLB) தமிழ்நாட்டில் எப்படி சேர்வது?
output: இரண்டு வழிகள்: 1) 5-வருட BA LLB (+2 முடித்தவர்களுக்கு) - CLAT/TNDALU நுழைவுத் தேர்வு 2) 3-வருட LLB (பட்டதாரிகளுக்கு). Dr. Ambedkar Law University கவுன்சிலிங் நடத்துகிறது. CLAT score பல கல்லூரிகளில் ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளப்படும். அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ₹5,000-15,000/ஆண்டு.

instruction: TN ரேஷன் கடையில் என்ன பொருட்கள் கிடைக்கும்?
output: TN PDS items list. Rice Card: 20 kg free rice/family. Sugar Card: 5 kg rice at ₹1/kg. Common: Sugar 1.5 kg (₹13.50), Wheat/Atta 2 kg (₹7), Palm Oil 500ml (₹27), Daal 1 kg (₹28). Specials: Pongal - 1 kg sugar free + cash; Diwali - 1 kg sugar free; Ramzan - dates + cash for Muslims. Eligibility: Ration card type-க்கு ஏற்ப. Shop: Monthly distribution, SMS alert.

instruction: FedEx call vandhuchi - 'Unga name la drugs parcel Mumbai customs la seized, CBI case file aagum' nu. Video call la uniform la oru aalu, 2 lakh pay pannina case close nu solraan. Bayam aa irukku da, genuine aa?
output: Fake da! 'Digital arrest' nu solluvaanga - police video call la case nadathaadhu, money kekaadhu. Uniform costume da. Egmore, Adyar la professionals kuda maatinanga ipdi. Don't pay. Cut pannu, Cyber Crime Shastri Nagar office ku complaint kudu.

instruction: என் பிள்ளை career choice-ஐ accept பண்ண முடியல. என்ன செய்வது?
output: Generation gap bridge: 1) Listen to their reasons - genuinely try to understand 2) Research that field - income potential, growth, stability 3) Meet professionals in that career - get real picture 4) Trial period suggestion - internship, shadowing 5) Your fears express - but don't impose 6) Compromise explore - related but acceptable field 7) Remember: It's their life to live. Reality: Many non-traditional careers successful today. Trust your upbringing - they'll be fine!

instruction: TC enge pochu theriyala, duplicate eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Duplicate TC process: 1) FIR file - nearest police station 2) Newspaper advertisement - TC lost notice 3) School application - with FIR copy, newspaper cutting, affidavit 4) School verifies records, issues duplicate 5) Fees: ₹50-200. Time: 1-2 weeks. If school closed: Contact DEO. Old schools: Check EMIS database for records. Important: Keep photocopy of all original certificates always!

instruction: Restaurant-la food poisoning aanaal case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. 1) Medical report vaangunga (treatment evidence), 2) Food Safety Officer-kku complaint, 3) Consumer forum case, 4) Serious case - Police complaint (IPC 269, 270). Medical expenses + compensation kidaikkum. Restaurant license suspend/cancel aagalam.

instruction: Birth certificate online-ல் download செய்யலாமா?
output: crsorgi.gov.in-ல் registered births-க்கு download செய்யலாம். Corporation/Municipality area என்றால் respective website-ல் பாருங்கள். Recent births online-ல் available, பழைய records-க்கு office போக வேண்டும்.

instruction: Family member-ai mental hospital-la admit panna mudiyumaa?
output: Voluntary admission: Person consents - preferred method. Supported admission: Person lacks capacity but nominated rep consents (10 days max without review). Independent admission (involuntary): Only if - 1) High risk of self-harm/harm to others, 2) Needs immediate treatment, 3) Two psychiatrists certify, 4) Magistrate approval within 24 hours. Rights: Review by Mental Health Review Board. Cannot just lock someone up.

instruction: Evening college-ல் படிக்கலாமா? Working people-க்கு option?
output: Evening college options: 1) University of Madras evening courses 2) Annamalai University distance + contact 3) IGNOU weekend classes 4) Polytechnic evening batches (limited). Timings: Usually 6-9 PM. Courses: BA, B.Com, BBA, LLB. Benefits: Work + study together, degree = regular degree value. Alternative: Distance education from TNOU, IGNOU - study anytime. Some employers sponsor employee education.

instruction: Bail conditions ennenna irukkum?
output: Common conditions: 1) Court dates attend, 2) Don't leave jurisdiction without permission, 3) Don't tamper evidence/threaten witnesses, 4) Passport surrender (if flight risk), 5) Periodical police station visit, 6) Don't contact victim. Violation = bail cancel + arrest.

instruction: Patta maatram eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Patta transfer-ku: 1. Sub-registrar office-la document register pannunga 2. Taluk office-la patta transfer application kudunga 3. Documents: Registered document, EC (Encumbrance Certificate), ID/Address proof, Tax paid receipt 4. Time: 30-45 days 5. Online: eservices.tn.gov.in

instruction: VAO certificate தர மாட்டேங்குறார், என்ன பண்றது?
output: Tahsildar-கிட்ட written complaint கொடுங்க. Right to Service Act-ன் கீழ் time limit இருக்கு - delay ஆனா penalty. Collector Grievance Day (weekly) போங்க. Last option: RTI போட்டு why delay-ன்னு கேளுங்க.

instruction: பிரதான் மந்திரி ஜன் தன் யோஜனா (PMJDY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: இலவச வங்கி கணக்கு திட்டம். தகுதி: எந்த இந்திய குடிமகனும். நன்மைகள்: Zero Balance Account, Free RuPay Debit Card, ₹2 லட்சம் Accident Insurance (RuPay Card-ல்), ₹30,000 Life Insurance (புதிய கணக்குகளுக்கு), Overdraft ₹10,000 வரை, Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) பெறலாம். திறக்க: அருகிலுள்ள Bank/Bank Mitra/CSC. ஆவணங்கள்: Aadhaar அல்லது Voter ID

instruction: KVPY scholarship enna? Science students eppadi apply seivathu?
output: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY): IISc Bangalore nadathum science aptitude test. Streams: SA (Class 11), SX (Class 12), SB (1st year BSc). Scholarship: ₹5,000-7,000/month + annual contingency grant. Selection: Aptitude test + Interview. Benefits: IISc/IISERs admission priority. 2022 onwards INSPIRE SHE-aaga merge aanadhu, but similar benefits continue through INSPIRE.

instruction: Whistleblower protection irukkaa?
output: Whistleblower Protection Act 2014: Corruption, misuse of power report pannuravarkalukku protection. Apply: Competent Authority (state level). Identity protection, victimization protection undu. Retaliation-kku penalty. Anonymous complaints-um accept.

instruction: Aviation/Pilot training எங்கே படிப்பது? Cost எவ்வளவு?
output: Options: 1) Commercial Pilot License (CPL) - Flying schools 2) B.Sc Aviation 3) Air hostess/Cabin crew training. CPL institutes: Madras Flying Club, Rajiv Gandhi Aviation Academy. CPL cost: ₹25-40 lakh (high investment). Duration: 18 months - 2 years. Alternative: IAF through AFCAT/NDA (free training). Cabin crew: 6 months course, ₹1-2 lakh. Jobs with airlines after training.

instruction: Ashta Siddhi (ettu siddhigal) endraal enna?
output: Ettu amaanushya sakthigal: 1) Anima - anu alavu siriyathaagudhal, 2) Mahima - migapperiyathaagudhal, 3) Laghima - miga ilaesaagudhal, kaatril paratthal, 4) Garima - miga kanamaagudhal, 5) Praapthi - edhaiyum adaidhal, 6) Praakaamyam - ella aasaigalaiyum niraivettrudhal, 7) Eesaththuvam - ellavattraiyum kattuppaduththudhal, 8) Vasiththuvam - ellavattraiyum vasappaduththudhal.

instruction: Tenant union form pannalaamaa? Collective bargaining legal-aa?
output: Legal! Tenant associations/unions form pannalam. Benefits: 1) Collective voice against unfair practices, 2) Negotiate with owner associations, 3) Legal aid pooling, 4) Information sharing. Registration: Societies Registration Act-in keezh. Apartment complexes: Resident Welfare Association (RWA) common. Protect yourselves through unity.

instruction: நான் Online-ல் Products விற்கிறேன். GST Registration எப்போது கட்டாயம்? எப்படி register செய்வது?
output:
**GST Registration for E-commerce:**

**எப்போது கட்டாயம்?**

| Category | Threshold |
|----------|----------|
| Goods (Inter-state) | ₹0 - Immediately! |
| Goods (Intra-state) | ₹40 lakh turnover |
| Services | ₹20 lakh turnover |
| E-commerce Seller | ₹0 - Immediately! |

**E-commerce-ல் விற்றால்:**
- Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, etc.
- Turnover limit இல்லை
- முதல் sale-க்கு முன்னே GST வேண்டும்!

**Registration Process:**

**Step 1: gst.gov.in**
1. Services → Registration → New Registration
2. Part A: PAN, Mobile, Email verify
3. TRN (Temporary Reference Number) கிடைக்கும்

**Step 2: Part B - Details**
1. Business Information
2. Promoter/Partner details
3. Principal place of business
4. Additional place (if any)
5. Goods/Services categories
6. Bank account details
7. Document upload

**Step 3: Documents**
- PAN Card
- Aadhaar Card
- Business Address Proof:
  - Own: Electricity Bill + Property Tax
  - Rent: Rent Agreement + NOC from owner
- Bank Statement / Cancelled Cheque
- Photo (Passport size)
- Digital Signature (Partnership/Company)

**Step 4: Verification**
- Aadhaar OTP / EVC
- Or: Physical verification by officer

**Step 5: GSTIN Issue**
- Time: 3-7 working days
- 15-digit GSTIN
- Certificate download

**Fee:** FREE (No government fee)

**After Registration:**
1. Issue GST invoices
2. Collect GST from customers
3. File monthly returns (GSTR-1, GSTR-3B)
4. Pay GST by 20th of next month

**Composition Scheme:**
- Turnover < ₹1.5 Cr
- Pay 1% tax (instead of regular)
- No input credit
- Quarterly return
- Not for e-commerce sellers!

**Penalties (no registration):**
- 10% of tax due or ₹10,000 (whichever higher)
- Serious offense: Imprisonment possible

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'AWS billing issue detected, verify card details to prevent service termination' nu AWS logo use panni. Company AWS use pannudhu, check pannalama?
output: Always access AWS through console.aws.amazon.com directly! AWS sends alerts through console and verified email, never asks card details via email. Check CloudWatch billing alerts. This is classic cloud service impersonation targeting DevOps engineers.

instruction: Hardware and Networking course padikkalaamaa?
output: Good career option. Courses: 1) CCNA (Cisco) - Networking 2) CompTIA A+ - Hardware 3) MCSE (Microsoft) - Server admin 4) Hardware & Networking diploma. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Network administrator 2) System support 3) Hardware technician 4) IT helpdesk. Salary: ₹15,000-30,000. Demand: Every company needs IT support. NIELIT offers recognized courses. Self-employment: Computer repair shop.

instruction: 10th mudicha appuram ennenna courses irukku?
output:
**After 10th Options:**

**1. Plus Two (+2):** 2 years, Science/Commerce/Arts

**2. Diploma (Polytechnic):** 3 years, Engineering branches, Lateral entry to degree

**3. ITI:** 6 months-2 years, Trades like Electrician, Fitter - Direct job

**4. Paramedical:** 1-2 years, ANM, Lab Tech, X-Ray Tech

**5. Skill Courses (PMKVY):** 3-6 months, Free, Job placement

**6. NIOS:** Open schooling, Same validity

**Choice Depends On:**
- Higher studies → +2
- Quick job → ITI
- Technical job → Diploma

instruction: 'SBI Home Loan pre-approved - 50 lakhs at 6.5%, lowest rate ever, processing fee 15,000 required' nu call vandhudhu. Home vaanga plan irukku, genuine offer aa?
output: Banks cold call la loan push pannaadhu. 6.5% - below current rates, impossible. Processing fee advance kekaadhu - loan amount la deduct pannuvaanga. 'Pre-approved' without application impossible. SBI branch ku direct apply pannunga.

instruction: ரம்ஜான் - 'Zakat collection online - transfer to this account for sadaqah' message வந்துச்சு. Genuine collection-ஆ?
output: Verify பண்ணுங்க! Ramadan-ல fake zakat collection scams அதிகம். Unknown account-க்கு transfer பண்ணாதீங்க. Local mosque treasurer-கிட்ட directly கொடுங்க. Online collection-னா mosque official handle verify பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: En Bank Account-la irundhu OTP illaama panam poyiduchu. Cyber fraud-ku enna seyvadhu?
output:
Immediately (Minutes matter!):
1. Call Bank - Freeze account, raise dispute
2. cybercrime.gov.in - File complaint online
3. 1930 Helpline - National Cyber Crime (24x7)

Within 24 hours:
4. Written Bank Complaint - Get acknowledgment
5. Police FIR - With all details + screenshots

Bank Liability (RBI Rules):
6. Report within 3 days → Full refund
7. 4-7 days → Max loss ₹10,000
8. Bank must resolve in 90 days

Escalation:
9. Banking Ombudsman - cms.rbi.org.in

Prevention:
10. Enable SMS alerts, set transaction limits
11. Never share OTP

instruction: Shop employee rights enna?
output: TN Shops and Establishments Act: 1) 8 hours work/day, 48 hours/week, 2) Weekly off mandatory, 3) Leave: 12 days earned + 12 days sick + 5 casual, 4) Overtime double wages, 5) No child labour (<14 years). Violation: Labour Inspector complaint.

instruction: Court case எத்தனை வருஷம் ஓடும்? Fast track வழி இருக்கா?
output: Average: Civil case 5-10 years, Criminal 3-7 years. Fast options: 1) Lok Adalat (one-day settlement), 2) Mediation centres (free, court-annexed), 3) Arbitration (private, faster), 4) Consumer Forum (6 months-1 year), 5) Fast track courts (specific cases). Tips: Avoid adjournments, complete documentation, experienced lawyer. E-courts app-ல் case status track பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: IGNOU-ல் என்னென்ன படிப்புகள் உள்ளன?
output: 228+ programmes available. Popular ones: BA, B.Com, BCA, MBA, MCA, MA, M.Com, B.Ed, Certificate courses. சேர்க்கை: July & January batch. Online application: www.ignou.ac.in. Regional centre Chennai-ல் இருக்கிறது. Credit transfer facility உள்ளது. Government jobs-க்கு recognized degree.

instruction: Medical negligence prove பண்ண என்ன evidence வேணும்?
output: Essential evidence: 1) Complete medical records (admission to discharge), 2) Prescription copies, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills (shows what was done), 5) Consent forms, 6) Photos if applicable, 7) Witness statements (family who were present), 8) Expert medical opinion. Preserve: Original documents, don't alter. Timeline: Note dates, times of events. Digital: Screenshots of online communications.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY) endraal enna?
output: Free LPG Connection. Eligibility: BPL families, SC/ST, PM-Awas beneficiaries. Benefits: Free LPG Connection, First Cylinder + Stove deposit-free, EMI option for cylinder cost. Apply: Nearby LPG Distributor (HP, Bharat, Indane), pmuy.gov.in. Documents: Aadhaar, BPL Card, Bank Account. Refill Subsidy: Comes directly to Bank Account via DBT

instruction: Old age home-la abuse nadakkuthu, complain enge?
output: Complaint options: 1) Police (if physical/sexual abuse), 2) District Social Welfare Officer, 3) State Commission for Senior Citizens, 4) National Commission for Elderly. Old age home registration: Social Welfare Department-kitta - unregistered homes-ai report pannalam. Elder helpline: 14567. Documentation: Photos, medical reports, witness statements.

instruction: பாரதியார் யார்? அவர் contribution என்ன?
output: சுப்பிரமணிய பாரதி (1882-1921) - தமிழின் மிகச்சிறந்த கவிஞர்களில் ஒருவர். சிறப்புகள்: 1) தேசிய கவிஞர் - independence movement-க்கு inspiring poems, 2) பெண் விடுதலை - 'புதுமைப்பெண்' concept, 3) சாதி ஒழிப்பு - social reform, 4) எளிய தமிழ் - common people புரிந்துகொள்ள, 5) பாஞ்சாலி சபதம் - epic poem. 'சிந்து நதியின் மிசை', 'வெள்ளைநிறத்தொருபூனை', 'அச்சமில்லை அச்சமில்லை' மிகவும் famous. Modern Tamil poetry father!

instruction: Free mental health treatment enge kidaikkum?
output: Government facilities: 1) Institute of Mental Health, Kilpauk (Chennai), 2) District Mental Health Program (DMHP) - every district, 3) Medical college psychiatry OPD, 4) Taluk/District hospital psychiatry unit. Free services: Consultation, medicines (basic), counseling. DMHP: Outreach to community, schools, PHCs. Appointment: Usually walk-in OPD or through PHC referral.

instruction: Coma patient-க்கு யார் decisions எடுக்கலாம்?
output: Decision hierarchy: 1) Advance directive (if patient made one), 2) Nominated healthcare proxy, 3) Spouse, 4) Adult children, 5) Parents, 6) Siblings. Life support removal: Supreme Court guidelines - medical board + High Court approval for passive euthanasia. Best interest: Decisions must be in patient's best interest - not family's convenience.

instruction: Rental agreement kattaayama?
output: Aama, 2017 Act padiye kattaayam. Written agreement illaattal problem varum. 11 months-kku mela irundhaal Registration kattaayam. Stamp paper-la ezhudhi Sub-Registrar office-la register seiyya venum.

instruction: Hardware and Networking course படிக்கலாமா?
output: Good career option. Courses: 1) CCNA (Cisco) - Networking 2) CompTIA A+ - Hardware 3) MCSE (Microsoft) - Server admin 4) Hardware & Networking diploma. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Network administrator 2) System support 3) Hardware technician 4) IT helpdesk. Salary: ₹15,000-30,000. Demand: Every company needs IT support. NIELIT offers recognized courses. Self-employment: Computer repair shop.

instruction: 12 varushamaaga nilatthai use pannuravar ownership claim pannuraar - valid-aa?
output: Adverse Possession law: 12 years continuous, open, hostile possession-kku piragu ownership claim pannalam - aanaal court-la prove pannanum. Government land-kku 30 years. Udanadiyaa legal action edunga - delay aanaal rights izhappeergal.

instruction: Business fail ஆனால் என்ன குறள் motivate பண்ணும்?
output: 'Aakkam izhandhaemenru allaaVaar ookkam oruvandam kaiththudai yaar'. Selvam ponaalum cry pannadhavargaLae unmaiyaana valimaiyaanavargal. Melum: 'Idukkan varungaal naguga' - kashtathil siriyungal. Failure is temporary, your spirit is permanent. Try again!

instruction: Social media-la fake account en perla - complaint eppadi?
output: Platform report: Impersonation report (ID proof upload). Legal: IT Act 66D (identity theft), IPC 419 (cheating by personation). cybercrime.gov.in complaint. Platform response: 24-72 hours. Multiple platforms: Each platform-lum separately report.

instruction: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam - full details and apply process?
output:
Scheme Summary: ₹1,000/month for woman head of family (Since 2023)

Eligibility:
✅ Woman should be family head
✅ Age 21+
✅ Family income < ₹2.5 lakh/year
✅ TN resident

Not Eligible:
❌ Govt employee
❌ Income Tax payer
❌ Already receiving other pension
❌ 4-wheeler owner
❌ 750cc+ two-wheeler owner
❌ 5+ acre agricultural land owner

Apply:

Method 1 - Anganwadi:
1. Nearest Anganwadi center pogga
2. Anganwadi worker form kudupanga
3. Fill pannunga
4. Documents kudungunga
5. They will process

Method 2 - Online: kalaaboravu.tn.gov.in
1. Register with Aadhaar
2. Fill application
3. Upload documents
4. Submit

Documents: Aadhaar, Ration Card (Family Head proof), Bank Passbook, Passport photo

Verification: Anganwadi worker + Door-to-door survey → Block Officer approval

Payment: Monthly ₹1,000 DBT (usually 1st week)

instruction: 'யாருக்கும் சொல்லாதீர்கள், secret offer' என்று caller insist பண்றாங்க.
output: Secrecy demand scam sign. 'Family-கிட்ட சொல்லாதீர்கள்', 'confidential' என்று சொன்னால் - அவர்கள் உங்களை isolate பண்ண try பண்றாங்க.

instruction: Owner இறந்துவிட்டால் agreement என்ன ஆகும்?
output: Agreement valid-ஆக continue ஆகும். Legal heirs-க்கு property rights transfer ஆகும். Heirs-உடன் புதிய agreement செய்யலாம் அல்லது existing agreement continue செய்யலாம். Heirs arbitrary-ஆக evict செய்ய முடியாது.

instruction: Scholarship status எப்படி check செய்வது?
output: Status check வழிகள்: 1) NSP portal login - application status tab 2) PFMS portal (Public Financial Management System) - payment tracking 3) State scholarship portal - individual login 4) SMS alerts (registered mobile) 5) College scholarship cell. Payment delay: 2-3 months normal. Rejected ஆனால்: Defect list பார்த்து correct documents upload. Grievance: helpdesk on portal.

instruction: Telecom/Mobile company bill dispute - எங்கே complaint செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Company customer care (written complaint), 2) Appellate Authority (company website-ல் details இருக்கும்), 3) TRAI (trai.gov.in) complaint, 4) Consumer forum. Wrong billing, service failure, unauthorized charges எல்லாத்துக்கும் complaint போடலாம்.

instruction: Semester exam-ku last minute preparation tips?
output: Last week strategy: 1) Previous year papers - pattern identify 2) Important questions list make 3) Short notes revise, not new topics 4) Formula sheets ready 5) Sleep properly - memory consolidation 6) Light food, hydration 7) Morning revision of previous day 8) Group discussion for doubt clearing 9) Hall ticket, stationery ready. Avoid: All-night study, new topics, junk food, negative people. Trust your preparation!

instruction: Kadum mazhaiyaal en payir muzhuvathum naasamaagividuchu. Enna compensation, help kidaikkum?
output:
Within 72 hours:
1. PMFBY Claim - pmfby.gov.in / 14447 - Take photos
2. Inform VAO - Written complaint with acknowledgment

Assessment:
3. Crop Cutting Experiment - Agri Dept + Insurance
4. Claim Amount - Based on yield loss %

Other Relief:
5. SDRF - Natural disaster relief from District Collector
6. Input Subsidy - ₹6,800-13,500/hectare
7. CM Relief Fund - Severe cases

Loan Relief:
8. Loan restructuring - Apply at Bank
9. Fresh KCC Loan - 4% interest for next season

instruction: Facebook/Instagram/WhatsApp இல் மோசடிக்காரரை எப்படி புகாரளிப்பது?
output: WhatsApp: உரையாடலைத் திறக்கவும் → பெயரைத் தட்டவும் → 'புகார்', மோசடி செய்தியை wa.me/919845098450 (இந்தியா குறிப்பு எண்) க்கு அனுப்புங்கள். Instagram: சுயவிவரம் → மூன்று புள்ளிகள் → 'புகார்' → 'மோசடி', அல்லது help.instagram.com. Facebook: சுயவிவரம்/இடுகை → மூன்று புள்ளிகள் → 'ஆதரவு கண்டறியவும் அல்லது புகாரளிக்கவும்', கணக்கு ஹேக் ஆனால் facebook.com/hacked. Telegram: சுயவிவரம் → புகார், abuse@telegram.org மின்னஞ்சல், @notoscam போட். Twitter/X: சுயவிவரம் → மூன்று புள்ளிகள் → 'புகார்'. LinkedIn: சுயவிவரம் → மேலும் → 'புகார்/தடு'.

instruction: 99acres la flat paathaen - 2BHK Race Course la 7000 rent. Owner call pannaar 'NRI irukkaen, advance 40K transfer pannunga, key courier pannuren' nu. Photos nalla irukkudhae, genuine aa saami?
output: Scam saami. Market rate la half ku below irukkunu red flag. 'NRI' excuse - direct meet avoid panna. Photos vera listing la irundhu copy pannirukkanga. NEVER pay without seeing property. Race Course, Saibaba Colony la rental scam romba common. Owner/agent in person meet pannunga.

instruction: Kabasura Kudineer - COVID-kku effective-aa?
output: Government approved: For COVID prevention and mild symptoms. Ingredients: 15 herbs including Kabasuram, Adathodai, Chukku, etc. Benefits: Respiratory immunity, cough, cold. Preparation: Same as Nilavembu - boil powder, strain. Dosage: 60ml twice daily. Research: CCRS conducted clinical trials. Note: 1) Not substitute for COVID vaccine, 2) Severe COVID = hospital treatment, 3) Prevention + mild symptoms only. Available: Government free distribution, pharmacies.

instruction: En pulla school-la adicchittaanga, action edukkanum (Madurai style)
output: Corporal punishment banned! RTE Act + NCPCR guidelines. Actions: 1) School principal-kitta written complaint, 2) Education Department (DEO), 3) Child Welfare Committee, 4) Police (if serious injury). Evidence: Photos, medical certificate. Teacher action: Suspension, termination possible. School license: Risk of cancellation. Child helpline: 1098.

instruction: En appa construction worker, vera vera place-ku porom. School admission eppadi?
output: Migrant children rights: 1) RTE Act - Free education anywhere in India 2) Admission without TC - Self-declaration accepted 3) Mid-year admission allowed 4) Age-appropriate class placement 5) SSA support. Contact: Nearest government school, District Education Officer. Documents: Aadhaar (if any), parent ID. Free: Books, uniform, mid-day meal. Language support provided for transition.

instruction: வேலையில இருந்து நிறுத்திட்டாங்க, F&F எப்ப கிடைக்கும்?
output: Full and Final settlement: 30-45 days-ல் கிடைக்கணும். Include: Salary, leave encashment, bonus, gratuity (if eligible), notice pay, reimbursements. Delay ஆனா Labour Commissioner-க்கு complaint. Documents: Relieving letter, experience letter, salary slip, Form 16 - எல்லாம் கேளுங்க.

instruction: 'Thai Poosam special - free prasadam courier! Just pay delivery 150 Rs' - WhatsApp வந்துச்சு. Order பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam! Temple prasadam courier service இல்ல. Card details வாங்கி fraud பண்ணுவாங்க. Thai Poosam devotion-ஐ misuse பண்றாங்க. Temple-க்கு நேர்ல போங்க. Online prasadam என்றெல்லாம் நம்பாதீங்க.

instruction: Panchakarma என்றால் என்ன? 5 treatments என்ன?
output: Panchakarma = 5 purification/detoxification procedures. 1) Vamana - Therapeutic vomiting (Kapha disorders), 2) Virechana - Purgation (Pitta disorders), 3) Basti - Medicated enema (Vata disorders), 4) Nasya - Nasal administration (head/neck disorders), 5) Raktamokshana - Blood letting (blood disorders). Pre-procedures: Snehapanam (oil intake), Swedanam (sweating). Post: Specific diet restrictions. Duration: 14-21 days ideally.

instruction: Drunk driving-kku enna punishment?
output: Blood alcohol limit: 30mg/100ml. First offence: Rs.10,000 fine + 6 months imprisonment. Second offence (3 years-la): Rs.15,000 + 2 years imprisonment. License suspension: 3 months - 1 year. Accident caused: Additional charges - up to 10 years imprisonment.

instruction: Online order varavilla - refund eppadi peruvathu?
output: Steps: 1) Website/App-la refund request raise pannunga, 2) Email-la written complaint anuppunga, 3) Payment bank-kku chargeback request kodunga (credit card), 4) Response illaattal NCH (1800-11-4000) complaint, 5) Consumer forum case podunga. E-commerce company 5-7 days-la acknowledge seyyanum.

instruction: Arranged marriage-க்கு ஒத்துக்கொள்வதா வேண்டாமா?
output: 'மனைமாட்சி இல்லாள்கண் இல்லாயின் வாழ்க்கை எனைமாட்சித் தாயினும் இல்'. நல்ல இல்லத்தரசி இல்லாவிட்டால் எந்த செல்வமும் பயனில்லை. மேலும்: 'பெண்ணின் பெருந்தக்க யாவுள' - பெண் என்பது மிகப்பெரிய வரம். Decision உங்களுடையது - ஆனால் compatibility, values பாருங்கள், external beauty மட்டும் அல்ல.

instruction: போகர் சமாதி எங்கே உள்ளது?
output: போகர் சமாதி பழனி முருகன் கோயிலுக்குள்ளேயே உள்ளது. Sanctum sanctorum-க்கு கீழே underground-ல் போகர் இன்றும் தியானத்தில் இருப்பதாக நம்பப்படுகிறது. அந்த இடத்தில் darshan செய்யலாம். 'Bogar' என்ற 2020 Tamil movie இதைப் பற்றியது. பழனிக்கு போனால் போகர் சமாதியை தரிசிக்க மறக்காதீர்கள்!

instruction: PCOS/PCOD treatment enge kidaikkum?
output: Available at: 1) Government hospital gynecology OPD - free, 2) Medical college hospitals - specialized care. Treatment: 1) Lifestyle modification (diet, exercise), 2) Medicines for hormonal balance, 3) Metformin if diabetic tendency, 4) Fertility treatment if trying to conceive. Tests: Ultrasound, hormonal tests - available free at government. Long-term: Regular monitoring needed.

instruction: Divorce-kku ennenna grounds irukku?
output: Hindu Marriage Act grounds: 1) Adultery, 2) Cruelty (physical/mental), 3) Desertion (2+ years), 4) Conversion to another religion, 5) Unsound mind, 6) Venereal disease, 7) Renunciation (sanyasa), 8) Not heard alive for 7 years. Wife additional ground: Husband has another wife.

instruction: Adoption-க்கு eligibility criteria என்ன?
output: CARA rules: 1) Age: 25-55 years, 2) Married couple: 2 years stable marriage, 3) Single parent: allowed (restrictions apply), 4) Income: sufficient to raise child, 5) Medical: physically/mentally fit, 6) No criminal record. Age difference with child: max 45 years.

instruction: Kanyakumari Thiruvalluvar silai evvalavu uyaram?
output: Silai: 133 adi (133 adhigaarangalukku), Peedam: 38 adi (Araththuppaal 38 adhigaarangalukku), Motham: 171 adi. Kadalil oru paarayin meedhu nirkkiradhu.

instruction: UPI fraud ஆனால் உடனே என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: Golden hour (first 24 hours முக்கியம்): 1) Bank-க்கு immediately call - transaction block, 2) 1930 helpline (cyber fraud), 3) cybercrime.gov.in-ல் complaint, 4) UPI app-ல் report, 5) Nearby police station FIR. Amount recover chance: 24 hours-ல் report = higher chance.

instruction: தேர்வு பயம் எப்படி போக்குவது?
output: Tips: 1) நல்ல தயாரிப்பே நம்பிக்கை - syllabus complete பண்ணுங்கள் 2) Mock tests எழுதி பழகுங்கள் 3) தேர்வுக்கு முந்தைய நாள் light revision மட்டும் 4) Deep breathing exercises 5) Positive self-talk 6) Proper sleep (7-8 hrs) 7) Light, healthy food 8) Hall ticket, pen ready-யாக வையுங்கள். Severe anxiety இருந்தால் school counsellor-ஐ சந்தியுங்கள்.

instruction: College-ல் stress அதிகமா இருக்கு. Handle பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Stress management: 1) Sleep 7-8 hours - non-negotiable 2) Exercise 30 min daily - even walking helps 3) Healthy food - avoid junk during stress 4) Break big tasks into small 5) Talk to friends, family 6) College counsellor - free service 7) Hobbies continue - music, sports, art 8) Social media break 9) Deep breathing when overwhelmed 10) Professional help if severe - no shame. Remember: Grades ≠ Self-worth. You matter more than marks.

instruction: Exam hall-la tension vandhaal enna seivathu?
output: Tension relief tips: 1) Deep breathing - 10 murai moochu vidunga 2) Easy questions mudhalil attempt 3) Stuck aanaal skip, later return 4) Water kudiyunga 5) Positive self-talk: 'Naan padiththirukkiren, ezhudha mudiyum' 6) Question paper muzhuvathum mudhalil padiyunga. Before exam: Proper sleep, light food, early arrival. Severe panic: Invigilator-ku sollunga, rest room break.

instruction: Job maarum bodhu PF transfer eppadi?
output: Same UAN continue aagum - transfer thevai illa (auto-transfer). Old account + new account merge: EPFO portal → Online Services → Transfer Request. New employer-kitta UAN kodunga. Transfer: 10-15 days. Withdrawal pannama transfer panrathu tax-efficient.

instruction: Emergency-la hospital admission refuse pannalaamaa?
output: NO! Illegal to refuse emergency. Law: Every hospital (government/private) must provide emergency care. Stabilization mandatory before transfer. Cannot ask for: 1) Advance payment, 2) Police clearance (accident), 3) ID proof. MLC cases: Treatment first, formalities later. Violation: Criminal prosecution + license cancellation. Report: 108, police, Health Department.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) endraal enna?
output: Crop insurance scheme for farmers. Premium: Kharif 2%, Rabi 1.5%, Commercial crops 5% only - rest paid by Government. Coverage: Natural calamities, pest attack, disease, post-harvest 14 days. Apply: Bank/CSC/Insurance Portal. Documents: Land records, Aadhaar, Bank details. Claim: Report loss within 72 hours. Loss calculated through Crop Cutting Experiments.

instruction: Safe abortion enge kidaikkum? Cost enna?
output: Safe facilities: 1) Government hospitals - free, 2) Approved private clinics (check registration), 3) Medical college hospitals. Cost: Government = free. Private = Rs.3,000-15,000 (depends on weeks, method). Method: 1) Medical (pills) - early pregnancy, 2) Surgical - later stage. Unsafe abortion risks: Infection, hemorrhage, infertility, death. Never go to unregistered places.

instruction: 'PhonePe cashback பெற request accept செய்யுங்கள்' என்று notification வந்தது. Accept செய்யலாமா?
output: Accept செய்யாதீர்கள்! Cashback பெற request accept தேவையில்லை. இது பணம் எடுக்க scammer அனுப்பும் request.

instruction: TN முதியோர் ஓய்வூதியம் எவ்வளவு? எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: 60+ வயதினருக்கு மாத ஓய்வூதியம். Amount: ₹1,000/month (State) + ₹200-500 (Central IGNOAPS) = ₹1,200-1,500. தகுதி: 60+ வயது, ஆண்டு வருமானம் ₹72,000-க்கு கீழ், BPL preferred. Destitute: ஆதரவற்ற முதியோருக்கு ₹1,500/month. விண்ணப்பம்: Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Income certificate, Aadhaar, Bank account. Dearness Allowance: Periodic increase announced.

instruction: Amma Baby Care Kit endraal enna?
output: Free kit for newborn baby. Value: ₹5,000+. Contents: Baby clothes (6 sets), Mosquito net, Baby bed, Towels, Diapers, Baby oil/soap/powder, Blanket, Toys. Eligibility: Govt hospital delivery, Dr. Muthulakshmi scheme beneficiary. Given: At hospital during discharge. Documents: MCP card, Delivery details.

instruction: NEET-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu? Endha books padikkanum?
output:
**NEET Preparation:**

**2-Year Plan:**
- Class 11: NCERT foundation, Concepts
- Class 12: NCERT revision, Mock tests, Previous papers

**Books:**

**Physics:**
- NCERT (Must!)
- HC Verma, DC Pandey

**Chemistry:**
- NCERT (Read multiple times!)
- MS Chouhan (Organic)
- N Awasthi (Physical)

**Biology:**
- NCERT (90% questions!)
- Trueman's, MTG Guide

**Daily Routine:**
- 5:30 AM: Physics/Chemistry
- Afternoon: Biology
- Evening: Weak subject
- Night: Revision/MCQs

**Tips:**
1. NCERT 5-6 times
2. Bio diagrams daily
3. Physics numericals daily
4. 50-100 MCQs daily
5. Weekly full test

instruction: Naanu transgender. College admission-la discrimination face pannuren. Enna pannalaam?
output: Your rights: 1) Transgender Persons Act 2019 - Equal education rights 2) Reservation for transgender in TN - 1% in education 3) Scholarship: Tamil Nadu Transgender Welfare Board scholarships 4) Discrimination complaint: National/State Human Rights Commission, UGC grievance. Support: Transgender welfare board, NGOs like Sangama, Nirangal. Legal help available. Don't give up - education is your right!

instruction: Consumer forum order implement aagala - enna seivathu?
output: Execution petition file pannunga. Order implement seyyaadha party-kku: 1) Fine, 2) Imprisonment (up to 3 years), 3) Property attachment. Forum-kke execution petition podunga. District Collector moolamum execution nadakkum.

instruction: Encumbrance Certificate (EC) எங்கே பெறுவது?
output: Online at tnreginet.gov.in (records from 1987 onwards) - instant download. Offline at Sub-Registrar Office - 3-5 days. Fee: ₹15 per year. Essential for property verification - shows if property has any legal dues or mortgages.

instruction: 'RBI அதிகாரி பேசுகிறேன், உங்கள் account-ல் கள்ள பணம் உள்ளது, verify செய்ய details கொடுங்கள்' என்று call வந்தது.
output: RBI நேரடியாக மக்களுக்கு போன் செய்யாது. இது மோசடி. எந்த தகவலும் கொடுக்காதீர்கள். Cyber crime-ல் புகார் செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Revenge porn/intimate images share பண்ணினால் என்ன punishment?
output: IT Act 66E: 3 years imprisonment + Rs.2 lakh fine. 67/67A: 5-7 years imprisonment. IPC 354C (voyeurism). Women: Section 499/500 defamation. Platform takedown: CERT-In report. Victim support: NCW helpline 7827-170-170. Don't blame victim - legal protection உண்டு.

instruction: Chitta endraal enna? Patta-vida vithiyaasam enna?
output: Patta = Owner details, survey number, area. Chitta = Same info + land classification (wet/dry), soil type, cultivation details. Chitta is more detailed. Agriculture land-kku Chitta mukkiyam. Both available at Taluk office or online.

instruction: புதிய ரேஷன் அட்டை எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: 1. tnpds.gov.in இணையதளத்தில் விண்ணப்பிக்கவும் 2. அல்லது அருகிலுள்ள நியாய விலைக் கடையில் படிவம் பெறவும் 3. தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்: குடும்ப உறுப்பினர்களின் ஆதார், வருமானச் சான்று, வீட்டு முகவரி சான்று, புகைப்படங்கள் 4. வகைகள்: PHH (ரூ.1 அரிசி), AAY (இலவச அரிசி), NPHH

instruction: PM-SYM (Shram Yogi Mandhan) scheme என்ன?
output: Unorganized sector workers-க்கான pension scheme. 18-40 வயது, மாத வருமானம் Rs.15,000-க்கு கீழ் இருந்தால் சேரலாம். 60 வயதில் Rs.3,000 monthly pension. CSC centre-ல் register செய்யலாம்.

instruction: CMCHIS-ல் எவ்வளவு coverage கிடைக்கும்?
output: ஒரு குடும்பத்திற்கு ஆண்டுக்கு Rs.5 lakh வரை coverage. 1,027 procedures covered. Empaneled hospitals-ல் cashless treatment கிடைக்கும். Critical illness-க்கு Rs.7.5 lakh வரை.

instruction: TNPSC Pothu Tamil எப்படி படிப்பது?
output: Pothu Tamil sections: 1) Ilakkanam (Grammar) - Ezhuthiyial, Solliyal, Porulathigaram 2) Ilakkiyam - Sangam to Modern literature 3) Tamil culture and heritage. Books: 6th-12th Tamil textbooks, TNPSC previous papers. High scoring: Grammar rules, author-work matching, literary periods. Daily practice: 50 questions. Ilakkanam: Vinaigal, Pechu vazhakku, Ezhuthuvazhi rules. Tamil literature: Thirukkural mandatory (1330 kurals meanings).

instruction: Rameswaram koviloda sirappu enna?
output: Ramanathaswamy Kovil - 12 Jyotirlingam-kalil ondru. Sirappugal: 1) Neelamaana corridor - 1200+ meters (longest in India), 2) 22 theerthangal (sacred wells) - ellavatrilum kulippadu tradition, 3) Ramar kattiya kovil endra nambikkai, 4) Agni Theertham - kadalil kulippadu, 5) Sethu Bandhanam - Adam's Bridge nearby. Char Dham-la ondru. Varanasi-kku povatharkku mun inge varuvaargal.

instruction: Cheating case-க்கு என்ன punishment?
output: IPC 420 (BNS 318): Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property - 7 years imprisonment + fine. Cheque bounce: Negotiable Instruments Act 138 - 2 years imprisonment + twice cheque amount fine. Civil + criminal both options உண்டு.

instruction: PMAY (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Eligibility: Family without own house, EWS/LIG/MIG. Assistance: Up to ₹1.5-2.67 lakhs. Apply: pmay-urban.gov.in / Common Service Center. Documents: Aadhaar, Income certificate, Land document. Interest subsidy on bank loan available.

instruction: Reliance Foundation Scholarship எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: Reliance Foundation Undergraduate Scholarship: UG 1st year students-க்கு ₹2 lakh over 4 years. Eligibility: Family income ₹2.5 lakh கீழ், JEE/NEET rank holders, 12th 60%+. Selection: Application + Interview. Apply: www.reliancefoundation.org. Scholarship Plus program: Leadership development, mentoring, internships included.

instruction: Naanga Sri Lankan Tamil refugee. En pillaikku education kidaikkuma?
output: Sri Lankan Tamil refugee education: 1) Government schools - Free admission for refugee camp children 2) Special coaching provided 3) TN Government scholarship for refugee students 4) UNHCR education support 5) Higher education: Special quota in some colleges. Documents: Camp registration, UNHCR certificate. Support organizations: READ, OFERR. Many refugee children have succeeded - IIT, Medical, Government jobs. Don't lose hope!

instruction: Valluvar Kottam endraal enna? Angge enna irukkudhu?
output: Valluvar Kottam Chennai Nungambakkathil ulla Thiruvalluvar ninaividam. 1976-la thirakkapattathu. Ulle: 1) 133 adi uyara gopuram (133 adhigaarangal), 2) 1330 kuralgalum granite-la porikappattuLLana, 3) Auditorium - 4000 per amaralam, 4) Temple chariot replica, 5) Azhagiya thottam. Entry free. Morning 8 AM - Evening 6 PM thirandhirukkum.

instruction: Scholarship deadlines summary
output: NSP (National): October-November. Post-matric SC/ST: September-October. BC/MBC welfare: August-September. Merit scholarships: After results announcement. INSPIRE: December-January. Private scholarships: Various - check Buddy4Study regularly. Tip: Apply within 2 weeks of portal opening.

instruction: Will இல்லாமல் இறந்தால் property யாருக்கு போகும்?
output: Hindu Succession Act படி: Class I heirs (wife, sons, daughters, mother) சமமாக பங்கு பெறுவார்கள். Class I இல்லாவிட்டால் Class II (father, siblings, etc.). Muslim-க்கு Shariat law, Christian-க்கு Indian Succession Act apply.

instruction: National Scholarship Portal (NSP) moolam endhendha scholarships kidaikkum?
output: NSP scholarships: 1) Pre-matric SC/ST/OBC 2) Post-matric SC/ST/OBC 3) MHRD Merit scholarship 4) PM scholarship for defence personnel wards 5) Minority scholarships 6) Top class education scholarship. Apply: www.scholarships.gov.in. One portal for 100+ schemes. Documents: Aadhaar, bank account, income certificate, caste certificate, marks. Deadline: October-November usually.

instruction: Eviction notice vandhaal ethanai naal time kidaikkum?
output: Agreement-la mention seidha notice period (1-3 months) kidaikkum. Court through eviction na reasonable time koduppaanga. Rent default case-la 15 days notice koduthu arrears pay seiyya chance tharuvaanga.

instruction: 'Video call-ல் இருங்கள், disconnect பண்ணாதீர்கள்' என்று officer சொல்கிறார்.
output: Digital arrest scam. Real police video call-ல் investigation செய்யாது. 'Call cut பண்ணாதீர்கள்' என்று insist பண்ணினால் 100% fraud.

instruction: 'Piranpazhi kooruvan thanpazhi' - idhu enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Piranpazhi kooruvan thanpazhi yullum thirantherindhu koorap padum'. Artham: Piraraip pazhippavan, than kuraigalai maRaikka mudiyaadhu. Avan kuraigalum aaraayappattu veliye varum. Others-a criticize panravan own flaws expose aagum. Gossip panraadheeargal - ungal secrets-um veliye varum!

instruction: Misleading advertisement-க்கு complaint போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். ASCI (Advertising Standards Council of India)-க்கு complaint போடலாம் - ascionline.in. Consumer forum-லும் case போடலாம். Celebrity endorsement false claims-க்கும் celebrity liable. Compensation + advertisement withdraw order கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Meenakshi Amman kovil la donation QR scan potten, 100 rupees donate panna 10,000 debit aaiduchu! Kovil QR dhaan da, enna aachhu?
output: Aiyooo! Fraudu gang original QR mela fake QR sticker ottirukkaanga da. Higher amount ku redirect aagirum. PIN enter pannumbodhu amount verify pannaama pottiye. Kovil la, temple la - ivanga vida maatanga. Ippo bank ku complaint pannu, cyber crime ku poi FIR podu.

instruction: Defamation-kku case podalaamaa?
output: Civil defamation: Damages claim seyyalam. Criminal defamation (IPC 499/500, BNS 356): 2 years imprisonment + fine. Truth = defence (public interest-la sonnaal). Social media defamation-kkum apply aagum. Written complaint Magistrate Court-la file.

instruction: Apartment vaangum podhu UDS endraal enna?
output: UDS = Undivided Share of Land. Flat owner-kku land-la proportionate share. Building collapse/demolish aanalum land share ungalukku. Higher UDS = Better value. UDS % sale deed-la clearly mention irukkanum. UDS illaama flat vaangaadheenga.

instruction: Swiggy/Zomato delivery partner-க்கு labour laws apply ஆகுமா?
output: Gig workers classified as 'independent contractors' - traditional labour laws fully apply ஆகாது. Code on Social Security 2020: Gig workers-க்கு social security provisions (implementation pending). Accident/injury-க்கு company insurance check பண்ணுங்க. Union formation possible.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Trademark violation complaint against your business. Pay 50,000 settlement or face legal action.' Trademark issue vandhududhaa, settle pannidlama?
output: Trademark disputes handled through legal notices and courts, not SMS settlements. Check IP India portal for actual complaints. Real trademark holders send advocate notices through registered post. Never settle via SMS - could be extortion attempt.

instruction: HIV status employer-கிட்ட சொல்லணுமா?
output: NO! HIV status = highly confidential. HIV/AIDS Act 2017: 1) No mandatory testing for employment, 2) No disclosure to employer without consent, 3) No termination based on HIV status, 4) Anti-discrimination protection. Violation: Legal action against employer. Medical fitness: Can be declared fit without disclosing diagnosis. Exception: Healthcare workers - restricted duties (not termination).

instruction: Yoga therapy எங்கே learn பண்ணலாம்?
output: Free options: 1) Government Yoga centres (every district), 2) AYUSH hospitals - yoga unit, 3) Parks - morning free sessions (many cities), 4) Schools/colleges - yoga programs. Paid: 1) Private yoga studios, 2) Art of Living, Isha centres, 3) Online courses (after basics learned). Certification: If want to teach - AYUSH certified courses. Therapy: For specific conditions - consult yoga therapist (BNYS or certified).

instruction: Chennai-la Thiruvalluvar thodarbaana idangal enna?
output: 1) Valluvar Kottam, Nungambakkam - auditorium + museum, 2) Thiruvalluvar Silai, Marina Beach - 39 feet uyaram, 3) Mylapore - pirandha idam endru nambappadugiradhu, 4) Thiruvalluvar Statue, Egmore - near museum, 5) DPI campus Thiruvalluvar statue. Ovvoru government office-lum Thiruvalluvar photo irukkum!

instruction: சித்தர்கள் உடல் பற்றி என்ன சொல்கிறார்கள்?
output: 'உடம்பார் அழியின் உயிரார் அழிவர்' - உடல் அழிந்தால் ஆன்மாவும் முன்னேற முடியாது. 'உடம்பினை முன்னம் இழுக்கென்று இருந்தேன், உடம்பினுக்கு உள்ளே உறுபொருள் கண்டேன்' - திருமூலர். உடலை neglect செய்யாமல், அதை கருவியாக பயன்படுத்தி ஆன்மீக முன்னேற்றம் அடையலாம் என்பது சித்தர் தத்துவம். Yoga, மருத்துவம் இதன் அடிப்படையிலேயே.

instruction: Sandwich pattern diploma என்ன? Regular-இலிருந்து என்ன வித்தியாசம்?
output: Sandwich Diploma: Theory + Industrial training combined. Pattern: 1st year theory → 2nd year industry (6 months paid training) → 3rd year theory. Benefits: 1) Real work experience 2) Stipend during training ₹5,000-8,000/month 3) Job placement better 4) Industry connections. Offered at: NTTF, Central Polytechnics, select government colleges. Duration: Same 3 years. Highly recommended for practical learning.

instruction: FIR endraal enna? Eppadi poduvadhu?
output: FIR = First Information Report - cognizable offence pattrina mudhal thagaval. Any police station-la podalam (Zero FIR). Written/oral complaint kodukkalam. Police written-aa ezhudhi ungal sign vaanguvaargal. Free copy kidaikkum. Online: tnpolice.gov.in.

instruction: Government Siddha hospital Chennai-la enge irukku?
output: Chennai facilities: 1) National Institute of Siddha (NIS), Tambaram - Premier institute, 200 beds, all specialties, 2) Government Siddha Medical College Hospital, Arumbakkam - Oldest college, teaching hospital, 3) Arignar Anna Government Hospital of Indian Medicine - Multiple AYUSH systems. Services: Free OPD, IPD, medicines, special therapies. Timings: Usually 8 AM - 4 PM OPD.

instruction: UGC scholarship MA/MSc/PhD students-ku enna?
output: UGC Scholarships: 1) Non-NET Fellowship - ₹8,000/month MPhil/PhD 2) JRF (through NET) - ₹31,000/month 3) SRF (2 years after JRF) - ₹35,000/month 4) Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship (SC/ST PhD) - ₹31,000-35,000/month 5) Maulana Azad National Fellowship (Minorities PhD). Apply: www.ugc.ac.in. NET exam pass aanaal automatic JRF.

instruction: Traffic police wrongly fine pottaal enna seivathu?
output: Options: 1) On-spot - evidence kaatti argue (dashcam, photos), 2) Court-la contest (challan dispute), 3) Online grievance: tnpolice.gov.in, 4) RTO officer complaint. Challan copy kelunga. Court contest-kku time limit undu.

instruction: Project/Thesis work eppadi approach panrathu?
output: Project success: 1) Choose topic early - guide consultation 2) Literature review first - Google Scholar, journals 3) Weekly meetings with guide - progress show 4) Documentation parallel - don't wait till end 5) Plagiarism check - Turnitin/iThenticate 6) Presentation practice - viva preparation 7) Backup data - multiple locations 8) Deadline buffer - submit before last day. Tip: Original contribution expected, not just copy. Industry internship projects valuable.

instruction: கலைஞர் மகளிர் உரிமை திட்டம் (₹1000 திட்டம்) என்றால் என்ன?
output: TN குடும்ப தலைவிகளுக்கு மாதம் ₹1,000. தகுதி: 21-60 வயது பெண், குடும்ப தலைவி, ஆண்டு வருமானம் ₹2.5 லட்சத்திற்கு கீழ், Rice card holder. விலக்கு: Govt job உள்ளவர், Income tax கட்டுபவர், 4-wheeler உடமை, AC உடமை. விண்ணப்பம்: Taluk office/Village panchayat. Documents: Aadhaar, Ration card, Family photo, Bank account. DBT: மாதந்தோறும் bank account-க்கு.

instruction: ராமேஸ்வரம் கோயிலின் சிறப்பு என்ன?
output: ராமநாதசுவாமி கோயில் - 12 ஜோதிர்லிங்கங்களில் ஒன்று. சிறப்புகள்: 1) நீளமான corridor - 1200+ meters (longest in India), 2) 22 தீர்த்தங்கள் (sacred wells) - எல்லாவற்றிலும் குளிப்பது tradition, 3) ராமர் கட்டிய கோயில் என்ற நம்பிக்கை, 4) அக்னி தீர்த்தம் - கடலில் குளிப்பது, 5) சேது பந்தனம் - Adam's Bridge nearby. Char Dham-ல் ஒன்று. Varanasi-க்கு போவதற்கு முன் இங்கே வருவார்கள்.

instruction: Annual health checkup எத்தனை வயசுல இருந்து பண்ணணும்?
output: Guidelines: 1) 30+ years: Basic checkup (sugar, BP, cholesterol), 2) 40+ years: Add cardiac screening, eye check, 3) 50+ years: Add cancer screening (colon, prostate/breast). Women: Cervical/breast screening from 30+. Family history: Start earlier. Government camps: Free checkups periodically - avail. Don't wait for symptoms - preventive checkups save lives.

instruction: தேர்வில் time management எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Strategies: 1) Question paper முழுவதும் முதலில் படியுங்கள் (5 mins) 2) Easy questions முதலில் attempt 3) Marks-க்கு ஏற்ப time allocate (1 mark = 1 minute rule) 4) Stuck ஆனால் skip, later return 5) Last 10 minutes revision-க்கு keep 6) Answer length = marks (2 marks = half page, 5 marks = 1 page) 7) Watch/clock பாருங்கள் regularly. Practice: At home, exam conditions-ல் previous papers எழுதுங்கள்.

instruction: Arranged marriage-kku oththukkolvadhaa vendaama?
output: 'Manamaatchi illaalkan illayin vaazhkkai enaimaatchith thaayinum il'. Nalla illaththarasi illaaVittaal endha selvamum payanillai. Melum: 'Pennin perunthakka yaavula' - penn enbadhu migapperiya varam. Decision ungaludayadhu - aanaal compatibility, values paarungal, external beauty mattum alla.

instruction: TN மதிய உணவு திட்டம் (Mid-Day Meal) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Govt school மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச சத்தான உணவு. Coverage: Class 1-10 (Govt + Aided schools). Menu: Rice/Variety rice + Sambar + Egg/Banana + Boiled Egg (weekly). காலை: Morning nutrition breakfast (select areas). Nutrition: 450-700 calories, 12-20g protein. Aim: School attendance increase, Nutrition, Dropout prevention. Quality: Monthly inspection, Nutritionist supervision. Anganwadi: 0-6 years kids-க்கு Integrated Child Development Services.

instruction: Land survey எப்படி செய்வது? Cost என்ன?
output: Apply: Taluk Surveyor office. Private licensed surveyor-ஐயும் hire பண்ணலாம். Government survey fee: Rs.500-2000 (area based). Private surveyor: Rs.2000-10,000. Survey sketch legally valid document - boundary disputes-க்கு முக்கியம்.

instruction: என் தாத்தாவுக்கு call வந்தது - 'உங்கள் பேரன் accident, hospital bill-க்கு urgent money transfer பண்ணுங்கள்' என்று.
output: இது grandparent scam. மூத்தவர்களின் அன்பை misuse செய்யும் மோசடி. உடனே பேரனை நேரடியாக call செய்து verify செய்யுங்கள். Panic-ல் பணம் அனுப்பாதீர்கள்.

instruction: High-risk pregnancy endraal enna? Special care enge?
output: High-risk factors: 1) Age <18 or >35, 2) Previous C-section/complications, 3) Multiple pregnancy (twins), 4) Diabetes/BP/heart disease, 5) Rh negative blood, 6) Previous stillbirth/miscarriage. Care: 1) Referred to district hospital/medical college, 2) More frequent monitoring, 3) Specialist care. Identification: During ANC visits. Don't hide history - affects baby's safety.

instruction: Minor burns/wounds-க்கு first aid natural remedy?
output: Burns (minor): 1) Cool water (not ice) 10-20 mins, 2) Aloe vera gel (fresh), 3) Honey application (antibacterial), 4) Coconut oil after cooling, 5) Turmeric paste (wound healing). Wounds: 1) Clean with water, 2) Turmeric powder (traditional antiseptic), 3) Neem paste (antibacterial), 4) Honey. Don't use: Toothpaste, egg white, butter on burns - myths! Major burns/wounds: Hospital immediately.

instruction: Uzhavar number endraal enna?
output: Unique farmer ID for TN government schemes. Registration: Primary Agricultural Cooperative Bank or eservices.tn.gov.in. Benefits: Crop insurance, subsidies, PM-KISAN, crop loan eligibility. Required documents: Patta, Chitta, Aadhaar, Bank account.

instruction: Back pain/spine problems-க்கு Ayurveda?
output: Ayurveda effective for: Lumbar spondylosis, disc problems, sciatica, muscle spasm. Treatments: 1) Kati Basti (oil pooling on back), 2) Pinda Sweda (bolus massage), 3) Abhyanga, 4) Basti (medicated enema), 5) Internal medicines. Duration: 7-21 days depending on severity. Many avoid surgery: Through proper Ayurveda treatment. Best results: Early treatment, lifestyle changes. Kerala specialty: Spine care centers.

instruction: வெளிநாட்டு வேலைக்கு உதவுவதாக முகவர் சொல்கிறார். 'விசா செயலாக்கத்திற்கு 2 லட்சம் முன்பணம்' கேட்கிறார்.
output: POE (Protector of Emigrants) பதிவு முகவரா என்று mea.gov.in இல் சரிபார்க்கவும். பதிவற்ற முகவர்களிடம் பணம் கொடுக்காதீர்கள். உண்மையான முகவர்கள் அதிக முன்பணம் கேட்பதில்லை. ஆவணங்களை நேரடியாக சரிபார்க்கவும்.

instruction: Abortion-kku husband consent venumaa?
output: NO! Woman's decision alone. MTP Act: Only woman's consent required (if adult). Husband cannot: 1) Force abortion, 2) Prevent abortion, 3) His consent not legally required. Minor: Parent/guardian consent needed. Confidentiality: Doctor cannot inform husband without woman's consent. Hospital asking husband consent: Wrong - complain.

instruction: Flipkart/Amazon la seller scam - report and refund process enna?
output: Amazon: Orders → Problem with order, A-to-Z Guarantee claim if seller unresponsive, call 1800-3000-9009, refund 5-10 days. Flipkart: My Orders → Need Help, call 1800-208-9898, email cs@flipkart.com. Meesho: My Orders → Help → Report, call 080-61799600, refund 7-15 days. OLX/Quikr: No buyer protection - Police complaint route, olx.in/support. For all platforms escalation: Consumer Forum consumerhelpline.gov.in, National Consumer Helpline 1800-11-4000.

instruction: ASHA worker யார்? என்ன help செய்வாங்க?
output: ASHA = Accredited Social Health Activist - village level health worker. Services: 1) Pregnant women tracking and support, 2) Child vaccination reminders, 3) Health awareness, 4) Medicine distribution (TB, malaria), 5) Nutrition counseling, 6) Family planning advice, 7) Escort to hospital, 8) COVID vaccination support. Contact: Through Village Health Nurse or PHC. Free service.

instruction: Morphed photos upload பண்ணிட்டாங்க - என்ன action?
output: Serious offence: IT Act 66E (privacy violation), 67/67A (obscene/sexually explicit content), IPC 500 (defamation), 509 (insult to modesty). Steps: 1) Platform report (takedown), 2) cybercrime.gov.in, 3) Police FIR. Women: Additional protection under POCSO (if minor), DV Act.

instruction: Abortion legal-aa? Endha conditions-la allowed?
output: Legal under MTP Act (amended 2021). Conditions: 1) Up to 20 weeks - one doctor opinion, 2) 20-24 weeks - two doctors opinion (rape, contraceptive failure, fetal abnormality), 3) Any time - if fetal abnormality (medical board). Special: Rape survivors, minors - extended limits. Unmarried women: Also eligible. Consent: Woman's consent only (adult). Minor: Guardian consent needed.

instruction: Ragging face panren. Enna seiyanum?
output: Immediate action: 1) Don't comply with unreasonable demands 2) Note names, time, place 3) Report to Anti-Ragging Committee (every college has) 4) Online complaint: www.antiragging.in 5) Helpline: 1800-180-5522 (toll-free) 6) College principal/warden 7) Police if physical harm 8) UGC complaint portal. Protection: Your identity can be kept confidential. Punishment: Expulsion, criminal case against raggers. Don't suffer silently!

instruction: Property document lost aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Police complaint (FIR), 2) Newspaper advertisement (lost notice), 3) Sub-Registrar office-la certified copy apply, 4) Affidavit notarize. Certified copy original-kku samam. Online: tnreginet.gov.in-la post-2009 documents download pannalam.

instruction: Owner irandhuvittal agreement enna aagum?
output: Agreement valid-aaga continue aagum. Legal heirs-kku property rights transfer aagum. Heirs-udan pudhu agreement seyyalam or existing agreement continue seyyalam. Heirs arbitrary-aaga evict seyya mudiyaadhu.

instruction: Women-க்கு special ITI courses உள்ளதா?
output: ஆம், Women ITI-கள் உள்ளன. Special trades: 1) Dress Making 2) Embroidery & Needle Work 3) Hair & Skin Care 4) Stenography 5) Desktop Publishing 6) Data Entry Operator 7) Secretarial Practice. Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai-ல் exclusive Women ITIs. Regular ITI-லும் co-ed batches உள்ளன. Hostel facility free. Employment: Garment industry, salons, corporate offices.

instruction: Bank service complaint எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Bank branch-ல் written complaint, 2) 30 days response இல்லாவிட்டால் Banking Ombudsman-க்கு complaint (rbi.org.in), 3) Still no resolution - Consumer forum. Online banking fraud-க்கு Cyber Crime portal-லும் report பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Scam la maatindhadu ku romba guilty feel aagudhu, family ku sollala. Emotional support eppidi get pannuradhu?
output: Understanding: Scam victims experience real trauma - guilt, shame, anxiety, depression common. You are NOT stupid: Scammers are professionals, doctors/IIT/IAS officers get scammed, psychological manipulation is sophisticated. Steps: 1) Tell someone you trust (sharing reduces shame), 2) Join support groups (Facebook 'Cyber Crime Victims India', Reddit r/Scams), 3) Professional help - iCall 9152987821, Vandrevala 1860-2662-345, NIMHANS 080-46110007, Snehi Chennai 044-24640050, 4) Focus on action (complaints give control), 5) Forgive yourself (you trusted, that's not wrong). Family talk: Choose calm moment, focus on facts not self-blame, discuss recovery plan together.

instruction: Driving License apply pannanum - LLR to DL full process?
output:
Step 1 - Learner's License (LLR):

Apply Online:
1. parivahan.gov.in → 'Online Services' → Tamil Nadu
2. 'Apply for Learner's License'
3. Fill Form 1 (Application)
4. Fill Form 2 (Medical - self declaration)
5. Upload: Age proof, Address proof, Photo, Signature
6. Pay: ₹200-350

Age Requirements: Scooty (no gear) 16, Bike/Car 18, Transport 20

Book Slot: Select RTO, Choose date, Go for test

LLR Test: Computer-based, 15 questions on road signs/rules, Pass: 9/15, Result: Same day, Valid: 6 months

Step 2 - Driving Test for DL:

Wait Period: 30 days after LLR

Book DL Slot:
1. parivahan.gov.in → 'Apply for Driving License'
2. Enter LLR number
3. Fill Form 4
4. Pay: ₹500-700
5. Book slot

Test Day:
- Bring own vehicle (or rent near RTO)
- Documents: LLR, Aadhaar, Photos
- Tests: 8 formation (parking/reverse), Slope driving, Traffic signals, Road driving

Pass: Biometric capture → DL number → Card mailed
Fail: Re-test after 7 days + additional fee

Timeline: LLR same day, DL test after 30 days, DL card 7-15 days after test

instruction: Social media-ல் abuse/threat வந்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Screenshot எடுங்க (URL visible-ஆ), 2) Report to platform, 3) Cyber Crime portal-ல் complaint, 4) Women-க்கு 181 helpline. Applicable laws: IT Act 66A (struck down), 67 (obscene content), IPC 506 (criminal intimidation), 509 (insult to modesty).

instruction: +2 முடித்த பிறகு என்ன படிக்கலாம்? எப்படி முடிவு செய்வது?
output: முடிவெடுக்க யோசிக்க வேண்டியவை: 1) உங்கள் ஆர்வம் - Science/Commerce/Arts 2) குடும்ப நிதி நிலை 3) வேலை வாய்ப்பு trichy 4) படிப்பு காலம். Options: Engineering, Medical, Arts/Science, Law, Management, Vocational. Free career counselling: District Employment Office, நம்மை ஊர் பள்ளிகள். TNSDC skill assessment free-யாக செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Affidavit எப்படி எழுதுவது? எங்கே notarize பண்றது?
output: Affidavit format: 1) Title (I, [Name], do hereby solemnly affirm...), 2) Personal details (age, address, occupation), 3) Statement of facts (numbered paragraphs), 4) Verification (true to knowledge and belief), 5) Deponent signature. Notarize: Any Notary Public - Rs.50-200 fee. Stamp paper: Rs.10-100 (depends on purpose). E-stamp available at banks.

instruction: Right to be forgotten endraal enna?
output: Online-la ulla personal information delete seyya request pannum right. DPDP Act 2023-la provision undu. Google search results remove: Google legal removal request. Social media: Platform privacy settings. Court orders moolamum removal possible.

instruction: Gym membership cancel பண்ண விடல, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Consumer rights: 1) Written cancellation request கொடுங்க, 2) Refund policy check - pro-rata refund கேளுங்க, 3) Unfair terms (no cancellation ever) = void under Consumer Protection Act, 4) Refuse பண்ணா: Consumer Forum complaint - Rs.1 lakh-க்குள் = District Forum. Medical reason cancellation: Doctor certificate கொடுத்தா usually accept பண்றாங்க.

instruction: நாயன்மார், ஆழ்வார் சமாதிகளை எங்கே visit செய்யலாம்?
output: முக்கிய சமாதிகள்: Nayanmars: 1) திருஞானசம்பந்தர் - நல்லூர், 2) அப்பர் - திருவாமூர், 3) சுந்தரர் - திருவஞ்சைக்களம், 4) மாணிக்கவாசகர் - சிதம்பரம், 5) காரைக்கால் அம்மையார் - காரைக்கால். Azhvars: 1) ஆண்டாள் - ஸ்ரீவில்லிபுத்தூர், 2) நம்மாழ்வார் - ஆழ்வார்திருநகரி, 3) பெரியாழ்வார் - ஸ்ரீவில்லிபுத்தூர். Temple visit-ல் சமாதி darshan common practice.

instruction: Mental health insurance cover aagumaa?
output: Yes! Mandatory since MHCA 2017 + IRDAI guidelines. Coverage: 1) Psychiatric hospitalization, 2) Day care treatment, 3) OPD (some policies), 4) Medicine costs. Exclusions: Some policies exclude substance abuse (check terms). Claim: Same as physical illness - cashless/reimbursement. Denied: Complaint to IRDAI, Insurance Ombudsman. Important: Don't hide history - disclose for valid claims.

instruction: 'கேடில் விழுச்செல்வம் கல்வி' - கல்வியின் மதிப்பு என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'கேடில் விழுச்செல்வம் கல்வி ஒருவற்கு மாடல்ல மற்றையவை'. அர்த்தம்: கல்வியே அழியாத செல்வம். மற்ற எல்லா செல்வங்களும் (பணம், தங்கம், சொத்து) ஒரு நாள் போய்விடும். ஆனால் கல்வி எப்போதும் உன்னுடன் இருக்கும். Education = permanent wealth. Investment in knowledge = best investment!

instruction: Free medicines எங்கு கிடைக்கும்?
output: Government hospitals-ல் essential medicines free. Jan Aushadhi stores-ல் 90% வரை discount-ல் medicines கிடைக்கும். Doctor prescription தேவை. janaushadhi.gov.in-ல் store locations பாருங்கள்.

instruction: Single mother rights என்னென்ன? Documents-ல் father name வேணுமா?
output: Rights: 1) Birth certificate - mother name only acceptable, 2) School admission - father name not mandatory (Supreme Court), 3) Passport - mother as sole guardian okay, 4) Aadhar - single parent sufficient. Challenges: Some private institutions insist - quote Supreme Court judgment. Government schemes: Single mother pension available in TN. Child custody: Automatic to mother (unwed).

instruction: Power of Attorney eppadi seivathu?
output: Types: General (all acts), Special (specific act). Draft on stamp paper (Rs.100-500 based on state). Registration: Sub-Registrar office (optional but recommended for property). NRI: Indian Embassy attestation. Revocation: Same process + inform parties.

instruction: IGNOAPS (Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme) என்றால் என்ன?
output: BPL மூத்த குடிமக்களுக்கு மாத ஓய்வூதியம். Central: ₹200/month (60-79 வயது), ₹500/month (80+ வயது). TN State: கூடுதலாக ₹1,000/month. Total TN-ல்: ₹1,200-1,500/month. தகுதி: 60+ வயது, BPL குடும்பம். விண்ணப்பம்: Village Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Aadhaar, BPL card/Income certificate, Bank account. Payment: DBT through bank account.

instruction: No Claim Bonus (NCB) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Claim இல்லாத ஒவ்வொரு வருடமும் premium discount. 1st year: 20%, 2nd: 25%, 3rd: 35%, 4th: 45%, 5th+: 50%. NCB transfer: Old vehicle sell பண்ணும்போது new vehicle-க்கு transfer ஆகும். Claim பண்ணினால் NCB reset.

instruction: Children parents-ஐ பார்க்காம விட்டுட்டாங்க - law உதவுமா?
output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007: Children (including married daughters) parents-க்கு maintain செய்யணும். Tribunal: SDM/Tahsildar level. Maintenance order: Rs.10,000/month max. Property revocation: Gift deed cancel possible if neglect proved.

instruction: Pension arrears எப்போது கிடைக்கும்?
output: Pay commission revision-க்கு பின் arrears calculate செய்து கொடுப்பார்கள். சில மாதங்கள் ஆகலாம். AG office-ல் status check செய்யலாம். Installment-ஆக கொடுக்கலாம்.

instruction: In-laws against DV case போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். DV Act-ன் கீழ் 'respondent' includes husband + his relatives who abuse. 498A IPC-ன் கீழ் husband மற்றும் relatives against criminal case போடலாம். ஆனால் specific allegations + evidence வேண்டும் - general accusation not enough.

instruction: என்ன disease-க்கு எந்த yoga?
output: Condition-specific yoga: 1) Diabetes - Surya Namaskar, twists, Pranayama, 2) BP - Shavasana, forward bends, slow breathing, 3) Back pain - Cat-cow, child's pose, sphinx, 4) Anxiety/stress - Pranayama, meditation, restorative poses, 5) Obesity - Power yoga, Surya Namaskar, 6) Asthma - Pranayama, chest opening poses, 7) Insomnia - Yoga Nidra, legs up wall. Important: Learn from qualified teacher, start slow, inform about conditions.

instruction: 'Gold investment scheme - 1 gram gold-க்கு மாதம் 10% return' என்று jewellery shop சொல்கிறது. Safe-ஆ?
output: Gold-க்கு fixed return கொடுக்க முடியாது. Gold price market-ஐ depend செய்யும். இது போன்ற schemes unsafe. Registered gold bonds வாங்குங்கள்.

instruction: MBBS/BDS சேர்க்கைக்கு தமிழ்நாட்டில் என்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output: NEET தேர்வு கட்டாயம். படிகள்: 1) NEET எழுதுங்கள் 2) தமிழ்நாடு Medical Selection Committee counselling-க்கு விண்ணப்பியுங்கள் 3) ஆன்லைன் choice filling 4) அரசு/தனியார் மருத்துவக் கல்லூரி ஒதுக்கீடு. அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ஆண்டுக்கு ₹13,500. 7.5% அரசு பள்ளி மாணவர்களுக்கு தனி இட ஒதுக்கீடு.

instruction: Government school-la admission eppadi?
output: RTE Act paadi 6-14 age children-ku free education. Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, Transfer Certificate (old school). Admission: June-July (academic year start). Complaint: Nearby BEO / DEO office.

instruction: Akshaya Tritiya - 'Digital gold at 50% off! Today only!' app notification வந்துச்சு. Buy பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam alert! Gold 50% off என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Akshaya Tritiya gold buying sentiment exploit. Unknown apps-ல gold வாங்காதீங்க. Trusted platforms (MMTC, banks) மட்டும் use பண்ணுங்க. Too good offer = too bad trap.

instruction: Free vaccination schedule enna? Enge poganum?
output: Universal Immunization Program - FREE for all children. Schedule: Birth - BCG, OPV, Hep B; 6 weeks - DPT, OPV, Hep B; 10 weeks - DPT, OPV; 14 weeks - DPT, OPV, Hep B; 9 months - Measles, Vitamin A; 16-24 months - DPT booster, OPV, Measles. Where: PHC, Government hospital, Anganwadi. Carry: Child's health card. Missed dose: Can catch up - consult ANM.

instruction: Medicine expiry aanaa use pannalaamaa?
output: NO! Expired medicine risks: 1) May not work (lost potency), 2) May become toxic, 3) Can cause adverse reactions. Law: Selling expired medicine = criminal offence. Check: Expiry date on strip/bottle before purchase. If sold expired: 1) Return to pharmacy, 2) Drug Inspector complaint, 3) Consumer Forum. Storage: Keep as per instructions - some need refrigeration.

instruction: Tholkappiyam endraal enna? Yaar ezhudhinar?
output: Tholkappiyam - Tamilin migap pazhamaiyaana ilakkana nool. Tholkappiyar ezhuthiyathu. Ezhutthu, Sol, Porul endra moondru adhikaarangal. Tamil mozhiyoda grammar mattumalla, vaazhkai murai, panpaadu ellam idhil ullana. Agathiyaroda maanavan endru korappadugiradhu. 'Tholkappiyam katravan sol kaappiyam' enbadhu pazhamozhi. Indrum Tamil studies-kku aadharam.

instruction: OTP share panniten, account empty aaiduchu. Bank liability evlo?
output: RBI Guidelines: Bank's fault = Zero liability, Third party breach (you not at fault) = Zero if reported in 3 days, Customer negligence (OTP sharing) = Full liability IF bank proves negligence. But you can argue: Social engineering defense (deceived, not negligent), Bank's duty of care (clear warnings?), Delayed debit argument (unusual pattern). Steps: Written complaint (say 'OTP obtained through fraud' not 'I gave OTP'), Banking Ombudsman at cms.rbi.org.in (90% get partial refund), Consumer Forum, Civil Court for large amounts.

instruction: Uzhavar number என்றால் என்ன?
output: Unique farmer ID for TN government schemes. Registration: Primary Agricultural Cooperative Bank அல்லது eservices.tn.gov.in. Benefits: Crop insurance, subsidies, PM-KISAN, crop loan eligibility. Required documents: Patta, Chitta, Aadhaar, Bank account.

instruction: 'ICICI வங்கி - உங்கள் debit card CVV update தேவை' என்று SMS வந்தது. Update செய்யலாமா?
output: CVV update என்று எதுவும் இல்லை. CVV யாருக்கும் சொல்லக்கூடாது. இது card details திருட மோசடி முயற்சி.

instruction: Gangaikonda Cholapuram koviloda sirappu enna?
output: Rajendra Chozhan thandhaiyoda ninaivaga kattiya kovil. Sirappugal: 1) Thanjai kovilai pondrae aanaal satru siriya alavu, 2) Lion base pilasters - unique feature, 3) Sirpangal miga azhagu - Nataraja, Saraswati, 4) Gangaiyai vendradhoda ninaivaga indha peyar, 5) Oru kaalathil pudhiya thalainagaram ingethan. Ariyalur district-la ulladhu. Thanjai alavu crowd illai - peaceful visit possible.

instruction: En medical information yaarukkum share panna koodaadhu - right irukkaa?
output: Yes! Doctor-patient confidentiality. Protected info: 1) Diagnosis, 2) Test results, 3) Treatment details, 4) HIV status, 5) Mental health records, 6) Reproductive health. Exceptions: 1) Patient consent, 2) Court order, 3) Public health (notifiable diseases), 4) Harm to others. Breach: Medical Council complaint + civil damages. Employer: Cannot demand medical records without consent.

instruction: High-risk pregnancy என்றால் என்ன? Special care எங்கே?
output: High-risk factors: 1) Age <18 or >35, 2) Previous C-section/complications, 3) Multiple pregnancy (twins), 4) Diabetes/BP/heart disease, 5) Rh negative blood, 6) Previous stillbirth/miscarriage. Care: 1) Referred to district hospital/medical college, 2) More frequent monitoring, 3) Specialist care. Identification: During ANC visits. Don't hide history - affects baby's safety.

instruction: Family member-க்கு patient condition சொல்லலாமா?
output: Only with patient consent (if patient is conscious/competent). Rules: 1) Adult patient decides who gets information, 2) Unconscious patient: Next of kin informed, 3) Minor: Parents/guardians informed, 4) Psychiatric patient: Rules vary. Sensitive info (HIV, mental health): Extra careful - patient must specifically consent. Nominated person: Patient can designate specific family member for communication.

instruction: 'Seiyaamal seidha uthavikku' - nandri patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Seiyaamal seidha uthavikku vaiyagamum vaanagamum aattral aridhu'. Artham: Naam endha uthaviyum seiyaamal irukkum bodhu, yaaro oruvar namakku uthavi seidhaal, andha uthavikku indha bhoomiyum sorgamum kooda eedaagaadhu. Unexpected kindness-oda mathippu alavida mudiyaadhadu.

instruction: Arthritis/joint pain-க்கு Siddha treatment என்ன?
output: Effective for: Osteoarthritis (Moottu Vaatham), Rheumatoid arthritis (Ama Vaatham), Gout (Vali Azhal Keel Vayu). Treatments: 1) Internal - Rasagandhi Mezhugu, Sallaki, 2) External - Kottamchukkadi Thailam, Pinda Thailam, 3) Thokkanam (specialized massage), 4) Varmam therapy, 5) Ottradam (fomentation), 6) Kizhi (poultice massage). Diet: Avoid sour, cold foods. Duration: 1-3 months typically.

instruction: Gym membership cancel panna vidala, enna seivathu?
output: Consumer rights: 1) Written cancellation request kodunga, 2) Refund policy check - pro-rata refund kelunga, 3) Unfair terms (no cancellation ever) = void under Consumer Protection Act, 4) Refuse pannaa: Consumer Forum complaint - Rs.1 lakh-kkul = District Forum. Medical reason cancellation: Doctor certificate koduththaa usually accept panraanga.

instruction: Rental agreement-la ennenna details irukkanum?
output: Owner & tenant peru, address, Aadhaar number, monthly rent amount, advance/deposit amount, agreement period, maintenance yaar responsibility, notice period, house condition, restrictions (pets, subletting), electricity/water yaar pay panrathu - ellaam irukkanum.

instruction: En bag-la ella documents-um thirudu poyiduchu (Aadhaar, PAN, DL, Voter ID, Bank Card). Enna seyvadhu?
output:
Immediately:
1. Police FIR - List all documents, get FIR copy
2. Block Bank Cards - Call helpline immediately (SBI: 1800-111-111)
3. Block SIM - If phone stolen

Get duplicate documents:
4. Aadhaar - eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in (Free instant download)
5. PAN - eportal.incometax.gov.in (Free e-PAN)
6. Driving License - parivahan.gov.in (₹200-500)
7. Voter ID - voters.eci.gov.in or Voter Helpline App
8. Bank Cards - Bank branch with FIR (7-10 days)
9. Ration Card - tnpds.gov.in

Important: Lock Aadhaar biometrics at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in

instruction: SC/ST மாணவர்களுக்கு என்னென்ன scholarships கிடைக்கும்?
output: Adi Dravidar Welfare Department: 1) Pre-matric scholarship - ₹500-1,500/ஆண்டு 2) Post-matric scholarship - ₹3,000-10,000/ஆண்டு 3) Professional course - full fee + maintenance 4) PhD scholarship 5) Foreign study - ₹20 lakh 6) Free laptop 7) Hostel free 8) Books, uniform free. Apply: www.adwelfare.tn.gov.in. Income limit: ₹2.5 lakh/ஆண்டு. ஏறக்குறைய எல்லா படிப்புகளுக்கும் scholarship உள்ளது.

instruction: Mudhiyor pension eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL family. Amount: Monthly ₹1,000. Apply: Online: pensionschemes.tn.gov.in, Offline: Tahsildar / Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Income certificate, Aadhaar, Bank passbook

instruction: Fake medicine கிடைச்சது - complain எங்கே?
output: Serious offence! Complaint: 1) Drug Inspector (District Drug Control Office), 2) State Drugs Control Department, 3) FDA helpline, 4) Police (criminal case possible). Evidence: Keep medicine, bill, pack with batch number. Verification: Check authenticity - company website, QR code (some have), call company. Punishment: Up to life imprisonment for spurious drugs causing death. CDSCO: Central regulator.

instruction: School admission மறுக்கிறார்கள் - RTE-ல் seat இருக்கே?
output: RTE Act 25%: EWS/disadvantaged group-க்கு reserved. Apply: Online portal (rte.tn.gov.in). Rejection complaint: Block Education Officer, DEO, State RTE Authority. Documents: Income certificate, caste certificate, residence proof. Age: 6-14 years.

instruction: Velai seithukonde padikka enna vazhi irukkudhu?
output: Distance Education options: 1) IGNOU - biggest open university 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) 3) University of Madras - IDE 4) Annamalai University Distance. UG/PG/Diploma ellam available. Fee: ₹5,000-20,000/year. Exams: 2 times per year. Work experience + degree rendu kidaikkum.

instruction: Subletting பண்ணலாமா? Owner-க்கு தெரியாம பண்ணினா என்ன ஆகும்?
output: Agreement check பண்ணுங்க - usually subletting prohibited. Without permission subletting: 1) Agreement breach, 2) Immediate eviction ground, 3) Deposit forfeit possibility. Commercial property: Subletting common but written permission வேணும். Safe approach: Owner consent in writing வாங்குங்க before subletting.

instruction: Power of Attorney எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Types: General (all acts), Special (specific act). Draft on stamp paper (Rs.100-500 based on state). Registration: Sub-Registrar office (optional but recommended for property). NRI: Indian Embassy attestation. Revocation: Same process + inform parties.

instruction: TB (Tuberculosis) treatment free-யா கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! National TB Elimination Program - completely FREE. Services: 1) Diagnosis (sputum test, X-ray), 2) Medicines (6-9 months course), 3) Follow-up tests, 4) DOTS therapy supervision, 5) Nutrition support (Rs.500/month), 6) Transport allowance. Where: Government hospitals, designated TB centres. Private diagnosis: Government will still provide free treatment. Nikshay Poshan Yojana: DBT nutrition support.

instruction: Paralysis/stroke rehabilitation Ayurveda-ல்?
output: Ayurveda rehabilitation: Complements physiotherapy well. Treatments: 1) Abhyanga with specific oils, 2) Pinda Sweda (Navarakizhi), 3) Basti (medicated enema - key treatment), 4) Nasya, 5) Internal medicines. Best time: Post-acute phase (after stabilization). Duration: 21-90 days intensive. Outcomes: Improved mobility, speech, daily activities. Combination: Ayurveda + Physiotherapy + Yoga gives best results. Where: Specialized centers in Kerala, some TN facilities.

instruction: Business fail ஆனால் என்ன குறள் motivate பண்ணும்?
