output: 12 Azhvaargalaal paadappatta 108 Vishnu kovilgal. Ivattril: 84 Tamil Nadu-la, 11 Kerala-la, 2 Andhra-la, 1 Gujarat-la, 2 Uttar Pradesh-la, 6 Nepal-la (Vaikunta), 2 mattravai. Ovvondrilum Perumal vevveru peyaril, vevveru form-la iruppaar. 'Nalayira Divya Prabandham' indha kovilgalai paadugiradhu. 108-m visit seivathu spiritual achievement.

instruction: நான் college student. 'Internship offer from Google, registration fee 2000' என்று email வந்தது. Join பண்ணலாமா?
output: Google internship-க்கு fee கிடையாது. Official careers.google.com-ல் மட்டுமே apply செய்ய வேண்டும். இது students-ஐ target செய்யும் scam. பணம் கட்டாதீர்கள்.

instruction: EC (Encumbrance Certificate) enga peruvadhu?
output: Online: tnreginet.gov.in (1987 onwards available). Offline: Sub-registrar office. Fee: ₹15 per year. Time: Online instant, offline 3-5 days.

instruction: Overtime pay எவ்வளவு கொடுக்கணும்?
output: Factories Act: Normal working hours = 8 hours/day, 48 hours/week. Overtime = Double wages (2x normal rate). Maximum overtime: 50 hours/quarter. Overtime refuse பண்ணலாம் (reasonable grounds). Forced overtime illegal.

instruction: Kalki, Sandilyan pondra naavalaasiriyargal patri sollungal?
output: Kalki Krishnamurthy (1899-1954) - 'Ponniyin Selvan', 'Sivagamiyin Sabadham', 'Parthiban Kanavu' ezhuthiyavar. Chozhar varalaaru novel-kalaaga. Sandilyan - 'Kadal Pura', 'Yavana Rani' ezhuthiyavar. Varalatru naavalgal popular. Kalki magazine indrum run aagudhu. Ponniyin Selvan - 2022 Mani Ratnam film, 2-part blockbuster! Tamil historical fiction pioneers.

instruction: Rental housing scheme ஏதாவது உள்ளதா?
output: Affordable Rental Housing Complex (ARHC) scheme urban poor-க்கு உண்டு. Industrial workers, migrants-க்கு subsidized rent-ல் வீடு. State urban development department-ல் விசாரிக்கவும்.

instruction: Chozhar venkala silaigal (Bronze sculptures) sirappu enna?
output: Chozhar kaalathu venkala silaigal ulaga pugazh petrravai. Lost wax technique (mezhugu neekkal murai) payanpaduththappattathu. Sirappugal: 1) Nataraja - migavum famous, cosmic dance, 2) Proportion perfection, 3) Dynamic poses, 4) Fine details, 5) Bronze alloy - centuries-aaga intact. Thanjavur Art Gallery, Chennai Museum-la collection ulladhu. Swamimalai (Kumbakonam aruge) indrum traditional bronze casting nadakkiradhu. GI tag petradhu.

instruction: Defective product வாங்கிட்டேன் - என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: Options: 1) Replacement - same product புதியதாக, 2) Refund - full amount திரும்ப, 3) Repair - free of cost சரி செய்ய, 4) Compensation - loss-க்கு extra amount. முதலில் seller-கிட்ட written complaint கொடுங்க. Response இல்லாவிட்டால் consumer forum போங்க.

instruction: Operation-la scissors/gauze ulle vittuttaanga - enna seivathu?
output: Classic negligence case (Res Ipsa Loquitur - thing speaks for itself). Steps: 1) Get X-ray/CT evidence, 2) Medical records collect, 3) Complaint to hospital, 4) Consumer Forum case, 5) Criminal complaint (Section 338 IPC - grievous hurt). Compensation: Cost of removal surgery + damages + mental agony + loss of income. Hospital cannot deny - clear negligence.

instruction: Azhvaargal yaar? Eththanai per?
output: Azhvaargal - Vaishnava bhakthi iyakkathoda 12 punithargal. 'Azhvaar' endraal 'aazhndhu arindhavar' endru porul - iraivanaai aazhamaga anubhaviththavargal. Ivargal Thirumaalai (Vishnu) paadinaargal. Nalayira Divya Prabandham ivargaloda padaippu - 4000 paasurangal. 108 Divya Desangalai (Vishnu kovilgal) paadiyullanar. Vaishnava sampradhaayathoda aadharam.

instruction: NEET-aa JEE-aa? Doctor-aa Engineer-aa? Eppadi decide panrathu?
output: Decision factors: 1) Interest - Patient care vs Problem solving 2) Study style - Memory vs Logic 3) Duration - MBBS 5.5 years vs Engineering 4 years 4) Investment - Medical costlier 5) Lifestyle - Doctor on-call vs Engineer 9-5. Self-assessment: Biology enjoy panreengala = NEET. Maths/Physics enjoy = JEE. Both attempt possible (Science stream). Shadow a doctor and engineer if possible. Final call: Your genuine interest, not family pressure.

instruction: Women-ku special ITI courses ulladha?
output: Aam, Women ITI-gal ullana. Special trades: 1) Dress Making 2) Embroidery & Needle Work 3) Hair & Skin Care 4) Stenography 5) Desktop Publishing 6) Data Entry Operator 7) Secretarial Practice. Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai-la exclusive Women ITIs. Regular ITI-layum co-ed batches ullana. Hostel facility free. Employment: Garment industry, salons, corporate offices.

instruction: Followed celebrity page 'iPhone 15 Giveaway - Follow + Tag 3 friends + Pay 500 shipping to claim.' I won nu DM vandhudhu. Legitimate aa?
output: Fake celebrity pages - verification badge check pannunga. Real giveaways shipping fee kekaadhu. 500 pay pannina - more fees varum, iPhone varaadhu. 'Tag friends' = scam spread mechanism. Ignore fake giveaways.

instruction: Online application submit ஆகல, error வருது
output: Common fixes: 1) Clear browser cache, try incognito mode 2) Different browser (Chrome/Firefox) 3) Check file size limits (usually <200KB photos, <500KB docs) 4) PDF/JPG format correct? 5) All mandatory fields filled? 6) Internet stable? 7) Deadline passed? 8) Server busy - try late night. Still failing: Screenshot error, contact helpline. Alternative: Try from e-Sevai centre - they have dedicated lines.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'Samacheer kalvi book distribution issue. Teacher contribution 1500 for additional copies.' School books ku teacher pay pannumaa?
output: Textbook distribution is government responsibility, never requires teacher payment. Samacheer kalvi books distributed through education department. Contact BEO/DEO if any book shortage. This targets teachers' dedication to students - emotional manipulation.

instruction: License renewal எப்போது பண்ணணும்?
output: Non-transport: 20 years validity (age 50 வரை), பிறகு 5 years. Transport: 3 years. Renewal: Expiry-க்கு 1 year முன் அல்லது 1 year பின் (late fee applicable). Online: parivahan.gov.in. Expired license-உடன் drive பண்ணினால் fine Rs.5,000.

instruction: NEET Exam Pattern enna? Marks eppadi calculate aagum?
output:
**NEET Exam Pattern:**

**Basics:**
- Offline exam, 3 hrs 20 min
- 200 questions (180 to attempt)
- 720 marks total

**Subjects:** Physics, Chemistry, Botany, Zoology - 45 each

**Marking:**
- Correct: +4
- Wrong: -1 (Negative!)
- Unattempted: 0

**Cut-off (Approx):**
- General top colleges: 600+
- Govt Medical General: 550+
- SC: 450+, ST: 400+

**Tips:**
- No random guessing
- Section B - choose wisely
- Time management key

instruction: Friend/family member suicidal-aa irukaanga - enna seivathu?
output: Dos: 1) Listen without judgment, 2) Take them seriously, 3) Stay with them, 4) Remove means (medicines, sharp objects), 5) Encourage professional help, 6) Call helpline together. Don'ts: 1) Don't leave alone if immediate risk, 2) Don't promise secrecy, 3) Don't argue or lecture, 4) Don't dare them. Emergency: Take to hospital emergency if attempt made or imminent risk. You're not alone - helplines guide you too.

instruction: Workplace-la sexual harassment, POSH Act enna solluthu?
output: POSH Act 2013 (Prevention of Sexual Harassment): 1) Every office with 10+ employees - Internal Committee (IC) irukkanum, 2) Complaint: IC-kku 3 months-kkul, 3) Inquiry: 90 days-kkul complete, 4) Action: Transfer, warning, termination. No IC: Local Committee-kku complaint. Retaliation protection undu. Anonymous complaint-um valid.

instruction: Polytechnic-ல் எந்த branch select செய்வது? Job opportunity எப்படி?
output: Branch wise opportunities: 1) Mechanical - Manufacturing, automobile companies 2) Civil - Construction, PWD, real estate 3) Electrical - TNEB, industries, electrician 4) Electronics - IT companies, telecom 5) Computer Science - Software, IT support 6) Automobile - Service centers, companies. Highest demand: Mechanical, Civil. Growing: Computer Science. Government jobs: TNPSC Diploma level posts available.

instruction: Padippai niruttha nirbanddhamaa irukiren, emergency scholarship ulladha?
output: Emergency options: 1) HDFC ECSS - crisis support ₹75,000 2) PM CARES (COVID affected) 3) Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund - apply to Collector 4) College Student Aid Fund 5) Rotary Club scholarships 6) Lions Club education support. Immediate help: District Social Welfare Officer-a santhiyunga. NGOs: Pratham, Smile Foundation. Fee postponement request to college principal.

instruction: Gratuity thara maruthal enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Written application to employer, 2) 30 days-kkul pay pannanum, 3) Refuse pannaal Controlling Authority (Labour Commissioner)-kku complaint, 4) Labour Court appeal. Delay-kku 10% interest kidaikkum. Forfeiture: Only if dismissed for serious misconduct.

instruction: Tuition போகணுமா? School படிப்பு மட்டும் போதாதா?
output: Depends on: 1) School quality - Government/Private 2) Child's self-study ability 3) Parent support at home 4) Specific subject weakness. Tuition alternatives: 1) Free government coaching centres 2) YouTube educational videos 3) Khan Academy, BYJU'S free tier 4) Group study with friends 5) Senior students help. When needed: Maths, Science weak subjects, competitive exam preparation. Cost: ₹500-2000/month for tuition. Self-study skill develop = best investment.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Arts council grant application. 10,000 processing fee for 5 lakh project grant.' Grant apply pannalama?
output: Government arts grants through official channels - Ministry of Culture, State Cultural departments. No processing fees for grant applications. Selection based on merit and proposal quality. Check official government cultural affairs websites for legitimate grant schemes.

instruction: Nayanmaargal yaar? Eththanai per?
output: Nayanmaargal - Saiva bhakthi iyakkathoda 63 punithargal. 'Nayanmaar' endraal 'thalaivar' endru porul. Ivargal Sivaperumaaanai vanangi, bhakthi maarggathai parappinaargal. Vevveru jaadhi, thozhil, pinnaniyilirundhu vandhavargal - arasar, vanigar, velaikkarar, pengal ellaarum undu. Sekkizhaar ezhuthiya 'Periya Puranam' ivargal varalatrai koorugiradu. Saiva samayathoda aadharam.

instruction: கூரியர் வந்து 'உங்கள் பெயரில் போதைப்பொருள் பார்சல் வந்துள்ளது, கைது தவிர்க்க இப்போதே பணம் செலுத்துங்கள்' என்றார்.
output: இது 'டிஜிட்டல் கைது' மோசடி. காவல்துறை தொலைபேசியில் பணம் கேட்பதில்லை. பயப்படாதீர்கள், தொலைபேசியை வைக்கவும். உண்மையான புலனாய்வு இருந்தால் நேரடி நோட்டீஸ் வரும்.

instruction: TNPSC Group 4 Exam-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
output:
**TNPSC Group 4 Preparation:**

**Eligibility:** 10th pass, Age 18-32

**Exam Pattern:**
- GK: 50 questions - 150 marks
- Tamil: 50 questions - 150 marks
- Total: 300 marks, 3 hours
- Negative: 1/3 mark

**GK Syllabus:**
History, Geography, Polity, Economy, Science, Current Affairs

**Tamil Syllabus:**
Grammar, Literature, General Tamil, Translation

**Books:**
- Tamil: 6th-12th TN Books, Pothu Tamil guides
- GK: NCERT + TN Textbooks
- Current: Tamil Hindu daily

**6-Month Plan:**
- Month 1-2: Textbook basics
- Month 3-4: Deep study
- Month 5: Revision
- Month 6: Mock tests

**Tips:**
1. Tamil medium advantage
2. 10th books = 60% syllabus
3. Previous 10 years papers must

instruction: திருக்குறள் mental health-க்கு எப்படி உதவும்?
output: 1) துன்பம் தீர்தல் அதிகாரம் - depression-க்கு உதவும், 2) ஊக்கமுடைமை - motivation loss-க்கு, 3) அடக்கமுடைமை - anger management-க்கு, 4) பொறையுடைமை - patience கற்றுக்கொள்ள, 5) இன்னா செய்யாமை - negative thoughts குறைக்க. 'துன்பம் வரும்போது அதை எப்படி face பண்றது' என்று வள்ளுவர் நிறைய சொல்லியிருக்கார். Therapists கூட Thirukkural quotes பயன்படுத்துறாங்க.

instruction: PAN Card-la thavaru irukku - eppadi sari seyvadhu?
output: To correct: 1. onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Changes or Correction in PAN Data' 2. Fill form 3. Upload correct documents 4. Fee: ₹107. Can correct: Name, DOB, Father's name, Address, Photo/Signature. Important: If PAN-Aadhaar linked, details must match in both

instruction: என் புள்ள school-ல அடிச்சிட்டாங்க, action எடுக்கணும்
output: Corporal punishment banned! RTE Act + NCPCR guidelines. Actions: 1) School principal-கிட்ட written complaint, 2) Education Department (DEO), 3) Child Welfare Committee, 4) Police (if serious injury). Evidence: Photos, medical certificate. Teacher action: Suspension, termination possible. School license: Risk of cancellation. Child helpline: 1098.

instruction: International Driving Permit (IDP) எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply: RTO office (not online). Documents: Valid Indian DL, passport, visa, photos. Fee: Rs.1,000. Validity: 1 year or Indian DL validity - எது குறைவோ அது. IDP alone not valid - Indian DL-உடன் carry பண்ணணும்.

instruction: Rural students-ku enna special schemes irukku?
output:
**Rural Student Benefits:**

**1. PMSSS:** Full fee + maintenance for meritorious

**2. Eklavya Schools:** Free residential (tribal) - emrs.tribal.gov.in

**3. KGBV:** Rural girls Class 6-12 residential

**4. Free Hostels:** BC/MBC/SC/ST hostels in all districts

**5. Transport Allowance:** ₹500-1,000/month

**6. Special Coaching:**
- TNSF rural NEET
- Block-level centers

**7. Agri Education:** Special quota in TNAU

**8. Distance Education:** IGNOU/TNOU in rural areas

**How to Get:**
- Rural certificate from VAO
- Apply through school
- Contact BEO

instruction: Police station la FIR file panna enna process? Refuse pannaa enna pannuradhu?
output: Documents needed: Written complaint (2 copies), evidence printouts, ID proof, bank statements, screenshots, cyber crime acknowledgment. Sections to mention: 420 IPC (Cheating), 406 IPC (Breach of trust), 66C IT Act (Identity theft), 66D IT Act (Cheating using computer). If police refuse: Step 1: Written application citing Section 154(3) CrPC. Step 2: Meet SP/DSP. Step 3: Section 156(3) CrPC application to Judicial Magistrate. Step 4: State Human Rights Commission. Step 5: High Court writ petition (if all else fails).

instruction: Bharatanatyam, Carnatic music padikka government institution irukka?
output: Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University, Kalakshetra Foundation (Chennai), Government Music Colleges irukku. Diploma, Degree courses available. Fee miga koraivau. Talented students-kku scholarship undu.

instruction: Email vandhudhu 'Press council accreditation renewal. Pay 10,000 for journalist ID card.' Press card ku idhu process aa?
output: Press Council of India accreditation free through employer organization. PIB accreditation through government process, no fees. State press accreditation through Information & PR department. No 10,000 fee for any legitimate journalist ID. Check official PCI website.

instruction: PM SVANidhi (Street Vendor Loan) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Street Vendors-க்கு கடன். முதல் கடன்: ₹10,000, இரண்டாவது: ₹20,000 (timely repayment-க்கு), மூன்றாவது: ₹50,000. Interest Subsidy: 7%. Cashback: Digital payment-க்கு ₹1,200/year வரை. தகுதி: Certificate of Vending/Letter of Recommendation, Urban Local Body survey-ல் பெயர். விண்ணப்பம்: pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in

instruction: PM-KISAN registration eppadi seyvadhu? Status eppadi check pannuvadhu?
output:
Registration:

Method 1 - Online (Self):
1. Go to: pmkisan.gov.in
2. Click: 'New Farmer Registration'
3. Select: State → Tamil Nadu
4. Enter: Aadhaar Number
5. Fill: Personal, Bank, Land details
6. Upload: Land records (Patta/Chitta)
7. Submit

Method 2 - CSC / Agriculture Office:
- Documents kondu ponaa avanga seivanga
- ₹0 charge (free service)

Documents:
- Aadhaar Card
- Bank Passbook (first page)
- Land Records (Patta, Chitta, Adangal)

Status Check:
1. pmkisan.gov.in → 'Beneficiary Status'
2. Enter: Aadhaar / Mobile / Account Number
3. Check: Registration status, Payment history

Payment schedule: ₹2,000 x 3 (April-July, Aug-Nov, Dec-March)

Reject reasons: Income Tax payer, Govt employee, Wrong land records, Bank mismatch

instruction: Oozhal / corruption patri enna solludhu Thirukkural?
output: Kural: 'Kalavinaal aagiya aakkam alavirandhu aavadhu polak kedum'. Thiruttal (corruption) vandha selvam peruginaalum azhiyum. Melum: 'Venmai enappaduvadhu yaadhenin onmai udaiyaan udaiyaaraip paarkkAdhu'. Suththamaana arasu enbadhu baarapatchamindri nadappadu. Anti-corruption message from ancient times!

instruction: Power of Attorney ethanai types? Edhu safe?
output: Types: 1) General POA - all acts (risky), 2) Special POA - specific acts only (safer), 3) Durable POA - continues even if principal incapacitated. Registration: Property transactions - compulsory registration. Revocation: Written revocation + newspaper publication. Safe practice: Special POA with specific purpose + time limit. Never give blank POA!

instruction: Consumer complaint-க்கு lawyer வேணுமா?
output: வேண்டாம். Consumer forum-ல் நீங்களே directly case நடத்தலாம். Simple procedure, no court fee for claims up to Rs.5 lakh. Complex cases-க்கு lawyer உதவியாக இருக்கும். But mandatory இல்லை.

instruction: 'Data entry job - தினமும் 2 மணி நேரம், மாதம் 30,000' என்று Instagram ad பார்த்தேன். Apply செய்யலாமா?
output: மிகை வருமானம் காட்டும் data entry jobs பெரும்பாலும் scam. Training kit வாங்க சொல்வார்கள். பணம் கொடுக்காதீர்கள்.

instruction: Free legal aid eppadi peruvathu?
output: Eligible: Women, children, SC/ST, disabled, victims of trafficking, industrial workers, custody persons, income < Rs.3 lakh/year. Apply: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), Taluk Legal Services Committee. Court-lum request pannalam. Toll-free: 15100.

instruction: Old Age Pension TN-la eppadi apply pannuvadhu?
output:
Eligibility: Age 60+, BPL/Low income, No other pension, TN resident

Amount: 60-79 years: ₹1,000/month | 80+: ₹1,500/month

Apply:

Method 1 - Online:
1. tneservices.tn.gov.in → 'Social Security Pension'
2. Register with mobile
3. Select: Old Age Pension
4. Fill application
5. Upload documents
6. Submit

Method 2 - Offline:
1. Taluk/Block Office pogga
2. Application form vaangunga
3. Fill pannunga
4. Documents attach
5. Submit with acknowledgment

Documents:
- Age Proof (Aadhaar/Voter ID/Birth Certificate)
- Address Proof
- Income Certificate (< ₹24,000/year)
- Ration Card
- Bank Passbook (first page)
- 2 Passport photos

Process: Application → Field verification (VAO/RI) → Tahsildar approval → Sanction → Monthly DBT

Time: 30-60 days
Status: tneservices.tn.gov.in → Track Application

instruction: Traffic police தப்பா fine போட்டுட்டாரு, எதிர்க்கலாமா?
output: ஆமா எதிர்க்கலாம். Dashcam/CCTV proof இருந்தா best. Court-ல் challan contest பண்ணலாம். Online grievance: tnpolice.gov.in. Time limit உண்டு - delay ஆகாம போங்க. Challan copy கட்டாயம் வாங்குங்க.

instruction: PAN Card தொலைந்துவிட்டது - Duplicate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: 1. e-PAN Download (Free): eportal.incometax.gov.in → Instant e-PAN, Aadhaar OTP verification, PDF download. 2. Physical Duplicate: onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Reprint of PAN Card', கட்டணம் ₹50, 15-20 நாட்களில் வரும். 3. PAN Number மறந்துவிட்டால்: incometax.gov.in → Know Your PAN, Name + DOB + Mobile கொடுத்து கண்டுபிடிக்கலாம்

instruction: Succession certificate எப்போது வேண்டும்?
output: When needed: Bank accounts, shares, securities claim செய்ய. Will இல்லாத cases-க்கு. Apply: District Court. Documents: Death certificate, legal heir proof, asset details. Fee: Asset value based. Time: 3-6 months. Alternative: Nominee-ஆக இருந்தால் தேவையில்லை.

instruction: Machan, PhonePe la issue, Google la number search panni call potten. AnyDesk install pannu remote la fix pannidurom nu solraanga. Panna okay va?
output: Dai NO! Google la fake numbers ad la varum da. AnyDesk kuduthaa unga phone full aa paappaanga - banking app open panni kaasu thookiduvaanga. Customer care number app la irundhu dhaan edukanam. Google search result trust pannaadhada.

instruction: Cyber stalking-க்கு என்ன law இருக்கு?
output: IPC 354D (stalking) - 3 years imprisonment (first offence), 5 years (repeat). IT Act 66D (cheating by personation). Evidence collect: Screenshots, call logs, messages. Platform block + police complaint. Women: Protection order under DV Act-உம் பெறலாம்.

instruction: Consumer case-க்கு time limit இருக்கா?
output: ஆம். Problem தெரிந்த நாளிலிருந்து 2 years-க்குள் complaint கொடுக்கணும். Special circumstances-ல் delay condone ஆகலாம் - valid reason இருக்கணும். Medical negligence cases-க்கு discovery date-ல் இருந்து count ஆகும்.

instruction: திருக்குறள் எத்தனை மொழிகளில் மொழிபெயர்க்கப்பட்டுள்ளது?
output: திருக்குறள் 82-க்கும் மேற்பட்ட மொழிகளில் மொழிபெயர்க்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. பைபிளுக்கு அடுத்தபடியாக அதிக மொழிகளில் மொழிபெயர்க்கப்பட்ட நூல் என்று சொல்லப்படுகிறது. முதல் ஆங்கில மொழிபெயர்ப்பு 1886-ல் ஜி.யு. போப் என்பவரால் செய்யப்பட்டது.

instruction: Bank service complaint eppadi seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Bank branch-la written complaint, 2) 30 days response illaattal Banking Ombudsman-kku complaint (rbi.org.in), 3) Still no resolution - Consumer forum. Online banking fraud-kku Cyber Crime portal-lum report pannunga.

instruction: Domicile certificate vs Nativity certificate - enna difference?
output: Nativity: Born in Tamil Nadu endru prove. Issued by: Tahsildar. For: Reservation benefits, state quota seats. Domicile: Residing in state for specified period (usually 5+ years). For: Some central institution admissions. Both different! Don't confuse. TN admissions mostly need: Nativity OR studied in TN for specific years (varies by counselling). Documents: Birth certificate, school TC, Aadhaar showing TN address.

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Arts padichaa future illai
output: Fact: Fact: Arts graduates options: IAS/IPS (UPSC - Arts background preferred), Banking, Teaching, Law, Journalism, Civil Services, HR, Social Work. Many IAS toppers are Arts graduates. Salary depends on job not degree. BA + competitive exam preparation = excellent career. Arts graduates excel in UPSC due to writing skills. Don't underestimate humanities!

instruction: Kobaththai adakkuvadhu patri enna solkiraar?
output: Kural: 'Sinaththai porulaaga kondavan kedu ninaiththadhan polum tharum'. Kobaththai mukkiyamaga karudhupavanukkku kedhuthalae varum. Melum: 'Thannaithaan kaakkin sinangaakka kaavaakkaal thannaiyae kollum sinam'. Kobaththai adakkavillendral, adhu unnaiyae azhikkum. Anger destroys the angry person first!

instruction: பெரிய கோயில் (தஞ்சாவூர்) பற்றி சொல்லுங்கள்?
output: பிரகதீஸ்வரர் கோயில் (பெரிய கோயில்) தஞ்சாவூரில் உள்ளது. ராஜராஜ சோழன் 1010 CE-ல் கட்டினான். Features: 1) விமானம் 216 அடி உயரம் - இந்தியாவிலேயே உயரமான விமானம், 2) மேல் உள்ள கல் 80 டன் எடை - எப்படி தூக்கினார்கள் என்பது mystery, 3) கோபுரத்தை விட விமானம் உயரம் - unique, 4) நந்தி - 25 டன் எடை, ஒரே கல்லில் செதுக்கப்பட்டது. UNESCO World Heritage Site (2004).

instruction: UPI மூலம் பணம் போனது, வங்கியில் என்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output: படி 1: வங்கியின் 24/7 மோசடி உதவி எண் அழைக்கவும் - SBI: 1800-111-109, HDFC: 1800-266-4332, ICICI: 1800-1080, Axis: 1800-419-5959, இந்தியன் வங்கி: 1800-425-4422. சொல்லுங்கள்: 'அங்கீகரிக்கப்படாத பரிவர்த்தனை நடந்தது, தொகை [X], நேரம் [X], பயனாளி UPI ஐடி [X]. தயவுசெய்து முடக்கி திருப்பித் தரவும்.' படி 2: 24 மணி நேரத்திற்குள் கிளைக்குச் செல்லுங்கள், எழுத்துப்பூர்வ புகார் கொடுங்கள். படி 3: வங்கி செயலியில் 'பரிவர்த்தனை தகராறு' பகுதியில் புகார் செய்யுங்கள். படி 4: 30 நாட்களில் வங்கி பதிலளிக்காவிட்டால் cms.rbi.org.in இல் RBI புகார். மீட்பு காலம்: 24 மணி நேரத்திற்குள் புகார் செய்தால் 10-45 நாட்கள்.

instruction: Divorce-la child custody yaarukku kidaikkum?
output: 'Welfare of child' principle - yaar better care kodukka mudiyumo avarkalukku. General preference: Below 5 years - mother. 5+ years - child's preference consider aagum. Father-kkum custody kidaikkalam if mother unfit. Joint custody possible.

instruction: Telemedicine consultation legal-aa? Prescription valid-aa?
output: Legal! Telemedicine Practice Guidelines 2020. Valid for: 1) First consultation for non-emergency, 2) Follow-up consultations, 3) Second opinion. Prescription: Valid if signed digitally, has registration number. Limitations: 1) No controlled substances via telemedicine, 2) Physical exam needed cases - refer for in-person, 3) Emergency - not appropriate. Platforms: Practo, Tata 1mg, Apollo 247, government eSanjeevani.

instruction: Vivasaaya nilam yaar vaangalaam?
output: Tamil Nadu-la agricultural land ceiling laws ullan. Farmer or farmer family member mathume wet land (15 acres limit) vaangalam. Dry land-kku liberal rules. Company/Non-farmer vaanga District Collector permission venum.

instruction: 'Fixed deposit - 15% interest rate, private finance company' என்று offer வந்தது. Bank FD-ஐ விட நல்லது போல் தெரிகிறதே?
output: Banks 7-8% தரும்போது 15% என்பது suspicious. RBI registered இல்லாத finance companies-ல் FD போடாதீர்கள். பணம் திரும்ப கிடைக்காமல் போகலாம்.

instruction: First Generation Graduate-ku enna special benefits?
output:
**First Generation Graduate Benefits:**

**Definition:** Both parents not degree holders

**1. CM Higher Education Scheme:**
- Free tuition
- Free laptop
- ₹1,000/month stipend
- Income < ₹2.5 lakh

**2. College Fees:** Govt FREE, Aided minimal

**3. Priority:**
- Higher scholarship
- Hostel priority
- Free coaching priority

**4. Book Bank:** Free textbooks

**5. Free Laptop:** UG first year

**Proof:** Parents' education declaration + Affidavit

**Documents:** Parents Aadhaar, Self-declaration, Income certificate

**Apply:** During admission + tneservices.tn.gov.in

**Important:** Declare during admission!

instruction: Fee comparison table
output: Engineering: Govt ₹50K/year, Private ₹1-2 lakh. Medical: Govt ₹13.5K/year, Private ₹10-20 lakh. Arts/Science: Govt ₹2-5K/year, Private ₹20-50K. MBA: Govt ₹30-50K/year, Private ₹2-5 lakh. ITI: Govt Free, Private ₹20-40K. Polytechnic: Govt ₹1.5-3K/year, Private ₹30-50K.

instruction: Kuzhanthaigalukkku Tamil saints patri eppadi karpikkalam?
output: Kuzhanthaigalukkku karpikka: 1) Aathichudi memorize pannunga - school-la karpikiraargal, 2) Kadhai sollungga - Kannappar, Avvaiyar kathaigal interesting, 3) Amar Chitra Katha comics - Tamil saints series, 4) YouTube videos - animated stories, 5) Kovil visit - samaadhigal kaattunga, 6) Thiruppaavai paadunga - Margazhiyil daily oru paasuram, 7) Periya Puranam children's version books. Make it story-based, not lecture-based!

instruction: பிரதான் மந்திரி கௌசல் விகாஸ் யோஜனா (PMKVY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: இலவச Skill Training. காலம்: 150-300 மணி நேரம். Courses: IT, Healthcare, Construction, Retail, etc. நன்மைகள்: இலவச Training, Certificate (Industry recognized), Placement assistance, ₹8,000 வரை reward (assessment pass செய்தால்). சேர: pmkvyofficial.org → Find Training Center, அருகிலுள்ள PMKVY Training Center, Aadhaar, Photo தேவை. RPL: ஏற்கனவே skill உள்ளவர்களுக்கு Certificate, ₹500 assessment fee (refundable)

instruction: ஒற்றை பெற்றோர்/அநாதை மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன scholarship?
output: Support schemes: 1) AICTE Swanath Scholarship - ₹50,000/ஆண்டு orphans-க்கு 2) PM CARES for Children (COVID orphans) - full support till graduation 3) Social Welfare Department orphan scholarship 4) NGO support - SOS Children's Villages, Udayan Care. Documents: Parent death certificate, guardian affidavit. Priority in government hostel admission. Apply through respective department.

instruction: மின்னஞ்சல் வந்தது 'Google நிறுவனத்தில் வேலை. மாதம் 80,000 சம்பளம். பதிவு கட்டணம் 5000 ரூபாய் செலுத்துங்கள்.' இது உண்மையான வேலை வாய்ப்பா?
output: இது மோசடி. உண்மையான நிறுவனங்கள் வேலைக்கு பணம் கேட்பதில்லை. Google போன்ற நிறுவனங்கள் நேரடியாக மின்னஞ்சல் அனுப்புவதில்லை. இது வேலை மோசடி.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) endraal enna?
output: Free bank account scheme. Eligibility: Any Indian citizen. Benefits: Zero Balance Account, Free RuPay Debit Card, ₹2 lakh Accident Insurance (via RuPay), ₹30,000 Life Insurance (new accounts), Overdraft up to ₹10,000, Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT). How to open: Nearby Bank/Bank Mitra/CSC. Documents: Aadhaar or Voter ID

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Labour department insurance scheme. Pay 3000 annual premium for 5 lakh coverage.' Insurance nalla irukum, join pannalama?
output: Government labour insurance (PMJJBY/PMSBY) costs only Rs 330-436 per year through bank. Welfare board provides free/subsidized insurance to members. 3000 for 5 lakh is neither government scheme nor good private deal. Check with bank for official government insurance schemes.

instruction: Chennai Music Season endraal enna? Yaen famous?
output: Chennai December Music Season - ulagin migapperiya cultural festival. December 15 - January 1 varai. 1920s-la thodangiyathu. Sirappugal: 1) 2000+ concerts nadakkum, 2) 100+ sabhas (cultural organizations) organize panraanga, 3) Morning 9 AM to Night 10 PM non-stop programs, 4) Free entry pala sabhas-la, 5) World-la irundhu Carnatic musicians varuvaargal. Famous sabhas: Music Academy, Narada Gana Sabha, Mylapore Fine Arts. Culture lovers' paradise!

instruction: Patta maatram eppadi seyvadhu?
output: After property registration at SRO, apply for Patta transfer at Taluk Office or eservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Registered document, EC, ID proof, tax receipts. Field inspection by VAO/RI. Time: 30-45 days. Essential for proving ownership.

instruction: Thevaram, Divyaprabandham engge ketkalaam/padikkalaam?
output: Ketka/padikka vazhigal: 1) Kovilkalil - daily odhuvaargal paaduvaargal, 2) YouTube - Sirkali Govindarajan, DKJ, Bombay Sisters versions famous, 3) Spotify, Gaana apps - playlists ullana, 4) Project Madurai - free text online, 5) Tamil Virtual Academy, 6) Books - Giri Trading, Higginbothams, 7) Apps - Thevaram app, Divya Prabandham app. Morning/evening kettaal peaceful feeling. Margazhi month-la Thiruppaavai daily radio-la varum!

instruction: MRP-ஐ விட அதிகமாக விற்றால் என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: MRP-க்கு மேல் விற்பது illegal (Legal Metrology Act). Complaint: 1) Legal Metrology Department (District level), 2) Consumer helpline 1800-11-4000, 3) Consumer forum. Seller-க்கு fine up to Rs.25,000 first offence, Rs.50,000 repeat offence.

instruction: வீட்டுக்கடன் வட்டி மிகவும் குறைவு என்று தனியார் நிறுவனம் அழைத்தது. 'செயலாக்க கட்டணம் 20,000 முன்கூட்டியே செலுத்துங்கள்' என்றார்கள்.
output: உண்மையான வங்கிகள் செயலாக்க கட்டணத்தை கடன் தொகையிலிருந்து கழிக்கும், முன்கூட்டியே கேட்காது. NBFC பதிவு RBI இணையதளத்தில் சரிபார்க்கவும். முன்பணம் கேட்கும் கடன் நிறுவனங்கள் பெரும்பாலும் மோசடி.

instruction: Office-la boss unfair-aa nadandhukkondaal enna kural udhavum?
output: 'Poraiyudaimai porludaimai potrrich sirandhaan serivudaimai avviraN en'. Porumai enbadhu migapperiya selvam. Unfair situation-la porumaiyaaga irundhu, right time-la action edukavum. Emotional reaction avoid pannunga. Document everything, stay professional.

instruction: Plus One admission-ku eppo apply pannanum?
output: Timeline: 10th result vandha piragu 1 week-la notification. Usually May-June. Online application: www.tnschooleducation.in. Documents ready: 10th marks card, TC, community certificate, income certificate, Aadhaar. Choice filling: Preferred schools + subjects. Random allocation for government schools. Cutoff based for popular schools. Don't miss deadline - late applications not accepted.

instruction: Doctor sex sonnaar/kettaar - complain enge?
output: Report immediately! Complaint to: 1) District Appropriate Authority (Collector office), 2) State Supervisory Board (DHS), 3) Police FIR, 4) Medical Council. Evidence: If possible, record/witness. Confidential complaint: Identity protected. Reward: Some states offer reward for reporting. Action: Center sealed, license cancelled, criminal prosecution. Even asking = offence for both parties.

instruction: 'Turmeric Board la irundhu pesuren yi, subsidy ready irukku, 2000 processing fee' nu call vandhuduchu. Genuine aa yi?
output: Government subsidy ku processing fee illa yi! Turmeric Board phone la fee kekaadhu yi. Unga details vera vazhila therinjirukku yi. Kodumudi, Gobichettipalayam la farmers ipdi maatikirukkanga yi. Agriculture office ku poi verify pannu yi.

instruction: Burns-kku first aid enna?
output: Immediate: 1) Cool water (not ice) for 10-20 minutes, 2) Remove jewelry/tight items, 3) Cover with clean cloth (not cotton wool), 4) Don't apply toothpaste/butter/egg - myth!, 5) Don't break blisters. Hospital needed: 1) Large burns, 2) Face/hands/genitals, 3) Deep burns (white/charred), 4) Chemical/electrical burns, 5) Difficulty breathing (smoke inhalation). Free treatment: Government hospitals for burns.

instruction: Online-la vaanguna phone-la problem, return panna maattengaraanga (Coimbatore style)
output: First screenshot ellam edunga. App-la complaint raise pannunga. Email-la grievance officer-kku complaint anuppunga. 7 days-la response illanna NCH-la complaint podunga. Consumer forum-la case podalam - free-dhaan 5 lakh varai.

instruction: En paiyan engineering vendaamnu solran - enna panrathu?
output: Paiyanoda interest ennannu purinjukonga. Arts, Commerce, Vocational, Creative fields-layum nalla career opportunities irukku. Aptitude test edunga. Career counsellor-kitta pesunga. Force pannaadheenga.

instruction: Arunagirinaathar yaar? Thiruppugazh endraal enna?
output: Arunagirinaathar Thiruvannamalayil pirandhavar. Ilamaiyil ketta vazhkai vaazhnthu, pin Murugan arulaal maariyavar. 'Thiruppugazh' endra arputhamaana noolai ezhuthiyavar - 16000+ paadalgal Murugan meedhu! Thaala (beat) structure migavum unique - isai ulagil migapperiya contribution. 'Muththaiththaru paththiththirunagai' pondra paadalgal indrum popular.

instruction: Minor kuzhanthaiku PAN Card thevaiya?
output: Needed when: FD/Investment in child's name, Child has income (Child Artist), Property in child's name. To apply: Parent/Guardian must apply, Need child's Birth Certificate + Parent's ID proof, Must update details (photo, signature) when turning 18

instruction: Defence force join aaga training enge kidaikkum?
output: Defence training options: 1) Sainik Schools - Class 6 admission (for NDA prep) 2) Army rally coaching - District soldiers boards 3) NDA coaching - Government free centers 4) Agnipath training - TNSDC centers 5) Private coaching institutes. Physical fitness: Running, pull-ups, sit-ups practice daily. Written exam: Maths, English, GK. Medical: Strict standards. Apply: www.joinindianarmy.nic.in. Age: 17.5-21 (varies by entry).

instruction: Pain killers addiction aagumaa? Control enna?
output: Some can! Opioids (Tramadol, Codeine, Morphine): High addiction potential - Schedule H/X. NSAIDs (Ibuprofen, Diclofenac): Lower risk but long-term issues (stomach, kidney). Paracetamol: Relatively safe but liver damage if overdose. Rules: Opioids = strict prescription, register entry. Chronic pain: Doctor supervision essential. Addiction help: De-addiction centres, psychiatrist.

instruction: Small claims court-la case podalaamaa? Procedure enna?
output: Consumer disputes-kku: District Consumer Forum (Rs.1 crore varai). Civil disputes: Regular civil court. Small Causes Court: Chennai-la available - Rs.1 lakh-kkul claims, fast track. Procedure: 1) Complaint draft, 2) Court fee pay (nominal), 3) Filing, 4) Hearing dates, 5) Judgment. Lawyer optional for small claims. E-filing: ecourts.gov.in

instruction: Spoken English course free-ya enge ulladhu?
output: Free English training: 1) TNSDC - Communicative English 2) British Council online resources 3) NPTEL/SWAYAM - English courses 4) Employment exchange - soft skills training 5) NGOs - Pratham, Teach India. Apps: Duolingo, Hello English (free tier). Library-based conversation clubs. Government college students - Language lab access free. Interview skills + English combined courses available through TNSDC.

instruction: PM Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP) endraal enna?
output: Subsidy for starting business. Eligibility: Above 18 years, 8th pass (Manufacturing ₹10L+, Service ₹5L+), New business only. Project Cost: Manufacturing up to ₹50 lakh, Service up to ₹20 lakh. Subsidy: General - Urban 15%/Rural 25%, SC/ST/OBC/Women/Minorities - Urban 25%/Rural 35%. Apply: kviconline.gov.in

instruction: Kadai thodanga enna permission vendum?
output: 1. GST registration (above ₹40 lakh turnover) 2. Trade License: Municipality/Gram Panchayat 3. Shop & Establishment Act: tnlabour.tn.gov.in 4. FSSAI License (food business): fssai.gov.in 5. Fire Safety Certificate (large shops)

instruction: Library-யை effectively use பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Library tips: 1) Get library card first day 2) Know sections - reference, lending, periodicals 3) Silent study areas = best concentration 4) Group study rooms book in advance 5) Digital resources - e-journals, databases access 6) Inter-library loan facility 7) Photocopy limits know 8) Renewal option use 9) Reserve books in demand. Pro tip: Morning time library = peaceful. Regular schedule = habit formation.

instruction: Unnecessary tests/procedures solraanga - refuse pannalaamaa?
output: Yes! Your body, your choice. Rights: 1) Ask why each test needed, 2) Get written justification, 3) Refuse non-essential tests, 4) Second opinion for major procedures. Red flags: 1) Full body checkup push, 2) Expensive test for minor issue, 3) Surgery suggestion without trying medicine first. If pressured: Change doctor/hospital. Complaint: If unethical push - Medical Council.

instruction: Therukoothu endraal enna?
output: Therukoothu - Tamil Nadu-oda traditional street theatre. Iravu muzhuvathum nadakkum. Mahabharata, Ramayana kathaigal popular. Sirappugal: 1) Vanna makeup - face painting, 2) Elaborate costumes, 3) Live music - harmonium, thavil, 4) Dialog + song + dance, 5) Audience participation. Kanchipuram, Villupuram areas-la famous. UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage list-la consideration-kku. Village entertainment before TV/cinema vandhadhu!

instruction: பிறப்பு சான்றிதழ் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Register within 21 days at hospital location's Municipality/Panchayat - FREE! After 21 days: ₹50 late fee + affidavit. Documents: Hospital discharge summary, parents' Aadhaar. Online at tnreginet.gov.in or crsorgi.gov.in. Certificate in 3-5 days.

instruction: New customer WhatsApp la contact panninaan yi - '10 lakh order, advance transfer pannuren' nu QR anuppinaan. Scan pannalaama yi?
output: Pannaadheyyi! QR scan panna nee KUDUKKA dhaan mudiyum yi, vaanga mudiyaadhu. Erode textile hub aachhu la, scammers specifically target pannuraanga yi. 'Big order' excitement la maatikkaadhe. LC through illana cash verify panni dhaan deal pannu yi.

instruction: Newborn-க்கு free screening tests என்ன?
output: Newborn screening at government hospitals: 1) Hearing screening, 2) Heart defect screening (pulse oximetry), 3) Eye examination (for retinopathy if premature), 4) Hip examination, 5) Thyroid screening (heel prick blood test). Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK): Regular health checkup for children 0-18 years. Follow-up: If abnormality found, referred to higher centre - treatment free.

instruction: Infertility-kku Siddha treatment effective-aa?
output: Used traditionally for: Male infertility (low sperm count, motility), Female infertility (PCOS, irregular periods, hormone balance). Treatments: 1) Karpam (fertility medicines), 2) Nei Prasham (ghee preparations), 3) Specific Lehyams, 4) Shodhana (detoxification). Consultation: Detailed history, examination. Duration: 3-6 months typically. Combined: Many take with modern treatment. NIS: Fertility clinic available. Evidence: Research ongoing, traditional success claims.

instruction: Chennai-la free coaching centres enge irukku?
output: Free coaching Chennai: 1) Government Free Coaching Centre - Nungambakkam (UPSC, TNPSC) 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare coaching - Saidapet 3) BC/MBC coaching - Egmore 4) IAS Academy free batches - Anna Salai 5) Employment Exchange coaching - various locations. Apply: Respective department websites. Selection: Merit + income based. Also: Marina Library study hall, Connemara Library resources free.

instruction: Dialysis free-யா செய்யலாமா?
output: Yes! Pradhan Mantri National Dialysis Program. Free dialysis: Government hospitals, empanelled private centres. Eligibility: BPL/low income patients. Sessions: Usually 2-3 per week. CMCHIS: Also covers dialysis. Kidney transplant: Covered under CMCHIS (Rs.5 lakh). Location: District hospitals, medical colleges. Registration: Through nephrologist referral. Medicines: EPO injections also subsidized.

instruction: ஔவையாரும் முருகனும் - என்ன கதை?
output: ஔவையார் நாவல் பழம் சாப்பிட ஒரு மரத்தடியில் அமர்ந்திருந்தார். ஒரு சிறுவன் (முருகன்) மரத்தில் இருந்தான். 'சுட்ட பழம் வேணுமா, சுடாத பழம் வேணுமா?' என்று கேட்டான். 'சுடாத பழம்' என்றார் ஔவை. சிறுவன் கிளையை குலுக்க, பழங்கள் மணலில் விழுந்தன. ஔவை ஊதி சாப்பிட, சிறுவன் சிரித்தான் - 'ஊதினால் சுடாத பழம் ஆகிவிடுமா?' என்று. சிறுவனிடமும் கற்றுக்கொள்ளலாம் என்று உணர்ந்தார் ஔவை. அந்த சிறுவன் முருகன்!

instruction: Online-ல் rental agreement register பண்ண முடியுமா?
output: ஆம். TNREGINET (tnreginet.gov.in) மூலம் online-ல் document draft செய்து, e-stamp வாங்கி, appointment book பண்ணி Sub-Registrar office-ல் biometric verification செய்யலாம். முழுவதும் online இல்லை - physical visit தேவை.

instruction: En thaatha perla irukkura nilatha en perla maathrathu eppadi? (Madurai style)
output: Thaatha uyiroda irundhaa: Gift deed or Sale deed register pannanum. Irandhuttaa: Legal heir certificate vaangi, Will irundhaa probate vaangi, Patta transfer apply pannanum. Ella heirs consent venum.

instruction: Misleading advertisement-kku complaint podalaamaa?
output: Aama. ASCI (Advertising Standards Council of India)-kku complaint podalam - ascionline.in. Consumer forum-lum case podalam. Celebrity endorsement false claims-kkum celebrity liable. Compensation + advertisement withdraw order kidaikkum.

instruction: En appa irandhuittaar. Gramathula avar peyarla nilam ulladhu. En peyarukku patta maatra enna seiyya vendum?
output:
**Succession Patta Transfer:**

**Step 1: Death Certificate**
- Within 21 days
- Panchayat/Municipality

**Step 2: Legal Heir Certificate**
- Where: Taluk Office / tneservices.tn.gov.in
- Documents: Death Certificate, Family details, All heirs' Aadhaar
- Time: 15-30 days

**Step 3: Heirs Consent**
- If Will exists: Follow Will
- No Will: Equal share to all heirs
- Release Deed: If others give up share

**Step 4: Patta Transfer Application**
- Where: Taluk Office / VAO
- Online: eservices.tn.gov.in

**Documents:**
- Death Certificate, Legal Heir Certificate
- Original Patta, Chitta, Adangal
- EC, Tax receipts
- Release Deed (if applicable)

**Step 5: Field Inspection**
- VAO/RI visit and verification

**Step 6: Patta Issue**
- Time: 30-60 days
- No registration fee for succession

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Marks மட்டும் important, extra-curricular waste
output: உண்மை: Fact: Balanced development essential. Extra-curricular benefits: 1) Sports quota admission 2) Stress relief = better study 3) Personality development 4) College applications value it 5) Soft skills development. Reality: Toppers also play sports, music, participate in activities. Time management skill learned. All-rounder students more successful in career long-term.

instruction: மதுரை மண்டபம் என்றால் என்ன? ஏன் famous?
output: Chennai December Music Season - உலகின் மிகப்பெரிய cultural festival. December 15 - January 1 வரை. 1920s-ல் தொடங்கியது. சிறப்புகள்: 1) 2000+ concerts நடக்கும், 2) 100+ sabhas (cultural organizations) organize பண்றாங்க, 3) Morning 9 AM to Night 10 PM non-stop programs, 4) Free entry பல sabhas-ல், 5) World-ல் இருந்து Carnatic musicians வருவார்கள். Famous sabhas: Music Academy, Narada Gana Sabha, Mylapore Fine Arts. Culture lovers' paradise!

instruction: Property register panna porren. 'Sub-registrar office agent' call pannaan - 'Fast track registration, avoid queue, 10,000 extra' nu.
output: Sub-registrar office la official 'agents' kidaiyaadhu. 'Fast track' bribe implication - illegal. Money vaangitu normal queue la nikka veppanga or kaanama poiruvaanga. Official slot booking through appointment vaangunga. 'Agents' avoid pannunga.

instruction: Diagnosis miss aachu, cancer late-aa detect aachu - negligence-aa?
output: Depends on circumstances. Negligence if: 1) Symptoms clearly pointed to cancer, 2) Standard tests not ordered, 3) Reports misread, 4) Follow-up not done, 5) Patient's complaints ignored. Not negligence if: Symptoms were atypical, tests done but cancer not detectable at that stage. Prove: What a reasonably competent doctor would have done. Expert witness: Essential for such cases.

instruction: Social media-ல் fake account என் பேர்ல - complaint எப்படி?
output: Platform report: Impersonation report (ID proof upload). Legal: IT Act 66D (identity theft), IPC 419 (cheating by personation). cybercrime.gov.in complaint. Platform response: 24-72 hours. Multiple platforms: Each platform-லும் separately report.

instruction: AICTE scholarship engineering students-ku enna ulladhu?
output: AICTE Scholarships: 1) Pragati - Women in technical education, ₹50,000/year 2) Saksham - Differently abled students, ₹50,000/year 3) Swanath - Orphan students 4) PM's Special Scholarship - J&K students. Additional: GATE qualified students-ku ₹12,400/month scholarship ME/M.Tech-la. Apply: www.aicte-india.org. Income limit: ₹8 lakh/year.

instruction: Rural students-ku special benefits ulladha?
output: Aam, special benefits: 1) 7.5% government school quota in Engineering/Medical 2) Rural area nativity certificate benefits 3) Panchayat Union school students special coaching 4) Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Scheme - girl students monthly stipend 5) Free coaching for competitive exams. District Collector office moolam apply pannalam. EMIS number irundhaal automatically eligible.

instruction: திருப்பதி திருமலை கோயில் தமிழ்நாட்டில் உள்ளதா?
output: திருப்பதி தற்போது Andhra Pradesh-ல் உள்ளது, ஆனால் தமிழ் தொடர்பு மிக ஆழமானது: 1) ஆழ்வார்கள் இங்கே பாடியிருக்கிறார்கள், 2) Tamil inscriptions நிறைய உள்ளன, 3) பல நூற்றாண்டுகள் தமிழக ஆட்சியில் இருந்தது, 4) இன்றும் Tamil devotees மிக அதிகம். TTD (Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams) நடத்துகிறது. World's richest temple - daily donation ₹3-4 crore! Tamil Nadu border-லிருந்து 2-3 hours.

instruction: Tamil Nadu la cyber crime report panna specific contacts enna?
output: State Cyber Crime Cell: DGP Office Complex, Mylapore, Chennai-4, Phone: 044-28512440, Email: ccps.tnpol@nic.in. District Cells: Chennai 044-28512440, Coimbatore 0422-2300106, Madurai 0452-2531500, Trichy 0431-2418717, Salem 0427-2211001, Tirunelveli 0462-2501500. Online: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in (Online FIR), Kavalan SOS App (Emergency). Special Cells: Women Cyber Crime 044-28592750, Child Online Safety 1098/childlineindia.org.

instruction: Online-ல் பழகியவர் 'intimate photos' share செய்து, இப்போது பணம் கொடுக்காவிட்டால் leak செய்வேன் என்று மிரட்டுகிறார்.
output: இது sextortion. Cyber crime police-ல் complaint போடுங்கள். பணம் கொடுத்தால் மேலும் கேட்பார்கள். 1930 helpline அழைக்கவும். பயப்படாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Chidambaram Nataraja koviloda sirappu enna?
output: Chidambaram Nataraja Kovil - Sivan Ananda Thandavam aadiya idam. Sirappugal: 1) Chidambara Ragasiyam - karuvraiyil vettridam (empty space) - formless God concept, 2) Pon Sabhai - gold-plated roof, 3) Nataraja bronze - Chola bronze masterpiece, 4) 5 sabhaigal - Chit Sabha, Kanaka Sabha, Nritta Sabha, Deva Sabha, Raja Sabha, 5) Aakaya Lingam - one of Pancha Bhoota Sthalams. Dikshitars (special priests) nadaththugiraargal.

instruction: Digestive problems-kku home remedy?
output: Indigestion: 1) Jeera (cumin) water, 2) Ajwain (omam) water, 3) Buttermilk with curry leaves, ginger, 4) Ginger + lemon + salt before meals. Acidity: 1) Cold milk, 2) Banana, 3) Coconut water. Constipation: 1) Triphala powder at night, 2) Isabgol (psyllium), 3) Warm water in morning. Gas/bloating: 1) Hing (asafoetida) in warm water, 2) Fennel seeds after meal. Diet: Eat on time, chew well, avoid late dinner.

instruction: Kadaikkaaran mosamaana saamaan kuduthuttan, enna panradhu? (Chennai casual)
output: Bill irukkaa paarunga. Bill irundhaa exchange/refund kelunga. Refuse pannaa Consumer helpline-la call pannunga - 1800-11-4000. WhatsApp-la complaint: 8800001915. Simple-aa solve aagum.

instruction: Sports quota scholarship தமிழ்நாட்டில் உள்ளதா?
output: Sports Development Authority of TN (SDAT) Scholarships: 1) State level players - ₹10,000-25,000/ஆண்டு 2) National level - ₹25,000-50,000 3) International level - ₹1-5 lakh 4) Olympic participants - special pension. College admission: 5% sports quota. Free coaching, equipment, diet allowance. Apply: www.sfrtn.tn.gov.in. Sports certificate from recognized association தேவை.

instruction: Free uniform, books எல்லாம் school கொடுக்குமா? Apply பண்ணணுமா?
output: Government school benefits: 1) Free textbooks - எல்லா subjects 2) Free notebooks - 4-5 books 3) Free uniform - 2 sets (₹600 worth) 4) Free footwear - Class 1-5 5) Free school bag - select schools. Apply: Admission-ஆனவுடன் automatic. Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent Aadhaar, address proof. Private aided schools-லும் books free. Distribution: June-July school opening.

instruction: 108 திவ்ய தேசங்கள் என்றால் என்ன?
output: 12 ஆழ்வார்களால் பாடப்பட்ட 108 விஷ்ணு கோயில்கள். இவற்றில்: 84 தமிழ்நாட்டில், 11 கேரளாவில், 2 ஆந்திராவில், 1 குஜராத்தில், 2 உத்தரபிரதேசத்தில், 6 நேபாளத்தில் (Vaikunta), 2 மற்றவை. ஒவ்வொன்றிலும் பெருமாள் வெவ்வேறு பெயரில், வெவ்வேறு form-ல் இருப்பார். 'நாலாயிர திவ்ய பிரபந்தம்' இந்த கோயில்களைப் பாடுகிறது. 108-ம் visit செய்வது spiritual achievement.

instruction: 'Electricity board - இன்று bill கட்டவில்லை என்றால் connection cut' என்று SMS வந்தது, link கொடுத்துள்ளது.
output: EB bill SMS-ல் link அனுப்பாது. Official app அல்லது website-ல் மட்டுமே bill கட்டுங்கள். இந்த link phishing site ஆக இருக்கும்.

instruction: Pet animal-kku enna legal responsibilities?
output: Responsibilities: Registration (some municipalities), vaccination, leash in public, damage liability. Pet cruelty: PCA Act - 3 months imprisonment + Rs.100 fine (old law, amendments pending). Noise nuisance: Neighbour complaint valid. Banned breeds: Check local rules.

instruction: புருஷன் அடிக்குறான், என்ன பண்றது?
output: உடனே: 1) 181 call பண்ணுங்க, 2) Nearest police station-ல் complaint, 3) Medical-ல் injury report வாங்குங்க, 4) Photos எடுங்க. Protection order 2-3 days-ல் கிடைக்கும். Safe place-க்கு போங்க - women's shelter உண்டு.

instruction: Emergency contacts ellam oru edathula vendum. Master list kudungal.
output: EMERGENCY: Police 100, Cyber Crime 1930, Women 181, Child 1098, Senior 14567. BANKS: RBI Ombudsman 14448, SBI 1800-111-109, HDFC 1800-266-4332, ICICI 1800-1080, Axis 1800-419-5959, Indian Bank 1800-425-4422. CYBER: National 1930, Portal cybercrime.gov.in, TN 044-28512440. CONSUMER: Helpline 1800-11-4000, Portal consumerhelpline.gov.in. UPI: PhonePe 080-68727374, GPay 1800-419-0157, Paytm 0120-4456456. LEGAL: NALSA 15100, TN SLSA tnsla.gov.in. MENTAL HEALTH: iCALL 9152987821, Vandrevala 1860-2662-345, Snehi 044-24640050. TELECOM: Airtel 121, Jio 198, Vi 199, BSNL 1800-180-1503.

instruction: Delivery-la mother/baby-kku injury - claim pannalaamaa?
output: Yes, if negligence proved. Common claims: 1) Delayed C-section causing brain damage, 2) Birth injuries (brachial plexus), 3) Maternal death due to PPH mismanagement, 4) Infection, 5) Wrong forceps use. Proof: Partograph (labor record), CTG (fetal monitoring), timelines. Child injury: Long-term care compensation. Maternal death: Family claims. Time sensitive: Evidence deteriorates - act quickly.

instruction: Fake news share பண்ணினால் legal trouble வருமா?
output: Yes, possible: IPC 505 (public mischief), 153A (promoting enmity), Epidemic Diseases Act (health misinformation). IT Rules 2021: Platforms must remove fake news. Knowingly spreading = higher liability. Before sharing: Verify from trusted sources. Fact-check websites use பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Expert witness எப்படி arrange பண்றது?
output: Expert = Doctor in same specialty who can opine on standard of care. Finding: 1) Through medical-legal lawyer, 2) Retired senior doctors, 3) Medical college professors. Cost: Fee for opinion + court appearance. Report: Written opinion on whether standard of care met. Court: May be cross-examined. Important: Expert from same specialty (surgeon for surgery case).

instruction: NRI property sell செய்ய POA கொடுக்கலாமா?
output: ஆம், ஆனால் Special Power of Attorney (SPA) இருக்கணும் - specific property, specific purpose mention ஆகணும். Indian Embassy/Consulate-ல் notarize + apostille வேண்டும். GPA alone not sufficient. SPA registration recommended.

instruction: Tax / vari patri Valluvar enna solkiraar?
output: Kural: 'Uzhuvaar ulagaththaarkku aaniaqth thatraadhu ezhuvaarai ellaam poruththu'. Vivasaayigal ulagoda aadharam. Melum: 'Alavu oththu vaazhAdha mannavan ulagaththu alavu irandhu migaipaduththu'. Vari adhigamaga vaangum arasan makkalai thunpuruththukiraan. Fair taxation, farmers' welfare - 2000+ years ago sonna modern economics!

instruction: Ketta aatchiyalar / corrupt leader patri enna solkiraar?
output: Kural: 'Iyalpulik kolochchum mannavan naattai peyalum vilaiyulum thokku'. Needhiyillaadha aatchiyil mazhaiyum vilaichchalum illai. Melum: 'Kolaiyir kodiyaarai vendhoruththal paingkuzh kalaikatt adhanodu ner'. Kodiyavargalai thandikkaadha arasan vivasaayathil kalai edukkaadhadhu pondravaN. Corrupt leaders destroy nations!

instruction: வீட்டில் structural changes செய்யலாமா?
output: Owner-ன் written permission இல்லாமல் எந்த structural change-உம் செய்யக் கூடாது. Wall break பண்றது, room partition போடுவது, bathroom add செய்வது எல்லாம் owner approval வேண்டும். Permission இல்லாமல் செய்தால் restoration cost tenant கட்டணும்.

instruction: 10th படிக்கும் மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன scholarship இருக்கு?
output:
**Class 9-10 Scholarships:**

**1. Post-Matric Scholarship (SC/ST):**
- Wait - இது 11th-க்கு பிறகு!

**2. Pre-Matric Scholarship (Continues from Class 8):**

**SC/ST Students:**
- Day Scholar: ₹150/month
- Hosteller: ₹350/month
- Ad-hoc grant: ₹750/year

**BC/MBC Students:**
- Day Scholar: ₹100/month
- Hosteller: ₹250/month

**Minorities:**
- ₹100/month + ₹500/year

**3. NMMS Continuation:**
- Class 8-ல் qualify ஆனவர்கள்
- ₹12,000/year continues

**4. State Merit Scholarship:**
- Class 9 entrance based
- Merit students select
- Monthly stipend

**5. Private Scholarships:**
- Tata Trust
- Reliance Foundation
- L&T Educational Trust
- Apply: respective websites

**6. Sitaram Jindal Foundation:**
- ₹750/month (Class 9-10)
- Income < ₹2 lakh
- Apply: sjfounation.in

**Apply Process:**
1. Check eligibility
2. Get documents ready (Income, Community, Marks)
3. Apply through scholarships.gov.in
4. School verification
5. Submit before deadline

**Deadlines:** Usually September-October

instruction: 'Thannuyir neeppinum' - unmai patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Thannuyir neeppinum seiyarka thanpiRidhor innuyir neekkum vinai'. Artham: Than uyir ponaalum, pira uyirgalai kollum seyalai seiyakkoodaadhu. Ahimsa-yoda uchcham. Even at the cost of your own life, don't harm others. Non-violence-a ivvalavu strongly sonnavar Valluvar!

instruction: 'ஒல்லாவே தீய செயல்' - தீமை பற்றிய குறள் என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'தீயவை தீய பயத்தலால் தீயவை தீயினும் அஞ்சப் படும்'. அர்த்தம்: தீய செயல்கள் தீய பலன்களையே தரும். எனவே தீ-யை விட தீய செயல்களை அதிகம் பயப்பட வேண்டும். நெருப்பு உடலை மட்டும் சுடும், ஆனால் தீய செயல்கள் வாழ்க்கையையே அழிக்கும்.

instruction: 'அறிவினான் ஆகுவது உண்டோ' - அறிவின் மதிப்பு என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'அறிவினான் ஆகுவது உண்டோ பிறிதினோய் தன்செய் வினையான் வரும்'. அர்த்தம்: அறிவால் எல்லாம் அடையலாம். ஆனால் அறிவில்லாமை என்ற நோய், நம் செயல்களாலேயே வரும். Ignorance is a self-inflicted disease. Knowledge is the cure - and it's up to you to acquire it!

instruction: Friend-ன் Facebook account-ல் இருந்து 'emergency, 10,000 send பண்ணு' என்று message வந்தது. அனுப்பலாமா?
output: Account hack ஆகியிருக்கலாம். Phone-ல் அழைத்து confirm செய்யுங்கள். Message மூலம் பணம் கேட்டால் எப்போதும் verify செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Urgent 30,000 vendum. Play Store la 'Instant Loan - No Documents' app download potten. Loan vandhudhu but interest 50% per month, daily harassment calls.
output: Illegal loan apps - RBI registered illa. Installation la contacts, photos access vaanguvaanga. Default pannaa - contacts ku call, morphed photos threat. Already trapped aa - cyber crime complaint pannunga, don't pay more (harassment won't stop with payment). RBI registered NBFCs only use pannunga.

instruction: காரணம் சொல்லாம job-ல் இருந்து remove பண்ணிட்டாங்க
output: Wrongful termination: 1) Written explanation demand, 2) Labour Commissioner, 3) Labour Court/Industrial Tribunal. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Standing Orders: Company rules check பண்ணுங்க. Workmen vs Manager: Different procedures apply.

instruction: Coimbatore-la engineering padikka nalla college edhu?
output: PSG Tech (autonomous - best ranking), GCT (government), CIT, Amrita, KGISL ellam top colleges. PSG-kku TNEA counselling la high cutoff varum. GCT government college - fees romba koraivau.

instruction: Menstrual hygiene products free-yaa kidaikkumaa?
output: Government schemes: 1) TN: Subsidized sanitary napkins at fair price shops, 2) School girls: Free sanitary napkins through schools, 3) Anganwadi: Distribution to adolescent girls. Jan Aushadhi: Cheap sanitary napkins (Rs.1/pad). NGOs: Many distribute free. Machines: Napkin vending machines in some government offices, colleges. Menstrual leave: Some TN government offices have period leave policy.

instruction: NEET-ku prepare aaganum, Telugu medium-la padichirukken, mudiyuma?
output: Mudiyum! NEET 13 languages-la ezhudhalaam - Telugu option irukku. TN state quota-ku: Native certificate venum OR 10th, 11th, 12th TN-la padichirukka venum. Border areas: Hosur, Krishnagiri students apply pannalam. NCERT Telugu version available. Focus on concepts - language secondary. Many Telugu medium students crack NEET!

instruction: Tamil Nadu govt-oda BC/MBC students-ku scholarship enna?
output: BC/MBC Welfare Department Scholarships: 1) Post-matric scholarship - ₹1,000-3,000/year 2) Professional course scholarship - ₹10,000-50,000 3) Foreign study scholarship - up to ₹20 lakh 4) Free laptop 5) Free bicycle (school students). Eligibility: BC/MBC community certificate, income ₹2.5 lakh/year kizha. Apply: www.bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in. Deadline: Usually September-October.

instruction: Prakriti (body constitution) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Prakriti = Your natural body type/constitution. Types: 1) Vata (air+space) - thin, active, anxious, 2) Pitta (fire+water) - medium build, sharp intellect, irritable, 3) Kapha (earth+water) - heavy, calm, slow. Most people: Combination (Vata-Pitta, Pitta-Kapha, etc.). Importance: Treatment personalized based on Prakriti. Diagnosis: Pulse examination (Nadi Pariksha), physical examination, questionnaire. Treatment: Balances your specific imbalances.

instruction: Insurance claim reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason written-aa kelunga, 2) Insurance company grievance cell, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Consumer forum, 5) MACT (accident claims). Common rejection reasons: Policy lapse, drunk driving, unlicensed driver. Documentation mukkiyam.

instruction: Scholarship-க்கு renewal எப்படி செய்வது?
output: ஒவ்வொரு academic year-க்கும் renewal apply செய்ய வேண்டும். Previous year marks, attendance, income certificate fresh-ஆக upload செய்யவும். Deadline miss ஆனால் scholarship நிற்கும்.

instruction: நான் நிலம் / வீடு வாங்க போகிறேன். என்னென்ன சரிபார்க்க வேண்டும்? Registration எப்படி செய்வது?
output:
வாங்குவதற்கு முன் சரிபார்க்க வேண்டியவை:
1. Title Verification - 30 வருட Parent Document Chain - Lawyer verify
2. EC (Encumbrance Certificate) - tnreginet.gov.in - 30 years
3. Patta & Chitta - eservices.tn.gov.in/landrecords
4. TSLR Extract (FMB) - நிலத்தின் அளவு
5. Tax Receipts - Property Tax paid-ஆ?
6. Approved Layout - DTCP/CMDA/RERA
7. Land Use - Agricultural/Residential?

Registration:
8. Stamp Duty: 7% + Registration: 4% = ~11%
9. Sale Deed - Lawyer-உடன் prepare
10. Sub-Registrar - Both parties + 2 witnesses
11. Post-Registration: Patta transfer at Taluk Office

PMAY Benefit: முதல் வீடு - 3-6.5% வட்டி மானியம்

instruction: Aadhaar Card-la mobile number maatra enna seiyyanum?
output:
Online-la mudiyaadhu - Aadhaar Seva Kendra pooganum

Steps:
1. Nearest ASK find: uidai.gov.in → Locate Enrollment Center
2. Appointment book (optional): appointments.uidai.gov.in
3. Documents: Original Aadhaar + New mobile (active SIM with OTP capability)
4. At ASK: Form fill → Biometric verification → New mobile register
5. Fee: ₹50
6. Confirmation: SMS to new number

Important:
- Old number-la OTP varaadhu, biometric verification thaan
- 2-3 days-la update aagum
- Verify at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in

instruction: Rent increase accept பண்ண மறுத்தால் என்ன ஆகும்?
output: Owner agreement renew செய்ய மறுக்கலாம். Proper notice கொடுத்து vacate செய்யச் சொல்லலாம். ஆனால் agreement period முடியும் வரை existing rent-ல் continue செய்யலாம். Forceful eviction illegal.

instruction: Amma-vukku sugar adhigam, kaal la pun, enna doctor paarkanum? (Coimbatore style)
output: Diabetic foot ulcer - serious! Immediately: 1) General surgery or 2) Vascular surgery specialist. Don't delay - infection spread fast, amputation risk. Government: District hospital, medical college. Treatment: 1) Sugar control, 2) Wound care (daily dressing), 3) Antibiotics, 4) Maybe surgery. Prevention: 1) Daily foot check, 2) Proper footwear, 3) No walking barefoot, 4) Cut nails carefully. Coimbatore: CMC, GH has good diabetic foot care.

instruction: Ayushman Bharat card eppadi vaanguvadhu? Eligibility check eppadi?
output:
Eligibility Check:

Method 1 - Online:
1. pmjay.gov.in → 'Am I Eligible'
2. Enter: Mobile number
3. OTP validate
4. Enter: State, Name, Ration Card / Aadhaar
5. Result: Eligible / Not Eligible

Method 2 - Helpline: 14555
Method 3 - Govt Hospital / Ayushman Mitra desk / CSC

Card vaanguvadhu:
1. Where: Government Hospital / CSC / PMJAY Kendra
2. Documents: Aadhaar, Ration Card, Passport photo
3. Process: Eligibility verify → Photo capture → e-Card generate
4. Fee: FREE!
5. Time: Same day (15-30 minutes)

Card use:
1. Empanelled hospital pogga
2. Ayushman desk-la card kaattunga
3. Pre-authorization (some surgeries)
4. Treatment - cashless!
5. No money needed (up to ₹5 lakh/year)

Tamil Nadu-la: CMCHIS + Ayushman Bharat combined, same card works

instruction: Expert witness eppadi arrange panradhu?
output: Expert = Doctor in same specialty who can opine on standard of care. Finding: 1) Through medical-legal lawyer, 2) Retired senior doctors, 3) Medical college professors. Cost: Fee for opinion + court appearance. Report: Written opinion on whether standard of care met. Court: May be cross-examined. Important: Expert from same specialty (surgeon for surgery case).

instruction: Police vehicle seize பண்ணினால் எப்படி release பெறுவது?
output: Steps: 1) Challan pay, 2) Required documents produce (license, RC, insurance), 3) Release order பெறுங்க, 4) Vehicle collect. Court custody-ல் இருந்தால் Court order வேண்டும். Seizure fee applicable. 24 hours-க்குள் Magistrate inform ஆகணும்.

instruction: Evening college-la padikkalamaa? Working people-ku option?
output: Evening college options: 1) University of Madras evening courses 2) Annamalai University distance + contact 3) IGNOU weekend classes 4) Polytechnic evening batches (limited). Timings: Usually 6-9 PM. Courses: BA, B.Com, BBA, LLB. Benefits: Work + study together, degree = regular degree value. Alternative: Distance education from TNOU, IGNOU - study anytime. Some employers sponsor employee education.

instruction: வீட்டு ஓனர் advance-ஐ திருப்பி தர மாட்டேங்குறாரு, agreement இல்ல
output: Agreement இல்லாட்டாலும் case போடலாம். Evidence: Bank transfer statement, WhatsApp messages, witness. Legal notice முதல்ல அனுப்புங்க. Respond பண்ணலன்னா Rent Authority complaint. Civil Court-லும் money suit போடலாம்.

instruction: 'உங்கள் Aadhaar money laundering-ல் use ஆகிறது' என்று call வந்தது. True-ஆ இருக்குமா?
output: False claim. 'Money laundering', 'drug case', 'arrest warrant' என்று phone-ல் சொன்னால் scam. Real cases-க்கு official notice வரும், phone call அல்ல.

instruction: TN-ல் இலவச வீட்டு மனை பட்டா எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: ஏழைகளுக்கு இலவச வீட்டு மனை. தகுதி: Houseless poor families, BPL card holder, No land ownership. Size: 2-3 cents (varies by area). Process: Panchayat/Taluk office-ல் apply, List publish, Selection, Registration. Documents: Income certificate, Family card, Aadhaar, No property certificate. Priority: SC/ST, Widows, Differently abled. PMAY-G: House construction-க்கு ₹1.2 lakh + state share.

instruction: திருவள்ளுவர் சிலை எங்கே உள்ளது? அதன் சிறப்பு என்ன?
output: கன்னியாகுமரியில் உள்ள திருவள்ளுவர் சிலை 133 அடி உயரம் கொண்டது - ஒவ்வொரு அடியும் ஒரு அதிகாரத்தைக் குறிக்கிறது (133 அதிகாரங்கள்). இது 38 அடி உயர பீடத்தின் மீது நிற்கிறது - 38 அடி என்பது அறத்துப்பாலின் 38 அதிகாரங்களைக் குறிக்கிறது. மொத்த உயரம் 171 அடி. 2000-ம் ஆண்டு ஜனவரி 1-ல் திறக்கப்பட்டது.

instruction: 'CMC Hospital la irundhu pesuren baa, unga relative admit, urgent surgery ku 1 lakh transfer pannu' nu call vandhuchi. Bayam aa irukku baa, enna pannudhu?
output: First unga relative ku direct call pannu baa! CMC random calls panni money kekaadhu. 'Emergency' nu panic create panni thiruduraanga. Vellore la hospital scams increase aachu. 30 seconds verify panna spend pannu - transfer panna avasaram illa baa.

instruction: சேக்கிழார் யார்? பெரிய புராணம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: சேக்கிழார் - சோழ மன்னன் குலோத்துங்கன் II-ன் அமைச்சர். 12th century. 'பெரிய புராணம்' எழுதியவர் - 63 நாயன்மார்களின் வரலாறு. 4286 பாடல்கள். 12-வது திருமுறை என்று அழைக்கப்படுகிறது. மன்னன் ஜைன இலக்கியம் படிக்க, சேக்கிழார் 'இதை விட சிறந்த சைவ இலக்கியம் எழுதுகிறேன்' என்று சொல்லி பெரிய புராணம் படைத்தார் என்று கதை. Tamil literary masterpiece!

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Cyber Fraud Recovery Process - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Ennoda account-la irundhu 25,000 online-la poyiduchu. Enna pannanum?

Assistant: **URGENT! Immediately pannunga:**

**RIGHT NOW (Next 5 minutes):**

1. **Bank-ku Call:**
   - SBI: 1800-111-111
   - HDFC: 1800-202-3344
   - ICICI: 1800-102-4242
   - Tell: "Unauthorized transaction, block my account"

2. **Note down:**
   - Transaction date & time
   - Amount
   - Transaction ID (SMS-la irukkum)

Bank call panniteengala? Enna bank?

User: SBI. Call pannitein, account freeze pannittanga

Assistant: Good! Fast action. Now next steps:

**Next 30 Minutes - Cyber Crime Report:**

**Step 1: Online Complaint (Fastest)**
1. Website: **cybercrime.gov.in**
2. Click: "Report Cyber Crime"
3. Select: "Financial Fraud"
4. Fill:
   - Your details
   - Bank details
   - Transaction details
   - Suspect details (if any)
5. Upload: Bank SMS screenshot
6. Submit
7. **Note: Complaint Number**

**Step 2: Call 1930**
- National Cyber Crime Helpline
- 24x7 available
- They'll also register complaint
- Helps freeze suspect's account faster!

**Why urgency matters:**
- Within 24 hours = 70-80% recovery chance
- After 48 hours = Drops to 30-40%
- After 1 week = Very difficult

cybercrime.gov.in complaint panniteengala?

User: Complaint panniten, number kedaichuchu. Ippo enna pannanum?

Assistant: **Complaint Number - KEEP SAFE!**

**Next Steps:**

**Step 1: Written Bank Complaint (Within 24 hours)**
1. Go to your SBI branch
2. Write complaint letter:
   - "Unauthorized transaction of ₹25,000 on [date]"
   - Transaction ID
   - Cyber complaint number
   - Request: "Reverse transaction and investigate"
3. Get acknowledgment with date stamp
4. Keep copy

**Step 2: Police FIR (Within 24 hours)**

**Online:** eservices.tnpolice.gov.in → Cyber Crime

**Or Visit:** 
- Cyber Crime Police Station
- Any Police Station (they'll transfer)

**Documents for FIR:**
- Bank statement showing fraud transaction
- SMS screenshots
- Cyber crime complaint number
- ID proof

**Step 3: Email to Bank Nodal Officer**
- SBI Nodal Officer: cms.gm@sbi.co.in
- Subject: "Cyber Fraud - Urgent - ₹25,000"
- Attach: Cyber complaint, Transaction details

Bank branch pogureengala ippo?

User: Poittu vandhutein. FIR-um panniten. Panam thirumba varum?

Assistant: Good work! Recovery chances:

**RBI Rules - Bank's Liability:**

| Reporting Time | Your Loss (Max) |
|----------------|----------------|
| Within 3 days | ₹0 (Full refund if not your fault) |
| 4-7 days | ₹10,000 max |
| After 7 days | Bank's discretion |

**Your Case:**
- Reported same day ✓
- You should get **FULL REFUND** if:
  - You didn't share OTP
  - You didn't share password
  - No negligence from your side

**Bank Investigation Process:**
1. Bank has **10 working days** to investigate
2. They'll check: Was it system failure or user error?
3. **90 days maximum** to resolve

**If Bank Denies:**
1. First Appeal: Branch Manager
2. Second: Bank's Grievance Officer
3. Third: **Banking Ombudsman** (cms.rbi.org.in)
4. Final: Consumer Court

**Track Your Case:**
- Bank complaint status: Call branch
- Cyber complaint: cybercrime.gov.in → Track

**Question:** Eppadi panam poachu? OTP share panneenga? Link click panneenga?

User: Link click pannitein - SBI update nu message vandhuchu, adha click pannein

Assistant: Ah, **Phishing Scam** - Very common!

**What Happened:**
- Fake SBI SMS
- Fake website (looks real)
- You entered details
- They used it to transfer money

**Impact on Refund:**

**Honest Assessment:**
- Bank may argue "customer negligence"
- But still fight for refund!
- Many cases - bank still refunds 50-100%

**Strengthen Your Case:**

**Argument 1:** "Sophisticated scam"
- SMS looked genuine
- Website looked real
- Not obvious fraud

**Argument 2:** "Bank's responsibility too"
- Why did bank allow suspicious transaction?
- Why no OTP for large amount? (Wait - OTP vandhucha?)

**Argument 3:** "Immediate reporting"
- You reported within hours
- Shows you're genuine victim

**What to Write in Bank Complaint:**
"I was victim of sophisticated phishing scam using fake bank communication. Despite being a careful customer, the fraudulent website was indistinguishable from genuine SBI website. I reported immediately upon discovering fraud. As per RBI circular, bank should credit the amount within 10 days."

OTP message vandhucha? Enter panneenga?

User: OTP vandhuchi, enter pannitten nu nenaikkuren. Full details nenaivila illa tension-la

Assistant: **Understandable. Let's document everything:**

**For Your Records (Write down now):**

1. **Timeline:**
   - Date: ?
   - Time of SMS received: ?
   - Time you clicked link: ?
   - Time you noticed money gone: ?
   - Time you called bank: ?

2. **What you entered on fake site:**
   - Card number? (Probably yes)
   - CVV? (Maybe)
   - OTP? (Yes)
   - Net banking password? (Maybe)

**Immediate Security Actions:**

**Do RIGHT NOW:**
1. **Change SBI Net Banking Password**
   - onlinesbi.sbi.co.in → Forgot Password
   
2. **Change ATM PIN**
   - Call SBI or use SBI YONO app

3. **Request New Debit Card**
   - Old card details compromised
   - Block old card, request new

4. **Check Other Accounts**
   - Same password used elsewhere?
   - Change those too!

5. **Enable Transaction Alerts**
   - SMS + Email alerts ON
   - Transaction limit set

**Fraudsters may try again!** - Common pattern

Net banking password change panniteengala?

User: Pannitten. Bank eppo reply pannuvanga? Vera enna pannanum?

Assistant: **Bank Timeline & Next Steps:**

**Bank Response Timeline:**
| Stage | Time |
|-------|------|
| Acknowledgment | 24-48 hours |
| Investigation | 10 working days |
| Resolution | Up to 90 days |
| Credit (if approved) | Within 10 days of decision |

**What to Do Now:**

**Week 1:**
- [ ] Follow up call to branch (after 3 days)
- [ ] Get written acknowledgment if not received
- [ ] Check cyber complaint status: cybercrime.gov.in

**Week 2:**
- [ ] If no response, email escalation:
  - Branch Manager
  - cms.gm@sbi.co.in (Nodal Officer)
- [ ] Reference: RBI Circular on Limiting Liability

**Week 3-4:**
- [ ] If rejected/no response: Banking Ombudsman
- [ ] cms.rbi.org.in → Lodge Complaint
- [ ] Free service, usually effective

**Keep Ready:**
- All complaint numbers
- Bank acknowledgments
- FIR copy
- SMS/Email screenshots
- Timeline document

**Realistic Expectation:**
- Phishing with OTP = Partial to Full refund possible
- Fight ka laga - don't give up!
- Ombudsman usually sides with customer

Vera doubt?

User: Thanks! Future-la eppadi safe-aa irukkuradhu?

Assistant: **Cyber Safety Tips - MUST FOLLOW:**

**SMS/Email Safety:**
| Red Flag | What to Do |
|----------|------------|
| "Click urgent link" | NEVER click - Go to official app/website directly |
| "Your account blocked" | Call bank directly, don't use number in SMS |
| "Update KYC immediately" | Banks never ask via SMS link |
| Shortened URLs (bit.ly) | Never click from unknown source |

**OTP Rules:**
- **NEVER share OTP with anyone** - Even if they say "bank officer"
- OTP valid for YOUR transactions only
- Bank staff will NEVER ask OTP

**Banking Safety:**

1. **SBI YONO App** - Use app, not website
   - Genuine app from Play Store/App Store
   - Biometric login

2. **Transaction Limits**
   - Set daily limit (₹25,000 for example)
   - UPI limit separate

3. **Alerts**
   - SMS + Email both ON
   - Immediate notification

4. **Two Accounts Strategy**
   - Savings account: Large amounts (no net banking)
   - Current/separate: Daily use (limited balance)

**Mobile Safety:**
- Don't install apps from links
- Keep phone updated
- Use official banking apps only

**If Suspicious Call:**
- Hang up
- Call bank official number
- Report to 1930

**Quick Reference Card:**
```
✓ Official app only
✓ Never share OTP
✓ Never click SMS links
✓ Set transaction limits
✓ When in doubt - CALL BANK
```

**Emergency Numbers:**
- Cyber Crime: 1930
- SBI: 1800-111-111
- RBI Ombudsman: 14448

Stay safe! Anything else?

instruction: Aadhaar card தொலைந்துவிட்டது. Download செய்யலாமா?
output: eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in-ல் download செய்யலாம். Registered mobile-க்கு OTP வரும். e-Aadhaar original Aadhaar-க்கு சமம், எல்லா இடத்திலும் valid.

instruction: Amma Baby Care Kit என்றால் என்ன?
output: புதிதாக பிறந்த குழந்தைக்கு இலவச Kit. Value: ₹5,000+. Contents: Baby clothes (6 sets), Mosquito net, Baby bed, Towels, Diapers, Baby oil/soap/powder, Blanket, Toys. தகுதி: Govt hospital delivery, Dr. Muthulakshmi scheme beneficiary. Given: Hospital-லேயே discharge போது கொடுப்பார்கள். Documents: MCP card, Delivery details.

instruction: 'நீங்கள் iPhone 15 வென்றீர்கள்! ஷிப்பிங் சார்ஜ் 999 ரூபாய் மட்டும்' - இது நம்பகமானதா?
output: இது மோசடி. இலவச பரிசுக்கு ஷிப்பிங் கட்டணம் என்பது பொய். உங்கள் கார்டு தகவல் கொடுத்தால் பணம் திருடப்படும்.

instruction: Moovar (Thevaram Trio) yaar yaar?
output: Moovar - Thevaram paadiya moondru mukkiya Nayanmaargal: 1) Thirugnana Sambandhar - 3 vayathil Umaiyaval paal oottiyathaaga kadhai, 16 vayathil Samanargalai vaadhaththil vendavar, 2) Thirunavukkarasar (Appar) - mudhalil Jain Samanar, pin Saivar aanavar, 'Navukkarasar' endraal naavoda arasar, 3) Sundarar - 'Thozhamai' bhakthi, Sivanai nanbanaaga paadiyavar. Ivargal 274 kovilgalai Paadal petra thalangalaakkinaargal.

instruction: அரசு பள்ளியில் சேர்க்கை எப்படி?
output: RTE Act படி 6-14 வயது குழந்தைகளுக்கு இலவச கல்வி. ஆவணங்கள்: பிறப்பு சான்று, ஆதார், Transfer Certificate (பழைய பள்ளி). சேர்க்கை: ஜூன்-ஜூலை (கல்வியாண்டு துவக்கம்). புகார்: அருகிலுள்ள BEO / DEO அலுவலகம்.

instruction: Discord DM vandhudhu - 'Valorant Riot employee, your account flagged for review, login here to verify: [link].'
output: Game companies DM through contact pannaadhu. 'Employee' DMs always fake. Link = phishing site, login details steal. Report and block. Two-factor authentication enable pannunga all gaming accounts la.

instruction: Hospital insurance claim-kku cooperate pannala - enna seivathu?
output: Hospital must cooperate for cashless. Issues: 1) Won't file pre-auth, 2) Asking cash despite insurance, 3) Not providing documents. Action: 1) Escalate to hospital administration, 2) Call TPA directly, 3) Insurer helpline, 4) Pay and claim reimbursement (last resort). Network hospital agreement: They must facilitate cashless. Complaint: Insurer can de-empanel non-cooperative hospitals.

instruction: தமிழ்நாடு அரசு வெளிநாடு படிப்புக்கு scholarship தருகிறதா?
output: ஆம், BC/MBC/SC/ST மாணவர்களுக்கு: 1) BC/MBC Welfare Department - ₹20 lakh வரை 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare - SC மாணவர்களுக்கு full scholarship 3) CM's Special Scholarship. Central schemes: 1) National Overseas Scholarship (SC/ST) 2) MOMA Scholarship (Minorities). Apply through respective department websites. Merit-based selection.

instruction: WhatsApp-ல் 'HR from TCS' என்று message வந்து interview call தருகிறேன் என்கிறார். Bank details கேட்கிறார்.
output: TCS போன்ற நிறுவனங்கள் WhatsApp-ல் recruit செய்வதில்லை. Interview-க்கு முன் bank details கேட்டால் 100% scam.

instruction: பெண் மாணவர்களுக்கான Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar scheme என்ன?
output: Scheme விவரம்: 6th-12th வரை படிக்கும் பெண் மாணவர்களுக்கு மாத உதவித்தொகை. Amount: ₹1,000/மாதம் (ஆண்டுக்கு ₹12,000). தகுதி: Government/Aided school மாணவி, குடும்ப வருமானம் ₹2.5 lakh கீழ். 18 வயது ஆனவுடன் ₹25,000 one-time பணம் (graduation-க்கு). Apply: School மூலம் automatic. Bank account தேவை.

instruction: Office-ல் boss unfair-ஆக நடந்துகொண்டால் என்ன குறள் உதவும்?
output: 'பொறையுடைமை பொருளுடைமை போற்றிச் சிறந்தான் செறிவுடைமை அவ்விரன் என'. பொறுமை என்பது மிகப்பெரிய செல்வம். Unfair situation-ல் பொறுமையாக இருந்து, right time-ல் action எடுக்கவும். Emotional reaction avoid பண்ணுங்க. Document everything, stay professional.

instruction: KVPY scholarship என்ன? Science students எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY): IISc Bangalore நடத்தும் science aptitude test. Streams: SA (Class 11), SX (Class 12), SB (1st year BSc). Scholarship: ₹5,000-7,000/மாதம் + annual contingency grant. Selection: Aptitude test + Interview. Benefits: IISc/IISERs admission priority. 2022 onwards INSPIRE SHE-ஆக merge ஆனது, but similar benefits continue through INSPIRE.

instruction: Kanchi Periyavar yaar?
output: Kanchi Periyavar (Chandrasekarendra Saraswati, 1894-1994) - Kanchi Kamakoti Peedathoda 68-vadhu Sankaracharyar. 13 vayathil sanniyaasam. 100 aandugal vaazhndaar. 'Walking God' endru azhaikkapattavar. India muzhuvathum nadanthe payanam seydhaar. Vedam, Saasthram, Dharmam ellavatrilum expert. 'Deivathin Kural' (Voice of God) - ivar pechugaloda collection, pala volumes. Hindu renaissance leader!

instruction: Govt school-la LKG/UKG-ku admission eppadi? Enna vayasu vendum?
output:
**Govt School Admission:**

**Age Rules:**
- LKG: 3+ years (as on June 1)
- UKG: 4+ years
- Class 1: 5+ years

**Admission Time:** May-June

**Documents:**
- Birth Certificate
- Child Aadhaar (optional)
- Parents Aadhaar
- Address proof
- Photos - 4
- Community Certificate

**Where:** School directly or emis.tnschools.gov.in

**Fee:** FREE!

**RTE:** 25% seats in private schools for EWS - Apply at rte.tnschools.gov.in

instruction: Naturopathy என்றால் என்ன? Ayurveda-விட வேறுபாடு?
output: Naturopathy = Treatment using nature's elements. Methods: Water (hydrotherapy), mud, air, sun, diet, fasting, yoga. Difference from Ayurveda: 1) No medicines (mostly), 2) Focus on lifestyle correction, 3) More recent system, 4) Emphasizes fasting/detox. Combined: Often practiced with Yoga. Qualification: BNYS (Bachelor of Naturopathy and Yogic Sciences). Good for: Lifestyle diseases, prevention, detoxification.

instruction: என் Aadhaar யாரோ misuse செய்கிறார்கள். Lock செய்ய முடியுமா?
output: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in-ல் Aadhaar lock செய்யலாம். Biometric lock, Aadhaar number lock இரண்டும் available. தேவைப்படும்போது unlock செய்யலாம். மிகவும் safe option.

instruction: LinkedIn-ல் 'Congratulations, you won a scholarship, apply now' என்று message வந்தது. Legit-ஆ?
output: Apply செய்யாத scholarship-ல் win ஆக முடியாது. LinkedIn-ல் scholarship scams அதிகம். University official website-ல் verify செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: 'Ulluvadhu ellam uyarvullal' - sindhhanai patriya kural enna?
