output: Kural: 'Ulluvadhu ellam uyarvullal matradhu thalinum thallaamai neerthu'. Artham: Eppodhum uyarndha ennangalaiye ninaikkA vendum. Nadakkaaviittaalum paravaayillai, uyarvaga ninaippadu nalladhu. Think big even if you fail! Positive thinking-a 2000 aandugalukkku munnbae sonnaar.

instruction: புதிய PAN Card எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Online விண்ணப்பம்: 1. NSDL: onlineservices.nsdl.com 2. UTIITSL: pan.utiitsl.com 3. e-Filing Portal (Instant e-PAN): eportal.incometax.gov.in (Aadhaar based - FREE!). தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்: அடையாள சான்று (Aadhaar/Voter ID/Passport), முகவரி சான்று, DOB சான்று, புகைப்படம் & கையொப்பம். கட்டணம்: Physical PAN ₹107 (India), e-PAN இலவசம். காலம்: 15-20 நாட்கள் (Physical), உடனடி (e-PAN)

instruction: Affidavit எங்கே பண்றது? Cost என்ன?
output: Notary Public office (court complex nearby). Cost: Rs.50-200 (stamp paper) + Rs.100-500 (notary fee). Documents: ID proof, matter details. Self-drafted allowed. Notarized affidavit = legal document. e-Stamp paper available at banks.

instruction: முதியோர் ஓய்வூதியம் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: தகுதி: 60 வயதுக்கு மேல், BPL குடும்பம். தொகை: மாதம் ₹1,000. விண்ணப்பம்: ஆன்லைன்: pensionschemes.tn.gov.in, நேரடி: தாசில்தார் / தாலுகா அலுவலகம். ஆவணங்கள்: வயது சான்று, வருமானச் சான்று, ஆதார், பாஸ்புக்

instruction: Insurance claim reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Rejection reasons: 1) Pre-existing disease (waiting period), 2) Excluded treatment, 3) Document missing, 4) Non-network hospital, 5) Fraud suspected. Appeal: 1) Written grievance to insurer (30 days), 2) IRDAI IGMS portal, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (free, up to Rs.30 lakhs), 4) Consumer Forum. Success tip: Get rejection reason in writing, provide complete documents, cite policy terms.

instruction: விவசாயக் கல்வி படிக்க என்ன வழி?
output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) Coimbatore-ல் BSc Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry courses உள்ளன. 12th Biology group-ல படித்தால் TNAU counselling மூலம் சேரலாம். Government job opportunities அதிகம்.

instruction: PMKVY scheme enna?
output: Central Government skill scheme. Features: 1) Free training - 200+ job roles 2) Certification - NSDC recognized 3) ₹500-2,000 reward on certification 4) Placement support 5) Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) - existing skills-ku certificate. Duration: 150-300 hours. Training centers: Skill India centres across TN. Register: www.pmkvyofficial.org. Age: 15-45 years. 10th pass preferred.

instruction: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme என்ன?
output: TN government scheme: Rs.18,000 cash assistance. Eligibility: 1) TN resident, 2) Family income limit, 3) First two live births, 4) Institutional delivery, 5) Age 19+. Payment: 3 installments - during pregnancy, after delivery, after vaccination completion. Apply: PHC/Government hospital during registration. Documents: Ration card, Aadhar, bank account. Working women: Separate maternity benefit also applicable.

instruction: LinkedIn premium DM vandhuchu 'We need urgent freelancer for US project, 5000 USD/month. Share bank details for advance payment.' Too good to be true aa?
output: Legitimate clients use proper freelancing platforms or company contracts. 'Advance payment needing bank details' is money mule recruitment. You could become complicit in money laundering. Real projects have clear scope, contracts, payment milestones.

instruction: முக்கிய exam dates 2024-25
output: Board Exams: 10th March, 12th March. NEET: May first week. JEE Main: January & April sessions. TNPSC Group 4: Throughout year. TNEA counselling: June-July. College admissions: June-August. GATE: February. CAT: November. CLAT: December.

instruction: SIM swap fraud-ல் இருந்து எப்படி protect பண்றது?
output: Prevention: 1) SIM lock enable, 2) Don't share personal details, 3) Unusual network loss-க்கு alert, 4) Bank OTP to email (if available). If happened: Telecom provider + bank + police immediately. New SIM block request பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Animation/VFX படிப்பு career-க்கு நல்லதா?
output: Growing industry! Courses: 1) B.Sc Animation 2) Diploma (Arena, MAAC, Frameboxx) 3) Certificate courses. Duration: 6 months - 3 years. Skills: Maya, 3ds Max, After Effects, Photoshop. Jobs: Animation studios, Game companies, Ad agencies, Film industry (VFX). Chennai: Major hub for animation studios. Salary: ₹15,000-40,000 starting. Freelancing possible. Portfolio = key to jobs.

instruction: திருக்குறளின் மூன்று பிரிவுகள் என்ன?
output: 1) அறத்துப்பால் (Virtue) - 38 அதிகாரங்கள், 2) பொருட்பால் (Wealth) - 70 அதிகாரங்கள், 3) காமத்துப்பால் (Love) - 25 அதிகாரங்கள். நினைவில் வைக்க: அ-பொ-கா (APK - like Android APK file!).

instruction: Government hospital-ல் free-யா treatment கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! Government hospitals = Free treatment for all. Free services: 1) OPD consultation, 2) Basic tests (blood, urine, X-ray), 3) Medicines (available stock), 4) Surgery (non-cosmetic), 5) Emergency care, 6) Delivery, 7) Vaccinations. Paid: Special rooms, specific tests (MRI/CT in some), outside medicines. Quality: Varies - GH Chennai, Madurai Medical College = good facilities.

instruction: Consumer complaint-kku lawyer venumaa?
output: Vendaam. Consumer forum-la neengale directly case nadathalaam. Simple procedure, no court fee for claims up to Rs.5 lakh. Complex cases-kku lawyer udhaviyaa irukum. But mandatory illa.

instruction: Hospital body thara marukkiradhu - death case
output: Bill non-payment-kkaaga body thara marukka mudiyaadhu - Supreme Court ruling. Contact: Police, District Collector, Human Rights Commission. Hospital against action possible. MLC case-la police formalities undu - legitimate delay. But payment reason illegal.

instruction: Panchakarma யாருக்கு நல்லது? யாருக்கு வேண்டாம்?
output: Good for: 1) Chronic diseases (arthritis, skin, digestive), 2) Lifestyle disorders (obesity, stress), 3) Preventive detox (healthy people - yearly), 4) Pre-conception purification, 5) Anti-aging. Avoid: 1) Acute illness/fever, 2) Pregnancy, 3) Very old/weak, 4) Children (<12), 5) Certain heart conditions, 6) During menstruation (some procedures). Consultation: Doctor will assess suitability based on strength, condition.

instruction: பெண் மாணவிகளுக்கு என்ன special schemes இருக்கு?
output:
**பெண் மாணவிகளுக்கான Special Schemes:**

**1. CM Girl Child Protection Scheme:**
- ₹50,000 FD at birth (single girl child)
- ₹25,000 each (two girl children)
- Maturity at 18: ~₹1.5-2 lakh

**2. Free Education:**
- Free education up to PG for all girls in Govt institutions
- No tuition fee

**3. Moovalur Ramamirtham Scheme:**
- ₹1,000/month for UG girl students
- Apply: tneservices.tn.gov.in

**4. Free Bicycle:**
- Class 11 & 12 girl students
- Govt & Aided schools
- Automatic distribution

**5. CBSE Udaan Scheme:**
- Free engineering preparation for girls
- cbseit.in/udaan

**6. Pragati Scholarship (AICTE):**
- ₹50,000/year for technical education
- One girl per family
- aicte-pragati-saksham-gov.in

**7. Begum Hazrat Mahal Scholarship:**
- For minority girls
- Class 9-12: ₹5,000-6,000
- UG/PG: ₹10,000-12,000

**8. Indira Gandhi Scholarship (SC Single Girl):**
- ₹36,200/year for PG
- Single girl child only

**9. Free Bus Travel:**
- All women/girls free in TN ordinary buses

**10. Safety Measures:**
- Women helpline: 181
- Anti-ragging helpline: 1800-180-5522
- Campus safety mandatory

**Apply:** Most through school/college or tneservices.tn.gov.in

instruction: Interview-ல் common questions என்ன? எப்படி answer பண்றது?
output: Common questions: 1) Tell about yourself - 2 min summary, relevant points 2) Strengths - with example proof 3) Weakness - genuine + improvement action 4) Why this company - research based answer 5) Where do you see yourself in 5 years - realistic goals 6) Why should we hire you - value proposition 7) Any questions - always ask 2-3 thoughtful ones. Practice: Mirror practice, record yourself, mock interviews. Dress: Formals, neat appearance.

instruction: Online காதலர் 'gift அனுப்பினேன், customs-ல் stuck, release செய்ய 1 lakh கட்டு' என்கிறார்.
output: Gift scam இது. கேட்காத gift-க்கு customs fee கட்ட வேண்டியதில்லை. Gift இருந்தாலும் sender தான் pay செய்ய வேண்டும். பணம் போட்டால் போய்விடும்.

instruction: Consumer-aaga enakku ennenna rights irukku?
output: Consumer Protection Act 2019-in keezh 6 mukkiya rights: 1) Safety right - unsafe products-la irundhu protection, 2) Information right - product details therinjukka, 3) Choice right - alternatives select seyya, 4) Hearing right - complaint kodukka, 5) Redressal right - compensation pera, 6) Education right - consumer awareness.

instruction: National Institute of Siddha (NIS) special treatments enna?
output: NIS Tambaram specialties: 1) Noi Naadal (diagnostics), 2) Maruthuvam (general medicine), 3) Kuzhanthai Maruthuvam (pediatrics), 4) Sirappu Maruthuvam (specialties), 5) Nanju Nool (toxicology), 6) Gunapadam (pharmacology), 7) Pothu Maruthuvam. Special: 1) Varmam unit, 2) Panchakarma therapies, 3) Yoga therapy, 4) Research wing. Referral: Complex cases from all over India. Contact: 044-22411611.

instruction: PM-AJAY கிராம சுகாதார திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: Pradhan Mantri Ayushman Arogya Yojana - கிராம சுகாதாரம். Components: Health & Wellness Centres (HWC) - Primary healthcare, Teleconsultation facility. Services: 12 essential services - Maternal care, Child health, Communicable diseases, NCD screening (Diabetes, BP), Mental health, Dental, Eye care. Free: All services free at HWC. Location: Sub-centre/PHC within 30 min travel. Access: Aadhaar/ration card போதும், registration required.

instruction: PF account balance eppadi check panradhu?
output: Methods: 1) EPFO portal: epfindia.gov.in (UAN login), 2) UMANG app, 3) SMS: EPFOHO UAN ENG to 7738299899, 4) Missed call: 011-22901406. UAN (Universal Account Number) venum. Employer-kitta kettu activate pannunga.

instruction: Ayurvedic products reliable brands evai?
output: Established brands: 1) Arya Vaidya Sala (Kottakkal), 2) Arya Vaidya Pharmacy (AVP), 3) Dabur, 4) Baidyanath, 5) Himalaya, 6) Patanjali (controversial but licensed), 7) Nagarjuna, 8) Kerala Ayurveda, 9) SNA Oushadhasala. Check: 1) AYUSH license on pack, 2) Manufacturing date/expiry, 3) Batch number. Avoid: Unbranded, loose, online unknowns. Government: IMPCOPS (TN government pharmacy) for Siddha/Ayurveda.

instruction: Life-la ellaamae wrong aagikittu irukku - enna seivadhu?
output: 'Idukkan varungaal naguga adhanai aduththoorvadhu aqdhoppa thil'. Kashta kaalathil siriyungal - adhuvae best remedy. Melum: 'Oozhayum uppakkam kaanbar ulaivindrith thaazhAdhu unjarru pavar'. Thodarndu muyarchi seipavargal fate-aiyum maatrruvaargal. This too shall pass!

instruction: வேலைக்குப் போகும்போதே படிக்க முடியுமா?
output: முடியும். Evening colleges (5pm-9pm), Sunday classes, correspondence courses, online degree programs (SWAYAM, NPTEL) மூலம் வேலை பார்த்துக்கொண்டே படிக்கலாம். UGC approved distance education universities-ல் சேரலாம்.

instruction: Water supply complaint எங்கே கொடுப்பது?
output: Chennai: CMWSSB - 044-28454455, cmwssb.tn.gov.in. Other cities: Municipal/Corporation office. Rural: TWAD Board - Local Panchayat. Issues: No supply, contamination, billing, new connection. Response: 24-48 hours for emergency.

instruction: கர்நாடக இசை என்றால் என்ன?
output: கர்நாடக இசை - தென்னிந்திய classical music. Features: 1) ராகம் - melody framework, 2) தாளம் - rhythm, 3) கீர்த்தனை - composition. திரித்துவம் (Trinity) - த்யாகராஜர், முத்துசுவாமி தீட்சிதர், சியாமா சாஸ்திரி - 18th-19th century-ல் இசையை வளர்த்தவர்கள். Instruments: வீணை, மிருதங்கம், வயலின், புல்லாங்குழல். Chennai December Season - world's largest music festival. தமிழ்நாட்டின் pride!

instruction: திருவள்ளுவரின் மனைவி யார்? அவர்களைப் பற்றி என்ன தெரியும்?
output: திருவள்ளுவரின் மனைவி வாசுகி. அவர் ஒரு கற்புக்கரசியாகவும், கணவனுக்கு முழு பணிவுடன் இருந்ததாகவும் போற்றப்படுகிறார். 'இல்லறவியல்' அதிகாரங்களில் வாசுகியின் குணங்களின் தாக்கம் தெரிகிறது என்று கூறுவர். அவர் எப்போதும் கணவர் சொல்வதை முதலில் செய்வார், தண்ணீர் கூட கணவர் கேட்கும் முன் கொண்டு வருவார் என்று கதைகள் உள்ளன.

instruction: என் பெயர் ரேஷன் கார்டில் தவறாக உள்ளது. திருத்த என்ன செய்வது?
output: Aadhaar-ல் உள்ள பெயரை சரி செய்து, அந்த copy-யுடன் taluk office-ல் correction application கொடுக்கவும். SSLC அல்லது passport proof-ஆக கொடுக்கலாம்.

instruction: Naan nilam / veedu vaanga porein. Ennenna check pannanum? Registration eppadi seyvadhu?
output:
Before buying - Verify:
1. Title - 30 years chain, Lawyer verify
2. EC - tnreginet.gov.in, 30 years
3. Patta & Chitta - Seller name correct?
4. FMB - Land measurement correct?
5. Tax Receipts - No dues?
6. Approved Layout - DTCP/CMDA/RERA
7. Land Use - Agricultural/Residential?

Registration:
8. Stamp Duty - 7% + 4% = ~11%
9. Sale Deed - Prepare with Lawyer
10. Sub-Registrar - Both parties + witnesses
11. Post-Registration - Patta transfer at Taluk Office

PMAY Benefit: First home buyers - 3-6.5% interest subsidy

instruction: Fake news share panninaal legal trouble varumaa?
output: Yes, possible: IPC 505 (public mischief), 153A (promoting enmity), Epidemic Diseases Act (health misinformation). IT Rules 2021: Platforms must remove fake news. Knowingly spreading = higher liability. Before sharing: Verify from trusted sources. Fact-check websites use pannunga.

instruction: En nilathula pudhiya borewell amaikkka enna permission vendum?
output:
Borewell permission process:

**Step 1: Get Permission**
- Where: PWD Ground Water Wing / District Collector
- Online: tnpwd.gov.in

**Step 2: Documents**
- Land document (Patta/Chitta)
- FMB Extract
- Location sketch
- Adjacent borewell details (within 500m)
- Aadhaar, Photo

**Step 3: Fee**
- Application: ₹100-500
- NOC: ₹500-1,000

**Step 4: Inspection**
- PWD officer visit
- Ground water check
- Spacing norms (Min 200m from others)

**Step 5: Approval**
- Time: 15-30 days
- Depth restriction possible

**Important:** Without permission = legal action

instruction: Online-la oru ponnu friend aanaanga, ippo hospital bill-ku panam vennum-nu solraanga
output: Romance scam ithu. Photo vera yaar-dhu-o irukkum. Video call refuse pannaanga-na confirm scam. Online stranger-ku panam anuppaadheenga.

instruction: Ancestral property-ai yaaraavadhu oruthar thaniyaa virkkalaamaa?
output: Mudiyaadhu. Ancestral property-la anaithu legal heirs-kkum pirappileye right undu. Virka ella coparceners consent + No Objection venum. Consent illaamal vitraal court-la challenge seyyalam.

instruction: 'Chit fund - மாதம் 5000 கட்டினால் 10 மாதத்தில் 1 lakh கிடைக்கும்' என்று புதிய company தொடங்கியிருக்கிறது.
output: Chit funds state government-ல் register ஆக வேண்டும். Registration இல்லாத chit funds-ல் சேராதீர்கள். Sahara, Rose Valley போன்ற scams-ஐ நினைவில் கொள்ளுங்கள்.

instruction: Exam-la wrong answer ezhudhitten, cut pannalaamaa?
output: Yes, cutting allowed. Method: Single line through wrong text, write correct above/below. Don't: Overwrite, scribble, use whitener (some exams prohibit). For MCQ/OMR: Circle filling rules strict - follow instructions exactly. If OMR mistake: Some allow correction with specific method. Essay type: Neat cutting = no penalty. Messy = bad impression. Time management: Better to continue, cut later if time permits. Rough work: Designated area only.

instruction: FIR எப்படி பதிவு செய்வது?
output: Visit nearest police station with written complaint. Zero FIR: Can file at ANY station. Online for some crimes: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in. Get FIR copy FREE (your right!). If police refuse: Complain to SP/District Collector. For cyber crimes: cybercrime.gov.in or call 1930.

instruction: இன்ஸ்டாகிராமில் 'iPhone இலவசமாக கிடைக்கும்! 10 நண்பர்களுக்கு பகிருங்கள், இணைப்பில் பதிவு செய்யுங்கள்' என்று பார்த்தேன். உண்மையா?
output: இது மோசடி. இலவச iPhone கொடுப்பது யாருக்கும் லாபம் இல்லை. இந்த இணைப்புகள் உங்கள் தனிப்பட்ட தகவல்களை சேகரிக்க உருவாக்கப்பட்டவை. பகிராதீர்கள், பதிவு செய்யாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Student bank account open பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Student account: 1) Zero balance accounts - SBI, Indian Bank offer 2) Documents: Aadhaar, college ID, photo, address proof 3) Benefits: ATM card, mobile banking, UPI 4) Scholarship DBT requires bank account 5) Education loan same bank = easier 6) Joint account option with parent 7) Fixed deposit for savings. Important: Keep minimum balance if required, avoid bounce charges. Link Aadhaar for DBT.

instruction: Avvaiyar Athiyamaanukku ezhuthiya paadalgal enna?
output: Sangam kaala Avvaiyar Athiyamaan Nedunchezhiyan endra mannaroda nerungiYa nanbar. Puranaanooru-vil avarukkaaga pala paadalgal paadiyuLLaar. Famous: 'Nellukku iraiththaa neer vaikkal vazhi odi pullukkkum aange posiyumaam' - nellukku thanni paaychum bodhu pullukkkum pogum, nallavargalukku udhavinaal avargal saarndhavargalukkum nanmai aagum. Athiyamaan nellikani kodutha kadhaiyum famous - neenda aayulukkaana pazham.

instruction: WhatsApp message vandhuchu 'Your GitHub account reported for copyright violation. Verify identity within 24 hours or account suspended. Click link.' GitHub account work ku important, verify pannalama?
output: GitHub sends violations to registered email, not WhatsApp! Check github.com directly for any notifications. This phishing attempt wants your GitHub credentials - once stolen, attackers can access all your repositories and inject malicious code.

instruction: Consumer complaint எங்கே கொடுக்கலாம்?
output: Claim amount based: 1) Rs.1 crore வரை - District Consumer Forum, 2) Rs.1-10 crore - State Commission, 3) Rs.10 crore மேல் - National Commission. Online: consumerhelpline.gov.in அல்லது NCH app மூலம். Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Lok Adalat-ல் என்ன cases settle ஆகும்?
output: Cases: Motor accident claims, labour disputes, matrimonial (except divorce), electricity bills, telephone bills, cheque bounce, bank loan recovery, compoundable criminal offences. Benefits: No court fee, no appeal, quick settlement. Permanent Lok Adalat: Public utility services.

instruction: Hospital bill அதிகமா போட்டாங்க, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Itemized bill கேளுங்க, 2) Each item verify - MRP check for medicines, tests actually done verify, 3) Duplicate charges check, 4) Compare with displayed rates, 5) Written complaint to hospital administrator, 6) No response: Consumer Forum. Evidence: Bill copy, displayed rates photo, admission estimate. Overcharging = Unfair trade practice.

instruction: 'பிறன்பழி கூறுவான் தன்பழி' - இது என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'பிறன்பழி கூறுவான் தன்பழி யுள்ளும் திறன்தெரிந்து கூறப் படும்'. அர்த்தம்: பிறரைப் பழிப்பவன், தன் குறைகளை மறைக்க முடியாது. அவன் குறைகளும் ஆராயப்பட்டு வெளியே வரும். Others-ஐ criticize பண்றவன் own flaws expose ஆகும். Gossip பண்றாதீர்கள் - உங்கள் secrets-ம் வெளியே வரும்!

instruction: Kitchen herbs-ன் medicinal uses என்ன?
output: Common kitchen medicines: 1) Turmeric - Antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, immunity, 2) Ginger - Digestion, nausea, cold, 3) Pepper - Cold, metabolism, 4) Cumin - Digestion, iron source, 5) Coriander - Cooling, digestion, 6) Curry leaves - Diabetes, hair health, 7) Fenugreek - Blood sugar, lactation, 8) Garlic - Heart, infection, 9) Tulsi - Immunity, respiratory, 10) Neem - Skin, blood purifier. Daily use: Prevention better than cure!

instruction: Coaching இல்லாமல் JEE crack பண்ண முடியுமா?
output: Possible but challenging. Self-study success factors: 1) Strong self-discipline 2) Proper study plan 3) Quality resources - YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy free), NPTEL 4) Regular mock tests 5) Doubt clearing - online forums, Telegram groups. Advantages: Own pace, cost saving. Challenges: Motivation, structured approach, peer competition. Hybrid approach: Free online + self-study works well. Many toppers are self-study students.

instruction: Mental illness reason-ஆ job reject பண்ணினாங்க - action?
output: Illegal discrimination! RPD Act + MHCA protection. Action: 1) Written reason கேளுங்க, 2) State Commissioner for Disabilities complaint, 3) Labour court if existing job, 4) Court (writ petition). Exceptions: Very limited safety-critical jobs with specific requirements. Proof: Email/written rejection citing mental health. Remedy: Reinstatement, compensation, policy change order.

instruction: Tamil Nadu govt vellinaadu padippuku scholarship tharugiradha?
output: Aam, BC/MBC/SC/ST students-ku: 1) BC/MBC Welfare Department - up to ₹20 lakh 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare - SC students-ku full scholarship 3) CM's Special Scholarship. Central schemes: 1) National Overseas Scholarship (SC/ST) 2) MOMA Scholarship (Minorities). Apply through respective department websites. Merit-based selection.

instruction: Hall ticket missing, exam-க்கு போக முடியுமா?
output: Emergency solutions: 1) Download duplicate from exam portal (DigiLocker link) 2) Contact exam centre - they have candidate list 3) Carry Aadhaar + Photo ID as backup 4) School/College principal letter 5) Reach early, explain to centre supervisor. For board exams: School coordinator can help. For competitive exams: Most allow with ID proof + declaration. Prevention: Download multiple copies, keep in phone, email to self. Last resort: Exam board helpline.

instruction: Tamil medium-ல் படிச்சா future-ல் problem வருமா? English medium better-ஆ?
output: Reality check: Tamil medium = Mother tongue strong, concepts clear. English medium = Language advantage. Both work! Important: 1) Foundation subjects (Maths, Science) any medium OK 2) English can be learned later 3) Many Tamil medium toppers in competitive exams 4) Government jobs no medium preference. Advice: Choose based on child comfort. Tamil medium + English tuition = balanced approach. Focus on learning, not medium.

instruction: Adakkamai-yoda vilaivuu enna?
output: Kural: 'Uyarvu udaiyavar yaaro udalodu neerthu viyaththalaagaa melavarku'. Uyarndhavargal yaar endraal, thangalai uyarththik kolladhavargal. Melum: 'Niraiyudaimai neengaamai vendin poraiyudaimai potri ozhugap padum'. Ego-a vittaal madhippu kidaikkum. Pride goes before a fall!

instruction: புலன் அடக்கம் (self-control) பற்றி என்ன குறள்கள் உள்ளன?
output: குறள்: 'ஐந்தவித்தான் ஆற்றல் அகல்விசும்பு ளார்கோமான் இந்திரனே சாலும் கரி'. ஐம்புலன்களை அடக்கியவன் இந்திரனுக்கு சமம். மேலும்: 'செறிவறிந்து சீர்மை பயக்கும் அறிவறிந்து ஆற்றின் அடங்கப் பெறின்'. Self-control உள்ளவனுக்கே சிறப்பு கிடைக்கும். Master your senses = master your life!

instruction: CBI officer-nu video call vandhudhu, unga name drug case-la irukku, panam kattuna case close pannuvaanga-nu solraanga
output: Digital arrest scam ithu madam! CBI video call-la case handle pannudhu illa. Uniform fake, ID fake. Call cut pannunga, 1930-la urgent-a report pannunga.

instruction: Overtime pay evvalavu kodukkanum?
output: Factories Act: Normal working hours = 8 hours/day, 48 hours/week. Overtime = Double wages (2x normal rate). Maximum overtime: 50 hours/quarter. Overtime refuse pannalam (reasonable grounds). Forced overtime illegal.

instruction: அஷ்ட சித்தி (எட்டு சித்திகள்) என்றால் என்ன?
output: எட்டு அமானுஷ்ய சக்திகள்: 1) அணிமா - அணு அளவு சிறியதாகுதல், 2) மகிமா - மிகப்பெரியதாகுதல், 3) லகிமா - மிக இலேசாகுதல், காற்றில் பறத்தல், 4) கரிமா - மிக கனமாகுதல், 5) பிராப்தி - எதையும் அடைதல், 6) பிராகாம்யம் - எல்லா ஆசைகளையும் நிறைவேற்றுதல், 7) ஈசத்துவம் - எல்லாவற்றையும் கட்டுப்படுத்துதல், 8) வசித்துவம் - எல்லாவற்றையும் வசப்படுத்துதல்.

instruction: 50,000 poachu. Full process follow pannanum. Complete checklist kudungal.
output: Day 1 (Critical): Bank fraud helpline ✓, Account freeze/dispute ✓, 1930 call ✓, cybercrime.gov.in ✓, Evidence backed up ✓, Scammer blocked ✓. Day 2-3: Bank branch written complaint ✓, Police FIR ✓, UPI app complaint ✓, Screenshots emailed to self ✓. Day 7: Bank acknowledgment ✓, FIR copy ✓, Cyber cell follow-up ✓. Day 30: Status check ✓, Escalation if needed ✓, Banking Ombudsman if unhelpful ✓. Day 60: Ombudsman complaint ✓, Consumer Forum prep ✓. Recovery chance: 30-40% with fast reporting. Timeline: 2-6 months.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'Legal aid society registration mandatory for all advocates. Pay 3000 registration fee.' Idhu genuine requirement aa?
output: Legal aid registration through District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), free of cost. Advocate registration only needed once with Bar Council. Legal Services Authority never charges fees from advocates. Visit your district court's legal services authority for genuine enrollment.

instruction: ஆதாரில் முகவரி மாற்றம் எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in → Login with OTP → Update Address → Upload new address proof → Pay ₹50. Address proof can be EB bill, bank statement, rent agreement. If no document, use Address Validation Letter (AVL) method where verifier at new address confirms.

instruction: Orphan/single parent children-ku padippu udhavi enna?
output: Benefits: 1) Social Welfare Department scholarship 2) Free education in government schools 3) Hostel facility free 4) PM CARES for Children scheme (COVID orphans) - ₹10 lakh insurance + monthly stipend + free education till graduation 5) NGO scholarships. Required: Death certificate of parent(s), income certificate. District Social Welfare Officer-a anugugal.

instruction: Hospital-la complaint eppadi poduvadhu?
output: Internal: 1) Grievance cell (every hospital must have), 2) Hospital administrator, 3) Medical superintendent. External: 1) District Health Department (DHS), 2) State Medical Council (for doctors), 3) Clinical Establishment Authority, 4) Consumer Forum (for deficiency in service). Written complaint: Keep copy with acknowledgment. Timeline: Response within 15-30 days typically.

instruction: Medical negligence prove panna enna evidence venum?
output: Essential evidence: 1) Complete medical records (admission to discharge), 2) Prescription copies, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills (shows what was done), 5) Consent forms, 6) Photos if applicable, 7) Witness statements (family who were present), 8) Expert medical opinion. Preserve: Original documents, don't alter. Timeline: Note dates, times of events. Digital: Screenshots of online communications.

instruction: Pudhiya ration card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. tnpds.gov.in website-la apply pannunga 2. Or nearby ration shop-la form vaangunga 3. Documents: Family members Aadhaar, Income certificate, Address proof, Photos 4. Types: PHH (₹1 rice), AAY (free rice), NPHH

instruction: Will contest பண்ணலாமா?
output: ஆம். Grounds: Undue influence, fraud, forgery, unsound mind, improper execution. Contest: Probate Court. Time: Before probate granted-க்கு எதிர்ப்பு, after = revocation suit. Evidence: Medical records, witnesses, handwriting expert. Burden of proof: Contestant.

instruction: Copyright registration எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: copyright.gov.in. Categories: Literary, artistic, musical, cinematograph, sound recording. Fee: Rs.500-5,000 (work type based). Process: Application → Diary number → Objection period (30 days) → Registration. Note: Copyright automatic - registration = evidence.

instruction: 'செல்வர்க்கு அழகு செழுந்தோட்டி' - செல்வந்தர்க்கு அழகு என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'செல்வர்க்கு அழகு செழுந்தோட்டி யாவர்க்கும் இல்லார்க்கு அழகு இல்லார் ஒப்புரவு'. (Alternative version) அர்த்தம்: பணக்காரர்களுக்கு அழகு என்னவென்றால் பிறருக்கு உதவுவது. ஏழைகளுக்கு அழகு என்னவென்றால் கேட்காமல் இருப்பது. True wealth = giving, True dignity = self-respect even in poverty.

instruction: TN Government websites enna enna?
output: Important TN Government Portals: tn.gov.in (TN Govt main), tnpds.gov.in (Ration/PDS), cmchistn.com (Health Insurance), tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in (Employment), bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC Welfare), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST Welfare), tnhb.tn.gov.in (Housing Board), tangedco.gov.in (Electricity), tnreginet.gov.in (Registration), serviceonline.gov.in (e-Sevai). Mobile: UZHAVAN (Farmers), TNeGA (e-Governance).

instruction: Calculator/Mathematical tables exam-ல் allowed-ஆ?
output: Depends on exam: Board exams (10th, 12th): Not allowed. NEET: Not allowed. JEE: Virtual calculator on screen only. Engineering semester: Usually allowed (non-programmable). CA/CMA: Specific models allowed. GATE: Virtual calculator. SSC/Banking: Not allowed. Mathematical tables: Some exams provide, some allow bringing. Always check: Admit card instructions. Penalty for unauthorized items: Disqualification possible.

instruction: Degree mudinjachu. Job search panradhaa, PG padikkiradhaa? Confused-aa irukken.
output: Decision framework: Job now if: 1) Financial need urgent 2) Work experience wanted 3) Industry-specific UG sufficient. PG if: 1) Academic/Research interest 2) Specific career needs PG (MBA for management) 3) Higher salary jump. Middle path: Job + Distance PG (IGNOU, University) OR Work 2-3 years → PG. Reality: Both paths successful. No 'wrong' choice. Career isn't linear. Many do job → PG → better job. Decide based on YOUR goals, not others' opinions.

instruction: Headache-க்கு natural remedy?
output: Remedies: 1) Ginger tea, 2) Clove paste on temples, 3) Peppermint oil on forehead, 4) Cold/warm compress (depends on type), 5) Rest in dark room, 6) Hydration (dehydration causes headache), 7) Inhale ajwain steam. Pressure points: Press between thumb and index finger. Lifestyle: Regular sleep, avoid screen strain, stress management. Migraine: See doctor - may need proper treatment.

instruction: Kadan kodutten, thirumba thara maattengaraanga - legal option?
output: Amount based: <Rs.20,000 - Small Causes Court. >Rs.20,000 - Civil Court (money suit). Documents: Promissory note, acknowledgment, bank transfer proof, witnesses. Cheque bounce: NI Act 138 (criminal). Interest: 18% per annum claim possible. Limitation: 3 years.

instruction: Trademark register panradhu eppadi?
output: Online: ipindia.gov.in. Classes: 45 different classes (goods/services). Search first: TM search portal. Fee: Rs.4,500-9,000. Process: Application → Examination → Publication → Opposition period (4 months) → Registration. Protection: 10 years, renewable.

instruction: என் ரேஷன் கார்டு வேறொருவர் பெயரில் உள்ளது. தலைவர் பெயர் மாற்ற என்ன செய்வது?
output: குடும்ப தலைவர் இறந்திருந்தால் death certificate, அல்லது விவாகரத்து ஆகியிருந்தால் divorce decree கொடுத்து Form 5 நிரப்பவும். புதிய தலைவர் Aadhaar தேவை.

instruction: Streedhan (woman's property) - husband eduthukalaamaa?
output: Streedhan = Woman's exclusive property (gifts at marriage, inheritance, earnings). Husband cannot: 1) Take without consent, 2) Sell or mortgage, 3) Claim ownership. Misuse: Criminal breach of trust (IPC 406) + Dowry Act violation if demand. Recovery: Civil suit + criminal complaint. Keep receipts, photos of jewelry. Joint locker: Inventory maintain pannunga.

instruction: Driving license renew eppadi pannuradhu?
output: Expiry-ku 1 year munnadi apply pannalam. Expiry aana pinna 5 years varaikkum renew pannalam. Online: parivahan.gov.in. Documents: Old DL, Aadhaar, Medical certificate (40+ age). Fee: ₹200 + smart card fee.

instruction: Education Loan எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: Apply through vidyalakshmi.co.in (40+ banks, single application) or directly at bank. Up to ₹7.5 lakh: collateral-free. Interest: 8-10%. EWS students get interest subsidy during study. Documents: Admission letter, fee structure, co-borrower details, ID proofs.

instruction: Aadhaar PVC card எப்படி order செய்வது?
output: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in அல்லது resident.uidai.gov.in-ல் order செய்யலாம். Rs.50 charge. Registered mobile-க்கு OTP வரும். 15-20 நாட்களில் post-ல் வரும்.

instruction: NEEDS (New Entrepreneur-cum-Enterprise Development Scheme) என்றால் என்ன?
output: இளைஞர்களுக்கு சுய தொழில் loan. Amount: ₹5 லட்சம் வரை (Project cost-ல் 25% subsidy). தகுதி: 21-35 வயது (SC/ST/Women 45 வரை), 8th pass, TN resident. Sectors: Manufacturing, Service, Trading. Subsidy: General 25%, SC/ST/Women 30%. Training: Free EDP training mandatory. Apply: DIC (District Industries Centre). Documents: Project report, Education proof, Community certificate, Bank no-objection. Repayment: 3-7 years.

instruction: Naturopathy centres TN-ல் எங்கே இருக்கு?
output: Government: 1) Government Yoga and Naturopathy Medical College, Chennai, 2) District AYUSH hospitals (Naturo units). Private: 1) Jindal Naturecure Institute, Bangalore (near TN), 2) Nature Cure Hospital, Chennai, 3) Various wellness resorts. Services: Hydrotherapy, mud therapy, massage, diet therapy, yoga. Duration: 7-21 days programs. Cost: Government free/nominal, Private Rs.2,000-8,000/day. Good for: Diabetes, BP, obesity, stress, detox.

instruction: 'Aakkam izhandhaemenru' - tholvi patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Aakkam izhandhaemenru allaaVaar ookkam oruvandam kaiththudai yaar'. Artham: Selvam izhandhaalum 'izhandhuVittom' endru azhuvaar alla, ookkam ullavargal. Setbacks-kku cry panravargal weak. Strong people bounce back. Resilience is wealth!

instruction: Marriage registration கட்டாயமா? எங்கே பண்றது?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல் Compulsory Registration of Marriages Act 2009-ன் கீழ் கட்டாயம். Register: 1) Hindu Marriage Act - Registrar of Marriages (Sub-Registrar office), 2) Special Marriage Act - Marriage Registrar. Online apply: serviceonline.gov.in. Documents: Age proof, address proof, photos, invitation card, witnesses.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Business loan pre-approved. 10 lakh at 8% interest. Processing fee 25,000.' Business ku loan venum, apply pannalama?
output: Banks don't pre-approve loans via WhatsApp. Processing fees deducted from loan, not paid upfront. 8% interest too low to be true for business loans. Apply through official bank branches or verified digital lenders only. This is advance fee fraud.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Fire safety certificate renewal. 5000 online payment or inspection failed.' Fire safety matter serious, pay pannidlama?
output: Fire safety NOC through Tamil Nadu Fire and Rescue Services department. Inspection and certification has proper procedure and official fees. Never pay through SMS for 'instant clearance'. Apply through official channels or district fire office.

instruction: Primary Health Centre (PHC) என்றால் என்ன? என்ன services கிடைக்கும்?
output: PHC = Village/block level government health facility. Free services: 1) Basic consultation, 2) Common illness treatment, 3) Maternal care, 4) Child immunization, 5) Family planning, 6) Minor wound dressing, 7) Basic lab tests, 8) Medicine dispensing, 9) Health education. Timings: Usually 9 AM - 4 PM. Staff: Doctor, nurse, pharmacist, lab technician. Referral: To CHC/District Hospital if needed.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'Ministry of Health survey about clinic facilities. Need your registration number, PAN, bank account for incentive payment.' Government survey aa?
output: Government surveys done through official department visits, not random calls asking bank details. Health Ministry uses NIC portals, not phone calls for data collection. Survey incentives never need bank account upfront. Verify from district health office.

instruction: Siddha doctor qualification enna? Verify eppadi?
output: Qualification: BSMS (Bachelor of Siddha Medicine and Surgery) - 5.5 years. Higher: MD (Siddha). Registration: State Medical Council mandatory. Verify: 1) TN Siddha Medical Council register, 2) Display of registration certificate, 3) BSMS degree certificate. Unqualified practice: Report to council, police. Titles: Siddha Maruthuvam, Vaidhiyar - verify registration before consulting.

instruction: Instagram ad - 'Made 10 lakhs in 3 months with crypto trading bot, DM for access.' Friend um try pannaan, initial la profit vandhudhu nu sonnaan.
output: Initial profits = their own money returning, creates trust. 'Trading bot' access ku investment keppanga. Friend um eventually lose pannuvaan - Ponzi structure. Crypto invest pannanum na - Binance, WazirX legitimate exchanges use pannunga, 'bots' and 'signals' avoid.

instruction: IGNOAPS (Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme) endraal enna?
output: Monthly pension for BPL senior citizens. Central: ₹200/month (60-79 years), ₹500/month (80+ years). TN State: Additional ₹1,000/month. Total in TN: ₹1,200-1,500/month. Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL family. Apply: Village Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Aadhaar, BPL card/Income certificate, Bank account. Payment: DBT through bank account.

instruction: Menstrual hygiene products free-யா கிடைக்குமா?
output: Government schemes: 1) TN: Subsidized sanitary napkins at fair price shops, 2) School girls: Free sanitary napkins through schools, 3) Anganwadi: Distribution to adolescent girls. Jan Aushadhi: Cheap sanitary napkins (Rs.1/pad). NGOs: Many distribute free. Machines: Napkin vending machines in some government offices, colleges. Menstrual leave: Some TN government offices have period leave policy.

instruction: மதுரையில MBBS படிக்க government college-ல seat கிடைக்குமா?
output: மதுரை Medical College-ல் 7.5% government school quota, OBC/BC/MBC reservation இருக்கு. NEET-ல் 550+ வாங்கினால் government seat கிடைக்க chance இருக்கு. Theni Medical College-லும் apply பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Kovil darshan timings eppadi therindhukolvathu?
output: Darshan timings theriya: 1) Official temple websites - major temples maintain, 2) Dinamalar/Dinakaran temple section, 3) Temple phone numbers - call and ask, 4) Google Maps reviews - visitors update timings, 5) TN Tourism website. General pattern: Morning 6-12, Evening 4-8. Noon break (Uchchi Saandhi) 12-4pm closed. Special darshan (VIP) tickets available in big temples - book online. Festivals-la extended hours. Arrive early for popular temples!

instruction: 12th mudinjachu, veetla college vendaam, kalyanam pannikonu solraanga. Naan padikkanum.
output: Your education is your RIGHT! Support available: 1) Moovalur Ramamirtham - financial support for girl education 2) Free government college education 3) Women helpline: 181 4) District Women Protection Officer 5) NGOs: Pratham, CRY support. Convince family: Show scholarship opportunities, free education costs, earning potential after degree. Legal: Child Marriage Prevention Act (below 18 illegal). Study brings independence and better life. Don't give up your dreams!

instruction: 'Nunukkamindri thaanum' - micro-management patri enna solkiRaar?
output: Kural: 'Poiyaamai poiyaamai aatrin arampira seiyaamai seiyaamai nandru'. Artham: Poi sollaamal iruppadhae dharmam. Matra arangalai seiyaaVittaalum paravaayillai. Truth is the foundation of all virtues. One who never lies needs no other dharma!

instruction: Health problem vandhuVittathu - mentally strong-aa irukka enna kural?
output: 'Marundhena vendaavaam yaakkaiku arundhiyadhu atrradhu potri unin'. Sariyaana unavae marundhu. Melum: 'Udambhar azhiyin uyiraar azhivar' - udalai paenungal. Physical health-kku treatment edungal, mental health-kku positive thoughts maintain pannungal. Body is a temple - take care of it!

instruction: Common Ayurvedic medicines - uses என்ன?
output: Popular medicines: 1) Triphala - Digestion, detox, constipation, 2) Ashwagandha - Stress, energy, immunity, 3) Brahmi - Memory, concentration, 4) Chyawanprash - General tonic, immunity, 5) Guggulu - Cholesterol, joints, weight, 6) Dashamoola - Pain, inflammation, 7) Kumkumadi Thailam - Skin glow. Available: Pharmacies, AYUSH stores. Self-use: Some general tonics okay. Specific treatment: Need doctor consultation.

instruction: Sex determination test legal-aa? Punishment enna?
output: ILLEGAL! PCPNDT Act 1994. Prohibited: 1) Sex determination of fetus, 2) Disclosure of sex, 3) Advertisement for sex selection. Punishment: 3-5 years jail + Rs.10,000-1 lakh fine. Who's punished: Doctor, lab, pregnant woman (if complicit), person who seeks test. Ultrasound: Must NOT reveal sex - if revealed, report to authorities. Female feticide: Serious crime - declining sex ratio issue.

instruction: Stamp duty evvalavu kattanum?
output: Tamil Nadu-la: Stamp duty 7%, Registration fee 4% = Total 11% of property value (guideline value or sale value - edhu adhigamo adhu). Women single owner-kku stamp duty 1% concession. Agricultural land-kku lower rates.

instruction: குறைபாடுள்ள குழந்தைகளுக்கான சிறப்புப் பள்ளிகள் தமிழ்நாட்டில் எங்கு உள்ளன?
output: ஒவ்வொரு மாவட்டத்திலும் அரசு சிறப்புப் பள்ளிகள் உள்ளன. NIEPMD (ஆடையாறு), செவித்திறன் குறைபாடுள்ளோருக்கான பள்ளிகள், பார்வையற்றோர் பள்ளிகள், மனவளர்ச்சி குறைபாடுள்ளோருக்கான பள்ளிகள் இயங்குகின்றன. அனைத்தும் இலவசம்.

instruction: PhonePe/GPay/Paytm la fraud report eppidi pannuradhu?
output: PhonePe: App → Help → Report an Issue, or call 080-68727374, email support@phonepe.com. Google Pay: App → Help → 'Money sent to wrong person/scam', or call 1800-419-0157. Paytm: App → 24×7 Help → Fraud/Scam report, call 0120-4456456, email care@paytm.com. Amazon Pay: App → Help → 'Report unauthorized transaction', call 1800-3000-9009. BHIM: App → Profile → Help → Report Issue. For all UPI disputes: NPCI at npci.org.in for resolution if app doesn't help.

instruction: Rich ஆக ஆசை - ஆனால் shortcut வேண்டாம். என்ன வழி?
output: 'அருளொடும் அன்பொடும் வாராப் பொருளாக்கம் புல்லார் புரள விடல்'. அருள், அன்பு இல்லாமல் சம்பாதிக்கும் பணத்தை விட்டுவிடுங்கள். மேலும்: 'தீயவை செய்தார் கெடுதல்' - wrong ways-ல் earn பண்ணினால் கெட்டுப்போவீர்கள். Hard work + smart work + integrity = sustainable wealth. Shortcuts lead to downfall!

instruction: Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana (RVY) endraal enna?
output: Free assistive devices for BPL senior citizens. Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL, age-related disability. Free Items: Walking stick, Elbow crutch, Walker, Tripod, Wheelchair, Hearing aid, Spectacles, Artificial dentures. Apply: ALIMCO assessment camps (announced in District). Documents: Age proof, BPL card, Aadhaar.

instruction: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam' - indha kuraloda artham enna?
output: Kural: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam aadhi bhagavan mudhatre ulagu'. Artham: Ezhuththukkal ellam 'A' endra ezhuththil thodanguvadhu pola, ulagam muzhuvathum iraivanaaal thodangiyathu. Idhu Thirukkuraloda mudhal kural. Kadavul Vaazhtthu adhigaarathil ulladhu.

instruction: Internship எப்படி கிடைக்கும்? Apply எங்கே?
output: Internship sources: 1) College placement cell - company tie-ups 2) Internshala.com - largest platform 3) LinkedIn - direct apply 4) Company websites - careers page 5) Professor reference - industry contacts 6) Alumni network 7) Government internships - NITI Aayog, ministries. Tips: Apply early (6 months before), customize resume for each application. Unpaid internship: Experience valuable, accept if good company. Stipend: Negotiate politely.

instruction: கல்கி, சாண்டில்யன் போன்ற நாவலாசிரியர்கள் பற்றி சொல்லுங்கள்?
output: கல்கி கிருஷ்ணமூர்த்தி (1899-1954) - 'பொன்னியின் செல்வன்', 'சிவகாமியின் சபதம்', 'பார்த்திபன் கனவு' எழுதியவர். சோழர் வரலாறு novel-களாக. சாண்டில்யன் - 'கடல் புறா', 'யவன ராணி' எழுதியவர். வரலாற்று நாவல்கள் popular. Kalki magazine இன்றும் run ஆகிறது. Ponniyin Selvan - 2022 Mani Ratnam film, 2-part blockbuster! Tamil historical fiction pioneers.

instruction: Guideline value endraal enna? Enge check panrathu?
output: Government nirnnayitha minimum property value - idhukku keezhe register panna mudiyaadhu. Check: tnreginet.gov.in → Guideline Value Search → Zone/Village select. Actual sale higher-aa irundhaal actual value-kku stamp duty.

instruction: 'Government job - பத்தாம் வகுப்பு போதும், மாதம் 45,000 சம்பளம், exam fee 2000' என்று ad பார்த்தேன்.
output: Government jobs-க்கு official websites-ல் மட்டுமே விண்ணப்பிக்க வேண்டும். Private websites மூலம் apply செய்து fee கட்டாதீர்கள். Scam ஆக இருக்கலாம்.

instruction: Thirukkural mental health-kku eppadi udhavum?
output: 1) Thunbam theerthal adhigaaram - depression-kku udhavum, 2) Ookkamudaimai - motivation loss-kku, 3) Adakkamudaimai - anger management-kku, 4) Poraiyudaimai - patience katrukolla, 5) Innaa seiyaamai - negative thoughts kuraikkA. 'Thunbam varum bodhu adhai eppadi face panradhu' endru Valluvar niraiya solliyirukkaar. Therapists kooda Thirukkural quotes payanpaduththuraanga.

instruction: Architecture படிப்பு (B.Arch) எப்படி சேருவது?
output: NATA (National Aptitude Test in Architecture) தேர்வு கட்டாயம். தகுதி: +2 Maths 50%. படிப்பு காலம்: 5 ஆண்டுகள். சென்னை Anna University, SAP, SRM நல்ல கல்லூரிகள். அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ₹30,000-50,000/ஆண்டு. JEE Paper 2 மூலமும் admission கிடைக்கும். Creative field with good scope.

instruction: ஐம்பெருங்காப்பியங்கள் என்றால் என்ன?
output: தமிழின் ஐந்து பெரிய காப்பியங்கள்: 1) சிலப்பதிகாரம் - இளங்கோவடிகள், கண்ணகி கதை, 2) மணிமேகலை - சீத்தலைச்சாத்தனார், கண்ணகி மகள் கதை, 3) சீவக சிந்தாமணி - திருத்தக்கதேவர், ஜைன காப்பியம், 4) வளையாபதி - ஜைன காப்பியம் (பகுதி மட்டும் கிடைத்தது), 5) குண்டலகேசி - புத்த காப்பியம் (முழுமையாக கிடைக்கவில்லை). சிலம்பும் மணிமேகலையும் இரட்டைக் காப்பியங்கள் என்று அழைக்கப்படும்.

instruction: 'Christmas charity - donate for orphans, get tax exemption certificate' - email வந்துச்சு. Donate பண்ணலாமா?
output: Verify பண்ணுங்க! Christmas-ல fake charity scams அதிகம். Unknown organization-க்கு direct donate பண்ணாதீங்க. Registered NGO website-ல donate பண்ணுங்க. 80G certificate issuing authority check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Idaikaadar Siddhar patri enna theriyum?
output: Idaikaadar aadu meykkum idaiyar samoogathai serndavar endru nambappadugiradhu - adhanaal indha peyar. Jaadhi bedhamindri evarum siddharagalam enbadharkku example. 'Idaikaadar Gnaanam', 'Idaikaadar Vaiththiyam' pondra noolgal avar peyaril ullana. Eliya mozhiyil aanmeegaththai explain panniyavar.

instruction: Bro, LinkedIn la Google HR message pannaan, interview fee 5K nu. Legit aa da?
output: Fake da! Google interview fee kekaadhu - they'll pay you for onsite travel. LinkedIn la fake recruiters romba irukkaanga. Official careers.google.com la apply pannu.

instruction: Yaaro irandhu vittargal - grief handle panna udhavum kural?
output: 'Nillaadhavatrai nilaiyina endrunarum pullari vaanmai kadai'. Nilaiyattravai (udal, uyir) nilaiyaanavai endru ninaippadu ariyaamai. Life is temporary - grieve, but understand impermanence. Melum: 'Pirappennm pedaimai neengach sirappendum semporul kaanba thaRivu'. Birth and death are natural - soul continues. Remember them with love.

instruction: Naan 65 vayasu mudhiyavar. Thaniyaa irukkiren. Ennenna benefits, safety measures peralaam?
output:
Monthly Income:
1. Old Age Pension - ₹1,000-1,500/month (TN)
2. PMVVY (LIC) - ₹9,250/month for ₹15L investment
3. SCSS - 8.2% quarterly interest

Healthcare:
4. CMCHIS - ₹5 lakh free treatment
5. Free aids - Walking stick, wheelchair, hearing aid
6. Janaushadhi - Cheap medicines

Safety:
7. Elder Line - 14567 (24x7)
8. Maintenance Tribunal - If children neglect - up to ₹10,000/month
9. Police Senior Cell - Register for regular checks

Travel: Railway 40-50% discount, Free/discounted bus
Banking: Senior Citizen FD - Extra 0.5% interest

instruction: Merchant Navy join aaga enna padikkanum?
output: Courses: 1) B.Sc Nautical Science (3 years) - Deck Officer 2) Marine Engineering (4 years) - Engine room 3) GP Rating (6 months) - Entry level. Eligibility: 12th PCM 60%+, Medical fitness strict. Institutes: IMU Chennai, AMET Chennai, MERI. Admission: IMU CET entrance exam. Career: High salary (₹50,000 - ₹5 lakh/month with experience), World travel. Challenges: Months away from family.

instruction: Unmai (truth) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Vaaimai enappaduvadhu yaadhenin yaadhodrum theemai ilaadha solal'. Unmai enbadhu yaarukkum theengu seiyaadha vaarthaigalae. Melum: 'Thannennju arivadhu poiyarka poiththapin thanenjae thannai sudum'. Nenju arindhu poi sonnaal, andha nenjae unnai varuththum. Conscience never lies!

instruction: 'நுணுக்கமின்றித் தானும்' - micro-management பற்றி என்ன சொல்கிறார்?
output: குறள்: 'பொய்யாமை பொய்யாமை ஆற்றின் அறம்பிற செய்யாமை செய்யாமை நன்று'. அர்த்தம்: பொய் சொல்லாமல் இருப்பதே தர்மம். மற்ற அறங்களை செய்யாவிட்டாலும் பரவாயில்லை. Truth is the foundation of all virtues. One who never lies needs no other dharma!

instruction: 12th exam-ல் centum வாங்க முடியுமா? எப்படி?
output: Centum possible subjects: Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Accountancy. Tips: 1) NCERT concepts தெளிவாக புரிந்துகொள்ளுங்கள் 2) Formula sheet தயாரியுங்கள் 3) Numerical problems: 50+ types practice 4) Diagram neat-ஆக draw பண்ணுங்கள் 5) Answer writing: Steps முழுமையாக 6) Time management: 3 hours mock tests. Centum scorers: 6 AM study, revision before sleep, doubt clearing same day.

instruction: Caste, religion paarthu treatment refuse pannalaamaa?
output: Absolutely ILLEGAL! Non-discrimination is fundamental right. Prohibited: 1) Caste-based denial, 2) Religion-based denial, 3) Gender discrimination, 4) Economic status discrimination, 5) Disease-based discrimination (HIV, leprosy). Action: 1) Police complaint (SC/ST Act if applicable), 2) Human Rights Commission, 3) State Medical Council, 4) Consumer Forum. Hospital license: Can be cancelled.

instruction: TNPDS Online Services - Ration card apply, name add/remove, address change?
output:
All services at: tnpds.gov.in

New Ration Card:
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'New Card Application'
2. Enter family details
3. Upload: All Aadhaar, Address proof, Income certificate, Gas details, Photos
4. Submit → RI inspection → Card issue (30-45 days)

Add Name (Birth/Marriage):
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'Add Member'
2. Select card number
3. Enter new member details
4. Upload: Birth/Marriage Certificate + Aadhaar
5. Submit → Verification → Approval (15-30 days)

Remove Name (Death/Transfer):
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'Delete Member'
2. Select card and member
3. Reason: Death/Transferred/Left
4. Upload: Death Certificate (if death)
5. Submit → Approval (15 days)

Address Change:
1. tnpds.gov.in → 'Address Modification'
2. Enter new address
3. Upload new address proof
4. Submit → Inspection → Shop change if different area (30-45 days)

Change Card Type (NPHH to PHH):
- Apply at Taluk Office with new Income Certificate

Track: tnpds.gov.in → 'Application Status'

instruction: Board exam-la fail aayitten. Life waste aayiduchu endru feel aagudhu. Enna seivathu?
output: First: You are NOT a failure! Exam failure ≠ Life failure. Many successful people failed exams: Abdul Kalam, Dhirubhai Ambani. Immediate steps: 1) Supplementary exam-ku prepare - 3 months time 2) Talk to parents/teacher openly 3) If severe stress - school counsellor or helpline iCALL: 9152987821. Future: Many paths to success - ITI, Diploma, NIOS, Skill training. One exam doesn't define you. Rise again stronger!

instruction: TN இலவச Laptop திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: Govt school மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச Laptop. தகுதி: +2 pass (Govt school), UG/Diploma சேர்ந்தவர்கள், Polytechnic students. Distribution: College-ல் கொடுப்பார்கள். Specs: Basic laptop with necessary software. Documents: +2 marksheet, College admission, Aadhaar. Usage: Education purpose, warranty உண்டு.

instruction: 'Virtual internship + Certificate from [Big Company Name], registration 1500' nu LinkedIn post.
output: Real companies internship fee kekaadhu - they pay stipend. 'Certificate from Big Company' - fake or unofficial. LinkedIn la fake internship posts common. Official company career pages la apply pannunga. Paid certificates value illa in job market.

instruction: Digital Marketing course padikkanum, free options irukka?
output: Free courses: 1) Google Digital Garage - Google certification 2) HubSpot Academy - Inbound marketing 3) Meta Blueprint - Facebook/Instagram ads 4) Semrush Academy - SEO 5) NPTEL digital marketing. Paid: TNSDC subsidized courses. Topics: SEO, SEM, Social media, Content marketing, Email marketing. Jobs: Digital marketing executive ₹15,000-25,000. Freelancing possible. Build own social media presence as portfolio.

instruction: Dubai job offer vannille - 'Salary 50,000, visa ready, 30,000 processing fee anuppulle' nu. Agent WhatsApp la photos anuppinaan. Genuine aano?
output: Scam alle idhu! Legitimate recruitment agencies upfront fee vaangillalle. 'Visa ready' nu photos fake alle. Gulf job scam la Kanyakumari youth romba maatikittanga - Colachel, Thuckalay la cases irukku. Only POE (Protector of Emigrants) registered agencies vazhiya apply pannu.

instruction: Hospital body தர மறுக்கிறது - death case
output: Bill non-payment-க்காக body தர மறுக்க முடியாது - Supreme Court ruling. Contact: Police, District Collector, Human Rights Commission. Hospital against action possible. MLC case-ல் police formalities உண்டு - legitimate delay. But payment reason illegal.

instruction: 108 Ambulance service எப்படி use பண்றது?
output: Dial 108 - Free emergency ambulance. Services: 1) BLS (Basic Life Support) ambulance, 2) ALS (Advanced Life Support) for critical cases, 3) Trained paramedics, 4) GPS tracking, 5) Hospital coordination. Response time: 15-20 minutes (urban), 20-30 minutes (rural). Free: No charges for transport. Alternative: 102 for pregnant women transport.

instruction: Government school student NEET crack பண்ண முடியுமா?
output: Absolutely yes! 7.5% reservation + determination = success. Resources: 1) Free coaching - Government NEET centres (apply through school) 2) Online free - NPTEL, SWAYAM, YouTube 3) NCERT books sufficient for Biology 4) Previous year papers - NTA website free. Success stories: Many govt school students top NEET. Challenges: English medium switch, lab exposure. Solutions: Tamil medium NEET option available, virtual labs online. Believe in yourself!

instruction: Girl students-க்கு special scholarship உண்டா?
output: CBSE Single Girl Child scholarship, Pragati scholarship (AICTE), Indira Gandhi scholarship for single girl child உண்டு. State-level-லும் girl students-க்கு special schemes இருக்கின்றன.

instruction: Pudhiya driving license eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. parivahan.gov.in la slot book pannunga 2. First Learner's License (LLR) vaangunga: Age: Two-wheeler 18+, Car 18+ (gear), Commercial 20+. Aadhaar, address proof, medical certificate vendum. Fee: ₹200-500 3. 30 days kazhichu DL test ezhudhunga

instruction: Abhyanga massage vs regular massage - difference?
output: Abhyanga = Ayurvedic whole body oil massage. Difference: 1) Medicated oils specific to condition/Prakriti, 2) Specific direction strokes (towards heart), 3) Marma points included, 4) Part of treatment protocol (not just relaxation), 5) Followed by steam bath typically. Benefits: Toxin removal, circulation, joint lubrication, skin health, relaxation. Self-Abhyanga: Daily oil massage at home recommended in Ayurveda. Professional: For treatment purposes.

instruction: Hospital infection (hospital-acquired infection) - claim?
output: HAI claim possible if: 1) Infection clearly hospital-acquired, 2) Poor hygiene/sterilization, 3) Contaminated equipment, 4) Staff didn't follow protocols. Common HAI: Surgical site infection, catheter infection, ventilator pneumonia. Proof: Culture reports, timing of infection, hospital records. Defense: Some HAI unavoidable despite best practices. Key: Was protocol followed?

instruction: 'New Year prediction: Your lucky number will bring 10 crore! Pay 5000 for full report' - call வந்துச்சு. Real astrologer-ஆ?
output: Fraud! 'Lucky number = crores' என்பது classic scam. New Year-ல astrology scams spike ஆகும். Lottery prediction என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Block the number. Astrology-க்கு money கொடுக்காதீங்க.

instruction: SDAT coaching centre-ல் சேர என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: SDAT (Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu) ஒவ்வொரு மாவட்டத்திலும் coaching centres வைத்திருக்கு. Age: 8-14 years. Selection trials நடக்கும். Free coaching, kit, diet allowance கிடைக்கும். District Sports Officer-ஐ தொடர்பு கொள்ளுங்கள்.

instruction: Owner repair seyya marukkiraar - rent kattaamal irukkalaama?
output: Rent kattaamal irukka koodaadhu - idhu eviction-kku grounds aagividum. Instead: 1) Written notice kodunga, 2) Owner response illaattal repair seydhu receipt vaangunga, 3) Rent-la irundhu deduct seydhu balance kattunga, 4) Rent Authority-kku complaint kodunga.

instruction: DDU-GKY (Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana) endraal enna?
output: Skill Training + Placement for rural youth. Eligibility: 15-35 years (up to 45 for SC/ST), BPL/Low income family, rural. Training: Minimum 576 hours, Residential (food/stay free). Sectors: IT, Healthcare, Retail, Hospitality, Automotive. Placement: 70% mandatory placement, ₹6,000+ salary. Incentive: Bonus for employment within 3 months of training. Apply: Gram Panchayat, Block office, ddugky.gov.in

instruction: Government hostel-ல் seat எப்படி கிடைக்கும்?
output: Process: 1) Apply through college/department 2) Priority: Distance from home, family income, caste category 3) Documents: Income certificate, nativity, distance proof 4) BC/MBC/SC/ST welfare hostels - apply through respective departments 5) Working women's hostel - separate application. Fees: Government hostel very subsidized (₹100-500/month). Free for eligible SC/ST. Apply early - seats limited. Waiting list exists.

instruction: Exam hall-ல் tension வந்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Tension relief tips: 1) Deep breathing - 10 முறை மூச்சு விடுங்கள் 2) Easy questions முதலில் attempt 3) Stuck ஆனால் skip, later return 4) Water குடியுங்கள் 5) Positive self-talk: 'நான் படித்திருக்கிறேன், எழுத முடியும்' 6) Question paper முழுவதும் முதலில் படியுங்கள். Before exam: Proper sleep, light food, early arrival. Severe panic: Invigilator-க்கு சொல்லுங்கள், rest room break.

instruction: IGNDPS (Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme) என்றால் என்ன?
output: BPL மாற்றுத்திறனாளிகளுக்கு ஓய்வூதியம். Central: ₹300/month (18-79 வயது), ₹500/month (80+). TN State: கூடுதலாக ₹1,000/month. தகுதி: 80%+ disability, BPL குடும்பம். விண்ணப்பம்: Taluk office/Social Welfare dept. Documents: Disability certificate (Medical Board), Aadhaar, Income proof. Disability Types: Visual, Hearing, Locomotor, Mental illness, Multiple disabilities.

instruction: Second-hand Car vaanginen. RC Transfer eppadi seyvadhu?
output:
**RC Transfer for Used Vehicle:**

**Seller Must:**
1. Sign Form 29 & 30
2. Get NOC if different state
3. Give: Original RC, Insurance, PUC, Signed forms

**Buyer Must:**

**Step 1:** Apply at parivahan.gov.in → Transfer of Ownership

**Step 2: Documents**
- Form 29 & 30 (both signed)
- Original RC
- Insurance (transferred)
- PUC
- Both Aadhaar + Address proof
- Sale receipt

**Step 3:** RTO Visit - Both parties, Vehicle inspection

**Step 4: Fee**
- Transfer: ₹300-500
- Smart Card: ₹200

**Step 5:** New RC in 7-15 days

**Deadline:** 14 days from sale
**Penalty:** ₹50/day delay (max ₹500)

**Loan Vehicle:** Bank NOC mandatory

instruction: Aadhaar address update online eppadi seyvadhu?
output:
Online Method (easiest):
1. Login: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in
2. OTP: Registered mobile-la varum
3. Select: 'Update Address'
4. Enter new address
5. Upload document: Passport/Bank Statement/EB Bill/Rent Agreement (PDF < 2MB)
6. Pay: ₹50 online
7. Note URN (Update Request Number)
8. Time: 2-3 weeks-la new Aadhaar varum

Address Validation Letter (Document illaadha case):
1. myaadhaar → Address Update → 'Request for AVL'
2. Enter Verifier details (relative/friend at new address)
3. Verifier-ku letter pogum
4. Verifier consent kodutha update aagum

instruction: Senior citizen pension apply எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL/low income. Schemes: IGNOPS (Rs.1,000/month), TN Old Age Pension (varies). Apply: e-Sevai centre, Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, income certificate, Aadhaar, bank account. Widow pension: Additional scheme available.

instruction: Exam hall ticket tholaindhuviduthu - enna seiyvathu?
output: Panic vendaam. School/College-la duplicate hall ticket vaangalam. Board exam-kku DGE website-la download pannalam. Exam centre-la ID proof kaatti emergency admit card peralaam. Principal letter-um udhavum.

instruction: TN Employment Exchange-la register eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Registration for Govt job notifications. Online: Register at tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in. Age: 18-40 (relaxation for reserved categories). Eligibility: Based on educational qualification. Renewal: Renew every 3 years. Benefits: Govt job notifications, Interview calls, Unemployment assistance (some categories). Documents: Education certificates, Community certificate, Aadhaar. Priority: Seniority + Marks-based. Local Employment: Referral for private companies too.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'LTC claim deadline extending. Advance submission fee 3000 for priority processing.' LTC claim pending, priority ku pay pannalama?
output: LTC claims processed through official channels - no 'advance fee' or 'priority processing' exists. Submit through proper bill section. Government never asks payment for processing employee benefits. Check service rules - all processes are free for employees.

instruction: CM Helpline-la complaint eppadi koduppadhu?
output: Tamil Nadu CM Helpline: 1100. Online: cmcell.tn.gov.in. Complaint categories: Corruption, service delay, government scheme issues. Tracking: SMS/Online. Escalation: Collector → Department Secretary → CM Cell. Response time: 15-30 days.

instruction: Data Science/AI padikka enna vazhi?
output: Options: 1) B.Tech CS/IT + elective courses 2) Online certifications - Coursera, edX (Google, IBM certificates) 3) IIT/IISc online programs 4) NPTEL free courses 5) M.Tech Data Science - IITs, NITs. Prerequisites: Python, Statistics, Linear Algebra. Chennai-la pala institutes coaching tharukindrana. Kaggle competitions-la participate pannunga. Portfolio build pannunga.

instruction: Hidden charges vasoolittaal enna seyyalam?
output: Hidden charges unfair trade practice. E-commerce Rules 2020-in keezh all charges upfront display kattaayam. Complaint: Consumer forum, NCH helpline. Refund of hidden charges + compensation ketkalam. Bank service charges-kku Banking Ombudsman.

instruction: Chettinad architecture sirappu enna?
output: Chettinad - Sivaganga district-la ulla paguthi. Nattukottai Chettiars vasikkum idam. Architecture sirappu: 1) Piramaanda maaligaigal - 50-100 rooms, 2) Burma teak, Italian marble, Belgian glass, 3) Athangudi tiles - handmade, 4) Spacious courtyards, 5) Ornate pillars. 19th-20th century-la vanigathil panakaararkalaga irundhaargal. Ippodhuu pala houses heritage hotels. Karaikudi famous for Chettinad food too!

instruction: சித்தர் பாடல்களை எங்கே கேட்கலாம்/படிக்கலாம்?
output: சித்தர் பாடல்கள் access செய்ய: 1) Project Madurai - free Tamil texts online (projectmadurai.org), 2) Tamil Virtual Academy - government site, 3) YouTube - விளக்கங்களோடு பாடல்கள், 4) Books - சென்னை Higginbothams, பரி நிலையம், 5) Apps - Siddhar Paadalgal app, 6) Libraries - University of Madras, Connemara Library. Original palm leaves Saraswathi Mahal Library (Thanjavur)-ல் preserve செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளன.

instruction: Pension வரும் போது TDS cut ஆகுமா?
output: ஆண்டு pension income taxable limit-ஐ தாண்டினால் TDS cut ஆகும். Senior citizens-க்கு Rs.3 lakh வரை tax இல்லை. Form 15H கொடுத்தால் TDS தவிர்க்கலாம்.

instruction: Bail எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Bailable offence: Police station-லேயே bail கிடைக்கும் (matter of right). Non-bailable: Court-ல் application போடணும். Documents: ID proof, address proof, surety documents. Bail bond + surety sign வேண்டும். Lawyer through apply பண்றது better.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Agricultural loan waiver verification. Send Aadhaar and bank details to confirm eligibility.' Loan waiver list la iruppena, verify pannalama?
output: Loan waiver lists published officially by government, verification through banks. Never send Aadhaar/bank details via SMS. Check with your loan-giving bank directly. Scammers use loan waiver hopes to collect sensitive data. Government has your details already through bank.

instruction: Bank loan EMI katta mudiyala, enna aagum?
output: EMI default aanaal: 1) 90 days delay = NPA (Non-Performing Asset), 2) Bank notice anuppum, 3) Recovery agent varalam - aanaal avanga threaten panna koodaadhu, 4) Restructure/one-time settlement kelunga, 5) Home loan: SARFAESI Act-in keezh property auction aagalam. RBI guidelines: Recovery agent harassment-kku complaint podalam.

instruction: New order WhatsApp la vandhuchchu nga - 'Dubai export ku 5 lakh order, advance QR scan pannunga receive panna' nu. Dindigul lock business ku genuine order aa nga?
output: QR scan panna receive aagaadhu nga - DEBIT aagum! Dindigul lock manufacturers specifically target pannuraanga scammers. 'Export order' excitement la maatikkaadhenga. LC through illana verified buyer dhaan deal pannunga.

instruction: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act endraal enna?
output: Law for care of parents/elders. Children's Duty: Legal obligation to maintain parents. Maintenance Amount: Tribunal decides (max ₹10,000/month). Tribunal: In every district, order within 90 days. Property: Transfer to children can be void if neglected after transfer. Old Age Homes: Government run, at least one per district. Penalty: ₹5,000 fine / 3 months imprisonment. Complaint: Maintenance Tribunal/SDM office.

instruction: Pollution complaint enge koduppadhu?
output: TNPCB (Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board): tnpcb.gov.in. NGT (National Green Tribunal): Chennai bench. District Environment Engineer. Complaint types: Air, water, noise, hazardous waste. Evidence: Photos, videos, test reports. Public interest litigation-um possible.

instruction: Chennai-la Metro Water Connection eppadi?
output: Apply at chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in with property document, building plan, tax receipt, Aadhaar. Site inspection for feasibility. Charges: Connection ₹500-2,000, deposit ₹500-1,000, road cutting extra. Monthly bill ₹70-400 (domestic). Helpline: 044-4567 4567.

instruction: Exam முடிந்த student-க்கு call வந்தது - 'Scholarship guaranteed, application fee 5000' என்று.
output: Legitimate scholarships-க்கு application fee கிடையாது. NSP (National Scholarship Portal) மூலமே apply செய்யுங்கள். Private calls நம்பாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Fasting therapy (Upvas) safe-ஆ? எப்படி செய்றது?
output: Therapeutic fasting types: 1) Fruit fast - only fruits, 2) Juice fast - fresh juices, 3) Water fast - only water (supervised only), 4) Intermittent fasting - 16:8 popular. Benefits: Detox, weight loss, digestive rest, autophagy (cell cleaning). Safe fasting: 1) Start slow (intermittent), 2) Stay hydrated, 3) Break fast gently (not heavy food), 4) Medical conditions - consult doctor. Avoid: Diabetes (uncontrolled), pregnancy, children, underweight.

instruction: ME/M.Tech admission Tamil Nadu-la eppadi?
output: GATE score compulsory (govt colleges-ku). Steps: 1) GATE ezhuthunga 2) Anna University TANCA counselling-ku apply 3) GATE score + UG marks basis rank 4) College allotment. GATE illamalum sila colleges-la seralaam (sponsored/self-financing). Govt college fee: ₹10,000-30,000/year.

instruction: கெட்ட ஆட்சியாளர் / corrupt leader பற்றி என்ன சொல்கிறார்?
output: குறள்: 'இயல்புளிக் கோலோச்சும் மன்னவன் நாட்டை பெயலும் விளையுளும் தொக்கு'. நீதியில்லாத ஆட்சியில் மழையும் விளைச்சலும் இல்லை. மேலும்: 'கொலையிற் கொடியாரை வேந்தொறுத்தல் பைங்கூழ் களைகட் டதனொடு நேர்'. கொடியவர்களை தண்டிக்காத அரசன் விவசாயத்தில் களை எடுக்காதது போன்றவன். Corrupt leaders destroy nations!

instruction: Owner current/water cut பண்ணி force பண்ணுகிறார் - என்ன செய்வது?
output: இது illegal harassment. 1) Police-ல் complaint கொடுங்கள், 2) Rent Authority-க்கு புகார், 3) Civil Court-ல் injunction பெறலாம். Essential services cut பண்றது criminal offence. Owner-க்கு fine மற்றும் imprisonment வரை தண்டனை.

instruction: Owner thideernu current cut pannitaar, legal-aa?
output: Illegal! Owner basic amenities (water, electricity) cut panna koodaadhu - self-help eviction illegal. Actions: 1) Police complaint (criminal intimidation), 2) Rent Authority complaint, 3) Civil court injunction. Owner penalty: Fine + imprisonment possible. Tenant rights: Continue staying + demand restoration. Document everything - photos, videos.

instruction: Scam la maatikitten nu realize aana udane enna pannanum?
output: GOLDEN HOUR - First 1 hour most critical! Step 1 (0-5 min): STOP all communication, block scammer. Step 2 (5-15 min): Call BANK 24/7 helpline, freeze account, report unauthorized transaction. Step 3 (15-30 min): Call Cyber Crime Helpline 1930. Step 4 (30-60 min): File FIR at cybercrime.gov.in. Within 24 hours action = 40-50% recovery chance. 72 hours later = only 10-15% chance.

instruction: Sex determination test legal-ஆ? Punishment என்ன?
output: ILLEGAL! PCPNDT Act 1994. Prohibited: 1) Sex determination of fetus, 2) Disclosure of sex, 3) Advertisement for sex selection. Punishment: 3-5 years jail + Rs.10,000-1 lakh fine. Who's punished: Doctor, lab, pregnant woman (if complicit), person who seeks test. Ultrasound: Must NOT reveal sex - if revealed, report to authorities. Female feticide: Serious crime - declining sex ratio issue.

instruction: Chennai-ல் Metro Water Connection எப்படி?
output: Apply at chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in with property document, building plan, tax receipt, Aadhaar. Site inspection for feasibility. Charges: Connection ₹500-2,000, deposit ₹500-1,000, road cutting extra. Monthly bill ₹70-400 (domestic). Helpline: 044-4567 4567.

instruction: Packaged food-ல் foreign object கிடைச்சது, action என்ன?
output: Serious matter! Steps: 1) Product preserve பண்ணுங்க (don't throw), 2) Photos/videos எடுங்க, 3) Batch number, manufacturing date note பண்ணுங்க, 4) Company complaint + social media, 5) Food Safety Officer complaint (local municipal office), 6) Consumer Forum - compensation claim. FSSAI: Manufacturer license cancel ஆகலாம். Health affected: Medical bills + additional compensation.

instruction: Medical negligence-kku consumer court-la case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. Doctors, hospitals ellam 'service provider' category-la varum. Wrong diagnosis, treatment failure, surgery complications, hospital infection - ellaathukkum case podalam. Aanaal 'bonafide mistake'-kkum 'negligence'-kkum vithiyaasam prove pannanum.

instruction: DCA/PGDCA course enna? Value irukkaa?
output: DCA (Diploma in Computer Applications): 6 months - 1 year. PGDCA (Post Graduate): 1 year after graduation. Contents: MS Office, Internet, Basic programming, Database. Value: Government jobs-la DCA mandatory sila posts-ku. Private sector: Entry level IT support, data entry. Better alternative: BCA degree or specific skill courses (Python, Web development). DCA sufficient for basic computer operator roles.

instruction: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme enna?
output: TN government scheme: Rs.18,000 cash assistance. Eligibility: 1) TN resident, 2) Family income limit, 3) First two live births, 4) Institutional delivery, 5) Age 19+. Payment: 3 installments - during pregnancy, after delivery, after vaccination completion. Apply: PHC/Government hospital during registration. Documents: Ration card, Aadhar, bank account. Working women: Separate maternity benefit also applicable.

instruction: நன்றி (gratitude) பற்றி என்ன குறள்கள் உள்ளன?
output: குறள்: 'செய்யாமல் செய்த உதவிக்கு வையகமும் வானகமும் ஆற்றல் அரிது'. எதிர்பார்க்காமல் யாரோ செய்த உதவிக்கு பூமியும் சொர்க்கமும் கூட ஈடாகாது. மேலும்: 'காலத்தினால் செய்த நன்றி சிறிதெனினும் ஞாலத்தின் மாணப் பெரிது'. Right time-ல் செய்த சிறிய உதவியும் உலகத்தை விட பெரியது.

instruction: CS (Company Secretary) padippu enna? Eppadi seruvathu?
output: ICSI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation (+2 aprom) 2) Executive 3) Professional. Total duration: 3-4 years. Practical training 15 months. Fee: Foundation ₹4,500, Executive ₹16,000, Professional ₹20,000. Corporate law, governance specialization. Good salary in companies.

instruction: 10th public exam-க்கு எப்படி prepare ஆவது? Topper tips என்ன?
output: Topper strategies: 1) Textbook முழுமையாக படியுங்கள் - 80% questions textbook-இலிருந்து 2) Previous 5 years question papers practice 3) Blue print படி chapter-wise weightage கவனியுங்கள் 4) Maths & Science: daily problem solving 5) Tamil/English: grammar + essay practice 6) Social: Map pointing + dates memorize. Time: Daily 6-8 hours. Last month: Revision only. TN Government question bank: www.dge.tn.gov.in

instruction: Suicide attempt criminal offence-aa?
output: NO! Decriminalized under MHCA 2017. Old: Section 309 IPC punished attempt. Now: Person attempting suicide presumed to be under severe stress - needs care, not punishment. Police: Cannot arrest or prosecute. Government duty: Provide care, rehabilitation. Family: Support, not blame. Hospital: Must treat without police formality. Exception: Abetment of suicide still criminal.

instruction: Parents-kku children maintenance kodukkanuumaa?
output: Aama. Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007 padi children (including married daughters) parents-kku maintain seyyanum. Maintenance Tribunal-la claim pannalam. Max Rs.10,000/month. Non-compliance: 3 months imprisonment. Property transfer reverse aagalam.

instruction: WhatsApp la unknown number video call vandhuchchi ayyaa, oru ponnu... aprom face screenshot eduthuttaanga. 50K illana video family ku anuppurom nu blackmail panraangadaa. Bayam aa irukku, enna pannuvaandaa?
output: Pay pannaadheenga ayyaa - pay pannaalum nirkaadhu. Organized gang idhu. cybercrime.gov.in la report pannunga, social media temporarily close pannunga. Family kitta sollunga - 'shame' dhaan ivanga weapon. Tirunelveli cyber crime la case panna mudiyum. Bayapadaadheenga ayyaa.

instruction: Voter ID eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. voters.eci.gov.in or Voter Helpline App use pannunga 2. Form 6 fill pannunga 3. Documents: Age proof (must be 18+), Address proof, Passport size photo 4. BLO will visit your home for verification 5. Time: 30-45 days

instruction: முக்கிய health helplines என்னென்ன?
output: Emergency: 108 (ambulance), 102 (pregnant women). Health info: 104 (general health helpline), 1075 (COVID - still active). Disease specific: 1097 (HIV/AIDS), 1800-599-0019 (TB). Mental health: 9152987821 (iCALL), 1800-599-0019 (NIMHANS). Poison: 1066 (Chennai). Child: 1098 (Childline). Women: 181 (women helpline). All 24x7 and free.

instruction: Part time job-nu YouTube video like panna panam kidaikkum-nu Telegram group irukku
output: Task-based scam ithu. Mudhal la 50-100 rupees kuduppanga, apram 'upgrade' panna investment kettuppanga. Thousands poirum. Join aagaadheenga.

instruction: 'Dubai prince' என்று சொல்லி contact ஆனார், property share செய்ய documents-க்கு money கேட்கிறார்.
output: Royal/Rich person scam மிகவும் பழைய trick. உண்மையான rich people strangers-கிடம் இப்படி கேட்க மாட்டார்கள். 100% fraud.

instruction: Fake website-la shopping panni fraud aanadhu - complaint eppadi?
output: Steps: 1) Payment bank-kku chargeback request, 2) cybercrime.gov.in complaint, 3) Consumer forum (seller fraud), 4) Police FIR (IPC 420). Evidence save pannunga: Website screenshots, payment receipts, communication. Domain registrar-kkum report pannalam.

instruction: NMMS Exam என்றால் என்ன? எப்படி prepare செய்வது?
output:
**National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship (NMMS):**

**என்ன இது?**
- Class 8 மாணவர்களுக்கான scholarship exam
- Pass ஆனால் Class 9-12 வரை ₹12,000/year

**தகுதி:**
- Class 8 Govt/Govt-aided school student
- Class 7-ல் 55%+ marks (SC/ST: 50%)
- Parent income < ₹3.5 lakh/year

**Exam Pattern:**

| Paper | Questions | Marks | Time |
|-------|-----------|-------|------|
| MAT (Mental Ability) | 90 | 90 | 90 min |
| SAT (Scholastic Aptitude) | 90 | 90 | 90 min |

**MAT Topics:**
- Reasoning (Series, Analogy, Classification)
- Coding-Decoding
- Blood Relations
- Direction sense
- Mirror/Water images

**SAT Topics:**
- Science (Class 7-8 syllabus)
- Social Science (History, Geography, Civics)
- Mathematics

**Preparation Tips:**
1. Class 7-8 NCERT/State Board thorough படிக்கவும்
2. Previous year papers practice
3. Online mock tests
4. Reasoning books (RS Aggarwal Junior)

**Important Dates:**
- Application: July-August
- Exam: November
- Result: January

**Apply:** School HM மூலம்

instruction: Minor child-க்கு யார் consent கொடுக்கணும்?
output: Parents/legal guardians. Rules: 1) Both parents equal right (married), 2) Single parent: That parent, 3) Guardian: Court-appointed guardian, 4) Emergency: Hospital can proceed without consent (life-saving), 5) Mature minor doctrine: 16+ may consent to some treatments. Conflict between parents: Court decides best interest of child. Orphan/abandoned: Child Welfare Committee.

instruction: ATM-ல் பணம் போச்சு ஆனா account-ல் debit ஆச்சு, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) உடனே bank-க்கு call பண்ணுங்க (customer care), 2) Written complaint கொடுங்க - transaction ID mention பண்ணுங்க, 3) RBI rule: Bank 5 days-க்குள் refund பண்ணணும், 4) Delay ஆனால்: Rs.100/day compensation, 5) Resolve ஆகல = Banking Ombudsman complaint. Evidence: Transaction SMS, mini statement வச்சுக்கோங்க.

instruction: Therkku maavatta maanavarkalukku special scholarship ethavathu irukka?
output: Aama. BC/MBC scholarship, first graduate scholarship, merit scholarship ellam apply pannalam. Tirunelveli, Thoothukudi, Kanyakumari district students-kku special priority irukku some schemes la.

instruction: Textile engineering படிக்க Coimbatore-தான் best-ஆ?
output: ஆமாம். PSG Tech, Kumaraguru, SITRA ஆகியவற்றில் textile technology courses உள்ளன. Tirupur textile hub அருகில் இருப்பதால் internship, placement opportunities அதிகம். Industry exposure கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Matrimony site-la abroad NRI match vandhudhu, India vara flight ticket panam venum-nu solraanga
output: Marriage scam ithu! NRI-nu sonna flight-ku panam irukkaadhu-nu illa. Video call with family kettunga. Refuse pannaanga-na avoid pannunga.

instruction: திருமூலர் யார்? திருமந்திரம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: திருமூலர் சைவ சித்தாந்தத்தின் founder-களில் ஒருவர். 'திருமந்திரம்' என்ற மகத்தான நூலை எழுதியவர் - 3000 பாடல்கள். இது 10-வது திருமுறை. 'ஒன்றே குலம், ஒருவனே தேவன்' என்ற famous quote இவரது. Yoga, tantra, சைவ சித்தாந்தம், ஆன்மீகம் எல்லாம் இதில் உள்ளன. ஒரு பசுவின் உடலில் புகுந்து அதன் கன்றை காப்பாற்றிய கதை famous - அதனால் 'மூலர்' என்ற பெயர் வந்தது.

instruction: Employer PF கட்டல - என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: Complaint options: 1) EPFO portal: EPFiGMS (online grievance), 2) Regional PF Commissioner office, 3) Labour Commissioner. Employer liability: PF amount + 12% interest + damages (up to 100%). Criminal prosecution-உம் possible. Salary slip-ல் PF deduction check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar Link எப்படி செய்வது? கட்டாயமா?
output: கட்டாயம்! Link செய்யாவிட்டால் PAN செயலிழக்கும் (Inoperative). Link செய்ய: 1. Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar 2. SMS: UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN> → 567678 or 56161 3. கட்டணம்: ₹1,000 (late fee). Status check: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar Status. Link ஆகவில்லை என்றால்: ITR file செய்ய முடியாது, பெரிய bank transactions முடியாது, MF/Demat திறக்க முடியாது, Higher TDS

instruction: Sports-ல் interest இருக்கு, படிப்பும் sports-ம் combine பண்ண முடியுமா?
output: Absolutely yes! Benefits: 1) Sports quota admission in colleges 2) Government jobs-ல் extra marks 3) Scholarships for sportspersons 4) Health and discipline. How: 1) Join school sports team 2) District sports coaching centres - free 3) SAI (Sports Authority of India) training 4) Balance: Morning sports, evening study. Careers: Sports quota → College → Job OR Professional sports. Many IAS officers, doctors are sportspersons. Time management key.

instruction: Cutoff marks quick guide
output: NEET 2024 (approx): General OC 720-137, BC 136-107, MBC 136-107, SC/ST 136-107. JEE Main: 90+ percentile for NITs. TNEA: Top colleges 195+, average 180+, minimum 150+. TNPSC Group 4: 80+ marks out of 150 safe. Engineering cutoff = Maths + Physics + Chemistry (max 200).

instruction: War / போர் பற்றி வள்ளுவர் என்ன சொல்கிறார்?
output: குறள்: 'தொல்படை தோன்றான் எதிர்வினையும் உள்படை ஒன்றானும் வேந்தனை வெல்'. நல்ல படை, எதிரியின் weakness அறிதல், உள்ளூர் support - இவை வெற்றிக்கு வழி. ஆனால்: 'அஞ்சாமை அல்லால் துணை வேண்டா எஞ்சாமை எண்ணி இடத்தால் செயின்'. யோசித்து, right time-ல் செய்தால் தைரியம் மட்டுமே போதும். Strategic thinking over brute force!

instruction: 'Processing fee கட்டுங்கள், loan/prize/refund வரும்' என்கிறார்கள். கட்டலாமா?
output: 'Processing fee', 'registration fee', 'advance payment' - இவை scam signals. பணம் வர பணம் கட்ட வேண்டியதில்லை.

instruction: Old Age Pension eppadi peruvadhu?
output: TN State: ₹1,000/month (60-79 years), ₹1,500/month (80+). Eligibility: BPL/low income, no other pension. Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office with age proof, income certificate, Aadhaar, bank account. VAO verification. Time: 30-60 days.
