instruction: Phone vandhuchu 'Namaskaaram doctor, IMA meeting registration urgent. Pay 5000 now, tomorrow deadline. UPI ID sollunga.' IMA meeting genuine aa, pay pannalama?
output: IMA registrations go through official website and branch offices, not random phone calls. Call your local IMA branch directly to verify any meeting. Scammers use professional association names to target doctors knowing they'll respond to medical authority.

instruction: பட்டினத்தார் யார்? அவர் கதை என்ன?
output: பட்டினத்தார் காவேரிப்பூம்பட்டினத்தில் பெரிய வணிகர். மிகவும் செல்வந்தர். ஒரு நாள் அவர் மகன் ஒரு packet தந்தார் - உள்ளே பார்த்தால் ஊசியும் நூலும். 'இதுவும் உனக்கு வேண்டாம்' என்று சொல்லி சென்றுவிட்டார் மகன். இதை உணர்ந்த பட்டினத்தார் எல்லா செல்வத்தையும் விட்டு துறவி ஆனார். 'என்ன புண்ணியம் செய்தனை நெஞ்சமே' என்ற பாடல் famous.

instruction: Daily immunity-க்கு Siddha tips என்ன?
output: Daily practices: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (immune booster), 2) Chukku Kaapi (dry ginger coffee), 3) Turmeric milk, 4) Kabasura Kudineer (respiratory immunity), 5) Oil pulling (Gandusha), 6) Sesame oil application on head, 7) Pranayama. Seasonal: Different recipes for different seasons. Government: Distributed free during dengue, COVID seasons. Home preparation: Simple recipes available online from authentic sources.

instruction: Pranayama types and benefits enna?
output: Main Pranayamas: 1) Anulom-Vilom (alternate nostril) - balance, calm, 2) Kapalbhati - energizing, weight loss, detox, 3) Bhramari (bee breath) - stress, sleep, 4) Ujjayi - focus, warmth, 5) Sheetali - cooling, BP reduction. Benefits: Lung capacity, stress relief, concentration, immunity. Start: 5-10 minutes daily. Precautions: 1) Empty stomach, 2) No forcing, 3) Heart/BP patients - gentle only, 4) Pregnancy - specific guidance needed.

instruction: மத்திய உணவு திட்டம் (Mid-day Meal) பற்றி சொல்லுங்கள். என் பையன் சாப்பிடுவானா?
output: Mid-day Meal Scheme: அரசுப் பள்ளி மாணவர்களுக்கு இலவச சத்தான மதிய உணவு. Class 1-8 வரை அனைவருக்கும். Menu: அரிசி, பருப்பு, காய்கறி, முட்டை (வாரம் 3 முறை), பழம். சமையல் பள்ளியிலேயே. தரமான உணவு - மாவட்ட அதிகாரிகள் inspect செய்வார்கள். குழந்தைகள் ஆரோக்கியமாக வளர உதவும். Attendance அதிகரிக்கும். பள்ளியில் சேர்த்தால் automatic-ஆக கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Medicine MRP-kku mela charge panraanga - legal-aa?
output: ILLEGAL! MRP = Maximum Retail Price. Law: Legal Metrology Act - selling above MRP is punishable. Hospital excuse: "Service charges" - not valid for medicines. Action: 1) Point out MRP on strip/bottle, 2) Refuse to pay excess, 3) Weights and Measures Department complaint, 4) Consumer Forum. Penalty: Fine + compensation. Document: Photo of MRP vs bill amount.

instruction: Thirumoolar yaar? Thirumandhiram endraal enna?
output: Thirumoolar Saiva Siddhaanthathoda founders-la oruvar. 'Thirumandhiram' endra magathaana noolai ezhuthiyavar - 3000 paadalgal. Idhu 10-vadu Thirumurai. 'Ondre kulam, oruvane devan' endra famous quote ivaradhu. Yoga, tantra, Saiva Siddhaandham, aanmeegam ellam idhil ullana. Oru pasuvoda udalil pugundu adhoda kanrai kaappattiya kadhai famous - adhanaal 'Moolar' endra peyar vandhadhu.

instruction: Medical negligence-kku evvalavu compensation ketkalaamaa?
output: Claim include: 1) Medical expenses incurred, 2) Future treatment cost, 3) Loss of income, 4) Pain and suffering (mental agony), 5) Loss of life expectancy, 6) Punitive damages. Lakhs to Crores varai - case severity-a poruthadhu. Expert lawyer consult pannunga.

instruction: புதிய மின் இணைப்பு எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at nsc.tnebnet.org with ownership proof (sale deed/rent agreement), Aadhaar, building certificate. Inspection by TANGEDCO. Charges: Deposit ₹500-15,000 based on load. Time: 7-15 days. Agricultural connection: FREE electricity for farming.

instruction: Police ennai eppodhu arrest pannalaam?
output: Cognizable offence-kku warrant illama arrest pannalam. Non-cognizable-kku warrant venum. Bailable offence-kku arrest thevai illa - notice podhum. 7 years-kku keezh punishment offences-kku generally arrest avoid pannanum (Supreme Court guidelines).

instruction: Thirukkural eththanai mozhigalil mozhipeyarkkapattuLLadhu?
output: Thirukkural 82-kkum merpatta mozhigalil mozhipeyarkkapattuLLadhu. Bible-kku aduthpadiyaga adhiga mozhigalil mozhipeyarkkappatta nool-nu sollapadugiradhu. Mudhal English mozhipeyarppu 1886-la G.U. Pope-naal seiyappattadhu.

instruction: நம்மாழ்வார் யார்? திருவாய்மொழி என்றால் என்ன?
output: நம்மாழ்வார் - ஆழ்வார்களில் மிக முக்கியமானவர். ஆழ்வார் திருநகரி (திருநெல்வேலி) பிறந்த இடம். புளிய மரத்தடியில் 16 ஆண்டுகள் தியானத்தில் இருந்ததாக கதை. திருவாய்மொழி - 1102 பாசுரங்கள், 'தமிழ் வேதம்' என்று அழைக்கப்படுகிறது. வைணவ தத்துவத்தின் ஆழம் இதில் உள்ளது. 'தாயே தந்தையே' என்ற பாசுரம் மிகவும் famous. வைகுண்ட ஏகாதசியில் இவரது உருவம் சொர்க்கவாசல் வழியாக செல்லும் நிகழ்ச்சி Srirangam-ல் நடக்கும்.

instruction: B.Ed சேர்க்கை தமிழ்நாட்டில் எப்படி நடக்கிறது?
output: தகுதி: ஏதேனும் பட்டப்படிப்பு 50% மதிப்பெண்களுடன் (SC/ST/OBC 45%). படிகள்: 1) TNTEU (Tamil Nadu Teachers Education University) அறிவிப்பு 2) ஆன்லைன் விண்ணப்பம் 3) Merit-based counselling 4) கல்லூரி ஒதுக்கீடு. அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ₹4,000-10,000/ஆண்டு. படிப்பு காலம்: 2 ஆண்டுகள்.

instruction: 12 Azhvaargal yaar yaar?
output: 12 Azhvaargal: 1) Poigaiyazhvar, 2) Boodhaththaazhvar, 3) Peyaazhvar - immovaruum 'Mudhalazhvaargal', 4) Thirumazhisaiyaazhvar, 5) Nammaazhvar - Thiruvaaimozhi paadiyavar, miga mukkiyamaanavar, 6) Madhurakaviyaazhvar, 7) Kulasekaraazhvar, 8) Periyaazhvar, 9) Aandaal - ore penn Azhvaar, Thiruppaavai paadiyavar, 10) Thondaradippodiyaazhvar, 11) Thiruppaanaazhvar, 12) Thirumangaiyaazhvar.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu 'Domestic workers association scheme. Pay 500 membership for PF and health benefits.' Membership edukkalam aa?
output: Domestic workers can register under various state schemes - process through labour department. Legitimate associations have proper offices, not just phone numbers. Check if association registered with labour commissioner. Government schemes like E-Shram free to register.

instruction: In-laws against DV case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. DV Act-in keezh 'respondent' includes husband + his relatives who abuse. 498A IPC-in keezh husband and relatives against criminal case podalam. Aanaal specific allegations + evidence venum - general accusation not enough.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Drug license renewal pending. Pay 8000 online to avoid clinic seal.' Drug license matter serious, pay pannidlama?
output: Drug licenses renewed through State Drug Control department, not SMS links. Check actual renewal date in your license. Visit drug controller office or official portal. Scammers know doctors fear drug license issues - exploiting regulatory anxiety.

instruction: NEET Physics hard-aa irukku, eppadi improve aavadhu?
output: Physics improvement: 1) Concepts first - derivations later 2) Formula list chapter-wise 3) Daily 20-30 numericals practice 4) HC Verma for conceptual clarity 5) DC Pandey for NEET level. High weightage topics: Mechanics, Electrostatics, Modern Physics, Optics. Weak students: Start with easy chapters (Units, Motion, Thermodynamics). Video lectures: Physics Wallah, Unacademy free. Avoid formula memorization without understanding.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Hospital promotion exam registration. Pay 5000 for staff nurse grade-2 to grade-1 exam.' Promotion exam ku pay pannalama?
output: Government hospital promotions through TNPSC or department exams - fees minimal and official. Private hospital promotions are internal HR process. No external 'promotion exam' services. Check with your hospital HR or nursing superintendent.

instruction: Email/social media account hack aaiduchu, scammer friends kitta kaasu kekuraan. Recovery process?
output: Immediate - Warn contacts: Call/SMS friends 'My account hacked, don't send money'. Platform recovery: Gmail - accounts.google.com/signin/recovery, Facebook - facebook.com/hacked (24-72 hours), Instagram - Help → Login → 'Can't log in' (video selfie verification), WhatsApp - Login with OTP kicks out hacker, enable 2-step. Post-recovery: Change ALL passwords, enable 2FA everywhere, check connected apps, check email forwarding rules, inform contacts about scam messages. If friends lost money: They file complaint, your account takeover FIR helps their case.

instruction: PMAY subsidy எவ்வளவு கிடைக்கும்?
output: EWS/LIG: Rs.2.67 lakh வரை subsidy (6.5% interest subsidy). MIG-I: Rs.2.35 lakh (4% subsidy). MIG-II: Rs.2.30 lakh (3% subsidy). Home loan எடுத்தால் subsidy நேரடியாக loan account-ல் credit ஆகும்.

instruction: Oru email vandhuchu 'Your company server is compromised, immediate security audit needed. Click here to download security patch' nu IT department name la. Company la security team irukke, ipo enna pannanum?
output: Classic phishing targeting IT professionals! Real security alerts come through internal channels, not random emails. Forward to actual security team, don't click any links. Attackers know IT people have admin access - that's why they target you specifically.

instruction: TNMSC pharmacy stores enge irukku?
output: TNMSC = Tamil Nadu Medical Services Corporation. Stores: All government hospitals, standalone Fair Price Medicine Shops. Prices: 20-50% cheaper. Quality: Government-procured, tested. Items: Medicines, surgical items, consumables. Location: tnmsc.com for store locator. Government hospital patients: Medicines from TNMSC pharmacy often free (in-patient).

instruction: EC (Encumbrance Certificate) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Property-க்கு loan, mortgage, legal dispute இருக்கா என்று காட்டும் certificate. வாங்கும் முன் 30 years EC check பண்ணணும். Online: tnreginet.gov.in-ல் apply. Fee: Rs.120/year. 'Nil EC' = clear property.

instruction: Consumer case-க்கு fees எவ்வளவு?
output: District Forum: Rs.5 lakh வரை - Nil fee, Rs.5-10 lakh - Rs.200, Rs.10-20 lakh - Rs.400, Rs.20-50 lakh - Rs.1000, Rs.50 lakh-1 crore - Rs.2000. State Commission: Rs.2500-5000. National Commission: Rs.5000. SC/ST/Women-க்கு 50% concession.

instruction: Plus One admission-க்கு எப்போது apply பண்ணணும்?
output: Timeline: 10th result வந்த பிறகு 1 week-ல் notification. Usually May-June. Online application: www.tnschooleducation.in. Documents ready: 10th marks card, TC, community certificate, income certificate, Aadhaar. Choice filling: Preferred schools + subjects. Random allocation for government schools. Cutoff based for popular schools. Don't miss deadline - late applications not accepted.

instruction: TN Free Bus Pass for students enna?
output: Free bus travel for all students. Coverage: School students - Govt/Private, College students - UG/PG/Professional. Type: Free travel in ordinary buses. Process: Apply at School/College, get ID card. Documents: Bonafide certificate, Photo, Aadhaar. Validity: Academic year. Not for: AC buses, special buses.

instruction: SC/ST/BC Scholarship TN-la enna ulladhu?
output: Community-wise Scholarships. SC Students: Post-matric scholarship (₹550-1,200/month), Free education (all levels), Hostel stipend. ST Students: Similar to SC + extra coaching. BC/MBC/DNC: Post-matric (₹300-700/month), higher for MBC within BC. Apply: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST). Documents: Community certificate, Income certificate, Institution bonafide, Aadhaar. Hostel: Free accommodation + food in govt hostels.

instruction: Yaaro ennaip patri gossip panraanga - eppadi handle panradhu?
output: 'Kannindru kannarach sollinum sollarka munnindru pinnokkach sol'. Munnaal nalladhu pesi, pinnaal kettadhu pesuvadhai avoid pannungal. Gossip panravargal own credibility izhappaargal. Ignore them. 'Manathukkan maaasilan aadhal' - ungal manam clean-aa irundhaal podhum. Their words can't hurt you.

instruction: Pharmacy padippu (B.Pharm/D.Pharm) pathi vilakkuanga?
output: D.Pharm: 2 years (+2 Biology/Maths aprom). B.Pharm: 4 years. Admission: TN Pharmacy Council counselling. Govt college fee: ₹5,000-15,000/year. Job opportunity: Medical shops, pharma companies, research. GPAT exam M.Pharm-ku. Own pharmacy shop thodangalam.

instruction: Student budget eppadi manage panrathu?
output: Budget tips: 1) Monthly expenses list make 2) Essentials first - food, transport, stationery 3) Track spending - apps like Money Manager 4) Hostel food cheaper than outside 5) Second-hand books - seniors, book banks 6) Student discounts use everywhere 7) Part-time work if possible 8) Avoid peer pressure spending 9) Emergency fund small amount keep 10) Scholarship money wise use. Rule: Needs > Wants.

instruction: Tenant union form பண்ணலாமா? Collective bargaining legal-ஆ?
output: Legal! Tenant associations/unions form பண்ணலாம். Benefits: 1) Collective voice against unfair practices, 2) Negotiate with owner associations, 3) Legal aid pooling, 4) Information sharing. Registration: Societies Registration Act-ன் கீழ். Apartment complexes: Resident Welfare Association (RWA) common. Protect yourselves through unity.

instruction: Part-time job student-ஆக இருக்கும்போது செய்யலாமா?
output: Part-time options: 1) Tuition teaching - ₹200-500/hour 2) Content writing - freelance 3) Data entry - weekend work 4) Campus jobs - library, canteen assistance 5) Internships - stipend based 6) Online tutoring - Chegg, Vedantu 7) Weekend coaching classes assistant. Rules: College permission may be needed. Balance: Studies first priority. Tax: Above ₹2.5 lakh/year - tax applicable. Skills: Communication, time management develop.

instruction: வேலை செய்துகொண்டே படிக்க என்ன வழி இருக்கிறது?
output: Distance Education வழிகள்: 1) IGNOU - மிகப்பெரிய open university 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) 3) University of Madras - IDE 4) Annamalai University Distance. UG/PG/Diploma எல்லாம் available. கட்டணம்: ₹5,000-20,000/ஆண்டு. Exams: ஆண்டுக்கு 2 முறை. Work experience + degree இரண்டும் கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Ayurveda endraal enna? Siddha-vida verupaadu enna?
output: Ayurveda = Sanskrit origin, 5000+ years old, pan-Indian system. Principle: Vata, Pitta, Kapha doshas balance. Difference from Siddha: 1) Language - Sanskrit vs Tamil, 2) Origin - Kerala/North vs Tamil Nadu, 3) Some unique medicines, 4) Emphasis - Siddha uses more metals/minerals. Similarities: Both holistic, natural medicines, similar principles. Recognition: Both government recognized AYUSH systems.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'RTO license renewal online. Click link, pay 500 convenience fee.' License renew pannanum, online easy aa irukum nu nenaikkiren.
output: RTO renewals through parivahan.gov.in only. Official fees fixed by government, no extra 'convenience fee'. Never click SMS links for license renewal. Visit RTO office or use official portal. Scammers collect card details through fake renewal sites.

instruction: PMGSY என்றால் என்ன? எந்த கிராமங்களுக்கு சாலை கிடைக்கும்?
output: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana - கிராம சாலை திட்டம். தகுதி கிராமம்: மலைப்பகுதி 250+ மக்கள், சமவெளி 500+ மக்கள் உள்ள கிராமம், சாலை இணைப்பு இல்லாதது. Road Type: All-weather road (Concrete/Bitumen). Request: Gram Panchayat மூலம் Block/District-க்கு. PMGSY-III: Existing roads upgrade. Maintenance: 5 வருடம் contractor responsibility.

instruction: Owner kooda sandai pottuten, ippa enna panradhu? (Chennai casual)
output: Calm-aa irunga. Ella communication-um writing-la vachukonga - WhatsApp, SMS, email. Verbal fight-kku evidence illa. Legal action-kku written proof venum. Aduttha step-aa Rent Authority-kku complaint podunga.

instruction: Medical emergency hostel-ல் வந்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Emergency steps: 1) Call warden immediately 2) College has tie-up hospital - use that 3) 108 ambulance if serious 4) Keep parent contact updated with warden 5) Student health insurance - claim process know 6) ESI hospital if eligible 7) Govt hospital - free emergency care for all. Preparation: Keep emergency contacts, medical history, blood group info with you. Health card carry. Prevention: Regular health checkup, don't ignore symptoms.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY) enna?
output: Life Insurance scheme. Premium: Only ₹436 per year. Coverage: ₹2 lakh (on death). Age: 18-55 years. Eligibility: Those with Jan Dhan/Savings Account. How to join: Fill form at Bank, Give auto-debit consent. Renews every June 1

instruction: Employer PF kattala - enna seyyalam?
output: Complaint options: 1) EPFO portal: EPFiGMS (online grievance), 2) Regional PF Commissioner office, 3) Labour Commissioner. Employer liability: PF amount + 12% interest + damages (up to 100%). Criminal prosecution-um possible. Salary slip-la PF deduction check pannunga.

instruction: e-Sevai services எங்கே available?
output: Locations: Taluk offices, e-Sevai centres, Common Service Centres. Online: eservices.tn.gov.in. Services: Certificates (income, community, nativity), Patta transfer, Pension, Ration card, License renewals. Fee: Rs.30-100 (service based).

instruction: First generation graduate-க்கு என்ன சலுகைகள் உள்ளன?
output: சலுகைகள்: 1) முதல் தலைமுறை பட்டதாரி scholarship - ₹2,000-5,000/ஆண்டு 2) Fee concession பல கல்லூரிகளில் 3) Book grant 4) Hostel fee waiver 5) MHRD scholarship. தகுதி: பெற்றோர் யாரும் degree படிக்கவில்லை என்று சான்றிதழ். Apply: College scholarship cell மூலம். Income certificate தேவை.

instruction: Education loan EMI katta mudiyala, enna option?
output: Options available: 1) Moratorium extension request - bank will consider 2) EMI restructuring - lower EMI, longer tenure 3) Interest only payment temporarily 4) Parent co-borrower support 5) Government interest subsidy scheme check 6) Loan transfer to lower interest bank 7) Part-time income for EMI contribution. Don't do: Default silently - affects CIBIL score. Do: Communicate with bank proactively. Recovery harassment: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

instruction: Employment Exchange-la register seivathu worth-aa?
output: Benefits: 1) Government job notifications 2) Seniority based on registration date 3) Free career guidance 4) Skill training opportunities 5) Private job placement 6) Self-employment scheme guidance. Register: District Employment Office with certificates. Renewal: Every year or seniority lost. Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar. Online renewal available now. Some government jobs require Employment Exchange registration.

instruction: Generic medicine vs Branded - quality same-aa?
output: Yes! Same active ingredient, same dose, same effect. Difference: Brand name vs chemical name. Why cheaper: No advertising cost, no brand royalty. Quality: WHO-GMP certified generics = equal quality. Example: Paracetamol (generic) = Crocin/Dolo (branded). Verify: ISI mark, batch number, expiry date. Jan Aushadhi: Government generic stores - same quality, 50-90% cheaper.

instruction: திருக்குறளின் முதல் குறள் எது?
output: 'அகர முதல எழுத்தெல்லாம் ஆதி பகவன் முதற்றே உலகு'. அர்த்தம்: 'அ' எழுத்து எல்லா எழுத்துக்களுக்கும் ஆதாரம் போல, இறைவன் உலகத்திற்கு ஆதாரம்.

instruction: Republic Day - 'Free flag with Tiranga photo frame! Register and share' WhatsApp forward. Genuine government initiative-ஆ?
output: Mostly scam! Government free-ஆ flag distribute பண்ணும், registration தேவையில்ல. 'Register and share' data collection trap. Republic Day patriotism exploit பண்றாங்க. Local government office-ல free-ஆ வாங்குங்க.

instruction: Ayushman Bharat (PMJAY) enna?
output: ₹5 lakh free health insurance per family per year. Eligibility based on SECC 2011 BPL data. Check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in. Get card FREE at govt hospital/CSC with Aadhaar + ration card. Covers 1,500+ procedures at empanelled hospitals. In TN, combined with CMCHIS.

instruction: Online natural remedy videos/tips - trust பண்ணலாமா?
output: Be careful! Red flags: 1) "Cure for everything" claims, 2) No credentials shown, 3) Extreme claims without evidence, 4) Asking to stop doctor's medicines, 5) Selling expensive products. Trust: 1) Government AYUSH websites, 2) Established medical institutions, 3) Registered practitioners, 4) Research-backed information. Verify: Cross-check with multiple sources. Best: Consult qualified practitioner in person for treatment.

instruction: Consumer complaint enge kodukkalam?
output: Claim amount based: 1) Rs.1 crore varai - District Consumer Forum, 2) Rs.1-10 crore - State Commission, 3) Rs.10 crore mela - National Commission. Online: consumerhelpline.gov.in or NCH app moolam. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: War / por patri Valluvar enna solkiraar?
output: Kural: 'Tholpadai thondran ethirvinaiyum ulpadai ondraanum vendhanai vel'. Nalla padai, ethiriyoda weakness aRidhal, ulloor support - ivai vetrikkku vazhi. Aanaal: 'Anjaamai allaal thunai venda enjaamai enni idaththaal seyin'. Yosiththu, right time-la seidhaal dhairiyam mattumae podhum. Strategic thinking over brute force!

instruction: Suicidal thoughts irukku - yaarai contact panradhu?
output: Helplines (24x7): 1) iCall: 9152987821, 2) Vandrevala Foundation: 1860-2662-345, 3) AASRA: 9820466726, 4) Snehi: 044-24640050 (Chennai), 5) NIMHANS: 080-46110007. Immediate danger: Call 108 or go to nearest hospital emergency. Talk to: Trusted family/friend. Remember: Feelings are temporary, help is available. Professional help: Psychiatrist can help with treatment.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Fertilizer subsidy direct transfer scheme. Register with 2000 for 10,000 annual benefit.' Fertilizer cost romba, subsidy genuine aa?
output: Fertilizer subsidy already included in MRP - you already get it! No separate registration needed. DBT for fertilizer is point-of-sale, not farmer registration. This is exploiting farmers' input cost concerns. All genuine schemes through agriculture department.

instruction: Common Ayurvedic medicines - uses enna?
output: Popular medicines: 1) Triphala - Digestion, detox, constipation, 2) Ashwagandha - Stress, energy, immunity, 3) Brahmi - Memory, concentration, 4) Chyawanprash - General tonic, immunity, 5) Guggulu - Cholesterol, joints, weight, 6) Dashamoola - Pain, inflammation, 7) Kumkumadi Thailam - Skin glow. Available: Pharmacies, AYUSH stores. Self-use: Some general tonics okay. Specific treatment: Need doctor consultation.

instruction: Facebook-ல் 'சிறப்பு அரசு வேலை - back door entry, guarantee, 5 லட்சம் fees' என்று post பார்த்தேன்.
output: Government job-க்கு back door entry என்று எதுவும் இல்லை. இது complete fraud. பணம் கொடுத்தால் போய்விடும், வேலையும் கிடைக்காது.

instruction: Chennai-la Apartment vaanga porein. Ennenna check pannanum? RERA endraal enna?
output:
**Apartment Buying Checklist:**

**1. RERA Registration (Must!)**
- Check at: rera.tn.gov.in
- Verify RERA Number
- Project details, Completion date

**What is RERA?**
- Real Estate Regulatory Authority
- Builder accountability & Buyer protection

**2. Legal Documents:**
- Mother Deed - Land ownership
- EC (30 years) - No encumbrance
- CMDA/DTCP Approval
- Building Permit
- Completion Certificate
- Occupancy Certificate

**3. Builder Check:**
- Previous projects
- Delivery track record
- Legal cases

**4. Costs:**
- Price + Hidden charges
- GST: 5-12%
- Stamp Duty: 7% + Registration: 4%

**5. PMAY Benefit:** First home = 3-6.5% interest subsidy

**Red Flags:** No RERA, No approved plan, Land dispute

instruction: UDID card enna? Eppadi peruvathu?
output: Unique Disability ID - disability irukkuravangalukku identity card. swavlambancard.gov.in la online apply pannalam. District hospital la assessment vanganum, certificate kudupanga. Ella scheme-kkum UDID card vendiyathu.

instruction: Coimbatore-la textile/fashion industry-related courses ulladha?
output: Coimbatore textile hub courses: 1) PSG Tech - B.Tech Textile Technology 2) Kumaraguru - Textile courses 3) NIFT Coimbatore - Fashion (opening soon) 4) Government Polytechnic - Textile 5) ITI - Textile trades. Industry connect: Internships in mills, design houses. Job placement: Tirupur garment cluster nearby = excellent opportunities. Specialized: Knitwear technology, Apparel production.

instruction: புதிய ஆதார் அட்டை எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Visit nearest Aadhaar Enrollment Center (find at uidai.gov.in), carry identity proof (Voter ID/PAN/Passport), address proof (Ration Card/EB Bill), and age proof (Birth Certificate/SSLC). Biometric capture will be done. First enrollment is FREE. Aadhaar delivered within 90 days.

instruction: Degree முடிஞ்சாச்சு. Job search பண்றதா, PG படிக்கறதா? Confused-ஆ இருக்கேன்.
output: Decision framework: Job now if: 1) Financial need urgent 2) Work experience wanted 3) Industry-specific UG sufficient. PG if: 1) Academic/Research interest 2) Specific career needs PG (MBA for management) 3) Higher salary jump. Middle path: Job + Distance PG (IGNOU, University) OR Work 2-3 years → PG. Reality: Both paths successful. No 'wrong' choice. Career isn't linear. Many do job → PG → better job. Decide based on YOUR goals, not others' opinions.

instruction: Chennai-ல் Apartment வாங்க போகிறேன். என்னென்ன சரிபார்க்க வேண்டும்? RERA என்றால் என்ன?
output:
**Apartment வாங்கும் முன் Checklist:**

**1. RERA Registration (கட்டாயம்!)**
- Website: rera.tn.gov.in
- RERA Number verify செய்யவும்
- Project details, Completion date பாருங்க
- Complaint history check

**RERA என்றால் என்ன?**
- Real Estate Regulatory Authority
- Builder accountability
- Buyer protection
- Delayed delivery compensation

**2. Legal Documents Check:**

| Document | என்ன பார்க்கணும் |
|----------|------------------|
| Mother Deed | Land ownership chain |
| EC (30 years) | Encumbrance இல்லை |
| Approved Plan | CMDA/DTCP approval |
| Building Permit | Corporation approval |
| Completion Certificate | Building complete |
| Occupancy Certificate | Stay permission |

**3. CMDA/DTCP Approval**
- Approved layout verify
- FSI/FAR compliance
- Setback rules followed
- cmdachennai.gov.in

**4. Builder Check:**
- Previous projects visit
- Delivery track record
- Legal cases check
- RERA complaints

**5. Financial Check:**
- All inclusive price
- Hidden charges (Parking, Club, etc.)
- GST: 5% (affordable) / 12% (luxury)
- Stamp Duty: 7%
- Registration: 4%

**6. Home Loan:**
- Bank approved project?
- Easier loan if approved
- PMAY benefit (First home): 3-6.5% subsidy

**7. Society/Association:**
- Association formed?
- Common area ownership
- Maintenance charges

**Red Flags:**
- No RERA registration
- No approved plan
- Unapproved deviation
- Multiple legal cases
- Land dispute

instruction: Sandwich pattern diploma enna? Regular-lirundhu enna viththiyaasam?
output: Sandwich Diploma: Theory + Industrial training combined. Pattern: 1st year theory → 2nd year industry (6 months paid training) → 3rd year theory. Benefits: 1) Real work experience 2) Stipend during training ₹5,000-8,000/month 3) Job placement better 4) Industry connections. Offered at: NTTF, Central Polytechnics, select government colleges. Duration: Same 3 years. Highly recommended for practical learning.

instruction: ரேஷன் அட்டையில் பெயர் சேர்க்க என்ன செய்வது?
output: For birth: Apply at tnpds.gov.in with birth certificate + baby's Aadhaar. For marriage: Marriage certificate + spouse's Aadhaar. Remove old card entry if transferring. Taluk Office verification. Time: 15-30 days.

instruction: Yoga therapy enge learn pannalaam?
output: Free options: 1) Government Yoga centres (every district), 2) AYUSH hospitals - yoga unit, 3) Parks - morning free sessions (many cities), 4) Schools/colleges - yoga programs. Paid: 1) Private yoga studios, 2) Art of Living, Isha centres, 3) Online courses (after basics learned). Certification: If want to teach - AYUSH certified courses. Therapy: For specific conditions - consult yoga therapist (BNYS or certified).

instruction: Government hospital-la free-yaa treatment kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! Government hospitals = Free treatment for all. Free services: 1) OPD consultation, 2) Basic tests (blood, urine, X-ray), 3) Medicines (available stock), 4) Surgery (non-cosmetic), 5) Emergency care, 6) Delivery, 7) Vaccinations. Paid: Special rooms, specific tests (MRI/CT in some), outside medicines. Quality: Varies - GH Chennai, Madurai Medical College = good facilities.

instruction: Srirangam kovil la donation box QR scan potten pa, 100 rupees ku. 8000 debit aaidichu! Kovil QR dhaan, enna aachchu?
output: Aiyyo pa! Fraud gang original QR mela fake sticker ottirukkaanga. PIN enter pannumbodhu amount check pannama pottiye. Srirangam, Samayapuram la idhu romba nadakkudhu. Bank ku complaint pannu, cyber crime la FIR podu.

instruction: RTI endraal enna? Yaar file pannalaam?
output: RTI = Right to Information Act 2005 - Government information perum urimai. Any Indian citizen file pannalam. NRI, Company, Trust - file panna mudiyaadhu. Government, PSU, government-funded NGO ellaathukkum RTI apply.

instruction: குழந்தைகளுக்கு திருக்குறள் எப்படி சுவாரஸ்யமாக கற்பிக்கலாம்?
output: 1) ஒவ்வொரு குறளுக்கும் ஒரு சின்ன கதை சொல்லலாம், 2) படங்கள் போட்டு explain பண்ணலாம், 3) பாட்டாக பாடலாம் - YouTube-ல் நிறைய videos உள்ளன, 4) Role play செய்யலாம், 5) 'Thirukkural for Kids' apps பயன்படுத்தலாம், 6) Daily challenge - ஒரு குறள் கேட்டு அவர்களே அர்த்தம் சொல்ல வைக்கலாம். சிறுவயதிலேயே பழகினால் lifetime remember பண்ணுவார்கள்.

instruction: ஆயுஷ்மான் பாரத் (PMJAY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: ₹5 lakh free health insurance per family per year. Eligibility based on SECC 2011 BPL data. Check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in. Get card FREE at govt hospital/CSC with Aadhaar + ration card. Covers 1,500+ procedures at empanelled hospitals. In TN, combined with CMCHIS.

instruction: Spy / உளவாளி பற்றி என்ன சொல்கிறார் வள்ளுவர்?
output: குறள்: 'ஒற்றும் உரைசான்ற நூலும் இவையிரண்டும் தெற்றென்க மன்னவன் கண்'. உளவாளிகளும், நல்ல நூல்களும் அரசனின் கண்கள். மேலும்: 'ஒற்றினான் ஒற்றிப் பொருள்தெரியா மன்னவன் கொற்றங் கொளக்கிடந்தது இல்'. உளவு இல்லாமல் ஆட்சி நடத்த முடியாது. Intelligence gathering is essential for governance - RAW, IB concepts 2000+ years ago!

instruction: Lab test results abnormal-aa vandhurucchu - panic aaganumaa?
output: Don't panic! First: 1) Consult doctor who ordered test - they know context, 2) Slightly abnormal ≠ disease, 3) Reference ranges vary by lab, 4) Single test may not be conclusive, 5) Repeat test may be needed. Common false positives: Dehydration, recent food, medications. Important: Don't Google and self-diagnose. Doctor will: Correlate with symptoms, order confirmatory tests if needed, explain significance.

instruction: Naturopathy centres TN-la enge irukku?
output: Government: 1) Government Yoga and Naturopathy Medical College, Chennai, 2) District AYUSH hospitals (Naturo units). Private: 1) Jindal Naturecure Institute, Bangalore (near TN), 2) Nature Cure Hospital, Chennai, 3) Various wellness resorts. Services: Hydrotherapy, mud therapy, massage, diet therapy, yoga. Duration: 7-21 days programs. Cost: Government free/nominal, Private Rs.2,000-8,000/day. Good for: Diabetes, BP, obesity, stress, detox.

instruction: Fever-kku traditional treatment enna?
output: Traditional fever remedies: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (best for viral), 2) Papaya leaf juice (dengue prevention), 3) Coriander seed water, 4) Tulsi + ginger tea, 5) Vetiver (Khus) water for cooling, 6) Light food - kanji (rice porridge), 7) Rest and hydration. Wet cloth: On forehead for high fever. When doctor needed: >103°F, convulsions, rash, severe headache, confusion, lasting >3 days.

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: SC/ST reservation = undeserving students getting seats
output: Fact: Fact: Reservation = Equalizing historical disadvantage. SC/ST students also clear cutoffs, just in their category. Many top performers are from reserved categories. Reservation doesn't mean zero merit - minimum marks required. Social mobility happening due to reservation - breaking caste barriers in education. Focus on your preparation, not others' category.

instruction: Scholarship-ku thevaiyana documents ennenna?
output: Standard documents: 1) Aadhaar card 2) Bank passbook (student name) 3) Income certificate (latest) 4) Caste/Community certificate 5) Bonafide certificate from institution 6) Previous year marks card 7) Passport size photo 8) Fee receipt. Special cases: Disability certificate, EWS certificate, BPL card, domicile certificate. Tip: Keep original + 3 photocopies + scanned PDF ready.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-la BBA/BCA admission eppadi nadakkudhu?
output: +2 any group pass. Govt colleges-ku: TNGASA counselling moolam. Private colleges: Direct application. BBA - Business padippu, BCA - Computer padippu. Duration: 3 years. Govt college fee: ₹3,000-8,000/year. Anna University affiliated colleges pala irukku.

instruction: Police investigation-la cooperate pannanuumaa?
output: Aama, reasonable cooperation venum. Aanaal rights therinchukonga: 1) Self-incriminating statement kodukka vendaam, 2) Lawyer presence-la statement kodukkalam, 3) Illegal search oppose pannalam, 4) Narco test, brain mapping - consent venum.

instruction: Thervu bayam (exam fear) eppadi pokkuvathu?
output: Tips: 1) Nalla thayaarippu = confidence - syllabus complete pannunga 2) Mock tests ezhudhi pazhagunga 3) Exam-ku mundhina naal light revision mattum 4) Deep breathing exercises 5) Positive self-talk 6) Proper sleep (7-8 hrs) 7) Light, healthy food 8) Hall ticket, pen ready-a vaiyunga. Severe anxiety irundhal school counsellor-a santhiyunga.

instruction: Vehicle fitness certificate eppodhu venum?
output: Transport vehicles: Every year (8 years-kkup piragu every 6 months). Non-transport: 15 years-kkup piragu every 5 years. Test: Emission, brakes, lights, etc. Expired fitness: Rs.2,000 fine. Online booking: parivahan.gov.in.

instruction: Tinder/Bumble la match aanaen - 2 months pesinom, 'stuck abroad, wallet stolen, 20,000 need for hotel, will return when back.' Photos, video calls - genuine feel aagudhu.
output: Classic romance scam pattern. Video calls - pre-recorded or accomplice. 'Emergency abroad' - untraceable request. 2 months investment creates emotional bond - hard to say no. NEVER send money to people you haven't met in person. If genuine, they have other options - embassy, family.

instruction: Civil case file செய்ய என்ன procedure?
output: Steps: 1) Lawyer consult, 2) Plaint draft, 3) Court fee pay, 4) Filing, 5) Summons to defendant, 6) Written statement, 7) Issues framing, 8) Evidence, 9) Arguments, 10) Judgment. Time: 2-5 years (varies). e-Courts: ecourts.gov.in case status track.

instruction: Mentally ill person treatment-kku yaar consent taranum?
output: Mental Healthcare Act 2017 rules: 1) Nominated representative (patient designates when competent), 2) Family members (spouse, parents, sibling - in order), 3) No one available: Hospital board decision. Advance directive: Patient can write treatment preferences when competent. Involuntary admission: Only if danger to self/others - magistrate approval needed within 24 hours.

instruction: நண்பன் துரோகம் செய்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: 'நட்பிற்கு வீற்றிருக்கை யாதெனின் கொட்பின்றி ஒல்லுவ தொல்யாக்க'. நல்ல நட்பு என்பது எந்த சூழ்நிலையிலும் support பண்றது. துரோகம் செய்தவன் உண்மையான நண்பன் இல்லை. 'பழைமையிற் கேண்மை செய்தார் உடையார்' - பழைய நட்பு மதிப்பானது, ஆனால் toxic friendship விட்டு விலகுவது wise.

instruction: Mentally ill person treatment-க்கு யார் consent தரணும்?
output: Mental Healthcare Act 2017 rules: 1) Nominated representative (patient designates when competent), 2) Family members (spouse, parents, sibling - in order), 3) No one available: Hospital board decision. Advance directive: Patient can write treatment preferences when competent. Involuntary admission: Only if danger to self/others - magistrate approval needed within 24 hours.

instruction: NEET result varaadhu, panicked aa irukken. 'Management quota seat guaranteed - MBBS 50 lakhs, no donation receipt' nu call vandhudhu. Desperate aa irukken, trust pannalama?
output: 'Guaranteed seat without proper process' impossible. Management quota transparent fees irukkum with receipts. 'No receipt' = illegal = scam. 50 lakhs vaangitu seat varaadhu, complain panna mudiyaadhu (no receipt). Desperation exploit pannuvaanga - official counselling wait pannunga.

instruction: Site வாங்கப் போறேன், என்னென்ன பாக்கணும்?
output: முதல்ல: 1) Patta யார் பேர்ல இருக்கு, 2) EC 30 years clear-ஆ, 3) Survey number match ஆகுதா, 4) Poramboke இல்லையே, 5) Approval (DTCP/CMDA) இருக்கா. எல்லாத்தையும் lawyer-கிட்ட verify பண்ணுங்க. Rush-ல வாங்காதீங்க.

instruction: Court fee evvalavu kattanum?
output: TN Court Fees Act based: Property suits - value based (1-10%), Money suits - amount based, Injunction - fixed fee. Consumer forum: Free up to Rs.5 lakh. Lok Adalat: No fee. Poor litigants: Court fee exemption available. e-payment: ecourts.gov.in.

instruction: PMAY (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) யாருக்கு கிடைக்கும்?
output: EWS (ஆண்டு வருமானம் Rs.3 lakh வரை), LIG (Rs.6 lakh வரை), MIG (Rs.18 lakh வரை) குடும்பங்களுக்கு. குடும்பத்தில் யாருக்கும் pucca வீடு இருக்கக்கூடாது. pmaymis.gov.in-ல் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Doctor prescription evvalavu naal valid?
output: General rule: 1) Acute illness prescription - use immediately, 2) Chronic medicines - usually for prescribed duration (30-90 days), 3) Controlled substances - single use only. Refills: Some pharmacies refill for chronic conditions (diabetes, BP) without new prescription. Best practice: Regular doctor checkup for chronic medicines. Expired prescription: Pharmacist discretion, usually won't dispense.

instruction: Hospital bill adhigamaa pottaanga, enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Itemized bill kelunga, 2) Each item verify - MRP check for medicines, tests actually done verify, 3) Duplicate charges check, 4) Compare with displayed rates, 5) Written complaint to hospital administrator, 6) No response: Consumer Forum. Evidence: Bill copy, displayed rates photo, admission estimate. Overcharging = Unfair trade practice.

instruction: Psychiatrist vs Psychologist - யாரை பார்க்கணும்?
output: Psychiatrist (MD): Medical doctor, can prescribe medicines. See for: Severe depression, bipolar, schizophrenia, anxiety needing medication. Psychologist (MPhil/PhD): Non-medical, provides therapy/counseling. See for: Stress, relationship issues, mild-moderate depression/anxiety, trauma. Often work together: Psychiatrist for meds + Psychologist for therapy. First step: Can start with either, they'll refer if needed.

instruction: மூவர் (Thevaram Trio) யார் யார்?
output: மூவர் - தேவாரம் பாடிய மூன்று முக்கிய நாயன்மார்கள்: 1) திருஞானசம்பந்தர் - 3 வயதில் உமையவள் பால் ஊட்டியதாக கதை, 16 வயதில் சமணர்களை வாதத்தில் வென்றவர், 2) திருநாவுக்கரசர் (அப்பர்) - முதலில் ஜைன சமணர், பின் சைவர் ஆனவர், 'நாவுக்கரசர்' என்றால் நாவின் அரசர், 3) சுந்தரர் - 'தோழமை' பக்தி, சிவனை நண்பனாக பாடியவர். இவர்கள் 274 கோயில்களை பாடல் பெற்ற தலங்களாக்கினார்கள்.

instruction: வங்கியிலிருந்து போன் வந்து 'உங்கள் account block ஆகிவிடும், OTP சொல்லுங்கள்' என்கிறார்கள். கொடுக்கலாமா?
output: ஒருபோதும் கொடுக்காதீர்கள்! வங்கி ஊழியர்கள் OTP கேட்க மாட்டார்கள். இது 100% மோசடி அழைப்பு. உடனே போனை வையுங்கள்.

instruction: Trading app-la daily 10% return guarantee solraanga, invest pannalama?
output: Ponzi scheme ithu! Daily 10% impossible - 3650% per year aagum. App moodividum, panam ellam poirum. SEBI registered platforms mattum use pannunga.

instruction: 274 பாடல் பெற்ற தலங்கள் என்றால் என்ன?
output: 63 நாயன்மார்களால் (சைவ பக்தர்கள்) தேவாரம், திருவாசகம் ஆகியவற்றில் பாடப்பட்ட 274 சிவன் கோயில்கள். இவற்றில் பெரும்பாலானவை தமிழ்நாட்டில். 'முத்து திருப்பதிகம்' என்று சிறப்புப் பெயர். தேவாரம் - சம்பந்தர், சுந்தரர், அப்பர் பாடியது. திருவாசகம் - மாணிக்கவாசகர் பாடியது. ஒவ்வொரு கோயிலுக்கும் சிறப்பான sthalapurana (history) உண்டு.

instruction: Naan siru vivasaayi. Organic vivasaayam seiyya virumburen. Enna udhavi kidaikkum?
output:
Organic vivasaayathukku pala thittangal ullana:

1. **PKVY Scheme**
   - Help: ₹50,000/hectare (3 years)
   - Cluster basis (50 farmers)
   - Where: District Agriculture Officer

2. **PGS Certification (Free)**
   - pgsindia-ncof.gov.in
   - Apply as group

3. **TN Organic Farming Policy**
   - Vermicompost unit: 50% subsidy
   - Bio-fertilizer: Free
   - Where: Block Agriculture Office

4. **Training**
   - KVK - Free training
   - TNAU - Certificate courses

5. **Market Support**
   - Organic Mandi through e-NAM
   - Direct sale allowed

instruction: 'PM கிசான் 6000 ரூபாய் பெற இந்த இணைப்பில் பதிவு செய்யுங்கள்' என்று வாட்ஸ்அப் செய்தி வந்தது. பதிவு செய்யலாமா?
output: இது மோசடி. PM கிசான் பதிவு pmkisan.gov.in இல் மட்டுமே. வாட்ஸ்அப் இணைப்புகள் உங்கள் தகவல்களைத் திருட உருவாக்கப்பட்டவை. அரசு திட்டங்களுக்கு அதிகாரபூர்வ இணையதளங்களை மட்டுமே பயன்படுத்துங்கள்.

instruction: 'Celebrity meet and greet - ticket 5000, limited seats' என்று fan page-ல் post பார்த்தேன். Book செய்யலாமா?
output: Official page-ஆ verify செய்யுங்கள். Fan pages போலியான events promote செய்யும். பணம் கட்டி ஏமாறாதீர்கள். Official websites-ல் மட்டுமே book செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana (PMMY) - loan eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Collateral-free loan for small business. Categories: Shishu (up to ₹50,000 - start business), Kishore (₹50,001-₹5 lakh - expansion), Tarun (₹5-₹10 lakh - larger expansion). Eligibility: Manufacturing/Trading/Service sector, Non-Corporate Small Business. Apply: mudra.org.in or nearby Bank. Need: Business Plan, ID Proof, Address Proof

instruction: Natural = Safe என்பது correct-ஆ?
output: NOT always! Natural doesn't mean: 1) No side effects (many herbs have), 2) No interactions (herb-drug interactions real), 3) Safe for everyone (allergies, conditions), 4) Any amount is okay (overdose possible). Examples: 1) Neem - excess can harm liver, 2) Turmeric - blood thinner interaction, 3) Aloe - not for pregnant, 4) Some herbs toxic in large doses. Safe approach: 1) Moderate amounts, 2) Inform doctors, 3) Buy quality products, 4) Watch for reactions.

instruction: Orphan/single parent children-க்கு படிப்பு உதவி என்ன?
output: சலுகைகள்: 1) Social Welfare Department scholarship 2) Free education in government schools 3) Hostel facility free 4) PM CARES for Children scheme (COVID orphans) - ₹10 lakh insurance + monthly stipend + free education till graduation 5) NGO scholarships. Required: Death certificate of parent(s), income certificate. District Social Welfare Officer-ஐ அணுகுங்கள்.

instruction: Clinical trial-la participate pannalaamaa? Risks enna?
output: Voluntary participation. Requirements: 1) Ethics Committee approval, 2) Detailed informed consent, 3) Insurance coverage for participants, 4) Right to withdraw anytime, 5) Compensation for injury. Risks: Unknown side effects, may receive placebo. Benefits: Access to new treatments, free care during trial, compensation. Verify: CTRI registration (ctri.nic.in). Never feel pressured.

instruction: ITI-la admission-ku enna procedure-nga? Fees evlo?
output: 10th/8th pass pannirukkanum. www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in-la apply pannu/pannunga. Government ITI full free - fee illai, tools, books ellam free. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. June-July-la admission start aagum.

instruction: பெற்றோர்களுடன் misunderstanding இருந்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: 'அன்னையும் பிதாவும் முன்னறி தெய்வம்' (கொன்றைவேந்தன்). பெற்றோரே முதல் கடவுள். மேலும்: 'ஈன்றபொழுதின் பெரிதுவக்கும் தன்மகனை சான்றோன் எனக்கேட்ட தாய்'. தாய் தந்தை நம் நல்லதற்கே சொல்கிறார்கள். Patience-உடன் explain பண்ணுங்கள், respect maintain பண்ணுங்கள்.

instruction: AC room-ல் இருந்தா cold வரும் - உண்மையா?
output: Myth! Cold caused by: Viruses, not temperature. AC connection: 1) Dry air irritates throat, 2) Poor AC maintenance = allergens, 3) Indoor crowding = virus spread, 4) Temperature shock going in/out. Prevention: Clean AC filters, adequate humidity, proper ventilation. Cold = viral infection - spread by contact/droplets, not AC itself.

instruction: புதிய ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: 1. parivahan.gov.in இல் ஸ்லாட் புக் செய்யவும் 2. முதலில் கற்றல் உரிமம் (LLR) பெறவும்: வயது: இருசக்கர 18+, நான்கு சக்கர 18+ (கியர்), 20+ (வாணிக). ஆதார், முகவரி சான்று, மருத்துவ சான்று தேவை. கட்டணம்: ₹200-500 3. 30 நாட்கள் கழித்து DL டெஸ்ட் எழுதவும்

instruction: Veetuku oru van vandhudhu, 'Free health checkup, Ayushman Bharat registration' nu. Aadhaar card kuduthen, fingerprint machine la vachanga. Aprom bank la irundhu kaasu poiduchu. Eppidi possible?
output: Aiyyo ayya! Ivanga Aadhaar fingerprint capture panni AEPS (Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) la unga bank account la irundhu kaasu eduthirukkanga. Ayushman Bharat door-to-door biometric collect pannaadhu. Immediately bank ku ponga, AEPS disable pannunga, police complaint kudungal.

instruction: வீடு காலி செய்யும்போது advance திரும்ப தருவாங்களா?
output: ஆம், கட்டாயம் தர வேண்டும். வீட்டிற்கு damage இருந்தால் repair cost கழித்து மீதி தர வேண்டும். Normal wear and tear-க்கு கழிக்க முடியாது. Owner தராவிட்டால் Rent Authority அல்லது Civil Court-ல் case போடலாம்.

instruction: Kaaranam sollaama job-la irundhu remove pannitaanga
output: Wrongful termination: 1) Written explanation demand, 2) Labour Commissioner, 3) Labour Court/Industrial Tribunal. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Standing Orders: Company rules check pannunga. Workmen vs Manager: Different procedures apply.

instruction: 'Amma, naan Priya pesuren, US la passport stolen, embassy la stuck, urgent aa $2000 vendum Western Union la anuppu' nu call vandhudhu. En ponnu US la dhaan irukka, genuine aa?
output: Ayya, overseas emergency scam idhu. Voice similar aa irundhaalum, verify pannunga. Daughter original number ku WhatsApp video call pannunga. Real embassy situations la different procedures irukkum. Western Union immediate transfer request - big red flag. Verify first, send later.

instruction: Diagnostic lab report-la doubt - retest ketkalaamaa?
output: Yes! Your right. Options: 1) Same lab - request repeat test (may charge or free depending), 2) Different NABL-accredited lab, 3) Hospital lab if admission. Red flags: 1) Result doesn't match symptoms, 2) Drastic change from previous, 3) Clerical errors visible. Lab liability: Wrong report causing harm = negligence. Verify: NABL accreditation for reliability.

instruction: வாட்ஸ்அப்பில் 'Amazon அதிர்ஷ்ட சீட்டில் வென்றீர்கள்' என்று வந்தது. இணைப்பை அழுத்தலாமா?
output: அழுத்தாதீர்கள்! Amazon இப்படி வாட்ஸ்அப்பில் செய்தி அனுப்பாது. இந்த இணைப்பு உங்கள் தகவல்களைத் திருட உருவாக்கப்பட்டது.

instruction: Campus placement-ku eppadi prepare aavadhu?
output: Placement preparation: 1) Aptitude - RS Aggarwal, IndiaBix daily 2) Technical - Core subjects revision 3) Coding - HackerRank, LeetCode (for IT) 4) Resume - 1 page, achievement focused 5) Communication - Mock interviews practice 6) GD - Current affairs, articulation 7) HR questions - self-intro, strengths, goals. Timeline: Start 6 months before placement season. CGPA matters - maintain above 7 minimum. Internships boost resume significantly.

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Getting Birth Certificate for Newborn - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Hi, en wife delivery aayiruchu. Baby-ku birth certificate vaanganum. Eppadi?

Assistant: Congratulations! Birth certificate vaanga indha steps follow pannunga:

**Mudhalil:** Hospital-la irundhu discharge summary vaangunga - adhu la baby birth date, time, weight ellam irukkum.

**Enga apply pannanum:** Neengal enga irukkeenga - hospital area municipality/panchayat or unga home area?

User: Hospital Chennai-la, but naanga Tambaram-la irukkoom

Assistant: Okay, Chennai hospital-la delivery na, Chennai Corporation-la dhan register pannanum. Hospital location-based registration.

**2 Options:**

1. **Hospital-layae** - Periya hospitals (Govt/Big Private) la birth registration desk irukku. Avanga direct register panniduvanga.

2. **Corporation Office** - Hospital register pannala na, hospital area Corporation Zonal Office-la neengal apply pannanum.

Unga hospital register pannuchaa illa neengal pannumaa?

User: Hospital register pannala. Naangal dhan pannanum. Enna documents vendum?

Assistant: Okay, neengal apply pannanum na indha documents ready pannunga:

**Documents:**
1. Hospital Discharge Summary (Original + Copy)
2. Father's Aadhaar Card (Original + Copy)
3. Mother's Aadhaar Card (Original + Copy)
4. Marriage Certificate (Original + Copy)
5. Address Proof

**Important:** 21 days-kulla apply pannunga - FREE! Adhukku apram ₹50 late fee + Affidavit vendum.

Baby birth date enna? 21 days kazhinjuchaa?

User: Illa, 10 days dhan aachu. Online apply panna mudiyumaa?

Assistant: Super, time irukku! Yes, online apply pannalam:

**Online Process:**
1. **Website:** chennaicorporation.gov.in
2. **Click:** Birth Registration
3. **Fill:** Baby details, Parents details
4. **Upload:** Documents scan
5. **Submit**

**Or** tnreginet.gov.in la "Birth Certificate" section use pannalaam.

**Apram:**
- Application number kedaikum
- 3-5 days-la certificate ready
- Download pannalam or office-la collect pannalam

Online try pannureengalaa, illa office-ku pogalaamaa?

User: Online try panren. Baby-ku name decide aagala, adhu problem aa?

Assistant: No problem! Name illama register pannalam:

**2 Options:**

1. **Without Name Register:** Birth certificate "Baby of [Mother's Name]" nu varum. Later name add pannalam.

2. **Add Name Later:** 
   - 1 year-kulla name add pannalam (No fee)
   - Form fill panni same office-la submit
   - Documents: Original Birth Certificate + Affidavit

**Tip:** Naming ceremony / Naming date decide aana apram add pannunga. Most people 1-3 months-la name add pannuvanga.

School admission-ku full name certificate pogum, so worry pannaadheenga!

Vera enna doubt irukku?

User: Thanks! Oru doubt - Aadhaar card baby-ku eppo apply pannalam?

Assistant: Good question! Baby Aadhaar apply pannalam:

**When:** Birth-ku apram anytime - but 5 years-kulla recommended

**Baal Aadhaar (0-5 years):**
- **Color:** Blue (Regular Aadhaar white)
- **Biometric:** Photo only (No fingerprint/iris)
- **Validity:** 5 years - apram mandatory update

**Documents:**
- Baby's Birth Certificate
- Either Parent's Aadhaar (POI & POA)
- Hospital Discharge (optional)

**Where:**
- Aadhaar Enrollment Center
- Appointment: appointments.uidai.gov.in

**Fee:** FREE (first enrollment)

**Process:**
1. Book appointment
2. Go with baby + parent
3. Baby photo capture
4. Parent biometric verification
5. 90 days-la Aadhaar varum

Birth certificate ready aana apram Aadhaar apply pannunga! Anything else?

instruction: பயிர் காப்பீடு (PMFBY) எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply before sowing at pmfby.gov.in, bank, or CSC. Premium: Kharif 2%, Rabi 1.5%, Commercial 5% - rest paid by govt. KCC holders auto-enrolled. Documents: Land records, Aadhaar, bank account. Report crop loss within 72 hours for claim. Helpline: 14447.

instruction: Rich aaga aasai - aanaal shortcut vendaam. Enna vazhi?
output: 'Arulodum anbodum vaaraap porulaakkam pullaar purala vidal'. Arul, anbu illaamal sambaadhikkum panathai vittuvidunagl. Melum: 'Theeyavai seidhar kedudhal' - wrong ways-la earn panninal kettuppoveergal. Hard work + smart work + integrity = sustainable wealth. Shortcuts lead to downfall!

instruction: Employer insurance போனா personal insurance வேணுமா?
output: Yes, recommended! Reasons: 1) Job change = coverage gap, 2) Corporate cover usually basic (Rs.3-5 lakhs), 3) Family may not be covered, 4) Age increases premium later, 5) Pre-existing conditions develop. Strategy: 1) Corporate as primary, 2) Personal as top-up, 3) Super top-up for high coverage. Start early: Lower premium, no waiting period issues later.

instruction: Maternity leave evvalavu naal kidaikkum?
output: Maternity Benefit Act 2017: 26 weeks paid leave (first two children), 12 weeks (third child onwards). Before delivery: 8 weeks max. Adoption/surrogate: 12 weeks. Miscarriage: 6 weeks. 10+ employees company-kku applicable. Creche facility mandatory (50+ employees).

instruction: Pregnancy-ல் free checkup எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Free at: 1) PHC (Primary Health Centre), 2) Government hospitals, 3) Urban health centres. Services: 1) Registration (first trimester), 2) Regular checkups (minimum 4 ANC visits), 3) Blood/urine tests, 4) Ultrasound scans, 5) Iron/folic acid tablets, 6) Tetanus injection, 7) High risk identification. Documents: Mother and Child Protection Card issued. Important: Register early for complete care.

instruction: Cervical/breast cancer screening free-யா?
output: Yes! Population-based screening program. Available: PHC, government hospitals. Cervical: VIA (Visual Inspection with Acetic Acid) - simple, painless. Breast: Clinical breast examination. Age: 30+ years, every 3-5 years. HPV vaccine: Available for cervical cancer prevention (9-26 years ideal). Early detection: Curable. Camps: Regular screening camps conducted. Ask at PHC.

instruction: Death certificate எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: இறப்பு நடந்த 21 நாட்களுக்குள் register செய்ய வேண்டும். Hospital death-க்கு hospital certificate, வீட்டில் என்றால் declaration form தேவை. Corporation/Panchayat office-ல் register செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: 'Kerala Lottery la 10 lakh win panniteenga, tax 15,000 pay pannulle' nu call vannille. Ticket vaangiyilla, win aakumo?
output: Ticket illaama win aakumo alle? Kerala Lottery phone la call pannillalle, tax advance vaangillalle. Fraudsters alle ivanga. Muttom, Kollencode la fishermen ipdi maatikittanga. Block pannu number.

instruction: Cold/cough-kku veetu vaithiyam enna?
output: Effective remedies: 1) Chukku Kaapi - Dry ginger + pepper + palm jaggery boiled in water, 2) Turmeric milk (Manjal Paal) - Before sleep, 3) Steam inhalation with tulsi/eucalyptus, 4) Honey + ginger juice, 5) Pepper rasam, 6) Tulsi kashayam, 7) Gargle with warm salt water. Avoid: Cold water, ice cream, curd. When to see doctor: Fever >3 days, breathing difficulty, blood in phlegm.

instruction: SSC CHSL enna post kidaikkum? 12th pass-ku best option?
output: SSC CHSL (Combined Higher Secondary Level): 12th pass Central Govt jobs. Posts: LDC (Lower Division Clerk), DEO (Data Entry Operator), Postal Assistant, Sorting Assistant. Salary: ₹20,000-60,000. Exam: Tier 1 (CBT) + Tier 2 (Descriptive). Syllabus: English, Maths, Reasoning, GK. Typing test required. Age: 18-27. Best option for 12th pass - stable central govt job. Apply: www.ssc.nic.in.

instruction: Online resources effectively use panrathu eppadi?
output: Best free resources: 1) NPTEL - IIT professors lectures 2) SWAYAM - certificate courses 3) Khan Academy - basics strong 4) YouTube - Physics Wallah, Unacademy 5) MIT OpenCourseWare - advanced topics 6) Coursera audit mode - free learning 7) Google Scholar - research papers 8) LibGen - textbooks (use responsibly). Tip: Schedule online study time, avoid distraction rabbit holes. Download for offline access.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'CBSE board training mandatory. Register with 5000 fee for CBSE certified teacher status.' Idhuvum mandatory aa?
output: CBSE training programs announced through schools, not WhatsApp. Official CBSE training through DIKSHA platform is free. 'CBSE certified teacher' is not an official designation. Schools receive training circulars officially - ask your administration.

instruction: Consumer forum-la case file seyya ennenna documents venum?
output: Required: 1) Written complaint (5 copies), 2) Bill/Invoice copy, 3) Warranty/Guarantee card, 4) Correspondence with seller (letters, emails), 5) ID proof, 6) Address proof, 7) Photos/Videos of defect. Online filing: edaakhil.nic.in portal moolam.

instruction: Call vandhuchu baa - 'Nee account block aagum baa, KYC update pannu' nu. OTP kekkuraanga baa. Enna pannudhu?
output: Fraud baa idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekkumaa baa? Kekaadhu! 'Block aagum' nu bayamudhuthuraanga. Branch ku nee poi pesu baa. Katpadi, Ambur la leather businessmen ipdi maatikirukkanga. Phone la details kudukkaadhe baa.

instruction: Arrear/Supplementary exam eppadi clear aavadhu?
output: Arrear clear strategy: 1) Previous failures reason analyze pannunga 2) Important chapters mattum focus - 60% weightage chapters 3) Previous year arrear question papers practice 4) Time: 1-2 months dedicated preparation 5) Easy questions first attempt 6) Passing marks aim: 35/100. Exam: October (10th), June (12th). Same syllabus, slightly easier paper. Private candidates also apply possible. Attempt limit illai.

instruction: Moottu vali aaru maasama irukku, scan edukkanumaa? (Senior citizen)
output: 6 months joint pain - orthopedic consultation needed. Tests: 1) X-ray first (usually sufficient), 2) MRI if X-ray normal but pain persists, 3) Blood tests (RA, uric acid). Government: Orthopedic OPD - free consultation and basic tests. Common causes: Osteoarthritis (wear and tear), rheumatoid arthritis. Treatment: 1) Medicines, 2) Physiotherapy (free at government), 3) Joint replacement if severe (CMCHIS covers). Self-care: Weight control, walking, avoid squatting.

instruction: VAO certificate thara maattengaraar, enna panradhu? (Rural Tamil)
output: Tahsildar-kitta written complaint kodunga. Right to Service Act-in keezh time limit irukku - delay aana penalty. Collector Grievance Day (weekly) ponga. Last option: RTI pottu why delay-nnu kelunga.

instruction: அடல் பென்ஷன் யோஜனா (APY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Unorganized Sector Pension திட்டம். வயது: 18-40 வயது சேரலாம். 60 வயதில் பென்ஷன்: ₹1,000/₹2,000/₹3,000/₹4,000/₹5,000 மாதம். Contribution: வயது + pension amount பொறுத்து மாறும் (18 வயதில் சேர்ந்தால் ₹210/month for ₹5,000 pension). நன்மைகள்: Government co-contribution, Spouse-க்கு pension தொடரும், Nominee-க்கு corpus கிடைக்கும். சேர: Bank/Post Office

instruction: Engal kudumbathula pudhusa kuzhanthai piranthuirukku. Enna ella documents and benefits-ku apply pannanum?
output:
Step-by-step seiyya vendiyavai:

First 21 days (Urgent!):
1. Birth Certificate Registration - Hospital/Municipality/Panchayat - Free

First 3 months:
2. Baby's Aadhaar Card - Aadhaar Enrollment Center
3. Add name in Ration Card - tnpds.gov.in

Mother's Benefits:
4. Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit (₹18,000) - PHC/Anganwadi
5. PMMVY - Central (₹5,000) - First child only
6. Amma Baby Care Kit - Auto at Govt Hospital

If girl child, additional:
7. CM Girl Child Protection Scheme - ₹50,000 FD
8. Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana - Post Office/Bank - 8.2% interest

instruction: Padhinen Siddhargal (18 Siddhars) yaar yaar?
output: Padhinen Siddhargal: 1) Nandeesar, 2) Agathiyar, 3) Thirumoolar, 4) Punnakkisar, 5) Pulippaani, 6) Kaalaanginaathar, 7) Azhuguni Siddhar, 8) Agappey Siddhar, 9) Theraiyar, 10) Kudhambai Siddhar, 11) Karuvoorar, 12) Idaikaadar, 13) Kamalamuni, 14) Valmiki, 15) Bogar, 16) Machchamuni, 17) Konganar, 18) Sattaimuni. (Pattiyal maarupadalam - vera versions-um ullana).

instruction: Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana (RVY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: BPL மூத்த குடிமக்களுக்கு இலவச உதவி சாதனங்கள். தகுதி: 60+ வயது, BPL, Age-related disability உள்ளவர்கள். Free Items: Walking stick, Elbow crutch, Walker, Tripod, Wheelchair, Hearing aid, Spectacles, Artificial dentures. விண்ணப்பம்: ALIMCO assessment camps (District-ல் announce செய்வார்கள்). Documents: Age proof, BPL card, Aadhaar.

instruction: Owner வீட்டு lock உடைத்து சாமான் வெளியே போட்டார் - என்ன செய்வது?
output: இது serious criminal offence - house trespass, criminal intimidation, theft ஆகும். உடனடியாக: 1) Police-ல் FIR போடுங்கள் (IPC 448, 441), 2) Magistrate Court-ல் complaint, 3) Civil Court-ல் damages claim செய்யலாம். Photos, videos evidence-ஆக வைத்துக்கொள்ளுங்கள்.

instruction: ஆதார் - மொபைல் எண் மாற்றம் எப்படி?
output: Cannot be done online for security reasons. Must visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra (ASK) with original Aadhaar and new active SIM. Biometric verification required. Fee: ₹50. Update is immediate with SMS confirmation.

instruction: நான் 65 வயது முதியவர். தனியாக இருக்கிறேன். என்னென்ன benefits, safety measures பெறலாம்?
output:
Monthly Income/Pension:
1. Old Age Pension (TN) - ₹1,000/month (60-79), ₹1,500 (80+)
2. PMVVY (LIC) - ₹15 லட்சம் → ₹9,250/month
3. SCSS (Post Office) - 8.2% interest quarterly

Healthcare:
4. CMCHIS/Ayushman Bharat - ₹5 லட்சம் free treatment
5. Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana - Free walking stick, wheelchair, hearing aid
6. PM Janaushadhi - 50-90% மலிவான மருந்துகள்

Safety & Legal:
7. Elder Line - 14567 (24x7)
8. Maintenance Tribunal - பிள்ளைகள் பராமரிக்கவில்லை என்றால் - ₹10,000/month order
9. Police Senior Citizen Cell - Regular check-ups

Travel: Railway 40-50% discount, TN Bus free
Banking: Senior Citizen FD - Extra 0.5% interest

instruction: சோழர் வெண்கல சிலைகள் (Bronze sculptures) சிறப்பு என்ன?
output: சோழர் காலத்து வெண்கல சிலைகள் உலகப் புகழ் பெற்றவை. Lost wax technique (மெழுகு நீக்கல் முறை) பயன்படுத்தப்பட்டது. சிறப்புகள்: 1) நடராஜர் - மிகவும் famous, cosmic dance, 2) Proportion perfection, 3) Dynamic poses, 4) Fine details, 5) Bronze alloy - centuries-ஆக intact. Thanjavur Art Gallery, Chennai Museum-ல் collection உள்ளது. Swamimalai (Kumbakonam அருகே) இன்றும் traditional bronze casting நடக்கிறது. GI tag பெற்றது.

instruction: Siddhar Peedangal endraal enna?
output: Siddhar Peedangal enbavai siddhargal thavam seidha, samaadhi adaindha idangalil amaindha aasiramangal. Ingge: 1) Siddha maruththuvam karpikkapadum, 2) Yoga, meditation classes nadakkum, 3) Siddhar noolgal preserved seiyapadum, 4) Traditional treatments kidaikkum. Gnana Boomi Trust, Siddhar Sabai pondra organizations ivattrai maintain panraanga. Serious seekers ingge study panraanga.

instruction: Siddha doctor qualification என்ன? Verify எப்படி?
output: Qualification: BSMS (Bachelor of Siddha Medicine and Surgery) - 5.5 years. Higher: MD (Siddha). Registration: State Medical Council mandatory. Verify: 1) TN Siddha Medical Council register, 2) Display of registration certificate, 3) BSMS degree certificate. Unqualified practice: Report to council, police. Titles: Siddha Maruthuvam, Vaidhiyar - verify registration before consulting.

instruction: 'CIBIL score low-ஆ இருந்தாலும் loan தருவோம்' என்று SMS வந்தது. Apply செய்யலாமா?
output: Low CIBIL-க்கு loan தருவோம் என்பது bait. இவர்கள் processing fee வாங்கிவிட்டு மறைந்துவிடுவார்கள். CIBIL improve செய்து regular bank-ல் try செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Rent increase accept panna maruthal enna aagum?
output: Owner agreement renew seyya marukkalam. Proper notice koduthu vacate seyyach sollalam. But agreement period mudiyum varai existing rent-la continue seyyalam. Forceful eviction illegal.

instruction: அமைச்சர் / minister-ன் தகுதி என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'கருவியும் காலமும் செய்கையும் செய்யும் அருவினையும் மாண்டது அமைச்சு'. Tools, timing, method, execution - எல்லாவற்றிலும் திறமையானவர் நல்ல அமைச்சர். மேலும்: 'வன்கண் குடிகாத்தல் கற்றறிதல் ஆள்வினையோடு ஐந்துடன் மாண்டது அமைச்சு'. தைரியம், குடிமக்களைக் காத்தல், கல்வி, செயல்திறன், நல்ல பேச்சு - minister-க்கு 5 qualities வேண்டும்.

instruction: Kadaiyila vaanguna product defective, kadaikkaaran maathi thara maattenguran (Chennai style)
output: Bill irukkaa? Bill vachu Consumer helpline 1800-11-4000 call pannunga. WhatsApp complaint: 8800001915. Consumer forum-la case podalam - Rs.5 lakh varai free. Warranty period check pannunga. Photos eduthu vachukonga.

instruction: நான் கிராமத்தில் உள்ள அரசு பள்ளியில் படிக்கிறேன். BC மாணவன். என்னென்ன benefits கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**BC மாணவர்களுக்கான அரசு நலத்திட்டங்கள்:**

**பள்ளியில் (School Level):**

1. **இலவச கல்வி**
   - Tuition fee இல்லை
   - Government/Aided schools

2. **இலவச பாடப்புத்தகங்கள்**
   - எல்லா subjects
   - School-லேயே கொடுப்பார்கள்

3. **இலவச சீருடை**
   - 2 sets per year
   - School-ல் distribution

4. **Mid-Day Meal**
   - காலை உணவு + மதிய உணவு
   - Weekly: Egg, Milk, Banana

5. **இலவச Bus Pass**
   - School ID காட்டி Bus Depot-ல்

6. **Scholarship (BC)**
   - Pre-Matric: ₹150-500/month
   - எங்கே Apply: School through, tneservices.tn.gov.in

**Higher Secondary (11th-12th):**

7. **இலவச Laptop**
   - Government School students
   - 11th-ல் கொடுப்பார்கள்

8. **BC Scholarship**
   - Tuition fee + ₹500/month stipend
   - Income limit: ₹2 lakh/year

**College Level:**

9. **முதலமைச்சர் உயர்கல்வி உறுதி திட்டம்**
   - First Generation Graduate
   - Free education + Laptop + ₹1,000/month

10. **BC Post-Matric Scholarship**
    - Full fee waiver
    - Hostel fee
    - ₹500-1,500/month stipend

**Apply செய்ய:**
- School/College scholarship committee
- tneservices.tn.gov.in
- scholarships.gov.in (Central)

**Documents:**
- Community Certificate
- Income Certificate
- Aadhaar
- Previous year marksheet
- Bank account

instruction: Scholarship apply pannen, status eppadi check panrathu?
output: Status check methods: 1) NSP login - dashboard shows status 2) PFMS portal - payment tracking 3) State portal - respective department 4) SMS alerts (if registered) 5) College scholarship cell. Common statuses: Pending verification, Under process, Sanctioned, Disbursed, Rejected. Rejected: Check defect list, re-apply with correct documents. Timeline: 2-6 months from application. Grievance: Portal helpdesk option.

instruction: PF withdrawal எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: EPFO portal → Online Services → Claim. Conditions: Retirement (58 years), 2 months unemployment, medical emergency (partial), home loan (partial), marriage (partial). Full withdrawal: Job quit + 2 months gap. Aadhaar linked UAN வேணும். 5-10 days-ல் amount வரும்.

instruction: Tirupathi Thirumalai kovil Tamil Nadu-la ulladha?
output: Tirupathi tharpodhU Andhra Pradesh-la ulladhu, aanaal Tamil thodarppu miga aazhamanadhu: 1) Azhvaargal inge paadiyirukiraargal, 2) Tamil inscriptions niraiya ullana, 3) Pala nootraandugal Tamizaga aatchiyil irundhadu, 4) Indrum Tamil devotees miga adhigam. TTD (Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams) nadaththugiradhu. World's richest temple - daily donation ₹3-4 crore! Tamil Nadu border-lirundhu 2-3 hours.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Restaurant rating improvement service. 15,000 for 4.5 star guarantee.' Rating improve aagum aa?
output: Fake review services violate Swiggy/Zomato terms - can get you delisted. Ratings improve through genuine food quality and service. 'Guaranteed ratings' means fake reviews - illegal and risky. Focus on actual customer satisfaction, not bought ratings.

instruction: 'Paytm கேஷ்பேக் - நீங்கள் 10,000 வென்றீர்கள்! இந்த QR ஸ்கேன் செய்யுங்கள்' என்று மெசேஜ் வந்தது.
output: QR ஸ்கேன் செய்யாதீர்கள்! QR கோடு பணம் பெற அல்ல, பணம் அனுப்ப உபயோகிக்கப்படுகிறது. இது reverse scam.

instruction: TN இலவச Bus Pass திட்டம் மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன?
output: அனைத்து மாணவர்களுக்கும் இலவச பேருந்து பயணம். Coverage: School students - Govt/Private, College students - UG/PG/Professional. Type: Free travel in ordinary buses. Process: School/College-ல் apply, ID card வாங்க வேண்டும். Documents: Bonafide certificate, Photo, Aadhaar. Validity: Academic year. Not for: AC buses, special buses.

instruction: Annual health checkup ethanai vayasula irundhu pannanum?
output: Guidelines: 1) 30+ years: Basic checkup (sugar, BP, cholesterol), 2) 40+ years: Add cardiac screening, eye check, 3) 50+ years: Add cancer screening (colon, prostate/breast). Women: Cervical/breast screening from 30+. Family history: Start earlier. Government camps: Free checkups periodically - avail. Don't wait for symptoms - preventive checkups save lives.

instruction: Police torture seydhaal enna seivathu?
output: Complaint options: 1) SP/DIG-kku written complaint, 2) Judicial Magistrate-kku complaint, 3) State Human Rights Commission, 4) National Human Rights Commission, 5) High Court writ petition. Medical report, photos, witnesses - evidence vaangunga. Custodial torture serious offence.

instruction: Hostel mess சாப்பாடு ஒத்துவரல. என்ன பண்றது?
output: Solutions: 1) Initially stomach upset common - adjust period 2) Mess committee-ல் complaint raise 3) Healthy snacks keep - fruits, biscuits 4) Weekend home food bring 5) Nearby canteen/restaurants (budget friendly) 6) Cooking allowed rooms-ல் simple items prepare 7) Mess rebate apply if eating outside regularly. Health: Don't skip meals, drink boiled water, maintain hygiene.

instruction: OBC certificate-க்கு creamy layer என்றால் என்ன?
output: குடும்ப வருமானம் ஆண்டுக்கு Rs.8 lakh-க்கு மேல் இருந்தால் creamy layer. Creamy layer-ல் இருந்தால் OBC reservation கிடைக்காது. Non-creamy layer certificate scholarship, jobs-க்கு தேவை.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Swiggy/Zomato premium partner program. Pay 10,000 for top listing and more orders.' Premium partner aanalaam aa?
output: Swiggy/Zomato partnerships through official partner app, not WhatsApp payments. Listing algorithms based on ratings, delivery time, not 'premium payments'. 10,000 to unknown person won't change your visibility. Contact official Swiggy/Zomato partner support for any programs.

instruction: Marriage-ல் mental illness ground for divorce-ஆ?
output: Complex issue. Law: Mental disorder is a ground under Hindu Marriage Act, but: 1) Must be incurable/very severe, 2) Must be before marriage or continuous after, 3) Court considers treatment possibility, 4) Living together impossible. Safeguards: 1) Medical evidence needed, 2) Treatment efforts considered, 3) Maintenance rights protected. Progressive interpretation: Courts increasingly protective of mentally ill spouse.

instruction: Important helpline numbers ennenna?
output: Emergency: 112. Police: 100. Fire: 101. Ambulance: 108. Women helpline: 181, 1091. Child helpline: 1098. Cyber crime: 1930. Consumer: 1800-11-4000. Senior citizen: 14567. Anti-corruption: 1064. CM helpline: 1100. Railway: 139.

instruction: Engineering padicha piragu job kedaikkalaye, enna seiyalam?
output: Kedaikkum, konjam time agum. Options: 1) Skill upgrade - Python, Data Science courses 2) GATE ezhudhu - PSU jobs, ME admission 3) Government jobs - SSC JE, RRB 4) Freelancing start pannu 5) Startup try pannu - PMEGP loan irukku. Tirupur, Coimbatore industry hub - networking pannu. Patience venum.

instruction: Income certificate எங்கே வாங்குவது? Online-ல் apply பண்ணலாமா?
output: Online apply: www.tnedistrict.tn.gov.in or e-Sevai centres. Offline: VAO (Village Administrative Officer) → RI → Tahsildar. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, employment proof (if any), self-declaration for non-employed. Time: 7-15 working days. Fee: ₹10-50. Validity: Usually 1 year, some schemes accept older. Types: Annual income certificate, income certificate for specific scheme. Tip: Apply in advance before scholarship deadline.

instruction: TNPSC Group 1/2/4 - enna viththiyaasam? Edhu easy?
output: Groups comparison: Group 4 - 10th/12th pass, Clerk/Typist posts, easiest. Group 2/2A - Degree, Assistant/Accountant posts, medium. Group 1 - Degree, DSP/Deputy Collector, hardest. Exam pattern: All MCQ. Syllabus: 6th-12th TN textbooks + Current affairs. Group 4: 1.5 lakh+ applicants, 5000+ posts. Group 1: 50,000 applicants, 50-100 posts. Start with Group 4, then progress. Same preparation works for all.

instruction: 'Mutual fund - எங்கள் மூலம் invest செய்தால் extra 2% bonus' என்று agent சொல்கிறார். Genuine-ஆ?
output: Mutual funds-ல் extra bonus என்று இல்லை. AMFI registered distributor-ஆ verify செய்யுங்கள். போலி agents பணத்தை எடுத்துக்கொண்டு invest செய்யாமல் இருக்கலாம்.

instruction: Job interview-க்கு போகும்போது courage-க்கு என்ன குறள் படிக்கலாம்?
output: 'அச்சமே கீழ்களது ஆசாரம் அஃதால் எச்சம் ஏமாப்பு உடைத்து'. பயம் என்பது தாழ்ந்தவர்களுக்கே உரியது. Confident-ஆக இருங்கள். மேலும்: 'ஊக்கமது கைவிடேல்' - enthusiasm-ஐ விடாதீர்கள். Believe in yourself, prepare well, and face it boldly!

instruction: Velaiku poren, aanaa degree complete pannala. Ippo padikka mudiyumaa?
output: 100% possible! Options: 1) IGNOU - most flexible, exams twice yearly 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) - Tamil medium available 3) University of Madras Distance 4) Evening colleges in Chennai 5) Online degrees - recognized universities. Process: Work continues + study weekends + exams during leave. Duration: UG 3 years, PG 2 years. Benefits: Promotion eligibility, government job apply, self-satisfaction. Many working people complete degrees in 30s, 40s. Never too late!

instruction: Minimum wages Tamil Nadu-la evvalavu?
output: Varies by industry and skill level. Unskilled: Rs.410-450/day, Semi-skilled: Rs.430-500/day, Skilled: Rs.480-600/day (approximate, 2024). Labour Department website-la exact rates. Less koduthal Labour Inspector-kku complaint.

instruction: Bank exam-க்கு prepare ஆவது எப்படி? SBI/IBPS difference?
output: Banking exams: IBPS - Public sector banks (PNB, Canara, etc). SBI - Separate recruitment. Pattern similar: Prelims + Mains + Interview. Sections: English, Reasoning, Quantitative, General Awareness, Computer. Preparation: 1) RS Aggarwal for Maths/Reasoning 2) Word Power Made Easy for English 3) Banking Awareness - Arihant 4) Daily mock tests. Difference: SBI slightly tougher, more vacancies. Start with IBPS, apply SBI also.

instruction: Mock test ethanai murai ezhuthanum? Eppadi analyze panrathu?
output: Mock test frequency: Last 2 months - weekly 2-3. Last month - daily. Analysis steps: 1) Check answers immediately 2) Category-wise error (silly mistake, concept gap, time issue) 3) Track weak areas 4) Revise mistakes same day 5) Redo wrong questions after 3 days 6) Score tracking graph maintain 7) Time per question analysis 8) Attempt strategy review. Sources: Official previous papers, coaching test series, free online (Testbook, Gradeup). Quality > quantity of mocks.

instruction: Scholarship status eppadi check seivathu?
output: Status check options: 1) NSP portal login - application status tab 2) PFMS portal (Public Financial Management System) - payment tracking 3) State scholarship portal - individual login 4) SMS alerts (registered mobile) 5) College scholarship cell. Payment delay: 2-3 months normal. Rejected aanaal: Defect list paarthu correct documents upload. Grievance: helpdesk on portal.

instruction: Pudhiya ration card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at tnpds.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: All family members' Aadhaar, address proof, income certificate, gas connection details, photos. Types: PHH (₹1 rice), AAY (free rice), NPHH. RI inspection, 30-45 days processing.

instruction: கல்வி கடன் தள்ளுபடி திட்டம் என்று அழைத்தார்கள். 'பதிவு கட்டணம் 5000' கேட்கிறார்கள். உண்மையான திட்டமா?
output: அரசு கடன் தள்ளுபடி திட்டங்களுக்கு பதிவு கட்டணம் இல்லை. உண்மையான திட்டங்கள் வங்கி மூலமாகவே செயல்படுத்தப்படும். தொலைபேசி அழைப்புகளை நம்பாதீர்கள். உங்கள் வங்கியில் நேரடியாக விசாரியுங்கள்.

instruction: Generic medicine weak, branded strong - உண்மையா?
output: MYTH! Same active ingredient, same dose = same effect. Why generic cheaper: No brand marketing cost, no patent royalty. Quality: Government-approved generics meet same standards. Proof: Government hospitals use generic - same results. Jan Aushadhi: WHO-GMP certified, 50-90% cheaper. Don't fall for: Marketing claims, fancy packaging. Ask pharmacist: Generic alternative for any branded medicine.

instruction: இறப்பு சான்றிதழுக்கு என்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
output: இறந்தவரின் ஆதார் அட்டை, மருத்துவமனை இறப்பு சான்று / போஸ்ட்மார்ட்டம் அறிக்கை, விண்ணப்பதாரரின் அடையாள அட்டை தேவை. 21 நாட்களுக்குள் பதிவு செய்ய வேண்டும்.

instruction: DV case-la enna relief kidaikkum?
output: Reliefs under DV Act: 1) Protection order (abuse stop), 2) Residence order (shared household-la stay), 3) Monetary relief (maintenance, medical, compensation), 4) Custody order, 5) Compensation. Ex-parte order (urgent) 2-3 days-la kidaikkum.

instruction: Ayushman Bharat vera, CMCHIS veraa?
output: TN has CMCHIS (state scheme) - Ayushman Bharat (central) illa. CMCHIS advantages: 1) Higher coverage (Rs.5 lakh vs Rs.5 lakh), 2) More procedures covered, 3) State-specific hospitals, 4) Better implementation. Other states: Ayushman Bharat applicable. TN residents: Use CMCHIS only. Traveling outside TN: Limited coverage - check empanelled hospitals.

instruction: 12 வருடமாக நிலத்தை use பண்றவர் ownership claim பண்றார் - valid-ஆ?
output: Adverse Possession law: 12 years continuous, open, hostile possession-க்கு பிறகு ownership claim பண்ணலாம் - ஆனால் court-ல் prove பண்ணணும். Government land-க்கு 30 years. உடனடியாக legal action எடுங்க - delay ஆனால் rights இழப்பீர்கள்.

instruction: Travel package ponathu worst experience, compensation kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes, if: 1) Promised amenities illa (hotel downgrade, no AC bus), 2) Itinerary maatram without consent, 3) Hidden charges. Claim: 1) Package cost difference, 2) Mental agony compensation, 3) Travel Forum/Consumer Forum complaint. Evidence: Brochure, booking confirmation, photos, videos. TAAI registered agents-kitta book pannunga - better accountability.

instruction: Tenant-ஆக என்னென்ன responsibilities இருக்கு?
output: 1) Time-க்கு rent கட்டுவது, 2) வீட்டை நல்ல condition-ல் maintain செய்வது, 3) Illegal activities செய்யாமல் இருப்பது, 4) Neighbors-க்கு disturbance கொடுக்காமல் இருப்பது, 5) Agreement terms follow செய்வது, 6) Vacate செய்யும் முன் notice கொடுப்பது.

instruction: மூத்தவர்களுக்கான கேள்வி: ஓய்வூதியம் சரிபார்க்க வங்கி விவரங்கள் கேட்கிறார்கள். கொடுக்கலாமா?
output: கொடுக்காதீர்கள்! ஓய்வூதியம் வங்கி கணக்கில் நேரடியாக வரும், சரிபார்ப்புக்கு விவரங்கள் தேவையில்லை. இது மூத்தோரை குறிவைக்கும் மோசடி. சந்தேகம் இருந்தால் குடும்பத்தினரிடம் கலந்தாலோசியுங்கள்.

instruction: JEE Main & Advanced-க்கு எப்படி prepare செய்வது?
output:
**JEE Preparation Strategy:**

**Class 11 (Foundation Year):**

**Focus Areas:**
- NCERT complete mastery
- Concept clarity > Speed
- Build problem-solving skills
- Regular practice

**Subject Priority:**
1. Maths (Most important for JEE)
2. Physics (Concepts + Numericals)
3. Chemistry (NCERT + Practice)

**Class 12 (Intensive Year):**

**Strategy:**
- Complete syllabus by December
- January: Full revision starts
- March: Mock test series
- April: JEE Main attempt

**Books:**

**Mathematics:**
| Book | Level |
|------|-------|
| NCERT | Foundation |
| RD Sharma | Practice |
| Cengage Series | Advanced |
| Previous Years | Must! |

**Physics:**
| Book | Level |
|------|-------|
| NCERT | Basic |
| HC Verma | Concept Master |
| DC Pandey | Practice |
| Irodov | JEE Advanced |

**Chemistry:**
| Book | Level |
|------|-------|
| NCERT | Must (Inorganic especially) |
| MS Chouhan | Organic |
| OP Tandon | Physical |
| VK Jaiswal | Inorganic |

**Daily Routine:**
```
5:00 AM - Wake up
5:30-8:00 AM - Maths (Most productive time)
8:00-9:00 AM - Break, Breakfast
9:00-1:00 PM - School/Self-study
2:00-5:00 PM - Physics
5:00-6:00 PM - Break
6:00-9:00 PM - Chemistry + Revision
9:00 PM - Dinner
10:00 PM - Sleep
```

**Weekly:**
- Sunday: Full mock test
- Analysis of mistakes
- Weak topic revision

**JEE Advanced Extra:**
- After JEE Main: 2-month intensive
- More complex problems
- Integer type, Matrix match practice

instruction: Shirodhara therapy என்ன? Benefits என்ன?
output: Shirodhara = Continuous pouring of medicated oil/buttermilk on forehead. Duration: 30-60 minutes per session. Benefits: 1) Stress relief, 2) Anxiety, depression, 3) Insomnia, 4) Headaches/migraines, 5) Hair problems, 6) Memory improvement. Types: Thaila dhara (oil), Takra dhara (buttermilk), Kashaya dhara (decoction). Sessions: 7-14 days typically. Where: Ayurveda centers, some wellness spas (verify authenticity).

instruction: Neighbour என் land-ல் ஆக்கிரமிப்பு செய்கிறார் - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Survey செய்து boundary verify பண்ணுங்க, 2) Written notice அனுப்புங்க, 3) Tahsildar-க்கு complaint, 4) Civil Court-ல் injunction + possession suit. Documents: Patta, Survey sketch, Photos, EC. Forceful removal try பண்ணாதீங்க.

instruction: Thirumoolar yoga patri enna solliyirukkaar?
output: Thirumandhirathil yoga-vukku arppanikkappattta paguthigal ullana: 1) Ashtaanga Yogam - 8 padigal vilakkam, 2) Praanaayaamam - breathing techniques, 3) Kundalini Yogam - chakra activation, 4) Samaadhi nilai - highest state. 'Udambai valarththen uyir valarththene' - udal paenuvathum aanmeegam endru sonnavar. Hatha yoga-voda Tamil roots inge ullana!

instruction: Bank account freeze ஆச்சு, ஏன்? என்ன செய்வது?
output: Freeze reasons: 1) Court order (loan default, legal case), 2) IT department notice, 3) Suspicious transactions (PMLA), 4) KYC not updated. Steps: 1) Bank-கிட்ட freeze reason கேளுங்க (writing-ல), 2) Court order = lawyer consult, 3) IT matter = CA consult, 4) KYC = documents update பண்ணுங்க. Wrongful freeze: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

instruction: Spoken English course free-யாக எங்கே உள்ளது?
