output: PMJJBY: Life insurance ₹2 lakh for ₹436/year (18-55 age). PMSBY: Accident insurance ₹2 lakh for just ₹20/year (18-70 age). Both together: ₹456/year for ₹4 lakh coverage! Enroll through bank with savings account. Auto-debit on June 1.

instruction: Body hospital-ல் detain பண்றாங்க bill கட்டும் வரை - legal-ஆ?
output: ILLEGAL! Dead body detention prohibited. Supreme Court + High Court orders: 1) Body cannot be held for bill payment, 2) Hospital can pursue legal recovery of dues, 3) Detention = criminal offence. Action: 1) Police complaint, 2) Magistrate petition, 3) Human Rights Commission. Bill dispute: Settle later through legal means - body must be released. Report: DHS, State Medical Council.

instruction: Suddenly phone 'No Network' for hours. Network vandra time - bank OTPs went somewhere, 2 lakhs transferred. OTP yaarkum sollala, eppidi?
output: SIM swap fraud - your data (Aadhaar, phone, bank) leaked/bought, scammers duplicate SIM vaanguvaanga telecom store la with fake ID. Your SIM deactivates, OTPs go to them. Immediately when network lost - call bank, call telecom. Enable SIM lock, app-based 2FA use pannunga.

instruction: First generation graduate scholarship eppadi peruvathu?
output: Scheme: Parents yarumae degree padikkaadha family-oda mudhal graduate-ku. Amount: ₹2,000-5,000/year + fee concession. Eligibility: 1) Parents non-graduate certificate (Tahsildar) 2) Income ₹2 lakh kizha 3) UG course. Apply: College scholarship committee moolam. Documents: Parents education declaration, income certificate, community certificate, Aadhaar.

instruction: Accident compensation evvalavu kidaikkum?
output: Formula based: Age, income, dependency, injury severity. Death case: Multiplier method (age based - 12 to 18 times annual income). Injury: Medical expenses + loss of income + pain & suffering + disability percentage. Third party insurance: Unlimited liability.

instruction: 'Vinayaka Chaturthi - live pooja streaming subscription 999 Rs yearly' - email வந்துச்சு. Subscribe பண்ணலாமா?
output: Most temples free-ஆ stream பண்றாங்க! Paid subscription scam இது. Temple official YouTube channels free. Chaturthi-ல religious sentiment exploit பண்றாங்க. Official temple website check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: அகத்தியர் எழுதிய நூல்கள் என்ன?
output: அகத்தியர் பெயரில் உள்ள நூல்கள்: 1) அகத்தியர் ஞானம் - ஆன்மீக ஞானம், 2) அகத்தியர் வைத்தியம் - மருத்துவம், 3) அகத்தியர் கர்ம காண்டம் - astrology, 4) அகத்தியர் யோகம் - yoga practices, 5) அகத்தியர் நாடி - palm leaf predictions, 6) அகத்தியர் ரத்ன சூத்திரம் - gemology. 'அகத்தியர் 12000' என்ற பெரிய நூலும் உள்ளது. மொத்தம் 200-க்கும் மேற்பட்ட நூல்கள் அவர் பெயரில் உள்ளன.

instruction: Thiruvalluvar Dhinam eppodhu kondadapadugiradhu?
output: Thai maadham 2-m thedhi (January 15 or 16). Pongalukku aduththa naal. Tamil Nadu-la government holiday. Schools-la Thirukkural competitions nadakkum.

instruction: PAN Card tholaindhuvidadhu - Duplicate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 1. e-PAN Download (Free): eportal.incometax.gov.in → Instant e-PAN, Aadhaar OTP verification, PDF download. 2. Physical Duplicate: onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Reprint of PAN Card', Fee ₹50, comes in 15-20 days. 3. Forgot PAN Number: incometax.gov.in → Know Your PAN, find using Name + DOB + Mobile

instruction: Dating app-ல் match ஆனவர் 'hospital bill-க்கு urgent help' கேட்கிறார். மனசாட்சி உறுத்துகிறது.
output: Emotional manipulation இது. Genuine emergency-க்கு family, friends இருப்பார்கள். Stranger-ஐ நம்பி பணம் அனுப்பாதீர்கள். உங்கள் கஷ்டப்பட்ட பணம்.

instruction: WhatsApp-ல் 'உங்கள் account வேறு device-ல் use ஆகிறது, verify செய்ய code அனுப்புங்கள்' என்று வந்தது.
output: 6-digit code யாருக்கும் share செய்யாதீர்கள்! இது OTP scam. Code கொடுத்தால் உங்கள் WhatsApp அவர்கள் கைக்கு போய்விடும்.

instruction: Diabetes-kku Siddha medicine irukkaa?
output: Yes! Siddha for Madhumegam (diabetes): Medicines: 1) Seenthil Choornam, 2) Neermulli Kudineer, 3) Nilavembu Kudineer, 4) Aavarai Pattai, 5) Sirukurinjan. Research: CCRS has validated formulations. Important: 1) Don't stop allopathic suddenly, 2) Regular monitoring essential, 3) Integrated approach best, 4) Diet + lifestyle crucial. Complication prevention: Siddha foot care for diabetic foot.

instruction: 'RBI Special Bond - 15% guaranteed return, senior citizens ku special allocation' nu broker call pannaan. Government bond safe la, invest pannalama?
output: RBI bonds 15% return kudukkaadhu ayya - current rate 7-8%. 'Special allocation' lie. Fake brokers senior citizens target pannuvaanga - life savings thiruduvanga. RBI bonds through banks only available - not random callers. Ignore this call.

instruction: Thirukkural Olympics-la mention aanadha?
output: Aam! 2004 Athens Olympics-la opening ceremony-la Thirukkural quote display aanadhu: 'Yaadhum oore yaavarum kelir' - 'Every land is my homeland, all people are my kin'. Ulaga sagodharaththuvathai kaattum indha kural Olympic spirit-a perfect-aa represent panniyathu. Idhu Tamil community-kku migapperiya perumai!

instruction: Age limit government college admission-க்கு இருக்கிறதா?
output: UG courses: Generally no upper age limit for most courses. Exceptions: Medical (25 for general, 30 for reserved), Law integrated (20), NDA (19.5). Minimum age: 17 years usually. PG courses: No age limit mostly. PhD: No limit. Government jobs: Age limits apply (varies by post). Reality: Complete your education at any age - many successful late starters. Distance education: No age restrictions at all.

instruction: Minimum wages Tamil Nadu-ல் எவ்வளவு?
output: Varies by industry and skill level. Unskilled: Rs.410-450/day, Semi-skilled: Rs.430-500/day, Skilled: Rs.480-600/day (approximate, 2024). Labour Department website-ல் exact rates. Less கொடுத்தால் Labour Inspector-க்கு complaint.

instruction: Government job salary ranges
output: TNPSC Group 1: ₹56,100-1,77,500 (DSP, DC level). Group 2: ₹35,400-1,12,400 (Assistant level). Group 4: ₹19,500-62,000 (Clerk level). Banking PO: ₹40,000-80,000+. SSC CGL: ₹35,000-1,50,000. Teaching (TRB): ₹35,000-70,000. Note: Includes DA, HRA, benefits.

instruction: 10th Public Exam-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu? Pass mark enna?
output:
**10th Public Exam Preparation:**

**Pass Marks:** 35/100 each subject, 35% overall

**Subjects:** Tamil, English, Maths, Science, Social

**Strategy:**

**6 Months Before:**
- Complete syllabus
- Identify important topics
- Create formula lists

**3 Months Before:**
- Chapter revision
- Previous 5 years papers
- Model exams

**1 Month Before:**
- Quick revision
- Daily formulas
- Mock tests

**Subject Tips:**
- Tamil: Grammar, Poems
- English: Grammar, Letter format
- Maths: Daily practice
- Science: Diagrams, Equations
- Social: Maps, Dates

**Free Resources:** Kalvi TV, DIKSHA App, YouTube

instruction: Will எப்படி எழுதுவது? Register பண்ணணுமா?
output: Will writing: Clear language, all properties list, beneficiaries பெயர், date, signature, 2 witnesses signature. Registration கட்டாயம் இல்லை ஆனால் recommended - disputes avoid. Registered will Sub-Registrar office-ல் safe custody-ல் இருக்கும்.

instruction: Board exam-ல் fail ஆயிட்டேன். Life waste ஆயிடுச்சு என்று feel ஆகுது. என்ன செய்வது?
output: First: You are NOT a failure! Exam failure ≠ Life failure. Many successful people failed exams: Abdul Kalam, Dhirubhai Ambani. Immediate steps: 1) Supplementary exam-க்கு prepare - 3 months time 2) Talk to parents/teacher openly 3) If severe stress - school counsellor or helpline iCALL: 9152987821. Future: Many paths to success - ITI, Diploma, NIOS, Skill training. One exam doesn't define you. Rise again stronger!

instruction: NRI relative-க்கு call வந்தது - 'உங்கள் India property-ல் problem, online-ல் fee கட்டினால் solve ஆகும்' என்று.
output: Property issues-க்கு online fee கட்ட வேண்டியதில்லை. NRIs-ஐ target செய்யும் scam - India-ல் வருவது கஷ்டம் என்று தெரிந்து exploit செய்கிறார்கள். Lawyer consult செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Counselling-la seat confirm aana, piragu change panna mudiyumaa?
output: Options: 1) Tentative allotment - wait for next round, better college possible 2) Self-reporting - confirm seat, can still upgrade in subsequent rounds 3) Final allotment - must join or forfeit. Upgrade: Each round, vacant seats filled. Your higher choices reconsidered. Risk: If you reject and don't get better, no seat. Safe: Confirm in hand, upgrade if available. Fees paid = refundable if upgraded officially.

instruction: 'பணம் திரும்பப் பெற 1 ரூபாய் அனுப்புங்கள்' என்று கூறி ஒரு QR குறியீடு அனுப்பினார்கள். செய்யலாமா?
output: இது மோசடி! பணம் பெற பணம் அனுப்ப வேண்டியதில்லை. QR ஸ்கேன் செய்தால் உங்கள் கணக்கிலிருந்து அதிக பணம் எடுக்கப்படும். இந்த செயலை தவிர்க்கவும்.

instruction: TNPSC-ku Tamil medium vs English medium - edhu better?
output: Both equal opportunity. Tamil medium advantages: 1) TN textbooks Tamil-la padikkalaam 2) Answer writing easier 3) More candidates. English medium advantages: 1) Reference books availability 2) Current affairs sources more. Reality: Language doesn't matter, content matters. Toppers in both mediums. Choose your comfortable language. Paper can be written in either, no preference given. Focus on preparation, not medium.

instruction: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) eppadi vaanguvadhu? Enna benefits?
output: Low-interest loan for farmers. Interest: 4% (after subvention - 7% base, 3% interest subvention for timely repayment). Credit Limit: Up to ₹3 lakh (based on land area). Uses: Seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, equipment, harvest expenses. Repayment: Flexible - based on crop cycle. Apply: Bank with land documents, Aadhaar, passport photo. Simplified for PM-KISAN beneficiaries. KCC available for fishermen, animal husbandry too.

instruction: ஒரே நேரத்தில் பல scholarships-க்கு apply செய்யலாமா?
output: ஆம், ஆனால் rules பாருங்கள்: 1) Different sources (central + state + private) - usually OK 2) Same department multiple schemes - one only 3) NSP-ல் one scholarship per year rule உள்ளது 4) Disclose other scholarships if asked. Strategy: Government first (guaranteed), then private (competitive). Keep track of all applications in a spreadsheet. Renewal applications separate apply.

instruction: Notes எப்படி எழுதுவது effective-ஆக இருக்கும்?
output: Effective note-making: 1) Cornell method - page divide into sections 2) Use your own words, not copy 3) Highlight keywords, underline important 4) Use diagrams, flowcharts 5) Color coding for topics 6) Short forms, abbreviations 7) One topic per page 8) Revision space at bottom 9) Index at front 10) Update regularly. Digital options: Notion, OneNote - searchable. Handwritten better for memory. Review notes within 24 hours of class.

instruction: Unnecessary tests/procedures சொல்றாங்க - refuse பண்ணலாமா?
output: Yes! Your body, your choice. Rights: 1) Ask why each test needed, 2) Get written justification, 3) Refuse non-essential tests, 4) Second opinion for major procedures. Red flags: 1) Full body checkup push, 2) Expensive test for minor issue, 3) Surgery suggestion without trying medicine first. If pressured: Change doctor/hospital. Complaint: If unethical push - Medical Council.

instruction: NEET/JEE-க்கு Free Coaching எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**Free NEET/JEE Coaching in Tamil Nadu:**

**1. Tamil Nadu Government Free Coaching:**

**a) Naan Mudhalvan Program:**
- Free NEET/JEE coaching
- Online + Offline
- Apply: naanmudhalvan.tn.gov.in

**b) District-level Free Coaching:**
- Collector Office conducts
- Weekend classes
- Free materials
- Apply through school HM

**2. TNSF (Tamil Nadu Science Forum):**
- Free NEET coaching for rural students
- Residential program
- tnsf.org.in

**3. Super 30 Programs:**
- Various NGOs run
- Selection through test
- Free coaching + Hostel + Food
- Mainly for SC/ST/EWS

**4. ANTHE (Aakash National Talent Hunt):**
- Scholarship exam
- Up to 100% fee waiver
- aakash.ac.in

**5. Allen Scholarship Test (TALLENTEX):**
- Up to 90% scholarship
- allen.ac.in

**6. Government Residential Schools:**
- Eklavya Model Schools (Tribal)
- Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya
- Free coaching included

**7. Online Free Resources:**

| Platform | Content |
|----------|--------|
| SWAYAM | Free courses |
| Khan Academy | All subjects |
| Physics Wallah | NEET/JEE |
| Unacademy Free | Limited access |
| Vedantu Free | Basic content |
| Kalvi TV | TN syllabus |

**8. SC/ST/BC Specific:**
- Dr. Ambedkar Free Coaching
- BC/MBC Free Coaching Scheme
- Apply: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in

**How to Find:**
1. Ask school HM
2. District Collector Office
3. Social Welfare Department
4. Local MLAs often sponsor

**Tip:** Apply to multiple programs - increase chances!

instruction: Case எத்தனை years ஓடும்? Settlement பண்ணலாமா?
output: Timeline: Consumer Forum 1-3 years, Civil court 5-10 years, Criminal 3-7 years. Settlement: 1) Lok Adalat (mutually agreed), 2) Mediation (court-annexed), 3) Direct negotiation. Benefits: Faster resolution, certain outcome, lower legal costs. Caution: Don't settle too low - get legal opinion on fair amount. Hospital insurance: Usually pushes for settlement.

instruction: Wrong medicine kodutthuttaanga - action enna?
output: Pharmacy negligence! Actions: 1) Don't use if noticed, 2) Return with bill, 3) If used and harm occurred - medical treatment first, 4) Complaint: Drug Inspector, Consumer Forum. Compensation: Medical expenses + damages if harm. Severe harm/death: Criminal case possible (Section 304A). Evidence: Wrong medicine pack, prescription, bill. Pharmacist license: Can be cancelled.

instruction: Silapathigaram kadhai enna?
output: Silapathigaram - Kannagi, Kovalan kadhai. Kovalan Pukaar nagarathu vanigan. Manaivi Kannagi. Madhavi endra nadana mangayai kaadhalitthu selvam izhakiraan. Manam maari Kannagiyudan Madurai pokiraan. Kannagiyoda silambu virkka, porkkollan 'thirudan' endru arasanidam pugaar seigiraan. Arasan Kovalanai kolkiraan. Kannagi kobathil silambai udaiththu nirabaaradhiyai kaatti, Maduraiyai erikkiraal. Pathivrathaiyoda sakthiyai kaattum kaappiyam.

instruction: குடும்பத்தில் ஒருவர் இறந்துவிட்டார். என்னென்ன formalities செய்ய வேண்டும்? என்ன benefits கிடைக்கும்?
output:
உடனடியாக (24-48 மணி நேரத்தில்):
1. மருத்துவ சான்று - Hospital/PHC Doctor

21 நாட்களுக்குள் (கட்டாயம்):
2. இறப்பு சான்றிதழ் பதிவு - நகராட்சி/பஞ்சாயத்து - இலவசம்

1-3 மாதங்களுக்குள்:
3. Bank Account Claim - Death Certificate + Nominee ID
4. Legal Heir Certificate - Taluk Office - 15-30 நாட்கள்
5. Ration Card-ல் பெயர் நீக்குதல் - tnpds.gov.in
6. Property Transfer - Legal Heir Certificate + Taluk Office

Benefits:
7. PMJJBY Claim (₹2 லட்சம்) - Bank Branch
8. PMSBY Claim (₹2 லட்சம்) - Accident death
9. EPF Claim - epfindia.gov.in
10. Family Pension - Govt employees
11. விதவை ஓய்வூதியம் (₹1,000/month) - BPL

instruction: Family-ல யாரும் college போனதில்ல. என்னால் handle பண்ண முடியுமா? என்ன expect பண்றது?
output: Proud moment - You're breaking the barrier! Tips: 1) Seniors-ஐ approach பண்ணுங்கள் - guidance 2) College orientation attend பண்ணுங்கள் 3) Professors approachable - doubt clear பண்ணுங்கள் 4) First generation scholarship apply பண்ணுங்கள் 5) Library, labs utilize பண்ணுங்கள் 6) Peer groups join - study circle. Common challenges: Imposter syndrome normal, English medium adjustment, new environment. Support: College counsellor, senior mentor programs. You CAN do this!

instruction: Penn kuzhanthaikalukku property right irukkaa?
output: Aama. 2005 Hindu Succession Amendment Act padi magalkalukku magankalukku samamaana right undu - ancestral property-lum, self-acquired property-lum. Married/unmarried difference illa. Idhu retrospective-aa apply.

instruction: Children-kku safe internet usage tips enna?
output: Parents: 1) Parental controls enable, 2) Screen time limits, 3) Open communication, 4) Monitor (not spy) activity, 5) Teach about online dangers. Children: Don't share personal info, stranger-kitta chat vendaam, uncomfortable content-a parents-kitta sollunga.

instruction: PMEGP loan-க்கு எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme: Manufacturing-க்கு ₹50 lakh, Service-க்கு ₹20 lakh வரை. Subsidy: General 15-25%, SC/ST/Women 25-35%. Process: 1) www.kviconline.gov.in-ல் register 2) Business plan submit 3) Bank verification 4) Loan sanction 5) EDP training (mandatory) 6) Disbursement. Age: 18+. Education: 8th pass (₹10 lakh+), any (₹10 lakh வரை). District Industries Centre-ல் help available.

instruction: Trademark register பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Online: ipindia.gov.in. Classes: 45 different classes (goods/services). Search first: TM search portal. Fee: Rs.4,500-9,000. Process: Application → Examination → Publication → Opposition period (4 months) → Registration. Protection: 10 years, renewable.

instruction: Counseling/therapy enge kidaikkum? Cost enna?
output: Options: 1) Government hospitals - free (limited slots), 2) NGOs - free/subsidized (iCall, Snehi, etc.), 3) Private practitioners - Rs.500-3000/session, 4) Online platforms - Rs.300-1500/session (Practo, Amaha, YourDOST). Types: Clinical psychologist, counselor, psychiatrist (for medicines). Verify: RCI registration for psychologists. Tip: Many offer sliding scale fees based on income.

instruction: Coaching centre-க்கு அனுப்பணுமா, self-study போதுமா?
output: பையன்/பொண்ணோட learning style பாருங்க. Self-disciplined-ஆ இருந்தா self-study + online resources போதும். Otherwise coaching உதவும். Free government coaching (Naan Mudhalvan, TNPSC free coaching) try பண்ணுங்க முதல்ல.

instruction: மற்ற districts-ல் Siddha hospital இருக்கா?
output: Yes! TN Siddha infrastructure: 1) Government Siddha Medical Colleges - Palayamkottai, Tirunelveli (oldest), 2) District AYUSH hospitals - Every district, 3) Taluk level Siddha dispensaries, 4) PHC attached Siddha units. Major colleges: Tirunelveli, Chennai (2), Palani. All services free. Find: tnhealth.tn.gov.in or AYUSH department website. Total: 100+ government Siddha facilities in TN.

instruction: TN Helpline Numbers என்னென்ன?
output: முக்கிய TN Helplines: 1967 (Ration complaints), 1077 (CM Helpline), 108 (Emergency Ambulance), 104 (Health Helpline), 100 (Police), 101 (Fire), 1091 (Women Helpline), 1098 (Child Helpline - Childline), 181 (Women Helpline - central), 1912 (Anti-Corruption), 155300 (Cyber Crime), 14461 (Kisan Call Centre), 1800-180-1111 (Pensioners). Free: Most are toll-free 24x7.

instruction: Golden hour என்றால் என்ன? அதுல hospital போகணுமா?
output: Golden hour = First 60 minutes after trauma/heart attack. Critical because: 1) Brain damage starts in minutes without oxygen, 2) Bleeding control crucial, 3) Heart attack - early treatment = more heart saved, 4) Trauma - internal bleeding stops. Action: 1) Call 108 immediately, 2) Don't move spine injury victims, 3) CPR if no pulse (if trained), 4) Control visible bleeding. Nearest hospital first - don't travel far.

instruction: Old house tenant vacate aagum time, 'Tenant rights lawyer' call pannaan - 'Tenant ku extra compensation vendum, 20,000 legal fee pay pannunga handle pannuren' nu.
output: Random 'lawyers' calling = scam. Tenant disputes Rent Control court la handle aagum. Legitimate lawyers office la meet pannuvaanga, random calls pannaadhu. 'Legal fee advance' vaangitu nothing pannuvaanga. Known lawyers consult pannunga.

instruction: Pen maanavar-kalukkaana Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar scheme enna?
output: Scheme details: 6th-12th padikkum pen students-ku monthly stipend. Amount: ₹1,000/month (₹12,000/year). Eligibility: Government/Aided school student, family income ₹2.5 lakh kizha. 18 years aanavudan ₹25,000 one-time panam (graduation-ku). Apply: School moolam automatic. Bank account theva.

instruction: யாரோ இறந்துவிட்டார்கள் - grief handle பண்ண உதவும் குறள்?
output: 'நில்லாதவற்றை நிலையின என்றுணரும் புல்லறி வாண்மை கடை'. நிலையற்றவை (உடல், உயிர்) நிலையானவை என்று நினைப்பது அறியாமை. Life is temporary - grieve, but understand impermanence. மேலும்: 'பிறப்பென்னும் பேதைமை நீங்கச் சிறப்பென்னும் செம்பொருள் காண்ப தறிவு'. Birth and death are natural - soul continues. Remember them with love.

instruction: 'வங்கி அதிகாரி - உங்கள் account-ல் suspicious activity, AnyDesk download செய்யுங்கள் fix செய்கிறேன்' என்கிறார்கள்.
output: AnyDesk, TeamViewer போன்றவை download செய்யாதீர்கள்! இவை remote access apps. Scammer உங்கள் போனை கட்டுப்படுத்தி பணம் திருடுவார்.

instruction: நான் சிறு விவசாயி. Organic விவசாயம் செய்ய விரும்புகிறேன். என்ன உதவி கிடைக்கும்?
output:
Organic விவசாயத்திற்கு பல திட்டங்கள் உள்ளன:

1. **PKVY (Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana)**
   - உதவி: ₹50,000/hectare (3 வருடம்)
   - Cluster அடிப்படையில் (50 விவசாயிகள்)
   - எங்கே: District Agriculture Officer

2. **PGS Certification (Free)**
   - pgsindia-ncof.gov.in
   - Group-ஆக apply செய்யவும்

3. **Tamil Nadu Organic Farming Policy**
   - Vermicompost unit: 50% subsidy
   - Bio-fertilizer: Free distribution
   - எங்கே: Block Agriculture Office

4. **Training**
   - KVK (Krishi Vigyan Kendra) - Free training
   - TNAU - Certificate courses

5. **Market Support**
   - Organic Mandi through e-NAM
   - Direct consumer sale permission

instruction: Wrong product deliver ஆனது - return policy இல்லையாம், என்ன செய்வது?
output: Wrong product deliver ஆனால் return policy இல்லை என்று சொல்ல முடியாது - இது seller mistake. Consumer Protection Act-ன் கீழ் correct product அல்லது full refund கேட்கலாம். Screenshots, photos எடுத்து complaint போடுங்க. NCH, consumer forum - இரண்டிலும் case போடலாம்.

instruction: False FIR pottaal enna aagum?
output: IPC 182 (BNS 213): False information to public servant - 6 months imprisonment + fine. IPC 211 (BNS 248): False charge with intent to injure - 2-7 years imprisonment. Defamation case-um varum. Accused can file counter case. Think twice before filing.

instruction: Purushan adikkuraan, enna panrathu? (Chennai style)
output: Udane: 1) 181 call pannunga, 2) Nearest police station-la complaint, 3) Medical-la injury report vaangunga, 4) Photos edunga. Protection order 2-3 days-la kidaikkum. Safe place-kku ponga - women's shelter undu.

instruction: Panchakarma yaarukku nalladhu? Yaarukku vendaam?
output: Good for: 1) Chronic diseases (arthritis, skin, digestive), 2) Lifestyle disorders (obesity, stress), 3) Preventive detox (healthy people - yearly), 4) Pre-conception purification, 5) Anti-aging. Avoid: 1) Acute illness/fever, 2) Pregnancy, 3) Very old/weak, 4) Children (<12), 5) Certain heart conditions, 6) During menstruation (some procedures). Consultation: Doctor will assess suitability based on strength, condition.

instruction: Fear of failure irukkidhu - eppadi overcome panradhu?
output: 'Olvadhu arivadhu arindhadan kan thangich selvaar peru nilaththu needu vaazhvaar'. Ungal thiRamayai arinDhu, adhil focus seiyungal. Melum: 'Ulluvadhu ellam uyarvullal' - always think positive. Failure is just feedback! Learn and try again. 'Thortraalum muyarchi sei' - effort matters more than outcome.

instruction: கோபத்தை அடக்குவது பற்றி என்ன சொல்கிறார்?
output: குறள்: 'சினத்தை பொருளாக கொண்டவன் கேடு நினைத்ததன் போலும் தரும்'. கோபத்தை முக்கியமாக கருதுபவனுக்கு கெடுதலே வரும். மேலும்: 'தன்னைத்தான் காக்கின் சினங்காக்க காவாக்கால் தன்னையே கொல்லும் சினம்'. கோபத்தை அடக்கவில்லென்றால், அது உன்னையே அழிக்கும். Anger destroys the angry person first!

instruction: En vivasaaya nilaththa veettu manaiyaaga maatra enna seiyya vendum?
output:
**Agricultural Land Conversion:**

**Where to Apply:**
- District Collector Office
- Online: eservices.tn.gov.in

**Types:**
1. **NA Conversion** - Agri to Residential/Commercial
2. **Layout Approval** - Multiple plots, need DTCP

**Documents:**
- Patta (your name)
- Chitta & Adangal
- FMB
- EC (30 years)
- Tax receipts
- Location sketch
- Agriculture Dept NOC (some cases)

**Fee:** 1-3% of land value + stamp duty difference

**Time:** 2-6 months

**Restrictions:**
- Wet land = difficult
- Prime agri zone = not allowed
- Above 2 acres = special permission

instruction: Two-wheeler-க்கு pillion rider helmet கட்டாயமா?
output: ஆம். Driver மற்றும் pillion rider இருவருக்கும் ISI marked helmet கட்டாயம். Fine: Rs.1,000 + 3 months license suspension (repeat offence). Children-க்கும் helmet வேண்டும். Fashion helmets not acceptable.

instruction: COVID pola emergency-la price capping irukkumaa?
output: Government can cap prices in emergencies. COVID example: TN government capped - room charges, oxygen, medicines, CT scan rates. Authority: Epidemic Diseases Act, Disaster Management Act. Violation: License suspension, heavy fines. Current: Some COVID caps may still apply. Check: DHS notifications. Overcharging complaint: DHS, Consumer Forum.

instruction: Fashion Design படிக்க தமிழ்நாட்டில் எங்கே போவது?
output: Top institutes: 1) NIFT Chennai - National level 2) AIFD Chennai 3) JD Institute of Fashion. Admission: NIFT - entrance exam (January). Courses: B.Des Fashion Design (4 years), Diploma (1-2 years). Eligibility: 12th any stream. Fees: NIFT ₹2-3 lakh/year, Private ₹50,000-1.5 lakh/year. Jobs: Fashion houses, Garment industry, Freelance designer. Chennai = garment hub = good placement.

instruction: காப்பீடு முகவர் அழைத்து 'உங்கள் பழைய பாலிசி முதிர்ச்சி தொகை தயார். பெற 10,000 செயலாக்க கட்டணம்' என்றார்.
output: காப்பீட்டு நிறுவனங்கள் முதிர்ச்சி தொகை கொடுக்க செயலாக்க கட்டணம் கேட்பதில்லை. பாலிசி இருந்தால் நேரடியாக நிறுவனத்தின் அதிகாரபூர்வ எண்ணில் அழைத்து சரிபார்க்கவும். இது காப்பீட்டு மோசடி.

instruction: Agreement register pannama irundhaal valid-aa?
output: 11 months-kku kuraivana agreement-kku registration kattaayam illa, but notarize panradhu nalladu. 11 months-kku mela irundhaal registration illaamal court-la valid aagaadhu. Unregistered agreement-a evidence-aa use panna mudiyaadhu.

instruction: 'Complete Web Development Course - Get job in 3 months, course fee 2000 (worth 20,000)' nu ad. Career ku useful, join pannalama?
output: 'Job guaranteed' no course can promise. 2000 course - usually outdated content, no proper support. Free quality content - freeCodeCamp, Coursera (audit), YouTube - available. Paid courses - Udemy sales (500-1000), verified platforms use pannunga.

instruction: WhatsApp group la add aanaen - stock tips kuduppaanga. Admin profit screenshots post pannuvaar, members ellam 'thanks anna 50K profit' nu solluvaanga. Invest pannalaama saami?
output: 'Pig butchering' scam saami idhu. Screenshots fake, 'members' ellam gang part dhaan. Small withdrawal allow pannuvaanga first - trust build panna. Big amount pottaa - 'technical issue', 'tax pay pannunga' nu mudiyaadha loop. SEBI registered brokers mattum use pannunga - Zerodha, Groww. RS Puram la oru textile merchant ipdi 15 lakh lose pannitaar.

instruction: 11th & 12th படிக்கும்போது என்ன scholarship கிடைக்கும்?
output:
**Plus Two Scholarships:**

**1. Post-Matric Scholarship (SC/ST) - Central:**
- Day Scholar: ₹230/month
- Hosteller: ₹750/month
- Maintenance: ₹750/month
- Income limit: ₹2.5 lakh
- Apply: scholarships.gov.in

**2. Post-Matric Scholarship (BC/MBC/DNC) - State:**
- Full fee reimbursement
- Monthly stipend: ₹500
- Income limit: ₹2 lakh
- Apply: tneservices.tn.gov.in

**3. Minorities Post-Matric:**
- ₹500/month (Hosteller: ₹1,000)
- Course fee: Actual or ₹7,000 (whichever less)
- Apply: scholarships.gov.in

**4. Free Laptop Scheme (TN Govt):**
- All Govt school 11th students
- Automatic distribution
- No separate application!

**5. TN CM Higher Education Assurance Scheme:**
- First Generation Graduates
- Free education + ₹1,000/month
- Apply: tneservices.tn.gov.in

**6. INSPIRE Scholarship (Class 11-12):**
- Top 1% in 10th board
- ₹5,000/year for 11th & 12th
- Auto-selection based on marks

**7. Merit-based Scholarships:**
- Various trusts based on 10th marks
- Tata, Reliance, L&T, etc.

**8. Pragati Scholarship (Girls):**
- For girls in technical education
- ₹50,000/year
- Apply: aicte-pragati-saksham-gov.in

**Apply Deadline:** Usually August-October

instruction: 'SBI technical team la irundhu pesuren ayya, unga account la security issue, AnyDesk install pannunga remote la fix pannidurom' nu call vandhudhu. Bank officer nu sonnaan, nambalam aa?
output: NEVER install AnyDesk ayya! Bank technical team ipdi call pannave pannaadhu. AnyDesk install pannina unga phone/computer full aa paappaanga - banking app open panni all money transfer panniduvaanga. Immediately cut pannunga. Bank branch ku complaint pannunga.

instruction: Kolam enna? Eppadi poduvathu?
output: Kolam - veettu vaasalil podum floor design. Rice flour (arisi maavu) payanpaduththuvathu traditional - ants, birds-kku unavu. Vagaigal: 1) Pulli Kolam - dots around design, 2) Sikku Kolam - intricate patterns, 3) Ner Kolam - straight lines. Every day different design. Pongal - special big kolam. Aadi month - kal pookal (stone flowers) add panraanga. YouTube-la tutorials niraiya. Tamil women's daily art form!

instruction: 'அருளில்லார்க்கு அவ்வுலகம் இல்லை' - அருள் பற்றிய குறள் என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'அருளில்லார்க்கு அவ்வுலகம் இல்லை பொருளில்லார்க்கு இவ்வுலகம் இல்லை யாங்கு'. அர்த்தம்: கருணை இல்லாதவர்களுக்கு மறுமை (after-life) இல்லை. பணம் இல்லாதவர்களுக்கு இம்மை (இந்த உலகம்) கஷ்டம். Compassion = spiritual wealth, Money = worldly needs. இரண்டும் தேவை!

instruction: Online-la order pannen, vera product vandhudutchu (Coimbatore style)
output: Steps: 1) Delivery podhu video edunga (unboxing), 2) App-la return/refund request, 3) Email complaint (company grievance officer), 4) NCH portal complaint. Evidence upload pannunga. 7 days-la response illanna consumer forum.

instruction: E-challan pay எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: echallan.parivahan.gov.in அல்லது TN Traffic Police app. Enter: Vehicle number/Challan number. Payment: Net banking, UPI, credit/debit card. Offline: Traffic police station, court. Non-payment: License suspension, vehicle seizure possible.

instruction: Builder flat தர delay பண்றார் - என்ன செய்யலாம்?
output: RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority)-ல் complaint போடுங்க. tnrera.in - Tamil Nadu RERA portal. Delay-க்கு interest (SBI lending rate + 2%) கேட்கலாம். Full refund with interest-உம் கேட்கலாம். Consumer forum-லும் parallel-ஆ case போடலாம்.

instruction: Agathiyar yaar? Avar yaen mukkiyamaanavar?
output: Agathiyar (Agasthiyar) Siddhargaloda thalaivar, 'Guru Moorthi' endru azhaikkapadubavar. Tamil mozhikku ilakkanam ezhuthiyavar endru nambappadugiradhu (Agaththiyam). Sivaperumaan ivarukku neradiyaaga gnaanam aLiththathaaga nambikkai. Thennindiyaavukku vadakkilirundu vandhavar. Podhigai malaiyil indrum iruppathaga nambappadugiradhu. Siddha medicine-oda founding father.

instruction: Fever-க்கு traditional treatment என்ன?
output: Traditional fever remedies: 1) Nilavembu Kudineer (best for viral), 2) Papaya leaf juice (dengue prevention), 3) Coriander seed water, 4) Tulsi + ginger tea, 5) Vetiver (Khus) water for cooling, 6) Light food - kanji (rice porridge), 7) Rest and hydration. Wet cloth: On forehead for high fever. When doctor needed: >103°F, convulsions, rash, severe headache, confusion, lasting >3 days.

instruction: Free house site patta எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: Homeless குடும்பங்களுக்கு government free site patta கொடுக்கும். Village panchayat அல்லது municipality-ல் விண்ணப்பிக்கவும். BPL certificate, landless certificate தேவை.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Tax audit software license expiring. Renew at 8000 or face ICAI penalty.' Software license ku ICAI penalty varudhaa?
output: ICAI doesn't mandate specific software for tax audit. Software licenses are between you and vendor, not ICAI matter. No ICAI penalty for software issues. Check with your actual software provider for genuine renewals.

instruction: Property vaangum mun ennenna documents check pannanum?
output: Must check: 1) Title deed chain (30 years), 2) EC (30 years), 3) Patta & Chitta, 4) Survey sketch, 5) Tax paid receipts, 6) Approved building plan, 7) NOC (if apartment), 8) RERA registration (new projects), 9) Power of Attorney (if applicable). Lawyer verification recommended.

instruction: Marriage certificate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Special Marriage Act அல்லது Hindu Marriage Act கீழ் register செய்யலாம். Sub-Registrar office-ல் இருவரும் நேரில் போக வேண்டும். 2 witnesses தேவை. Age proof, address proof, photos கொண்டு செல்லுங்கள்.

instruction: MBA படிப்பு தமிழ்நாட்டில் எங்கே படிப்பது?
output: சிறந்த விருப்பங்கள்: 1) IIM Trichy (CAT score) 2) Anna University - MIT (TANCET) 3) Govt Arts Colleges (TANCET). TANCET தேர்வு: பிப்ரவரி-மார்ச். தகுதி: ஏதேனும் பட்டம் 50%. அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ₹30,000-50,000/ஆண்டு. IIM கட்டணம்: ₹20+ லட்சம் மொத்தம். Scholarship வாய்ப்புகள் உள்ளன.

instruction: Whistleblower protection இருக்கா?
output: Whistleblower Protection Act 2014: Corruption, misuse of power report பண்றவர்களுக்கு protection. Apply: Competent Authority (state level). Identity protection, victimization protection உண்டு. Retaliation-க்கு penalty. Anonymous complaints-உம் accept.

instruction: TN Ration Kadai-la enna items kidaikkum?
output: TN PDS items list. Rice Card: 20 kg free rice/family. Sugar Card: 5 kg rice at ₹1/kg. Common: Sugar 1.5 kg (₹13.50), Wheat/Atta 2 kg (₹7), Palm Oil 500ml (₹27), Daal 1 kg (₹28). Specials: Pongal - 1 kg sugar free + cash; Diwali - 1 kg sugar free; Ramzan - dates + cash for Muslims. Eligibility: Based on ration card type. Shop: Monthly distribution, SMS alert.

instruction: Tamil Nadu govt-oda merit scholarship eppadi kidaikkum?
output: CM's Merit Scholarship: 10th, 12th-la high marks vangiyavargalukku. Amount: ₹5,000-10,000 one-time. Eligibility: State topper, district topper, subject topper. Selection: Board exam results basis automatic. Higher education scholarship: ₹25,000-50,000 for state rank holders in entrance exams (NEET, JEE). Apply through School Education Department.

instruction: Defective product vaangiten - enna seyyalam?
output: Options: 1) Replacement - same product pudhiyathaa, 2) Refund - full amount thirumba, 3) Repair - free of cost sari seyya, 4) Compensation - loss-kku extra amount. Mudhalil seller-kitta written complaint kodunga. Response illaattal consumer forum ponga.

instruction: 'IPL match prediction - 100% accurate, join Telegram VIP group, 5000 subscription.' Demo predictions correct aa vandhudhu.
output: Demo predictions - they send opposite predictions to different groups, one group always 'wins.' VIP group la 'invest more for insider info' demands varum. Match fixing illegal anyway. Cricket betting apps - most unlicensed, money recovery impossible.

instruction: Body hospital-la detain panraanga bill kattum varai - legal-aa?
output: ILLEGAL! Dead body detention prohibited. Supreme Court + High Court orders: 1) Body cannot be held for bill payment, 2) Hospital can pursue legal recovery of dues, 3) Detention = criminal offence. Action: 1) Police complaint, 2) Magistrate petition, 3) Human Rights Commission. Bill dispute: Settle later through legal means - body must be released. Report: DHS, State Medical Council.

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'Free cement scheme for house construction. Register with 2000 for 50 bag cement.' Cement kedaikum aa free la?
output: Government housing schemes provide materials through proper application and verification. No 'free cement' scheme with cash registration. Housing subsidies through PMAY/CM housing scheme with extensive documentation. Scammers target construction workers' building material needs.

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Farmer Applying for PM-KISAN and Crop Insurance - Full conversation guide
output:
User: Naan vivasaayi. PM-KISAN scheme-la register aagala. Eppadi pannuvadhu?

Assistant: PM-KISAN register panna simple process. First few questions:

1. Unga peyarla land irukka? (Patta unga name-la?)
2. Evvalavu land irukku?
3. Neengal income tax file pannuveengalaa?

Indha details sollunga, eligibility check pannalam.

User: Aamaa, 3 acre peyarla irukku. Income tax file pannala.

Assistant: Perfect! Neengal eligible:

**PM-KISAN Eligibility ✓**
- Land owner: ✓
- Not Income Tax payer: ✓

**Benefits:** ₹6,000/year (₹2,000 x 3 installments)

**Registration Options:**

**Option 1: Online (Self)**
1. pmkisan.gov.in
2. "New Farmer Registration"
3. State: Tamil Nadu
4. Aadhaar number enter
5. Fill details
6. Upload: Patta/Chitta
7. Submit

**Option 2: CSC / Agriculture Office**
- Nearest Common Service Center
- Agriculture Officer office
- Avanga free-ya register pannuvanga

Online try pannuveengalaa? Documents ready irukka?

User: Online try panren. Enna documents scan pannanum?

Assistant: **PM-KISAN Registration Documents:**

**Mandatory:**
1. **Aadhaar Card** - Front & Back scan
2. **Bank Passbook** - First page (Name, Account No, IFSC)
3. **Land Records:**
   - Patta (latest)
   - Chitta
   - OR Adangal extract

**Details you need:**
- Aadhaar Number
- Mobile Number (Aadhaar linked better)
- Bank Account Number
- IFSC Code
- Survey Numbers (land)
- Land area (hectares)

**Important:**
- Bank account unga name-la irukkanum
- Aadhaar-Bank name match aaganum
- Mobile number active irukkanum

Ellaam ready aa?

User: Documents ready. Oru doubt - crop insurance-um pannanum. Adhukku separate aa apply pannumaa?

Assistant: Good question! Yes, Crop Insurance (PMFBY) separate application:

**PM-KISAN vs PMFBY:**
| | PM-KISAN | PMFBY |
|--|----------|-------|
| What | Direct cash | Crop Insurance |
| Amount | ₹6,000/year fixed | Claim based on loss |
| Apply | Once (auto-renew) | Every season |

**PMFBY Apply:**
- **When:** Before sowing - deadline irukku
- **Where:** Bank / CSC / pmfby.gov.in / UZHAVAN App

**Premium (You pay):**
- Kharif crops: 2% of Sum Insured
- Rabi crops: 1.5%
- Commercial crops: 5%

**Example:** 3 acres paddy
- Sum Insured: ~₹1,50,000
- Your Premium: ₹3,000 (2%)
- Govt pays rest

**Claim:** Natural calamity, pest attack la loss na compensation

Neengal enna crop poda porreenga? Deadline check pannalam.

User: Paddy podalaam nu irukken. Deadline eppo?

Assistant: **Paddy (Samba/Thaladi) - Kharif Season:**

**Deadline:** Usually August-September (exact date varies yearly)

**Check Current Deadline:**
1. pmfby.gov.in → Crop Insurance tab
2. Select: State (TN) → District → Season → Crop
3. Shows: Last date, Premium, Sum Insured

**Or:** UZHAVAN App la notification varum

**Apply Process:**

**Option 1: Through Bank (Easiest)**
- KCC (Kisan Credit Card) irukka?
- KCC loan vaangunavanga-ku auto-enrollment
- Premium loan-layae deduct aagum

**Option 2: Online Self**
1. pmfby.gov.in → "Farmer Corner"
2. Register with mobile
3. Fill crop details
4. Upload: Land records, Sowing certificate
5. Pay premium online

**Option 3: CSC / Agriculture Office**
- Documents kondu poganum
- Avanga apply pannuvanga

KCC irukka ungakitta?

User: KCC illa. Vaangalaamaa? Interest evvalavu?

Assistant: **KCC (Kisan Credit Card) - Must Have for Farmers!**

**Benefits:**
- **Interest:** Only 4% (Normal 7% - 3% Govt subsidy)
- **Collateral Free:** Up to ₹1.6 lakh
- **Flexible:** Withdraw anytime, pay after harvest
- **Crop Insurance:** Auto-enrolled
- **PM-KISAN link:** Easy processing

**Eligibility:**
- Land owner ✓ (You qualify!)
- Tenant farmers - also eligible
- Even oral lessees can apply

**KCC Loan Amount:**
- Based on: Crop + Area + Scale of Finance
- 3 acres paddy: ~₹60,000-90,000 per season

**Apply:**

**Option 1: Bank**
- Nearest Commercial Bank / Co-operative Bank
- Documents: Aadhaar, Patta, Chitta, Photos
- Time: 7-14 days

**Option 2: Through PM-KISAN**
- pmkisan.gov.in → KCC tab
- Auto-forward to bank
- Easier process for PM-KISAN beneficiaries

**My Suggestion:** Apply KCC first, then:
- PM-KISAN registration easier
- Crop insurance auto
- 4% interest loan ready

Bank pogalaamaa? Cooperative irukka near-by?

User: Okay, KCC first apply panren. Complete process sollunga

Assistant: **KCC Application - Complete Process:**

**Step 1: Choose Bank**
- Primary Agricultural Credit Society (PACS) - Easiest for farmers
- Co-operative Bank
- Any Commercial Bank (SBI, Indian Bank, etc.)

**Step 2: Collect Documents**
1. Aadhaar Card (Original + 2 copies)
2. PAN Card (if available)
3. Patta (Original + copy)
4. Chitta & Adangal (from VAO)
5. Sowing Certificate (from VAO) - optional initially
6. Passport Photos - 4
7. Bank passbook (if existing account)

**Step 3: Visit Bank**
- Ask for "KCC Application Form"
- Fill the form
- Attach documents
- Submit

**Step 4: Bank Process**
- Document verification
- Land record check
- Credit limit calculation
- Field visit (sometimes)

**Step 5: Sanction**
- Sanction letter
- KCC card issue
- Cheque book (optional)
- **Time:** 7-14 days

**Step 6: Disbursement**
- Go to bank
- Withdraw as needed
- Repay after harvest
- **Interest:** 4% if timely repayment!

**After KCC Ready:**
- PM-KISAN auto-link
- PMFBY premium auto-deduct
- Soil Health Card link

**One tip:** Sowing certificate VAO kitta vaangunga - multiple uses irukku.

All clear aa? Vendum na summary sheet tharattumaa?

User: Thanks! Oru last doubt - Soil Health Card enna? Free aa?

Assistant: **Soil Health Card - Free & Very Useful!**

**What is it?**
- Unga nilathoda soil test report
- Nutrients (N, P, K, etc.) evvalavu irukku
- pH level, Organic carbon
- Enna fertilizer evvalavu podanum - recommendation

**Benefits:**
- Right fertilizer = Less cost
- Better yield
- Soil damage prevent

**How to Get (FREE):**

**Option 1: Online Request**
1. soilhealth.dac.gov.in
2. Register with Aadhaar
3. Enter land details
4. Request soil testing
5. Sample collection by Agri Dept
6. Report online + Card by post

**Option 2: Agriculture Office**
- Visit Block Agriculture Office
- Give land details
- They'll collect soil sample
- Report in 2-3 weeks

**Option 3: KVK (Krishi Vigyan Kendra)**
- Nearby KVK-la free testing
- Plus free advice

**When to Test:**
- Before sowing season
- Every 3 years recommended

**Pro Tip:** Soil test result based-la fertilizer vaangunga - waste avoid, yield increase!

**Summary ungalukku:**
1. KCC Apply → Bank
2. PM-KISAN Register → pmkisan.gov.in
3. Crop Insurance → Auto with KCC or pmfby.gov.in
4. Soil Health Card → soilhealth.dac.gov.in

All the best for your farming! Vendum na kekuinga.

instruction: Data Science, AI courses-kku endha college best?
output: IIT Madras (BSc in Data Science - online), Anna University, VIT, SRM, PSG Tech-la AI/ML courses irukku. IIT Madras online degree affordable-aagavum flexible-aagavum irukku.

instruction: சங்க இலக்கியம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: சங்க இலக்கியம் தமிழின் மிகப் பழமையான இலக்கிய தொகுப்பு. மூன்று சங்கங்கள் நடந்ததாக தமிழ் மரபு கூறுகிறது. இந்த இலக்கியங்கள் அகம் (காதல்), புறம் (வீரம், போர், அரசியல்) என்று பிரிக்கப்படுகின்றன. எட்டுத்தொகை, பத்துப்பாட்டு முக்கிய தொகுப்புகள். இயற்கை வர்ணனை, மனித உணர்வுகள் அழகாக சித்தரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன. உலகின் மிகப் பழைய secular இலக்கியங்களில் ஒன்று.

instruction: ESI card benefits ennenna?
output: Benefits: 1) Free medical care (ESI hospitals/dispensaries), 2) Sickness benefit (70% wages), 3) Maternity benefit (100% wages - 26 weeks), 4) Disability benefit, 5) Dependent benefit (death case), 6) Funeral expenses. Salary Rs.21,000/month varai ESI applicable.

instruction: 'நவராத்திரி கொலு set FREE! Just pay shipping 299 Rs' - Instagram ad genuine-ஆ?
output: Fraud ad! 'Free + shipping only' classic scam pattern. நவராத்திரி-ல கொலு related scams spike ஆகும். Card details வாங்கி recurring charges போடுவாங்க. Verified sellers-கிட்ட மட்டும் buy பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Machan, crypto bot la friend profit pannaan nu sonnan, try pannalama?
output: Bro, initial profit trap da. Friend own money dhaan return varudhu. More invest panna solluvaanga, then ghost. Binance, CoinDCX - legit exchanges use pannu, Instagram bots scam da.

instruction: தெற்கு மாவட்ட மாணவர்களுக்கு special scholarship ஏதாவது இருக்கா?
output: ஆம். BC/MBC scholarship, first graduate scholarship, merit scholarship எல்லாம் apply பண்ணலாம். Tirunelveli, Thoothukudi, Kanyakumari மாவட்ட மாணவர்களுக்கு Sadras scheme-ல் priority உண்டு.

instruction: NEEDS (New Entrepreneur-cum-Enterprise Development Scheme) endraal enna?
output: Self-employment loan for youth. Amount: Up to ₹5 lakh (25% subsidy on project cost). Eligibility: 21-35 years (up to 45 for SC/ST/Women), 8th pass, TN resident. Sectors: Manufacturing, Service, Trading. Subsidy: General 25%, SC/ST/Women 30%. Training: Free mandatory EDP training. Apply: DIC (District Industries Centre). Documents: Project report, Education proof, Community certificate, Bank no-objection. Repayment: 3-7 years.

instruction: Tally course padiththaal enna job kidaikkum?
output: Tally jobs: 1) Accountant - small/medium businesses 2) Billing operator 3) Inventory manager 4) GST filing assistant 5) Bank data entry. Salary: ₹10,000-20,000 starting. Course duration: 2-3 months. Government centres: NIELIT, TNSDC. Private: Tally Academy (authorized). Certification: Tally.ERP 9 / TallyPrime. Combined with GST knowledge = better opportunities. Self-employment: Freelance accounting services.

instruction: 'Business loan - collateral இல்லாமல் 50 lakh தருவோம், government subsidy உண்டு' என்கிறார்கள். Trust செய்யலாமா?
output: Government subsidy schemes-க்கு official websites-ல் apply செய்ய வேண்டும். Agents மூலம் போனால் scam ஆக இருக்கலாம். MSME, MUDRA official portals check செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Democracy / jananayagam concept Thirukkuralil ulladha?
output: Neradiyaaga 'democracy' illai, aanaal concepts ullana: 'Iraimaatchi' - nalla aatchiyoda adaiyaалangal. 'Kudiseyalvagai' - makkal pangaetpu. Melum: 'Sevikkuna villAdha pozhdu siRidhum ivakkum iraachchiyam il'. Makkal kural ketkkaadha arasu veezhum. Accountability to people - democratic principle in ancient text!

instruction: Second-hand product-க்கு consumer rights apply ஆகுமா?
output: Seller condition honestly disclose செய்யணும். Hidden defects மறைத்து விற்றால் consumer rights apply ஆகும். 'As-is' condition-ல் வாங்கினால் limited rights. Dealer-இடம் வாங்கினால் full protection, private seller-இடம் வாங்கினால் limited.

instruction: ஸ்டாண்ட் அப் இந்தியா திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: SC/ST/பெண்களுக்கு தொழில் கடன். கடன் அளவு: ₹10 லட்சம் - ₹1 கோடி. தகுதி: SC/ST அல்லது பெண் தொழில்முனைவோர், 18 வயதுக்கு மேல், புதிய Manufacturing/Trading/Service தொழில், குறைந்தது 51% ownership. நன்மைகள்: Collateral-free (CGTMSE Guarantee), Low interest rate, 7 வருட திருப்பி செலுத்தும் காலம். விண்ணப்பம்: standupmitra.in

instruction: Child-க்கு ADHD/autism - treatment எங்கே?
output: Assessment: 1) Child psychiatrist, 2) Developmental pediatrician, 3) Clinical psychologist. Government: 1) Institute of Child Health (Chennai), 2) District Early Intervention Centres (DEIC), 3) Medical college child psychiatry. Services: Diagnosis, therapy (occupational, speech, behavioral), medicines if needed. Free: Government facilities. Schools: Special needs provisions mandatory. UDID: Apply for benefits if certified.

instruction: Engineering counselling-ல் random number என்ன? எப்படி work ஆகும்?
output: Random number: Same marks students-க்கு tie-breaker. System generated, not controllable. Priority: 1st - Cutoff marks, 2nd - Random number (if same marks). Example: You 195 cutoff, random 50000. Another person 195 cutoff, random 10000. They get priority. Impact: Matters only when competing for last few seats in popular colleges. Strategy: Higher marks = random number irrelevant. Focus on marks, not luck.

instruction: Arthritis/joint pain-kku Siddha treatment enna?
output: Effective for: Osteoarthritis (Moottu Vaatham), Rheumatoid arthritis (Ama Vaatham), Gout (Vali Azhal Keel Vayu). Treatments: 1) Internal - Rasagandhi Mezhugu, Sallaki, 2) External - Kottamchukkadi Thailam, Pinda Thailam, 3) Thokkanam (specialized massage), 4) Varmam therapy, 5) Ottradam (fomentation), 6) Kizhi (poultice massage). Diet: Avoid sour, cold foods. Duration: 1-3 months typically.

instruction: விநாயகர் சதுர்த்தி - 'Eco-friendly Ganesha idol FREE! Just pay courier 500 Rs' ad வந்துச்சு. Order பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam! 'Free + courier charge' classic fraud pattern. Ganesha Chaturthi-ல idol scams அதிகம். Money வாங்கிட்டு deliver பண்ண மாட்டாங்க. Local artisans-கிட்ட buy பண்ணுங்க. Online free offers நம்பாதீங்க.

instruction: Thirukkural Olympics-ல் mention ஆனதா?
output: ஆம்! 2004 Athens Olympics-ல் opening ceremony-யில் Thirukkural quote display ஆனது: 'யாதும் ஊரே யாவரும் கேளிர்' - 'Every land is my homeland, all people are my kin'. உலக சகோதரத்துவத்தை காட்டும் இந்த குறள் Olympic spirit-ஐ perfect-ஆ represent பண்ணியது. இது Tamil community-க்கு மிகப்பெரிய பெருமை!

instruction: 'செய்யாமல் செய்த உதவிக்கு' - நன்றி பற்றிய குறள் என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'செய்யாமல் செய்த உதவிக்கு வையகமும் வானகமும் ஆற்றல் அரிது'. அர்த்தம்: நாம் எந்த உதவியும் செய்யாமல் இருக்கும்போது, யாரோ ஒருவர் நமக்கு உதவி செய்தால், அந்த உதவிக்கு இந்த பூமியும் சொர்க்கமும் கூட ஈடாகாது. Unexpected kindness-ன் மதிப்பு அளவிட முடியாதது.

instruction: Suicide attempt criminal offence-ஆ?
output: NO! Decriminalized under MHCA 2017. Old: Section 309 IPC punished attempt. Now: Person attempting suicide presumed to be under severe stress - needs care, not punishment. Police: Cannot arrest or prosecute. Government duty: Provide care, rehabilitation. Family: Support, not blame. Hospital: Must treat without police formality. Exception: Abetment of suicide still criminal.

instruction: தஞ்சாவூர் ஓவியம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: தஞ்சாவூர் ஓவியம் - தமிழ்நாட்டின் traditional painting style. 16th century-ல் Nayak period-ல் develop ஆனது. சிறப்புகள்: 1) Gold foil work - relief, 3D effect, 2) Semi-precious stones embedded, 3) Vibrant colors, 4) Hindu gods, goddesses themes, 5) Wooden base with cloth coating. GI (Geographical Indication) tag பெற்றது. Prices: ₹500 (small) to ₹50,000+ (large). Thanjavur-ல் நிறைய shops. Wedding gift-ஆக popular. Museum quality pieces collectors buy பண்றாங்க.

instruction: Owner திடீர்னு current cut பண்ணிட்டார், legal-ஆ?
output: Illegal! Owner basic amenities (water, electricity) cut பண்ண கூடாது - self-help eviction illegal. Actions: 1) Police complaint (criminal intimidation), 2) Rent Authority complaint, 3) Civil court injunction. Owner penalty: Fine + imprisonment possible. Tenant rights: Continue staying + demand restoration. Document everything - photos, videos.

instruction: Court fee எவ்வளவு கட்டணும்?
output: TN Court Fees Act based: Property suits - value based (1-10%), Money suits - amount based, Injunction - fixed fee. Consumer forum: Free up to Rs.5 lakh. Lok Adalat: No fee. Poor litigants: Court fee exemption available. e-payment: ecourts.gov.in.

instruction: Resume/CV eppadi ezhudhuvadhu?
output: Resume essentials: 1) Contact info - email (professional), phone 2) Education - reverse chronological, CGPA 3) Skills - technical + soft skills 4) Projects - 2-3 relevant ones with outcomes 5) Internships/Experience 6) Achievements - quantify where possible 7) Extra-curricular - leadership roles. Format: 1 page for freshers, clean design, no photos (India OK), PDF format. Avoid: Spelling errors, lying, lengthy paragraphs. Templates: Canva, Novoresume free options.

instruction: Advance/Security deposit எவ்வளவு கேட்கலாம்?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல் சட்டப்படி maximum 3 மாத வாடகை மட்டுமே advance-ஆக வாங்கலாம். ஆனால் practice-ல் 6-10 மாத advance கேட்கிறார்கள். இது சட்டவிரோதம். Rent Authority-க்கு புகார் செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Paramedical courses ennenna irukku? Job scope?
output: Popular courses: 1) DMLT (Lab Technician) - 2 years 2) X-Ray/Radiology - 2 years 3) Operation Theatre Tech - 2 years 4) Physiotherapy (BPT) - 4 years 5) Optometry - 4 years 6) Medical Imaging Tech - 3 years. Admission: Based on 12th marks (Physics, Chemistry, Biology). Jobs: Hospitals, Diagnostic centres, Clinics. Salary: ₹12,000-25,000 starting. High demand, job security good.

instruction: Scholarship amount bank-ல் வரவில்லை. என்ன செய்வது?
output: NSP portal-ல் application status check செய்யுங்கள். 'Disbursed' என்று இருந்தால் bank-ல் விசாரிக்கவும். Account number தவறு இருக்கலாம். College scholarship cell-ல் கேளுங்கள்.

instruction: Amma-வுக்கு sugar அதிகம், கால் ல புண், என்ன doctor பார்க்கணும்?
output: Diabetic foot ulcer - serious! Immediately: 1) General surgery or 2) Vascular surgery specialist. Don't delay - infection spread fast, amputation risk. Government: District hospital, medical college. Treatment: 1) Sugar control, 2) Wound care (daily dressing), 3) Antibiotics, 4) Maybe surgery. Prevention: 1) Daily foot check, 2) Proper footwear, 3) No walking barefoot, 4) Cut nails carefully. Coimbatore: CMC, GH has good diabetic foot care.

instruction: SIM swap fraud la account empty aaiduchu. Special procedure irukka?
output: Step 1 (FIRST): Call telecom - Airtel: 121/1800-103-4444, Jio: 198/1800-889-9999, Vi: 199/1800-119-1199, BSNL: 1800-180-1503. Say: 'Unauthorized SIM swap happened, block my number immediately.' Step 2: Call ALL banks simultaneously, freeze accounts, disable mobile/UPI banking. Step 3: Visit telecom store with original ID and police complaint, get new SIM. Step 4: FIR mentioning IT Act Section 66C (Identity Theft), Section 420 IPC (Cheating). Recovery chance: 30-50% if acted within 2-3 hours.

instruction: 12th முடிஞ்சாச்சு, வீட்ல college வேண்டாம், கல்யாணம் பண்ணிக்கோன்னு சொல்றாங்க. நான் படிக்கணும்.
output: Your education is your RIGHT! Support available: 1) Moovalur Ramamirtham - financial support for girl education 2) Free government college education 3) Women helpline: 181 4) District Women Protection Officer 5) NGOs: Pratham, CRY support. Convince family: Show scholarship opportunities, free education costs, earning potential after degree. Legal: Child Marriage Prevention Act (below 18 illegal). Study brings independence and better life. Don't give up your dreams!

instruction: 'கிரிப்டோ வர்த்தகத்தில் உத்தரவாத வருமானம். எங்கள் நிபுணர்கள் உங்களுக்காக வர்த்தகம் செய்வார்கள். குறைந்தபட்ச முதலீடு 50,000' - நம்பலாமா?
output: கிரிப்டோவில் 'உத்தரவாத வருமானம்' என்பது மோசடி. சந்தை ஏற்ற இறக்கம் உள்ளது, யாரும் லாபத்தை உறுதி செய்ய முடியாது. SEBI பதிவில்லாத தளங்களில் முதலீடு செய்யாதீர்கள்.

instruction: NABH accreditation endraal enna? Important-aa?
output: NABH = National Accreditation Board for Hospitals. Means: Hospital meets quality standards in - patient safety, infection control, infrastructure, staff qualifications, processes. Benefits: 1) Quality assurance, 2) Insurance companies prefer NABH hospitals, 3) CGHS/ECHS empanelment, 4) Patient safety protocols. Levels: Entry level, Progressive, Full accreditation. Check: nabh.co website for list.

instruction: 'தாம்வீழ்வார் மென்றோள்' - துணைவியின் அழகு பற்றிய குறள் என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'தாம்வீழ்வார் மென்றோள் துயிலின் இனிதுகொல் தாமரைக் கண்ணான் உலகு'. அர்த்தம்: நம்மை நேசிப்பவர் மெல்லிய தோளில் தூங்குவது, திருமாலின் (தாமரைக் கண்ணான்) சொர்க்கத்தை விட இனிமையானது. True love is heaven on earth! Romance-க்கு வள்ளுவரின் அழகான expression.

instruction: Coaching illaamal JEE crack panna mudiyumaa?
output: Possible but challenging. Self-study success factors: 1) Strong self-discipline 2) Proper study plan 3) Quality resources - YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy free), NPTEL 4) Regular mock tests 5) Doubt clearing - online forums, Telegram groups. Advantages: Own pace, cost saving. Challenges: Motivation, structured approach, peer competition. Hybrid approach: Free online + self-study works well. Many toppers are self-study students.

instruction: ஒரு மாவட்டத்திலிருந்து வேறு மாவட்டத்திற்கு ரேஷன் கார்டு மாற்றம் செய்வது எப்படி?
output: One Nation One Ration Card திட்டத்தின் கீழ் இப்போது எளிது. புதிய முகவரியில் Aadhaar update செய்து, பழைய மாவட்ட office-ல் NOC வாங்கி, புதிய மாவட்டத்தில் விண்ணப்பிக்கவும்.

instruction: Fever 3 days aachu, hospital poganumaa?
output: Go to hospital if: 1) Fever >103°F (39.4°C), 2) Fever with rash, 3) Severe headache/stiff neck, 4) Difficulty breathing, 5) Persistent vomiting, 6) Confusion, 7) Not responding to paracetamol, 8) Underlying conditions (diabetes, heart), 9) Children/elderly - earlier threshold. Dengue season: Blood test after day 3 of fever. Self-care: Hydration, rest, paracetamol (not aspirin for dengue suspected).

instruction: Neighbour வீட்டு construction என் வீட்டுக்கு damage - compensation கிடைக்குமா?
output: ஆம். Civil Court-ல் damages claim. Steps: 1) Written notice to neighbour, 2) Photos/videos of damage, 3) Engineer report (damage assessment), 4) Civil suit file. Compensation: Repair cost + inconvenience. Injunction to stop work-உம் possible.

instruction: வாக்காளர் அடையாள அட்டை எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: 1. voters.eci.gov.in அல்லது Voter Helpline App பயன்படுத்தவும் 2. படிவம் 6 நிரப்பவும் 3. ஆவணங்கள்: வயது சான்று (18+ ஆக இருக்க வேண்டும்), முகவரி சான்று, பாஸ்போர்ட் அளவு புகைப்படம் 4. BLO (Booth Level Officer) உங்கள் வீட்டிற்கு சரிபார்க்க வருவார் 5. காலம்: 30-45 நாட்கள்

instruction: Property document lost ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Police complaint (FIR), 2) Newspaper advertisement (lost notice), 3) Sub-Registrar office-ல் certified copy apply, 4) Affidavit notarize. Certified copy original-க்கு சமம். Online: tnreginet.gov.in-ல் post-2009 documents download பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: ITI படிப்பு யாருக்கு ஏற்றது? எப்படி சேருவது?
output: 8th அல்லது 10th pass ஆனவர்களுக்கு. 130+ வகையான trades உள்ளன (Electrician, Fitter, Welder, Computer Operator போன்றவை). சேர்க்கை: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. படிப்பு காலம்: 6 மாதம் முதல் 2 ஆண்டுகள். அரசு ITI முழுவதும் இலவசம். படித்த பிறகு Apprenticeship செய்யலாம், நல்ல வேலை வாய்ப்பு.

instruction: NEET answer key-la mistake irundhal challenge panna mudiyuma?
output: Mudiyum. NTA official website-la answer key challenge window open aagum. Rs.200 per question pay panni challenge pannalam. Valid challenge-aa irundha money refund aagum, marks adjust aagum.

instruction: JEE-ku endha books padikkanum?
output: Essential books: Physics - HC Verma, DC Pandey, Irodov (Advanced). Chemistry - NCERT (must), OP Tandon (Physical), Himanshu Pandey (Organic), JD Lee (Inorganic). Maths - RD Sharma, Cengage series, Arihant. NCERT = Foundation. Beyond NCERT for JEE Advanced. Online: PYQs from NTA website, mock tests from coaching platforms. Quality > Quantity - one book per subject master pannunga.

instruction: என் புள்ளைக்கு fever வந்திருக்கு, GH போகலாமா?
output: GH போங்க, free treatment. ஆனா mild fever-க்கு PHC போதும். High fever, 3 days+ fever, fits, rash இருந்தா GH immediately. Chennai: 1) GH (Egmore/Stanley/Kilpauk), 2) ICH Egmore (children specialist). Token system - early போங்க. Documents: Ration card/Aadhar இருந்தா good. Emergency-க்கு எந்த document-உம் வேண்டாம்.

instruction: Neighbour சத்தம் போட்டு தொல்லை தருகிறார் - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Friendly talk முதலில், 2) Written complaint to RWA/Association, 3) Police complaint (IPC 290 - public nuisance), 4) Civil Court injunction. Night 10PM-6AM noise: Noise Pollution Rules violation. Decibel limit: Residential area 55dB day, 45dB night.

instruction: Commercial property-க்கும் same rules-ஆ?
output: Basic principles same. ஆனால் commercial tenancy-க்கு: 1) Advance limit 6 months (residential-க்கு 3 months), 2) Rent increase நியாயமாக இருக்கணும், 3) Goodwill compensation கேட்கலாம் (long-term tenants), 4) Business loss-க்கு compensation கேட்கலாம்.

instruction: திருக்குறளின் அமைப்பு எப்படி இருக்கிறது?
output: திருக்குறள் மூன்று பிரிவுகளாக அமைந்துள்ளது: 1) அறத்துப்பால் (38 அதிகாரங்கள்) - தர்மம், நல்லொழுக்கம், 2) பொருட்பால் (70 அதிகாரங்கள்) - அரசியல், பொருளாதாரம், 3) காமத்துப்பால் (25 அதிகாரங்கள்) - காதல், இல்லற வாழ்க்கை. மொத்தம் 133 அதிகாரங்கள், 1330 குறட்பாக்கள். ஒவ்வொரு அதிகாரத்திலும் 10 குறள்கள்.

instruction: Streedhan-க்கும் Dowry-க்கும் என்ன வித்தியாசம்?
output: Streedhan = Woman's personal property (gifts from parents, relatives - voluntarily given). Dowry = Demand-ஆக கேட்டு வாங்கியது (illegal). Streedhan wife's absolute property - husband touch பண்ண முடியாது. Streedhan claim divorce-ல் பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Government officer லஞ்சம் கேட்டால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Vigilance and Anti-Corruption (DVAC): 1064 helpline, 2) Lokayukta, 3) CBI (central government). Trap operation request பண்ணலாம். Evidence: Recording (legal in TN), witnesses. Bribe giver-க்கும் protection உண்டு (if reports).

instruction: SMS வந்தது: 'உங்கள் SBI கார்டு expire ஆகிவிட்டது. புதுப்பிக்க இந்த லிங்க் கிளிக் செய்யுங்கள்'
output: இது phishing SMS. கார்டு புதுப்பிக்க வங்கிக்கே போக வேண்டும் அல்லது official app பயன்படுத்துங்கள். SMS லிங்க் போலியானது.

instruction: Patta transfer எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Property வாங்கிய பின் 30 நாட்களுக்குள் patta transfer apply செய்ய வேண்டும். Sale deed registered copy, seller's patta, EC தேவை. Taluk office-ல் apply செய்யுங்கள். Online-லும் eservices.tn.gov.in-ல் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Oruthan kadan vaangittu thirumba tharala, enna panradhu? (Chennai style)
output: Steps: 1) Written reminder anuppunga, 2) Legal notice (registered post), 3) Response illa = court case. Evidence: Cheque/transfer proof, WhatsApp messages, witnesses. Rs.20 lakh-kkul: Summary suit (faster). Criminal: Cheque bounce aana Section 138 case. Limitation: 3 years. Pro tip: Promissory note vaangiyirundhaa strong case.

instruction: Income certificate enge vaanguvadhu? Online-la apply pannalaamaa?
output: Online apply: www.tnedistrict.tn.gov.in or e-Sevai centres. Offline: VAO → RI → Tahsildar. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, employment proof (if any), self-declaration for non-employed. Time: 7-15 working days. Fee: ₹10-50. Validity: Usually 1 year, some schemes accept older. Types: Annual income certificate, income certificate for specific scheme. Tip: Apply in advance before scholarship deadline.

instruction: Delivery government hospital-ல் free-யா?
output: Yes! Completely free. Includes: 1) Normal delivery, 2) C-section if needed, 3) Anesthesia, 4) Medicines, 5) Post-delivery care, 6) Baby care. Additional: 1) 102 ambulance free transport, 2) JSY cash incentive for institutional delivery, 3) Dr. Muthulakshmi scheme Rs.18,000. Private: CMCHIS covers complicated deliveries. Register: PHC for referral chain.

instruction: 'Part time job - mobile-ல் app install செய்தால் தினமும் 500' என்று ad வந்தது. Try செய்யலாமா?
output: இந்த apps malware ஆக இருக்கலாம். உங்கள் data திருடப்படலாம். Unknown apps install செய்யாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Child choking - enna seyyanum?
output: If can cough: Encourage coughing. If can't cough/breathe: Infant (<1 year) - 5 back blows + 5 chest thrusts. Child (>1 year) - Heimlich maneuver: Stand behind, fist above navel, quick upward thrusts. Unconscious: Start CPR, call 108. Prevention: No small objects, cut food into small pieces, supervise eating. Learn CPR: Red Cross, hospitals conduct training.

instruction: Weight loss-kku Ayurveda treatment?
output: Ayurveda approach: Not just weight loss - metabolic correction. Treatments: 1) Udvartana (herbal powder massage), 2) Vamana/Virechana (detox), 3) Lekhana Basti (specific enema), 4) Internal medicines (Triphala, Guggulu), 5) Diet as per Prakriti, 6) Lifestyle modifications. Duration: 3-6 months for sustainable results. Benefit: Addresses root cause, prevents regain. Not: Quick fix - gradual healthy weight loss.

instruction: Water connection eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Urban area: twadboard.tn.gov.in. Rural: Village Administrative Officer. Documents: Property document, ID proof, Tax receipt. Fee: ₹500-1500 (connection charge)

instruction: PMKVY (Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana) scheme என்ன?
output: Central Government skill scheme. Features: 1) Free training - 200+ job roles 2) Certification - NSDC recognized 3) ₹500-2,000 reward on certification 4) Placement support 5) Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) - existing skills-க்கு certificate. Duration: 150-300 hours. Training centers: Skill India centres across TN. Register: www.pmkvyofficial.org. Age: 15-45 years. 10th pass preferred.

instruction: TN Differently Abled pension/assistance enna?
output: TN benefits for differently abled. Pension: ₹1,500/month (40%+ disability). Aids: Free wheelchair, hearing aid, artificial limbs, crutches. Education: Free education + special hostels. Employment: 4% reservation in govt jobs. Bus: Free travel (ordinary buses). Loan: Subsidy loan for self-employment. UDID Card: Unique Disability ID - mandatory for all benefits. Apply: Social Welfare dept/Taluk office.

instruction: Antibiotics ellaa infection-kkum velai seyyumaa?
output: NO! Antibiotics only for: Bacterial infections. Useless for: Viral infections (cold, flu, most fevers, COVID). Problem: Overuse = antibiotic resistance (serious global threat). When needed: Doctor decides based on examination/tests. Don't: 1) Self-prescribe antibiotics, 2) Demand antibiotics for every fever, 3) Stop course early. Most colds/fevers: Viral - need rest, fluids, paracetamol only.

instruction: Ration Card pattriya thavraana purithalkal enna?
output:
Wrong Beliefs vs Truth:

1. ❌ Can only apply in person → ✅ Online apply at tnpds.gov.in
2. ❌ Benefits only for Rice Card → ✅ NPHH card also has some benefits
3. ❌ Cannot get Ration in other district → ✅ One Nation One Ration Card works anywhere
4. ❌ No Ration without Aadhaar link → ✅ Some exceptions exist, but linking is better
5. ❌ No Ration without Smart Card → ✅ Manual entry must also be allowed
6. ❌ Only one card per house → ✅ Separate family can get separate card

Common Mistakes:
- Not surrendering old card during address change → Legal issue
- Not removing deceased person's name → Ration loss

instruction: Diabetes, BP-kku free medicine kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! NCD (Non-Communicable Disease) Program. Free at: PHC, CHC, Government hospitals. Services: 1) Screening camps, 2) Blood sugar/BP check, 3) Basic medicines (Metformin, Amlodipine, etc.), 4) Diet counseling, 5) Regular monitoring. NCD clinics: Dedicated clinics at larger centres. Insulin: Available at district hospitals. Register: Health ID (ABHA) helps track records.

instruction: Onam (Kerala friends) - 'Onam Bumper lottery - TN residents also eligible! Buy online' message. Buy பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam! Kerala lottery TN-ல online buy பண்ண முடியாது, illegal. 'TN eligible' என்று ஏமாத்துறாங்க. Onam lottery excitement misuse. Official Kerala lottery agents மட்டும் Kerala-ல sell பண்ணுவாங்க. Online lottery avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: TNPSC என்றால் என்ன? என்னென்ன exams நடத்துவாங்க?
output:
**TNPSC (Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission):**

**என்ன இது?**
- TN அரசு வேலைகளுக்கான தேர்வு நடத்தும் அமைப்பு
- Group 1, 2, 2A, 4 exams
- Technical, Non-technical posts

**Major Exams:**

**1. Group 1 (CSSE):**
- Posts: Deputy Collector, DSP, AD, RDO
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Salary: ₹56,100-1,77,500
- Toughest TNPSC exam

**2. Group 2 (CCSE-II):**
- Posts: Sub-Registrar, Assistant, Audit Inspector
- Eligibility: Degree
- Salary: ₹35,400-1,12,400

**3. Group 2A:**
- Posts: Junior Assistant, Bill Collector, Typist
- Eligibility: Degree (most posts)
- Salary: ₹19,500-62,000

**4. Group 4 (CCSE-IV):**
- Posts: Junior Assistant, Typist, Village Admin Officer
- Eligibility: 10th/12th pass
- Salary: ₹19,500-62,000
- Most vacancies!

**5. Group 3 (Technical):**
- Posts: Junior Engineer, Surveyor
- Eligibility: Diploma/Degree
- Department-wise recruitment

**Exam Pattern (General):**

| Stage | Marks | Papers |
|-------|-------|--------|
| Prelims | 200 | GS + Aptitude |
| Mains | 300 | GS + Language |
| Interview | 40 (Group 1 only) | - |

**Age Limit:**
- General: 21-32 years
- BC/MBC: +5 years
- SC/ST: No limit

**Apply:** tnpsc.gov.in

instruction: Cervical/breast cancer screening free-yaa?
output: Yes! Population-based screening program. Available: PHC, government hospitals. Cervical: VIA (Visual Inspection with Acetic Acid) - simple, painless. Breast: Clinical breast examination. Age: 30+ years, every 3-5 years. HPV vaccine: Available for cervical cancer prevention (9-26 years ideal). Early detection: Curable. Camps: Regular screening camps conducted. Ask at PHC.

instruction: தமிழ்நாட்டின் நாட்டுப்புற கலைகள் என்னென்ன?
output: முக்கிய நாட்டுப்புற கலைகள்: 1) கரகாட்டம் - பானையை தலையில் வைத்து ஆடுவது, 2) ஒயிலாட்டம் - group dance, harvest celebration, 3) கும்மி - women's circle dance, 4) கோலாட்டம் - stick dance, 5) காவடி ஆட்டம் - Murugan festival, 6) தெருக்கூத்து - street drama, 7) பொய்க்கால் குதிரையாட்டம் - dummy horse dance, 8) மயிலாட்டம் - peacock costume dance, 9) தப்பாட்டம் - percussion instrument dance. Village festivals-ல் இன்றும் popular!

instruction: 5000 rupees dhaan poachu. Complaint file panna worth aa?
output: Worth filing because: Police track patterns - your complaint + others = arrests, cyber crime data prevents future scams, scammer accounts get flagged. Quick process: cybercrime.gov.in (15 min), Bank complaint via app (10 min), organize evidence. Skip if: Time investment too high, evidence insufficient, no scammer financial details. Alternative: Report scammer profiles on platforms, warn others on social media, contribute to scam number databases. Recovery chance: Low for small amounts. But reporting value: HIGH (helps others).

instruction: PAN Card-ல் தவறு இருக்கிறது - எப்படி சரி செய்வது?
output: திருத்தம் செய்ய: 1. onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Changes or Correction in PAN Data' 2. Form நிரப்பவும் 3. சரியான ஆவணங்கள் upload செய்யவும் 4. கட்டணம்: ₹107. திருத்தக்கூடியவை: பெயர், பிறந்த தேதி, தந்தை பெயர், முகவரி, புகைப்படம்/கையொப்பம். முக்கியம்: PAN-Aadhaar link ஆகியிருந்தால், இரண்டிலும் details ஒரே மாதிரி இருக்க வேண்டும்

instruction: பெண் நாயன்மார்கள் யாரேனும் இருக்கிறார்களா?
output: ஆம், மூன்று பெண் நாயன்மார்கள் உள்ளனர்: 1) காரைக்கால் அம்மையார் - பேய் உருவில் சிவனை வணங்கியவர், திருவாலங்காட்டில் சிவன் ஆடும்போது இசை வழங்கியவர், 'அம்மையே' என்று சிவன் அழைத்ததால் 'அம்மையார்' பெயர், 2) மங்கையர்க்கரசி (திருநாவுக்கரசர் சகோதரி), 3) இசைஞானியார் (திருஞானசம்பந்தர் தாய்). பெண்களும் பக்தி மார்க்கத்தில் சிறந்தவர்கள் என்பதற்கு proof!

instruction: Cyber stalking-kku enna law irukku?
output: IPC 354D (stalking) - 3 years imprisonment (first offence), 5 years (repeat). IT Act 66D (cheating by personation). Evidence collect: Screenshots, call logs, messages. Platform block + police complaint. Women: Protection order under DV Act-um peralaam.

instruction: Minority community students-க்கு என்ன scholarship?
output: Pre-matric, post-matric, merit-cum-means scholarship உண்டு. Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Buddhist, Jain, Parsi students eligible. minorityaffairs.gov.in-ல் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Naanga Sri Lankan Tamil refugee. En pillaikku education kidaikkuma?
output: Sri Lankan Tamil refugee education: 1) Government schools - Free admission for refugee camp children 2) Special coaching provided 3) TN Government scholarship for refugee students 4) UNHCR education support 5) Higher education: Special quota in some colleges. Documents: Camp registration, UNHCR certificate. Support organizations: READ, OFERR. Many refugee children have succeeded - IIT, Medical, Government jobs. Don't lose hope!

instruction: Doctor death case-la enna compensation kidaikkum?
output: Death case compensation: 1) Lost income (future earnings multiplied), 2) Funeral expenses, 3) Medical expenses before death, 4) Loss of consortium (spouse), 5) Loss of parental care (children), 6) Mental agony to family. Calculation: Age, income, dependents, life expectancy. Young earning member death: Higher compensation. Ceiling: No fixed limit - based on facts. Criminal: Separate from compensation.

instruction: Family-la yaarum college ponadhilla. Ennaal handle panna mudiyumaa? Enna expect panrathu?
output: Proud moment - You're breaking the barrier! Tips: 1) Seniors-a approach pannunga - guidance 2) College orientation attend pannunga 3) Professors approachable - doubt clear pannunga 4) First generation scholarship apply pannunga 5) Library, labs utilize pannunga 6) Peer groups join - study circle. Common challenges: Imposter syndrome normal, English medium adjustment, new environment. Support: College counsellor, senior mentor programs. You CAN do this!

instruction: முக்கிய மத்திய அரசு இணையதளங்கள் என்ன?
output: All Services: services.india.gov.in, Aadhaar: uidai.gov.in / myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in, PAN: incometax.gov.in, Scholarships: scholarships.gov.in, Pension: maandhan.in, PM-KISAN: pmkisan.gov.in, Ayushman Bharat: pmjay.gov.in, PMAY Housing: pmay-urban.gov.in, Education Loan: vidyalakshmi.co.in, Skill Training: pmkvyofficial.org, MUDRA Loan: mudra.org.in, Street Vendor: pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in, LPG: mylpg.in, DigiLocker: digilocker.gov.in

instruction: ITI/Diploma holders-க்கு government jobs எவ்வளவு?
output: ITI holder jobs: 1) Railway Technician 2) TNEB Wireman/Lineman 3) Defence (Technical) 4) Ordinance Factory 5) PSU technician posts. Diploma holder jobs: 1) SSC JE (Junior Engineer) 2) RRB JE 3) TNPSC JA/AE 4) PWD Junior Engineer 5) PSU engineers. Salary: ITI ₹20,000-35,000, Diploma ₹35,000-60,000. Prepare: Technical subjects + General knowledge. Many vacancies yearly.

instruction: Chief Minister's Girl Child Protection Scheme endraal enna?
output: Girl child protection + savings. Amount: ₹50,000 deposit (by Govt). Types: Scheme 1 - Single girl child family, Scheme 2 - Two girl children family. Eligibility: Poor family, parents below 35 years, family planning operation done. Benefit: ₹1 lakh+ maturity at 18, for higher education/marriage. Apply: ICDS/Taluk office.

instruction: KCC eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at any bank or through pmkisan.gov.in. Documents: Aadhaar, PAN, land records (Patta/Chitta), sowing certificate. Loan up to ₹3 lakh collateral-free at only 4% interest (with subvention). Crop insurance auto-enrolled. Repay after harvest.

instruction: EB office la irundhu call vandhudhu - '2 hour la current poirum, immediately pay pannunga link la' nu. Current pona enna pannuradhu, pay pannalaamaa?
output: Oy summa irudhaa! EB 2 hour la current cut pannaadhu da, proper notice tharum. Official app la illana EB office la dhaan pay pannanum. Ivanga anuppura link click panninae - card details thirudiruvaanga. Meenakshi Amman kovil pakkathu la oru thatha ipdi 50,000 lose pannittaan.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'CAG audit notification for your department. Personal appearance fee 10,000 or show cause notice issued.' Government job la audit matter serious, pay pannidlama?
output: CAG audit notices come through official department channels, not phone calls. No 'personal appearance fee' exists in government system. CAG communicates through written notices to department heads. This exploits government employees' fear of audit - verify from your DDO.

instruction: Appeal eppadi poduvadhu?
output: Hierarchy: District Court → High Court → Supreme Court. Time limit: 30-90 days (varies). Appeal grounds: Law error, fact error, procedure violation. Memorandum of Appeal + certified copy of judgment. Stay application-um file pannalam. Delay condone petition if late.

instruction: Paramedical courses என்னென்ன இருக்கு? Job scope?
output: Popular courses: 1) DMLT (Lab Technician) - 2 years 2) X-Ray/Radiology - 2 years 3) Operation Theatre Tech - 2 years 4) Physiotherapy (BPT) - 4 years 5) Optometry - 4 years 6) Medical Imaging Tech - 3 years. Admission: Based on 12th marks (Physics, Chemistry, Biology). Jobs: Hospitals, Diagnostic centres, Clinics. Salary: ₹12,000-25,000 starting. High demand, job security good.

instruction: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam enna?
output: Monthly ₹1,000 for woman head of family. Eligibility: Family head should be woman, Family income below ₹2.5 lakhs, Should not receive any other pension. Apply: Anganwadi center / Village Administrative Officer. Documents: Aadhaar, Ration card, Bank account

instruction: Ayushman Bharat வேற, CMCHIS வேறா?
output: TN has CMCHIS (state scheme) - Ayushman Bharat (central) இல்ல. CMCHIS advantages: 1) Higher coverage (Rs.5 lakh vs Rs.5 lakh), 2) More procedures covered, 3) State-specific hospitals, 4) Better implementation. Other states: Ayushman Bharat applicable. TN residents: Use CMCHIS only. Traveling outside TN: Limited coverage - check empanelled hospitals.

instruction: ஔவையார் அதியமானுக்கு எழுதிய பாடல்கள் என்ன?
output: சங்க கால ஔவையார் அதியமான் நெடுஞ்செழியன் என்ற மன்னனின் நெருங்கிய நண்பர். புறநானூறில் அவருக்காக பல பாடல்கள் பாடியுள்ளார். Famous: 'நெல்லுக்கு இறைத்த நீர் வாய்க்கால் வழி ஓடி புல்லுக்கும் ஆங்கே பொசியுமாம்' - நெல்லுக்கு தண்ணீர் பாய்ச்சும்போது புல்லுக்கும் போகும், நல்லவர்களுக்கு உதவினால் அவர்கள் சார்ந்தவர்களுக்கும் நன்மை ஆகும். அதியமான் நெல்லிக்கனி கொடுத்த கதையும் famous - நீண்ட ஆயுளுக்கான பழம்.

instruction: Medical negligence case-க்கு என்ன evidence வேணும்?
output: Required: 1) All medical records (hospital bound to give), 2) Prescriptions, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills, 5) Expert medical opinion (another doctor's opinion), 6) Death certificate (if applicable). RTI மூலம் government hospital records பெறலாம்.

instruction: ESI hospital-la treatment eppadi peruvathu?
output: ESI card + ID proof kaattunga. Dispensary-la OP treatment free. Serious cases: ESI hospital referral. Tied-up hospitals-lum treatment available. Emergency-kku any hospital-la treatment petru reimbursement claim pannalam. Dependent family members-kkum cover undu.

instruction: 'உங்கள் KYC expire, 24 மணி நேரத்தில் account freeze ஆகும்' என்று message வந்தது. என்ன செய்வது?
output: பயப்பட வேண்டாம். KYC update-க்கு வங்கி SMS மூலம் லிங்க் அனுப்பாது. நேரடியாக வங்கி கிளைக்கு போய் விசாரியுங்கள்.

instruction: Building demolish பண்ற மாதிரி சொல்றாங்க, போகணுமா?
output: Demolition notice வந்தால்: 1) Genuine notice-ஆ verify பண்ணுங்க (municipal records), 2) Owner alternative accommodation or compensation தரணும், 3) Reasonable notice period (usually 6 months), 4) Fake notice = harassment case போடலாம். Rights: Relocation assistance, advance rent return, shifting cost compensation. Don't vacate without proper documentation.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-oda naattuppura kalaigal ennenna?
output: Mukkiya naattuppura kalaigal: 1) Karakattam - paanaiyai thalaiyil vaiththu aaduvathu, 2) Oyilattam - group dance, harvest celebration, 3) Kummi - women's circle dance, 4) Kolattam - stick dance, 5) Kavadi Attam - Murugan festival, 6) Therukoothu - street drama, 7) Poikkaal Kuthiraiyattam - dummy horse dance, 8) Mayilattam - peacock costume dance, 9) Thappattam - percussion instrument dance. Village festivals-la indrum popular!

instruction: மாற்றுத்திறனாளி குழந்தைக்கு என்ன சலுகைகள் உள்ளன?
output:
**மாற்றுத்திறனாளி மாணவர் சலுகைகள்:**

**Inclusive Education:**
- Regular school-ல் படிக்கலாம்
- Special educator support
- Resource room facility

**Special Schools:**
- Blind schools
- Deaf schools
- Intellectually disabled schools
- All FREE

**Financial Benefits:**
- Scholarship: ₹1,000-3,000/month
- Transport allowance
- Reader allowance (visually impaired)
- Scribe allowance

**Exam Concessions:**
- Extra time: 20-30 minutes/hour
- Scribe facility
- Separate room
- Computer/Laptop allowed

**Assistive Devices (FREE):**
- Wheelchairs
- Hearing aids
- Braille kit
- Crutches
- ADIP Scheme through District Differently Abled Welfare Office

**Apply:**
- District Differently Abled Welfare Officer
- UDID Card mandatory: swavlambancard.gov.in

**Documents:**
- Disability Certificate (Medical Board)
- UDID Card
- Aadhaar
- School TC/Bonafide

instruction: Private college students-க்கு government scholarship கிடைக்குமா?
output: AICTE/UGC approved private colleges-ல் படிக்கும் students-க்கு government scholarships applicable. College recognition verify செய்யுங்கள். Self-finance college-க்கும் சில schemes உண்டு.

instruction: NEET-la seat kidaikkal, drop year edukkalaama? Waste aagumaa?
output: Drop year = Strategic decision, not waste. When good idea: 1) Close to cutoff - improvement chances high 2) Strong determination 3) Clear preparation plan. When risky: 1) First attempt poor score by big margin 2) No structured plan 3) Family pressure only. Statistics: Many successful doctors took 2-3 attempts. Alternative: Join backup course (B.Sc) + prepare NEET simultaneously. Drop year plan: Join test series, daily 8-10 hours, monthly assessment. One year invested wisely = lifetime career.

instruction: Hospital-ல் complaint எப்படி போடுவது?
output: Internal: 1) Grievance cell (every hospital must have), 2) Hospital administrator, 3) Medical superintendent. External: 1) District Health Department (DHS), 2) State Medical Council (for doctors), 3) Clinical Establishment Authority, 4) Consumer Forum (for deficiency in service). Written complaint: Keep copy with acknowledgment. Timeline: Response within 15-30 days typically.
