instruction: Mock test எத்தனை முறை எழுதணும்? எப்படி analyze பண்றது?
output: Mock test frequency: Last 2 months - weekly 2-3. Last month - daily. Analysis steps: 1) Check answers immediately 2) Category-wise error (silly mistake, concept gap, time issue) 3) Track weak areas 4) Revise mistakes same day 5) Redo wrong questions after 3 days 6) Score tracking graph maintain 7) Time per question analysis 8) Attempt strategy review. Sources: Official previous papers, coaching test series, free online (Testbook, Gradeup). Quality > quantity of mocks.

instruction: பிரதான் மந்திரி உஜ்வலா யோஜனா (PMUY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: இலவச LPG Connection. தகுதி: BPL குடும்பங்கள், SC/ST, PM-ஆவாஸ் பயனாளிகள். நன்மை: இலவச LPG Connection, முதல் Cylinder + Stove deposit-free, EMI option for cylinder cost. விண்ணப்பிக்க: அருகிலுள்ள LPG Distributor (HP, Bharat, Indane), pmuy.gov.in. ஆவணங்கள்: Aadhaar, BPL Card, Bank Account. Refill Subsidy: DBT மூலம் Bank Account-ல் நேரடியாக வரும்

instruction: Kovilukku pogum bodhu enna dress code follow pannanum?
output: Dress code guidelines: 1) Men - veshti/thundu preferred, lungi ok, shorts allowed in some temples, 2) Women - saree/churidar preferred, dress with dupatta ok, 3) No sleeveless, revealing clothes, 4) Remove footwear at entrance, 5) Big temples may rent dhotis if needed. Specific temples like Padmanabhaswamy (Kerala) strict - only traditional dress. Tirumala moderately strict. Most TN temples flexible but modest dress respectful. Carry plastic bag for footwear.

instruction: Psychiatrist vs Psychologist - yaarai paarkanum?
output: Psychiatrist (MD): Medical doctor, can prescribe medicines. See for: Severe depression, bipolar, schizophrenia, anxiety needing medication. Psychologist (MPhil/PhD): Non-medical, provides therapy/counseling. See for: Stress, relationship issues, mild-moderate depression/anxiety, trauma. Often work together: Psychiatrist for meds + Psychologist for therapy. First step: Can start with either, they'll refer if needed.

instruction: Thirukkuraloda moondru pirivugal enna?
output: 1) Araththuppaal (Virtue) - 38 adhigaarangal, 2) Porutpaal (Wealth) - 70 adhigaarangal, 3) Kaamaththuppaal (Love) - 25 adhigaarangal. Ninaivil vaikka: A-Po-Ka (APK - like Android APK file!).

instruction: Children-க்கு safe internet usage tips என்ன?
output: Parents: 1) Parental controls enable, 2) Screen time limits, 3) Open communication, 4) Monitor (not spy) activity, 5) Teach about online dangers. Children: Don't share personal info, stranger-கிட்ட chat வேண்டாம், uncomfortable content-ஐ parents-கிட்ட சொல்லுங்க.

instruction: 'Udaiyar enappaduvadhu ookkam' - ookkam patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Udaiyar enappaduvadhu ookkam aqdhilaar udaiyadhu udaiyaro matru'. Artham: Unmaiyaana selvam enbadhu ookkame. Ookkam illadhavargal vera edhai vaiththirundhaalum adhu unmaiyaana selvam alla. Motivation-a patri arputhamaana kural.

instruction: Apprenticeship training எப்படி join ஆவது? Stipend கிடைக்குமா?
output: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS): ITI/Diploma முடித்தவர்களுக்கு. Register: www.apprenticeshipindia.gov.in. Duration: 1-3 years depending on trade. Stipend: ₹8,000-15,000/month (govt subsidy உள்ளது). Companies: TCS, L&T, Hyundai, Railways, BHEL - all hire apprentices. Benefits: Real experience, permanent job chance 70%+. Documents: ITI certificate, Aadhaar, bank account.

instruction: Thirukkural-ஐ artificial intelligence (AI) எப்படி பயன்படுத்துகிறது?
output: 1) ChatGPT, Claude போன்ற AI-கள் Thirukkural explain பண்ணும், 2) Tamil NLP research-ல் Thirukkural corpus பயன்படுகிறது, 3) AI-powered apps குறள் recommend பண்ணும் situation-க்கு ஏற்ப, 4) Voice assistants Thirukkural சொல்லும், 5) Machine learning Thirukkural translations improve பண்ண உதவுகிறது. Tamil-க்கு AI develop பண்றவங்க Thirukkural-ஐ test case-ஆ use பண்றாங்க!

instruction: சிலப்பதிகாரம் கதை என்ன?
output: சிலப்பதிகாரம் - கண்ணகி, கோவலன் கதை. கோவலன் புகார் நகரத்து வணிகன். மனைவி கண்ணகி. மாதவி என்ற நடன மங்கையை காதலித்து செல்வம் இழக்கிறான். மனம் மாறி கண்ணகியுடன் மதுரை போகிறான். கண்ணகியின் சிலம்பு விற்க, பொற்கொல்லன் 'திருடன்' என்று அரசனிடம் புகார் செய்கிறான். அரசன் கோவலனை கொல்கிறான். கண்ணகி கோபத்தில் சிலம்பை உடைத்து நிரபராதியை காட்டி, மதுரையை எரிக்கிறாள். பதிவிரதையின் சக்தியை காட்டும் காப்பியம்.

instruction: Thiruvalluvar silai engge irukku? Adhoda sirappu enna?
output: Kanyakumari-la ulla Thiruvalluvar silai 133 adi uyaram kondadhu - ovvoru adiyum oru adhigaarathai kurikkiradhu (133 adhigaarangal). Idhu 38 adi uyara peedathil mela nikkudhu - 38 adi enbadhu Araththuppaal-oda 38 adhigaarangalai kurikkiradhu. Motha uyaram 171 adi. 2000-m aandu January 1-la thirakkapattathu.

instruction: 'Free tractor loan - 0% interest! Apply through this link' WhatsApp forward farmers group-ல வந்துச்சு. Apply பண்ணலாமா?
output: Trap! 0% tractor loan என்றெல்லாம் இல்ல. Farmers group-ல இந்த scam அதிகம் spread ஆகுது. Processing fee என்று money கேப்பாங்க. Bank-ல directly enquire பண்ணுங்க. WhatsApp loan offers எல்லாம் fraud.

instruction: Assault/Fighting case-kku enna aagum?
output: Simple hurt (IPC 323/BNS 115): 1 year imprisonment. Grievous hurt (IPC 325/BNS 117): 7 years. Voluntarily causing hurt (IPC 324/BNS 118): 3 years. Self-defence valid excuse. Medical report severity decide seyyum. Compromise possible in simple cases.

instruction: ஆன்லைன்ல order பண்ணேன், வேற product வந்துடுச்சு
output: Steps: 1) Delivery போது video எடுங்க (unboxing), 2) App-ல் return/refund request, 3) Email complaint (company grievance officer), 4) NCH portal complaint. Evidence upload பண்ணுங்க. 7 days-ல் response இல்லன்னா consumer forum.

instruction: தெருக்கூத்து என்றால் என்ன?
output: தெருக்கூத்து - தமிழ்நாட்டின் traditional street theatre. இரவு முழுவதும் நடக்கும். Mahabharata, Ramayana கதைகள் popular. சிறப்புகள்: 1) வண்ண makeup - face painting, 2) Elaborate costumes, 3) Live music - harmonium, thavil, 4) Dialog + song + dance, 5) Audience participation. Kanchipuram, Villupuram areas-ல் famous. UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage list-ல் consideration-க்கு. Village entertainment before TV/cinema வந்தது!

instruction: என் பையில் எல்லா documents-உம் திருடு போய்விட்டது (Aadhaar, PAN, DL, Voter ID, Bank Card). என்ன செய்வது?
output:
உடனடியாக செய்ய வேண்டியவை:
1. Police FIR - eservices.tnpolice.gov.in - எல்லா documents list
2. Bank Card Block - Helpline call (SBI: 1800-111-111)
3. Mobile SIM Block - திருடு போனால்

Documents மறுபடியும் பெற:
4. Aadhaar - eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in - OTP - Free instant download
5. PAN - eportal.incometax.gov.in - Instant e-PAN - Free
6. Driving License - parivahan.gov.in - ₹200-500
7. Voter ID - voters.eci.gov.in / Voter Helpline App - Form 002
8. Bank Cards - Bank branch with FIR - 7-10 days
9. Ration Card - tnpds.gov.in - Duplicate

Misuse தடுக்க:
10. Aadhaar Biometric Lock - myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in

instruction: Phone vandhudhu, 'Namaskaaram, Treasury la irundhu pesuren, ungalukku pension arrears 50,000 pending irukku. Process panna Aadhaar number, bank account details sollunga' nu romba polite aa pesunaan. Genuine government officer aa?
output: Illa ayya, fraud dhaan. Treasury office phone la personal details kekaadhu. Pension arrears irundhaa written intimation varum. Phone la Aadhaar, bank details kuduthaa account la irundhu kaasu thirudiduvaanga. Treasury office ku neenga direct aa ponga, phone la yaarkum details kudukkaadhenga.

instruction: Neighbour en land-la aakkramippu seigiraar - enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Survey seydhu boundary verify pannunga, 2) Written notice anuppunga, 3) Tahsildar-kku complaint, 4) Civil Court-la injunction + possession suit. Documents: Patta, Survey sketch, Photos, EC. Forceful removal try pannaadheenga.

instruction: Certificate delay aanaal enna seivathu?
output: TN Right to Service Act: Specified time limit-kkul service kodukkanum. Delay aanaal: 1) Appellate Authority-kku appeal, 2) Penalty: Rs.250/day delay, 3) CM Cell complaint. Income certificate: 7 days, Community certificate: 15 days (approximate).

instruction: SMS வந்தது: 'SBI லக்கி கஸ்டமர்! 50,000 ரூபாய் கேஷ்பேக். இந்த லிங்கில் க்ளைம் செய்யுங்கள்' - என்ன செய்வது?
output: இது மோசடி SMS. SBI இப்படி லிங்க் அனுப்பாது. லிங்க் கிளிக் செய்யாதீர்கள். சந்தேகம் இருந்தால் நேரடியாக வங்கிக்கு போய் கேளுங்கள்.

instruction: Builder போன loan EMI கட்டிக்கிட்டு இருக்கேன், possession தரல - என்ன option?
output: RERA-ல் complaint போடுங்க. Builder EMI interest compensate செய்யணும் என்று order வாங்கலாம். Parallel-ஆ bank-கிட்ட loan restructure/moratorium கேளுங்க. Extreme case: Full refund + EMI interest compensation கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: எனக்கு rice card வேண்டும், sugar card இருக்கிறது. மாற்ற முடியுமா?
output: குடும்ப வருமானம் ஆண்டுக்கு 1 லட்சத்திற்கு கீழ் இருந்தால் rice card-க்கு eligible. Income certificate வாங்கி, taluk office-ல் விண்ணப்பிக்கவும். Verification-க்கு பிறகு மாற்றப்படும்.

instruction: Engineering counselling-la random number enna? Eppadi work aagum?
output: Random number: Same marks students-ku tie-breaker. System generated, not controllable. Priority: 1st - Cutoff marks, 2nd - Random number (if same marks). Example: You 195 cutoff, random 50000. Another person 195 cutoff, random 10000. They get priority. Impact: Matters only when competing for last few seats in popular colleges. Strategy: Higher marks = random number irrelevant. Focus on marks, not luck.

instruction: Fake medicine kidaichadhu - complain enge?
output: Serious offence! Complaint: 1) Drug Inspector (District Drug Control Office), 2) State Drugs Control Department, 3) FDA helpline, 4) Police (criminal case possible). Evidence: Keep medicine, bill, pack with batch number. Verification: Check authenticity - company website, QR code (some have), call company. Punishment: Up to life imprisonment for spurious drugs causing death. CDSCO: Central regulator.

instruction: Tamil Nadu-oda mukkiya kovil thiruvizhakkal enna?
output: Mukkiya thiruvizhakkal: 1) Chithirai Thiruvizha - Madurai (April/May) - 1 month, 2) Karthigai Deepam - Thiruvannamalai (Nov/Dec), 3) Panguni Uthiram - Srirangam, 4) Thaipusam - Pazhani, 5) Navarathri - Tanjore area, 6) Vaikunta Ekadasi - Srirangam, 7) Aarudhra Darisanam - Chidambaram, 8) Thirukalyanam - all major temples. Temple car (Ratham) Therthiruvizha spectacular!

instruction: WhatsApp message 'BOCW card renewal urgent. Pay 500 online or benefits stopped.' BOCW card irukku, renew pannalama?
output: BOCW renewal through labour department office - nominal government fees. Benefits don't stop immediately - grace period exists. Never pay through WhatsApp links. Visit district labour welfare office for genuine renewal process.

instruction: Cancer medicine-kku subsidy irukkaa?
output: Yes! Options: 1) Government hospital pharmacy - free/subsidized, 2) CMCHIS covers cancer treatment including medicines, 3) Jan Aushadhi - generic cancer drugs cheaper, 4) Patient assistance programs (pharma companies), 5) NGO support (Cancer Institute, Adyar). Apply: Hospital social worker helps. Also: PM-BJKAY scheme for some cancer surgeries.

instruction: Enna da, call vandhudhu - 'Unga SBI account block aairum innaiku raathiriku munnadhi KYC update pannunga' nu. OTP ellam keppanga. Enna pannuradhu?
output: Fraudu da idhu! Bank kaaran phone la OTP keppaanaa? Keppaane keppaane! 'Innaiku block' nu bayamudhuthuvaanga paaru. Branch ku nee poi pesu, phone la enna details um kudukkaadhe. Fraudu gang da ivanga ellam.

instruction: Consumer case-kku fees evvalavu?
output: District Forum: Rs.5 lakh varai - Nil fee, Rs.5-10 lakh - Rs.200, Rs.10-20 lakh - Rs.400, Rs.20-50 lakh - Rs.1000, Rs.50 lakh-1 crore - Rs.2000. State Commission: Rs.2500-5000. National Commission: Rs.5000. SC/ST/Women-kku 50% concession.

instruction: CMCHIS card eppadi apply panradhu?
output: Apply process: 1) Taluk office / Primary Health Centre visit, 2) Documents: Ration card, Aadhar, income certificate, photos, 3) Biometric enrollment, 4) Card delivery: 15-30 days. Online check: cmchistn.com. Already rice card holder: Automatic enrollment - check status online. Missing card: Duplicate apply at same office.

instruction: Aadhaar correction எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in (demographic update). Offline: Aadhaar Enrolment Centre. Documents: Supporting proof for correction. Fee: Rs.50 (biometric update free). Time: 10-30 days. OTP verification required. Address update: Aadhaar app-லும் possible.

instruction: Ayurveda-படி என்ன food combinations avoid பண்ணணும்?
output: Viruddha Ahara (incompatible foods): 1) Milk + fruit (except banana, mango), 2) Milk + fish/meat, 3) Honey + hot water, 4) Curd at night, 5) Cold water after meals, 6) Fruit after meals (eat separately), 7) Milk + sour foods. Why: Causes Ama (toxins), indigestion, diseases. Good combinations: Rice + dal, bread + vegetables. Rule: Eat warm, freshly cooked food. Avoid: Refrigerated/reheated food regularly.

instruction: Community certificate eppadi vaanguvadhu? Time evvalavu aagum?
output: Process: 1) Apply at Tahsildar office or e-Sevai 2) Documents: Aadhaar, parent community certificate, school TC mentioning community, family photo 3) Verification by RI 4) Issue by Tahsildar. Time: 15-30 days. One-time: Permanent certificate for lifetime. Required for: Reservation benefits, scholarships, government jobs. Tip: Get parents' certificate first, then children's easier. Online tracking: tnedistrict.tn.gov.in.

instruction: PM Shram Yogi Maan-Dhan (PM-SYM) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Unorganized Workers-க்கு Pension. தகுதி: 18-40 வயது, மாத வருமானம் ₹15,000-க்கு கீழ், EPFO/ESIC/NPS இல் இல்லாதவர், Street vendors, Domestic workers, Construction workers, etc. Contribution: ₹55-200/month (வயது பொறுத்து). 60 வயதில்: ₹3,000/month pension. Government: Equal matching contribution. சேர: CSC (Common Service Center), maandhan.in. Aadhaar + Savings Account தேவை

instruction: OTP பகிர்ந்தேன், கணக்கு காலியானது. வங்கி பொறுப்பு எவ்வளவு?
output: RBI வழிகாட்டுதல்கள்: வங்கி தவறு = பூஜ்ஜிய பொறுப்பு, மூன்றாம் தரப்பு மீறல் (உங்கள் தவறு இல்லை) = 3 நாட்களில் புகார் செய்தால் பூஜ்ஜியம், வாடிக்கையாளர் அலட்சியம் (OTP பகிர்வு) = வங்கி அலட்சியத்தை நிரூபித்தால் முழு பொறுப்பு. ஆனால் நீங்கள் வாதிடலாம்: சமூக பொறியியல் பாதுகாப்பு (ஏமாற்றப்பட்டேன், அலட்சியம் அல்ல), வங்கியின் கவனிப்பு கடமை (தெளிவான எச்சரிக்கைகள் இருந்ததா?). நடவடிக்கைகள்: எழுத்துப்பூர்வ புகார் ('OTP கொடுத்தேன்' அல்ல - 'OTP மோசடி மூலம் பெறப்பட்டது' என்று சொல்லுங்கள்), 30 நாட்களில் வங்கி மறுத்தால் cms.rbi.org.in இல் வங்கி குறைதீர்ப்பாளர் (90% வழக்குகளில் குறைந்தபட்சம் பகுதி பணம் திரும்பக் கிடைக்கும்), நுகர்வோர் மன்றம், பெரிய தொகைக்கு நீதிமன்றம்.

instruction: வேலைக்கு போறேன், ஆனா degree complete பண்ணல. இப்போ படிக்க முடியுமா?
output: 100% possible! Options: 1) IGNOU - most flexible, exams twice yearly 2) Tamil Nadu Open University (TNOU) - Tamil medium available 3) University of Madras Distance 4) Evening colleges in Chennai 5) Online degrees - recognized universities. Process: Work continues + study weekends + exams during leave. Duration: UG 3 years, PG 2 years. Benefits: Promotion eligibility, government job apply, self-satisfaction. Many working people complete degrees in 30s, 40s. Never too late!

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: 30 வயசு கடந்தால் படிக்க late
output: உண்மை: Fact: Learning has no age limit! Distance education: IGNOU, TNOU - no age bar. Success stories: People completing degrees at 40, 50, even 60. Benefits: Career switch, personal satisfaction, promotion eligibility. Government job age limit = only restriction (up to 35-40 for many). Skill courses: No age limit. Your motivation to learn > Your age. Start today!

instruction: CCRS (Central Council for Research in Siddha) என்ன செய்கிறது?
output: CCRS Chennai: Siddha research organization under Ministry of AYUSH. Functions: 1) Clinical research on Siddha formulations, 2) Drug standardization, 3) Documentation of manuscripts, 4) Clinical trials, 5) Publication of research. OPD: Research centres have OPD - free. Important work: Validated many traditional formulations. Location: Arumbakkam, Chennai. Publications: Siddha research journals, textbooks.

instruction: Kerala border-la irukkindrom, TN scholarship kidaikkumaa?
output: Kidaikkum! TN nativity certificate irundha all TN scholarships eligible. Kanyakumari district fully TN - no issue. Apply: NSP portal for central, TN department portals for state scholarships. Documents: Nativity certificate, income certificate from TN Tahsildar. Same benefits as other TN districts. BC/MBC/SC/ST applicable based on TN categorization.

instruction: Motor Accident Claim எப்படி file செய்வது?
output: File at: Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT) - District Court. Documents: FIR, medical records, bills, death certificate (if applicable), income proof, insurance details. Time limit: No strict limit (reasonable time). Lawyer not mandatory. Lok Adalat-லும் settle ஆகலாம்.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Property leads subscription. 50,000 annual for verified buyer database.' Investment worth aa?
output: Many lead services are scams with recycled or fake data. Legitimate lead platforms have verifiable track records and trials. 50,000 upfront for 'database' is risky - data might be outdated or public information. Build network through genuine property listings and referrals.

instruction: District hospital vs Medical college hospital - enna difference?
output: District Hospital: 1) Every district headquarters, 2) General specialties, 3) Emergency, surgery, maternity, 4) 100-300 beds typical. Medical College Hospital: 1) Teaching hospital, 2) Super-specialties available, 3) Better equipment, 4) 500-1000+ beds, 5) Complex cases referred here. Both free. Medical colleges: Chennai, Madurai, Coimbatore, Trichy, Salem, Thanjavur, Tirunelveli, etc.

instruction: 'Uram oruvatku ulla verukkai' - dhairiyam patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Uram oruvarku ulla verukkai aqdhillaar maramakkal aadhalae veru'. Artham: Manam thidam (courage) iruppavane unmaiyaana manidhan. Adhu illadhavargal mara manithargal - uyiratra maram pondravargal. Inner strength illaamal verum body irundhu enna payan? Mental courage > Physical strength.

instruction: TN Slum Clearance Board veedu eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Rehabilitation for slum-dwellers. Eligibility: 10+ years in recognized slum, Name in survey. Types: In-situ development (same location), Resettlement (new location). Cost: Free or subsidized (based on income). Facilities: Basic amenities - water, electricity, toilet. Apply: TNSCB office/Local body. Documents: Slum survey ID, Aadhaar, Ration card. Projects: Multi-storey tenements in Chennai, other cities.

instruction: Pharmacy license illaama operate panraanga - report?
output: Illegal! Every pharmacy needs: 1) Drug License (displayed), 2) Registered Pharmacist (during operating hours). Report: Drug Inspector, State Drugs Control, local police. Check: License number displayed, pharmacist name displayed. Risk: Unlicensed pharmacy may sell fake/expired/wrong medicines. Online: E-pharmacy also needs license - check before ordering.

instruction: Home remedies safe-aa? Eppodhu avoid pannanum?
output: Some safe: Ginger for nausea, turmeric milk, salt water gargle, honey for cough (not <1 year). Avoid home remedies: 1) Serious illness (high fever, breathing difficulty), 2) When already on prescription medicines (interactions), 3) Wounds/burns (infection risk), 4) Children/pregnant (specific risks). Rule: Home remedy not working in 2-3 days = see doctor. Never apply: Cow dung on wounds, kerosene on head lice (dangerous!).

instruction: Paralysis/stroke rehabilitation Ayurveda-la?
output: Ayurveda rehabilitation: Complements physiotherapy well. Treatments: 1) Abhyanga with specific oils, 2) Pinda Sweda (Navarakizhi), 3) Basti (medicated enema - key treatment), 4) Nasya, 5) Internal medicines. Best time: Post-acute phase (after stabilization). Duration: 21-90 days intensive. Outcomes: Improved mobility, speech, daily activities. Combination: Ayurveda + Physiotherapy + Yoga gives best results. Where: Specialized centers in Kerala, some TN facilities.

instruction: TN Free Laptop Scheme endraal enna?
output: Free Laptop for Govt school students. Eligibility: +2 pass (Govt school), joined UG/Diploma, Polytechnic students. Distribution: Given at college. Specs: Basic laptop with necessary software. Documents: +2 marksheet, College admission, Aadhaar. Usage: Education purpose, warranty included.

instruction: கன்னியாகுமரி திருவள்ளுவர் சிலை எவ்வளவு உயரம்?
output: சிலை: 133 அடி (133 அதிகாரங்களுக்கு), பீடம்: 38 அடி (அறத்துப்பால் 38 அதிகாரங்களுக்கு), மொத்தம்: 171 அடி. கடலில் ஒரு பாறையின் மீது நிற்கிறது.

instruction: தமிழக அரசின் merit scholarship எப்படி கிடைக்கும்?
output: CM's Merit Scholarship: 10th, 12th-ல் அதிக மதிப்பெண் பெற்றவர்களுக்கு. Amount: ₹5,000-10,000 one-time. Eligibility: State topper, district topper, subject topper. Selection: Board exam results அடிப்படையில் automatic. Higher education scholarship: ₹25,000-50,000 for state rank holders in entrance exams (NEET, JEE). Apply through School Education Department.

instruction: 'Customs officer - உங்கள் பெயரில் drugs parcel வந்துள்ளது, arrest தவிர்க்க settlement கட்டுங்கள்' என்று WhatsApp call வந்தது.
output: Customs WhatsApp-ல் contact செய்யாது. Drugs case-க்கு settlement கிடையாது. இது மோசடி. எந்த பணமும் கொடுக்காதீர்கள். Police-ல் complaint செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: ஊழல் / corruption பற்றி என்ன சொல்கிறது திருக்குறள்?
output: குறள்: 'களவினால் ஆகிய ஆக்கம் அளவிறந்து ஆவது போலக் கெடும்'. திருட்டால் (corruption) வந்த செல்வம் பெருகினாலும் அழியும். மேலும்: 'வெண்மை எனப்படுவது யாதெனின் ஒண்மை உடையான் உடையாரைப் பார்க்காது'. சுத்தமான அரசு என்பது பாரபட்சமின்றி நடப்பது. Anti-corruption message from ancient times!

instruction: WhatsApp message 'TNRERA compliance fee 15,000 for continued registration.' TNRERA la idhu mandatory aa?
output: TNRERA fees published on official website - no hidden 'compliance fees'. Registration and renewal through portal only. WhatsApp payment requests are scams. Check rera.tn.gov.in for actual fee structure and payment method.

instruction: Staff rude-ஆ behave பண்றாங்க - complain?
output: Patient dignity is a right. Complaint: 1) Duty manager/nursing superintendent, 2) Hospital administrator, 3) Written complaint for record, 4) Consumer Forum if serious/repeated. Include: Date, time, staff name/description, what happened, witnesses. Outcome: Apology, warning to staff, policy reminder. Serious (abuse/harassment): Police complaint possible.

instruction: ME/M.Tech சேர்க்கை தமிழ்நாட்டில் எப்படி?
output: GATE score கட்டாயம் (அரசு கல்லூரிகளுக்கு). படிகள்: 1) GATE எழுதுங்கள் 2) Anna University TANCA counselling-க்கு விண்ணப்பம் 3) GATE score + UG marks அடிப்படையில் rank 4) College allotment. GATE இல்லாமலும் சில கல்லூரிகளில் சேரலாம் (sponsored/self-financing). அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ₹10,000-30,000/ஆண்டு.

instruction: Cosmetic surgery gone wrong - refund/compensation kidaikkumaa?
output: Trickier than medical treatment cases. Issues: 1) Subjective expectations, 2) Inherent risks, 3) No guaranteed outcomes. Claim if: 1) Promised results not delivered, 2) Complications due to negligence, 3) Unqualified surgeon, 4) No proper consent. Proof: Before/after photos, advertisements/promises made, consent form, expert opinion. Consumer Forum: Deficiency in service.

instruction: Dowry demand-க்கு என்ன action எடுக்கலாம்?
output: Dowry கேட்பது/கொடுப்பது illegal (Dowry Prohibition Act). Complaint: Police, Women helpline 181, Protection Officer. Punishment: 5 years imprisonment + fine. Dowry death (304B IPC): 7 years to life imprisonment. Evidence: Messages, recordings, witness statements.

instruction: Nilavembu Kudineer eppadi thayaarippadhu?
output: Ingredients: Nilavembu (Andrographis), Vetiver, Coriander, Dry ginger, Pepper, and 5 more herbs. Ready-made: Government distributes, pharmacies sell. Home preparation: 1) Get powder from Siddha pharmacy, 2) Boil 5g in 100ml water, 3) Reduce to 50ml, 4) Strain and drink warm. Dosage: 30-60ml, twice daily. When: Viral fever, dengue prevention, monsoon season. Avoid: Pregnancy, very young children - consult doctor.

instruction: Email vandhudhu 'Bar Council license renewal overdue. Pay 25,000 immediately or practice suspended.' License very important for practice, urgent aa pay pannanum?
output: Bar Council renewal done through State Bar Council office, not email payments. Check actual renewal date in your enrollment certificate. Bar Council sends official notices through post. Large amounts like 25,000 never asked via email - visit council office directly.

instruction: Anticipatory bail என்றால் என்ன?
output: Arrest ஆவதற்கு முன்னாலேயே bail பெறுவது. Non-bailable offence-க்கு Sessions Court/High Court-ல் apply பண்ணலாம். FIR பதிவான உடனேயே apply பண்ணலாம். Grant ஆனால் arrest ஆகாமல் investigation-ல் cooperate செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Medicine MRP-kku mela vitraal complaint enge?
output: Complaint: Drug Inspector (District), State Drug Control. Legal Metrology Department-um complaint edukkum. Pharmacy license suspend/cancel aagalam. Consumer forum-la compensation. Evidence: Bill with MRP comparison. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Case status online-ல் எப்படி check பண்றது?
output: Websites: ecourts.gov.in (all courts), highcourtmadras.gov.in (Madras HC), sci.gov.in (Supreme Court). Search by: CNR number, party name, case number, advocate name. e-Courts app-உம் available. Cause list (daily hearing list) check பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: 'ஒன்றே குலம் ஒருவனே தேவன்' - இதன் அர்த்தம் என்ன?
output: திருமூலரின் மிகப் புகழ்பெற்ற வரி: 'ஒன்றே குலம் ஒருவனே தேவன்'. அர்த்தம்: எல்லா மனிதர்களும் ஒரே குலம் - சாதி பேதம் இல்லை. கடவுளும் ஒருவரே - எல்லா மதங்களும் ஒரே உண்மையை சொல்கின்றன. 2000 வருடங்களுக்கு முன்பே சாதி ஒழிப்பு, மத நல்லிணக்கம் பேசிய progressive thinker திருமூலர்!

instruction: Aindhinai endraal enna?
output: Aindhinai - Tamil ilakkiyathoda unique concept. Aindhu nilapagudhigalum avattrodan thodarpudaiya unarvugalum: 1) Kurinji (malai) - punarchi (union), 2) Mullai (kaadu) - iruththal (waiting), 3) Marudham (vayal) - oodal (sulking), 4) Neydhal (kadaloram) - irangal (pining), 5) Paalai (paalaivanam) - piridhal (separation). Iyarkaiyum manidha unarvum inaindha azhagaana concept. Ulaga ilakkiyathil thanithuvam!

instruction: JEE Maths-la weak, eppadi improve aavadhu?
output: Maths improvement plan: 1) Basics strong - NCERT Class 11 first 2) Formula derivation purindhu padiyunga 3) Daily minimum 30 problems 4) Chapter-wise: Start easy (Sets, Relations) → Hard (Calculus, Coordinate) 5) Error analysis - why wrong? 6) Timed practice. High weightage: Calculus 35%, Algebra 25%, Coordinate 20%. Weak students: Focus scoring chapters first. Practice > Theory for Maths.

instruction: Drunk driving-க்கு என்ன punishment?
output: Blood alcohol limit: 30mg/100ml. First offence: Rs.10,000 fine + 6 months imprisonment. Second offence (3 years-ல்): Rs.15,000 + 2 years imprisonment. License suspension: 3 months - 1 year. Accident caused: Additional charges - up to 10 years imprisonment.

instruction: BC/MBC மாணவர்களுக்கு என்ன scholarship உண்டு?
output: Tamil Nadu BC/MBC scholarship: Tuition fee, maintenance allowance கிடைக்கும். தமிழ்நாடு scholarship portal-ல் apply செய்யவும். Caste certificate, income certificate தேவை.

instruction: Bail eppadi peruvathu?
output: Bailable offence: Police station-layae bail kidaikkum (matter of right). Non-bailable: Court-la application podanum. Documents: ID proof, address proof, surety documents. Bail bond + surety sign venum. Lawyer through apply panrathu better.

instruction: Computer courses free-ya enge padikkalaam?
output: Free computer training: 1) TNSDC IT courses - Web, Data entry, Tally 2) NIELIT (Government) - CCC, O Level 3) Digital India Programme - Basic computer 4) CSC (Common Service Centre) - Digital literacy 5) Library-based free classes. Online free: SWAYAM, NPTEL, Coursera (audit mode). Employment exchange computer labs free practice available. Apply through respective websites.

instruction: அகத்தியர் நாடி ஜோதிடம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: அகத்தியர் palm leaves-ல் எழுதிய predictions. ஒவ்வொரு மனிதரின் கடந்த காலம், நிகழ்காலம், எதிர்காலம் பற்றிய தகவல்கள் இதில் உள்ளன என்று நம்பப்படுகிறது. Vaitheeswaran Koil (நாகப்பட்டினம்) இதற்கு famous. Thumb impression கொடுத்து உங்கள் leaf-ஐ கண்டுபிடிப்பார்கள். நம்பிக்கை இருப்பவர்களுக்கு ஆறுதலாக இருக்கும். Scientific proof இல்லை என்று critics சொல்வார்கள்.

instruction: PM Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) endraal enna?
output: Water irrigation expansion scheme. Components: Har Khet Ko Pani (water availability), Per Drop More Crop (Micro irrigation - Drip/Sprinkler, 55% subsidy), Watershed Development. Benefit: 55% subsidy for drip irrigation, 30-50% water saving, 20-40% yield increase. Apply: Agriculture Department/Horticulture Department. Micro Irrigation Fund: ₹5,000 crore for states. Water Sources: Bore well, farm pond, check dam support.

instruction: Veetuku oru aalu vandhaan, 'SBI la irundhu ayya, senior citizen account verification, Aadhaar xerox, passbook, ATM card photo edukanum' nu. ID card kaatinaan, kudukkalama?
output: Bank employees verification ku veetuku varaadhu ayya! ID card fake aa irukkum. Documents kuduthaa account takeover panniduvaanga. 'Verification' bank branch la nadakkum. Door la vara 'bank employees' avoid pannunga. SBI branch ku call panni verify pannunga.

instruction: தொல்காப்பியம் என்றால் என்ன? யார் எழுதினார்?
output: தொல்காப்பியம் - தமிழின் மிகப் பழமையான இலக்கண நூல். தொல்காப்பியர் எழுதியது. எழுத்து, சொல், பொருள் என்ற மூன்று அதிகாரங்கள். தமிழ் மொழியின் grammar மட்டுமல்ல, வாழ்க்கை முறை, பண்பாடு எல்லாம் இதில் உள்ளன. அகத்தியரின் மாணவர் என்று கூறப்படுகிறது. 'தொல்காப்பியம் கற்றவன் சொல் காப்பியம்' என்பது பழமொழி. இன்றும் Tamil studies-க்கு ஆதாரம்.

instruction: ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம் புதுப்பிக்க என்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output: காலாவதியாவதற்கு 1 வருடம் முன்பே விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம். காலாவதியான பின் 5 வருடம் வரை புதுப்பிக்கலாம். ஆன்லைன்: parivahan.gov.in. ஆவணங்கள்: பழைய DL, ஆதார், மருத்துவ சான்று (40+ வயது). கட்டணம்: ₹200 + ஸ்மார்ட் கார்டு கட்டணம்.

instruction: Free coaching enge kidaikkum? Government schemes irukkiradha?
output: Free coaching options: 1) Tamil Nadu Government Free Coaching Centres - UPSC, TNPSC, SSC-ku major cities-la 2) BC/MBC Welfare Dept coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare free coaching (SC/ST) 4) District Employment Office coaching 5) TNSDC skill centers. Online: NPTEL, SWAYAM, Unacademy free tier. Apply through respective department websites. Selection based on marks and income.

instruction: Hydrotherapy treatments ennenna?
output: Water treatments: 1) Hip bath (pelvic area) - digestive, urinary issues, 2) Spinal bath - spine problems, stress, 3) Arm/foot bath - circulation, 4) Steam bath - detox, skin, 5) Enema - colon cleansing, 6) Wet pack - fever, inflammation, 7) Hot and cold compress. Home: Alternate hot-cold shower, foot bath. Centre: Full treatments under supervision. Benefits: Circulation, toxin removal, pain relief. Caution: Heart patients, BP - consult before.

instruction: Hospital-la bill romba pottaanga, enna panradhu? (Madurai style)
output: First - itemized bill kelunga. Medicine MRP check pannunga - MRP-kku mela charge panna koodaadhu. Estimate irundhaa compare pannunga. Reasonable illanna: 1) Hospital manager-kitta complaint, 2) Consumer Forum, 3) DHS complaint. CMCHIS card irundhaa - pala treatment free. Bill dispute = pay under protest (writing-la) and then fight.

instruction: ரேஷன் கார்டில் இருந்து பெயர் நீக்க முடியுமா?
output: முடியும். இறந்துவிட்டால் death certificate, வேறு வீட்டுக்கு மாறினால் transfer certificate கொடுத்து Form 3 நிரப்ப வேண்டும். Taluk supply office-ல் கொடுக்கலாம்.

instruction: Seasonal diseases-kku Siddha prevention?
output: Monsoon (Kaar kaalam): Nilavembu, avoid raw foods, warm water. Winter (Munpani): Chukku preparations, oil massage. Summer (Mudhuvenil): Cooling preparations, Nannari, tender coconut. Flu/dengue season: Papaya leaf juice, Nilavembu Kudineer. Government distribution: During epidemics, free Siddha immunity medicines distributed through PHC. Lifestyle: Seasonal diet (Paruva Unavugal) as per traditional calendar.

instruction: என் நிலத்தில் புதிய ஆழ்துளை கிணறு (Borewell) அமைக்க என்ன permission வேண்டும்?
output:
Borewell permission process:

**Step 1: Permission வாங்குதல்**
- எங்கே: PWD Ground Water Wing / District Collector Office
- Online: tnpwd.gov.in

**Step 2: தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்**
- நில ஆவணம் (Patta/Chitta)
- FMB Extract
- Location sketch
- Adjacent borewell details (500m சுற்றளவில்)
- Aadhaar, Photo

**Step 3: கட்டணம்**
- Application fee: ₹100-500
- NOC fee: ₹500-1,000

**Step 4: Inspection**
- PWD officer visit
- Ground water level check
- Spacing norms verification (Minimum 200m from other borewells)

**Step 5: Approval**
- காலம்: 15-30 நாட்கள்
- Depth restriction இருக்கலாம்

**Free Electricity Connection:**
- Borewell complete-ஆன பின் TANGEDCO-ல் apply
- Agricultural free connection

**முக்கியம்:**
- Permission இல்லாமல் borewell போட்டால் legal action
- Over-exploited areas-ல் permission கிடைக்காது

instruction: Primary Health Centre (PHC) endraal enna? Enna services kidaikkum?
output: PHC = Village/block level government health facility. Free services: 1) Basic consultation, 2) Common illness treatment, 3) Maternal care, 4) Child immunization, 5) Family planning, 6) Minor wound dressing, 7) Basic lab tests, 8) Medicine dispensing, 9) Health education. Timings: Usually 9 AM - 4 PM. Staff: Doctor, nurse, pharmacist, lab technician. Referral: To CHC/District Hospital if needed.

instruction: ITI Course patri full details thanga. Free-ya padikkalamaa?
output:
**ITI Complete Guide:**

**What:** Technical skill training, NCVT certified

**Eligibility:** 8th/10th pass based on trade

**Duration:** 6 months - 2 years

**Popular Trades:**
- Electrician, Fitter, COPA, Mechanic, Welder

**Fees:**
- Govt ITI: FREE (₹100-500 nominal)
- Private: ₹10,000-50,000/year

**Free Training:**
- SC/ST: Free + ₹500-1,000/month stipend
- BC/MBC: Free tuition

**Admission:** itidata.tn.gov.in (May-June)

**After ITI:**
- Apprenticeship: ₹5,000-9,000/month
- Direct jobs
- Diploma lateral entry

instruction: Close friend persistent aa 'business opportunity' explain pannaan - 'Amway/Vestige join pannu, both of us earn, just 15,000 starter kit.'
output: Friend genuine aa believe panniruppaan - but MLM structure problematic. 95%+ participants lose money (FTC data). Friendship strain aagum if you refuse or fail. Research MLM statistics, politely decline. Real friendship survives business rejection.

instruction: Shop employee rights என்ன?
output: TN Shops and Establishments Act: 1) 8 hours work/day, 48 hours/week, 2) Weekly off mandatory, 3) Leave: 12 days earned + 12 days sick + 5 casual, 4) Overtime double wages, 5) No child labour (<14 years). Violation: Labour Inspector complaint.

instruction: ITI-la ennenna trades padikkalaam? Edhu popular?
output: Popular ITI trades: 1) Electrician - mikavum demand 2) Fitter - manufacturing jobs 3) Welder - construction, shipyard 4) Motor Mechanic - automobile industry 5) COPA (Computer Operator) - IT support 6) Electronics Mechanic 7) Plumber - house construction 8) Turner - machine shop. Duration: 1-2 years. TN-la 130+ trades available. Government ITI free-yaa padikkalaam.

instruction: Apprenticeship training eppadi join aavadhu? Stipend kidaikkuma?
output: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS): ITI/Diploma mudithavargalukku. Register: www.apprenticeshipindia.gov.in. Duration: 1-3 years depending on trade. Stipend: ₹8,000-15,000/month (govt subsidy ulladhu). Companies: TCS, L&T, Hyundai, Railways, BHEL - all hire apprentices. Benefits: Real experience, permanent job chance 70%+. Documents: ITI certificate, Aadhaar, bank account.

instruction: Class 8-ku appuram enna padikkalam? Endha stream select seyvadhu?
output:
**After Class 8 Options:**

**Option 1: Regular School (9-12)**
- Class 9-10: Same for all
- Class 11-12: Choose stream

**Streams:**
| Stream | Subjects | Career |
|--------|----------|--------|
| Science-Maths | PCM | Engineering |
| Science-Bio | PCB | Medicine |
| Commerce | Accounts | CA, Banking |
| Arts | History | Law, Civil Services |

**Option 2: ITI** - After 8th/10th, 1-2 years, Direct jobs

**Option 3: Polytechnic** - After 10th, 3 years diploma

**How to Decide:**
1. Your interest
2. 10th marks
3. Career goal
4. Family situation

**Guidance:** School counselor, tnsdc.in

instruction: Newly married couple-க்கு - 'Free honeymoon package வென்றீர்கள்! Booking fee 10000 மட்டும் கட்டுங்கள்' என்று Instagram ad.
output: Free package-க்கு booking fee என்பது contradiction. Newly married couples-ஐ target செய்யும் travel scam. பணம் கட்டினால் போய்விடும், trip கிடைக்காது.

instruction: Graphic Design course enge padikkalaam? Job opportunity?
output: Training options: 1) Arena Animation 2) MAAC 3) TNSDC multimedia courses 4) Online - Coursera, Skillshare. Tools to learn: Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDraw, Canva. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Graphic designer 2) Social media designer 3) Print designer 4) UI designer 5) Freelancing. Salary: ₹12,000-30,000 starting. Portfolio build pannunga. Freelance platforms: Fiverr, Upwork, 99designs.

instruction: Hit and run case-la compensation eppadi peruvathu?
output: FIR podunga (vehicle details theriyaaviitalum). Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT)-la claim. Hit and run compensation: Death - Rs.2 lakh, Grievous injury - Rs.50,000 (Solatium Scheme). Driver identify aanaal full compensation + criminal case.

instruction: HIV/AIDS treatment எங்கே free-யா கிடைக்கும்?
output: Free at ART (Anti-Retroviral Therapy) Centres. TN has 100+ ART centres. Services: 1) HIV testing (free, confidential), 2) ART medicines (lifelong free), 3) CD4 count tests, 4) Opportunistic infection treatment, 5) Counseling, 6) PPTCT (pregnant women). Location: District hospitals, medical colleges. TANSACS: State AIDS control body. Helpline: 1097 (AIDS helpline). Confidentiality guaranteed.

instruction: Stamp duty எவ்வளவு கட்டணும்?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல்: Stamp duty 7%, Registration fee 4% = Total 11% of property value (guideline value அல்லது sale value - எது அதிகமோ அது). Women single owner-க்கு stamp duty 1% concession. Agricultural land-க்கு lower rates.

instruction: 'Flipkart Big Billion Day - நீங்கள் ஸ்பெஷல் winner! 90% discount voucher க்ளைம் செய்யுங்கள்' என்று வாட்ஸ்அப் வந்தது.
output: Flipkart வாட்ஸ்அப்பில் இப்படி அனுப்பாது. இது போலி மெசேஜ். Flipkart ஆப்பில் மட்டுமே offers பாருங்கள்.

instruction: PM-KISAN scheme enna?
output: Direct cash support for farmers. Amount: ₹6,000/year (₹2,000 x 3 installments). Eligibility: Land-owning farmers. Exclusions: Government employees, Income Tax payers, Registered professionals, Those getting ₹10,000+ pension. Registration: pmkisan.gov.in, CSC/Agriculture Office. Need Aadhaar, Land Records, Bank Account. Status: pmkisan.gov.in → Beneficiary Status

instruction: WhatsApp message 'TCS requires your old employee data for tax compliance. Fill this form with PAN, previous salary details.' Munna TCS la work pannen, compliance ku genuine aa?
output: Ex-employers contact through official HR email, not WhatsApp. TCS has Form 16 data, doesn't need you to fill forms. This is PAN/financial data harvesting. If genuinely needed, visit TCS HR portal or call official numbers.

instruction: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme endraal enna?
output: ₹18,000 assistance for pregnant women. 3 installments: ₹6,000 (at 12 weeks), ₹6,000 (at delivery), ₹6,000 (baby 9 months vaccines). Eligibility: 1 year TN resident, delivery at govt/govt-aided hospital. Amma Baby Kit: Additional ₹5,000 worth baby care items. Apply: PHC/Govt hospital/ICDS. Documents: Aadhaar, MCP card, Bank account.

instruction: NEET Result-ku appuram Counselling eppadi nadakkum? TN-la seats eppadi kidaikkum?
output:
**NEET Counselling:**

**Types:**
1. All India Quota (15%) - MCC
2. State Quota (85%) - TN Selection Committee

**TN Website:** tnmedicalselection.org

**Process:**
1. Online Registration + Documents + Fee
2. Choice Filling - List colleges in preference
3. Seat Allotment - Based on rank + choice + category
4. Reporting - Go to college, verify, pay, confirm

**TN Reservation:**
- OC 31%, BC 26.5%, MBC 20%, SC 18%, ST 1%
- 7.5% Govt school within each

**Fees:**
- Govt: ₹15,000/year
- Self-Finance: ₹5-15 lakh/year
- Deemed: ₹10-25 lakh/year

**Timing:** July-August usually

instruction: Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY) endraal enna?
output: ₹5 lakh free treatment. Coverage: ₹5 lakh per family per year. Eligibility: BPL families as per SECC 2011 data. Treatments: 1,500+ procedures covered. Check eligibility: pmjay.gov.in → Am I Eligible, Enter Aadhaar/Ration Card number. Get card: Ayushman Mitra/Government Hospital, Need Aadhaar + Ration Card + Photo, Free. In TN: Integrated with CMCHIS

instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'E-courts registration update required. Click link to verify advocate ID or case filing affected.' E-courts use pannuren, verify pannalama?
output: E-courts registration done through ecourts.gov.in with Bar Council enrollment number. Never click SMS links - access portal directly. Case filing not 'affected' by link clicks - this is scare tactic. Report such messages to cyber cell.

instruction: 'Katrradhanaal aaya payanenkol' - indha kuraloda porul enna?
output: Kural: 'Katrradhanaal aaya payanenkol vaalariVan natraal thozhaar enin'. Artham: Thooya arivudaiya iraivanoada thiruvadigalai vanangaavittaal, katra kalviyaal enna payan? Kalviyoda unmaiyaana payan iraivanai vananguvadhae enkiraar Valluvar.

instruction: Madurai Chithirai Thiruvizha eppadi nadakkum?
output: Tamil Nadu-oda migapperiya thiruvizha. Oru maadham nadakkum. Mukkiya events: 1) Thirukalyanam - Meenakshi-Sundareswarar thirumanam, 2) Azhvaar Thiruveedhi purapaadu - Vishnu's brother role, 3) Therthiruvizha - huge temple car, 4) Theppathiruvizha - float festival at Mariamman Teppakulam. 1 million+ people varuvaargal. Hotels, transport early book seiya vendum. April/May-la veyil adhigam - prepare accordingly.

instruction: [Multi-turn dialogue] Senior Citizen Pension and Benefits - Full conversation guide
output:
User: En appa-ku 62 years aaguchu. Retire aanaar. Enna government benefits kidaikum?

Assistant: 62 years-ku niraiya benefits irukku! First, siladhu clarify pannanum:

1. Appa government employee-aa private-aa?
2. Appa income tax file pannuvaaraa?
3. BPL card / Rice card irukka?
4. Vera pension vaanguraaraa?

Indha details sollunga, exact benefits sollren.

User: Private employee, small company. Income tax illa. Rice card irukku. No pension.

Assistant: Good! Appa-ku niraiya benefits eligible:

**1. Old Age Pension (TN State)**
- Amount: ₹1,000/month
- Eligibility: 60+ years, Low income, Rice card ✓
- Where: Taluk Office / tneservices.tn.gov.in

**2. Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam**
- Wait... indha Amma-ku dhan, Appa-ku illa

**3. Free/Subsidized Benefits:**
- Free bus travel (ordinary buses)
- Free health insurance (CMCHIS)
- Railway ticket 40% discount

**4. Banking Benefits:**
- Senior Citizen FD - Extra 0.5% interest
- SCSS (Senior Citizen Savings Scheme) - 8.2% interest

**5. Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana (if needed)**
- Free: Spectacles, Walking stick, Hearing aid, etc.

Mudhalil Old Age Pension apply pannalaamaa?

User: Aamaa pension apply pannanum. Online mudiyumaa?

Assistant: **Old Age Pension - Online Application:**

**Website:** tneservices.tn.gov.in

**Steps:**
1. Go to tneservices.tn.gov.in
2. Register: Mobile number, Create login
3. Services → Social Security → Old Age Pension
4. Fill application form
5. Upload documents
6. Submit
7. Note: Application number

**Documents to Upload:**
1. **Age Proof:** Aadhaar / Voter ID / Birth Certificate
2. **Address Proof:** Aadhaar / Ration Card
3. **Income Certificate:** (Less than ₹24,000/year) - from Taluk Office
4. **Ration Card:** Front page
5. **Bank Passbook:** First page
6. **Passport Photo:** Recent

**Income Certificate illana mudhalil adhu vaanganum:**
- Taluk Office / tneservices.tn.gov.in
- VAO verification nadakkum
- 7-15 days

Income certificate irukka Appa kitta?

User: Income certificate illa. Adhu eppadi vaanguvadhu?

Assistant: **Income Certificate - Process:**

**Online (Easier):**
1. tneservices.tn.gov.in → Income Certificate
2. Register/Login
3. Fill: Name, Address, Family members, Income sources
4. Upload: Aadhaar, Address proof
5. Submit + Pay ₹20 (online)

**Offline:**
1. VAO (Village Administrative Officer) office
2. Fill application
3. Submit documents
4. VAO enquiry (may visit home)

**After Apply:**
- VAO verification
- Revenue Inspector check
- Tahsildar approval
- Certificate issue

**Time:** 7-15 days

**Documents Needed:**
- Aadhaar Card
- Ration Card
- Self-declaration of income
- If employed before: Last salary slip / relieving letter

**Appa's case:** Retired, no current income, Rice card holder → Easy approval

**Tip:** Apply online - faster, track status easily

Online apply pannalaamaa?

User: Okay apply panren. CMCHIS health card eppadi vaanguvadhu?

Assistant: **CMCHIS Health Card (₹5 Lakh Free Treatment):**

**Good News:** Rice card holder na automatic eligibility!

**How to Get Card:**

**Option 1: Government Hospital (Easiest)**
1. Nearest Government Hospital poganum
2. Ayushman Mitra / CMCHIS counter find pannunga
3. Documents kaattunga:
   - Aadhaar Card
   - Ration Card
4. They'll check eligibility online
5. Photo capture
6. Card print - **Same day!**
7. **Cost: FREE**

**Option 2: Online Check + Hospital**
1. pmjay.gov.in → "Am I Eligible"
2. Enter Ration Card number
3. If eligible → Go to hospital for card

**Option 3: CSC (Common Service Center)**
- Nearest CSC
- Same documents
- Card issue

**What's Covered:**
- ₹5 lakh per family per year
- 1,500+ surgeries and treatments
- Empanelled hospitals (Govt + Private)
- Cashless treatment

**Not Covered:**
- OPD (Outpatient)
- Cosmetic surgery
- Fertility treatment

**Tip:** Card vaangina, list of empanelled hospitals vaangunga - emergency-ku useful.

Government hospital near-by irukka?

User: GH irukku. Appa-ku regular medicines vendum - BP, Sugar. Cheap-aa enga vaanguvadhu?

Assistant: **Cheap Medicines for Senior Citizens:**

**1. Jan Aushadhi Kendra (Best Option!)**
- **Discount:** 50-90% off MRP!
- **Quality:** Same as branded (WHO-GMP certified)
- **Find:** janaushadhi.gov.in → Store Locator
- Chennai-la 100+ stores irukku

**Price Comparison:**
| Medicine | Market | Jan Aushadhi |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| Metformin 500mg (10 tabs) | ₹25 | ₹3.50 |
| Amlodipine 5mg (10 tabs) | ₹30 | ₹4 |
| Atorvastatin 10mg (10 tabs) | ₹80 | ₹12 |

**2. Government Hospital Pharmacy**
- Free medicines (with prescription)
- GH OPD-la prescription vaangunga
- Pharmacy-la free medicines

**3. Amma Pharmacy (TN Govt)**
- Subsidized rates
- CMCHIS card holders - additional discount

**4. Generic Medicine Shops**
- Any pharmacy-la "generic" medicine kekuinga
- Same salt, less price

**For Regular BP/Sugar:**

**Best Strategy:**
1. GH-la OPD poganum (₹5-10 registration)
2. Doctor prescription vaangunga
3. Same hospital pharmacy - FREE medicines
4. Illa na Jan Aushadhi store - cheap

**Tip:** CMCHIS card-la OPD free, medicines free at GH!

Monthly medicines list irukka? Jan Aushadhi-la kidaikuma check pannalaam.

instruction: Advocate hire panna budget illa. Free legal help eppidi kedaikum?
output: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA): Every district has one, free lawyers for eligible (income <₹3L), application at District Court. Taluk Legal Services Committee: Taluk level. State Legal Services: tnsla.gov.in (Tamil Nadu), Helpline 15100 (NALSA). Law School Clinics: NLU, NLSIU - free consultation. NGOs: Human Rights Law Network, Alternative Law Forum, PUCL. Eligible: SC/ST, Women/Children, Senior citizens, Disabled, Industrial workmen, Trafficking/disaster victims, Below income threshold. Documents: Income certificate, ID proof, case documents.

instruction: Son ku US admission apply panrom. 'Visa guaranteed, university scholarship arranged, processing fee 2 lakhs' nu consultant solraan. Trust pannalama?
output: 'Visa guaranteed' no one can promise - embassy decision. 'Scholarship arranged' - legitimate scholarships application through varum, agents arrange pannaadhu. 2 lakhs vaangitu basic work um pannaama ghost aaguvaanga. Verified consultants - check reviews, past student references.

instruction: Weight loss-க்கு Ayurveda treatment?
output: Ayurveda approach: Not just weight loss - metabolic correction. Treatments: 1) Udvartana (herbal powder massage), 2) Vamana/Virechana (detox), 3) Lekhana Basti (specific enema), 4) Internal medicines (Triphala, Guggulu), 5) Diet as per Prakriti, 6) Lifestyle modifications. Duration: 3-6 months for sustainable results. Benefit: Addresses root cause, prevents regain. Not: Quick fix - gradual healthy weight loss.

instruction: Child custody order maatra mudiyumaa?
output: Aama, circumstances maarinaal. Modification petition file pannalam. Grounds: Custodial parent neglect, child's preference change, better opportunity with other parent, relocation. Court child's welfare basis-la decide seyyum.

instruction: 10th public exam-ku eppadi prepare aavadhu? Topper tips enna?
output: Topper strategies: 1) Textbook muzhmaiyaaga padiyunga - 80% questions textbook-lirundhu 2) Previous 5 years question papers practice 3) Blue print padi chapter-wise weightage kavaniyunga 4) Maths & Science: daily problem solving 5) Tamil/English: grammar + essay practice 6) Social: Map pointing + dates memorize. Time: Daily 6-8 hours. Last month: Revision only. TN Government question bank: www.dge.tn.gov.in

instruction: Free legal aid எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Eligible: Women, children, SC/ST, disabled, victims of trafficking, industrial workers, custody persons, income < Rs.3 lakh/year. Apply: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), Taluk Legal Services Committee. Court-லும் request பண்ணலாம். Toll-free: 15100.

instruction: Employer notice இல்லாம terminate பண்ணலாமா?
output: முடியாது (except gross misconduct). Notice period: Agreement-ல் உள்ளபடி (usually 1-3 months). Notice இல்லாவிட்டால் notice pay கொடுக்கணும். Probation period-லும் reasonable notice வேண்டும். Termination reason writing-ல் கேளுங்க.

instruction: மக்கள் நலம் / public welfare பற்றி என்ன குறள்கள் உள்ளன?
output: குறள்: 'குடிபுறம் காக்கும் ஒருவனை மக்கள் அடிபுறம் காப்பாருள் வைப்பர்'. மக்களைக் காப்பாற்றும் அரசனை மக்கள் மதிப்பார்கள். மேலும்: 'இறைகாக்கும் வையகம் எல்லாம் அவனை முறைகாக்கும் முட்டாச் செயின்'. அரசன் நியாயமாக ஆண்டால், உலகமே அவனைக் காக்கும். Leader who serves people = people protect leader. Public service = ultimate duty!

instruction: Property pillaigalukku transfer pannitten, ippo veliyethuraanga, enna seivathu?
output: Senior Citizens Act protection: Property transfer-kku piragu neglect/eviction = transfer cancel pannalam. Steps: 1) Tribunal application (Collector office), 2) Prove neglect/ill-treatment, 3) Order for property return. Time limit: None specified - apply anytime. Evidence: Witnesses, medical records (if abuse), communication records. Preventive: Transfer with life interest retention safer.

instruction: FIR eppadi register seyvadhu?
output: Visit nearest police station with written complaint. Zero FIR: Can file at ANY station. Online for some crimes: eservices.tnpolice.gov.in. Get FIR copy FREE (your right!). If police refuse: Complain to SP/District Collector. For cyber crimes: cybercrime.gov.in or call 1930.

instruction: A-Register endraal enna?
output: Village-level land record maintained by VAO. Contains: All survey numbers, owners, area, classification. Public document - anyone can inspect. Patta transfer, mutation ellam A-Register-la update aaganum. Discrepancy irundhaal Tahsildar-kku complaint.

instruction: Aadhaar card-ல் mobile number மாற்ற என்ன செய்வது?
output: Mobile number update-க்கு Aadhaar centre-க்கு நேரில் போக வேண்டும். Online-ல் செய்ய முடியாது. Original Aadhaar, new mobile number எடுத்துச் செல்லுங்கள். Biometric verification உண்டு.

instruction: Ayurveda daily routine (Dinacharya) enna?
output: Ideal routine: 1) Wake before sunrise (Brahma Muhurta), 2) Drink warm water, 3) Toilet/elimination, 4) Oil pulling (Gandusha), 5) Tongue scraping, 6) Teeth cleaning with herbal powder, 7) Abhyanga (oil massage), 8) Exercise/Yoga, 9) Bath, 10) Breakfast appropriate to Prakriti, 11) Mindful eating, 12) Early dinner (before sunset ideal), 13) Sleep by 10 PM. Benefits: Disease prevention, energy, longevity.

instruction: Phone vandhuchu 'PM Kisan installment problem. Pay 500 service charge to fix account issue.' PM Kisan money varalai, idhu genuine call aa?
output: PM Kisan payments through DBT - no service charge. Check status at pmkisan.gov.in with Aadhaar. If payment delayed, contact agriculture department. Government schemes never need 'service charges'. Scammers target farmers knowing they depend on these payments.

instruction: Generic medicine weak, branded strong - unmaiyaa?
output: MYTH! Same active ingredient, same dose = same effect. Why generic cheaper: No brand marketing cost, no patent royalty. Quality: Government-approved generics meet same standards. Proof: Government hospitals use generic - same results. Jan Aushadhi: WHO-GMP certified, 50-90% cheaper. Don't fall for: Marketing claims, fancy packaging. Ask pharmacist: Generic alternative for any branded medicine.

instruction: Important helpline numbers enna?
output: Emergency: 112, Women Helpline: 181, Child Helpline: 1098, CM Cell: 1100, Legal Aid: 15100, Consumer: 1915, Electricity: 94987-94987, Water: 1916, Ration Card: 1967

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar Link eppadi seyvadhu? Kattaayama?
output: Mandatory! If not linked, PAN becomes Inoperative. How to link: 1. Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar 2. SMS: UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN> → 567678 or 56161 3. Fee: ₹1,000 (late fee). Check status: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar Status. If not linked: Cannot file ITR, Cannot do large bank transactions, Cannot open MF/Demat, Higher TDS deduction

instruction: School reopening - 'Textbooks 80% discount! Order before stock ends' unknown site offer. Order பண்ணலாமா?
output: Risky! School opening time-ல textbook scams common. Advance வாங்கி wrong books or nothing அனுப்புவாங்க. Government schools free-ஆ books தரும். Private school-க்கு official bookshop-ல வாங்குங்க.

instruction: Call vandhuchu 'This is Infosys IT security team. We detected unauthorized access from your credentials. Share OTP to verify your identity.' Naanum Infosys la dhaan velai paakkuren, genuine call aa?
output: Real IT security teams use internal communication, never ask OTP over phone. They can verify you through company systems. Call your manager or security team directly using known numbers. Internal breach attempts often come disguised as security calls.

instruction: School admission marukkiraargal - RTE-la seat irukke?
output: RTE Act 25%: EWS/disadvantaged group-kku reserved. Apply: Online portal (rte.tn.gov.in). Rejection complaint: Block Education Officer, DEO, State RTE Authority. Documents: Income certificate, caste certificate, residence proof. Age: 6-14 years.

instruction: Consumer case எவ்வளவு நாள் ஆகும்?
output: சட்டப்படி 3-5 months-ல் முடிக்கணும். ஆனால் practical-ஆ 6 months - 2 years ஆகலாம். Simple cases faster. Mediation option இருந்தால் 30-60 days-ல் settle ஆகலாம். e-Filing cases faster-ஆ process ஆகும்.

instruction: Instagram la 'model' DM pannaa - chatting aachhu, 'exclusive content subscription 2000/month' nu, payment link anuppunaa.
output: Fake profiles using stolen photos. 'Exclusive content' sites usually malware or card theft. Payment pannina - more demands, blackmail possibility. Reverse image search pannunga photos - vera sites la irukkum. Don't pay strangers for 'content.'

instruction: மருத்துவர் என்று அழைத்து 'உங்கள் உறவினர் விபத்தில் அனுமதி, அவசர சிகிச்சைக்கு 50,000 உடனே அனுப்புங்கள்' என்றார்கள்.
output: முதலில் அமைதியாக இருங்கள். உறவினரை நேரடியாக அழைத்து சரிபார்க்கவும். மருத்துவமனை பெயர், முகவரி கேளுங்கள், அழைத்து உறுதி செய்யுங்கள். மோசடிக்காரர்கள் அவசரத்தை பயன்படுத்தி பணம் திருடுவார்கள். சரிபார்க்காமல் பணம் அனுப்பாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Job fraud - advance vaangittu mosam pannitaanga
output: Complaint: 1) cybercrime.gov.in, 2) Local police FIR, 3) Labour Department (if company involved). Legal sections: IT Act 66D (cheating using computer), IPC 420 (cheating). Red flags: Advance fee, unrealistic salary, gmail/yahoo recruiter. Legitimate companies never ask money.

instruction: PhD admission Tamil Nadu-la eppadi nadakkudhu?
output: Steps: 1) PG degree 55% marks (SC/ST 50%) 2) UGC NET/CSIR NET/GATE/SLET pass (fellowship-ku) 3) University entrance test + interview. Fellowship: JRF ₹31,000/month, SRF ₹35,000/month. Part-time PhD working professionals-ku available. Major universities: Anna, Madras, Bharathidasan, Bharathiar.

instruction: விவசாயிகளுக்கு - 'PM Kisan bonus 5000 Rs! KYC update பண்ணுங்க, OTP சொல்லுங்க' call வந்துச்சு. Genuine-ஆ?
output: Fraud! PM Kisan amount direct account-ல வரும், OTP தேவையில்ல. Harvest season-ல farmers target ஆகுறாங்க. Government OTP கேக்காது. CSC centre போய் KYC update பண்ணுங்க. Phone-ல details சொல்லாதீங்க.

instruction: TN Helpline Numbers enna enna?
output: Important TN Helplines: 1967 (Ration complaints), 1077 (CM Helpline), 108 (Emergency Ambulance), 104 (Health Helpline), 100 (Police), 101 (Fire), 1091 (Women Helpline), 1098 (Child Helpline - Childline), 181 (Women Helpline - central), 1912 (Anti-Corruption), 155300 (Cyber Crime), 14461 (Kisan Call Centre), 1800-180-1111 (Pensioners). Free: Most are toll-free 24x7.

instruction: Fine Arts படிச்சா future என்ன?
output: BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts): 4 years. Specializations: Painting, Sculpture, Applied Art, Graphic Design. Colleges: Govt College of Fine Arts Chennai, Kumbakonam. Jobs: Art galleries, Advertising agencies, Film industry (Art director), Teaching, Freelance artist. Digital art growing field. Salary varies widely: ₹15,000-1 lakh+ based on skill and reputation. Portfolio and networking crucial.

instruction: Bail reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Appeal options: Lower court reject → Sessions Court. Sessions reject → High Court. High Court reject → Supreme Court. Fresh application: New grounds/changed circumstances irundhaal same court-layae fresh petition podalam. Legal aid available.

instruction: Social media-la abuse/trolling - complaint podalaamaa?
output: Aama. Sections: IT Act 66A (struck down but alternatives exist), 67 (obscene content), IPC 509 (insult to modesty), 506 (criminal intimidation), 507 (criminal intimidation by anonymous). Platform report + cybercrime.gov.in complaint. Women: 181 helpline.

instruction: Road accident-la enna seyyanum?
output: Steps: 1) Injured-kku first aid, 2) 108 ambulance call, 3) Police 100 call, 4) Photos/videos edunga, 5) Witness details collect, 6) FIR file (or police will file). Good Samaritan law: Help pannuravarkalukku legal protection undu.

instruction: ITI padicha piragu engineering seralaamaa?
output: Aam, Lateral Entry scheme ulladhu. ITI + 2 years relevant work experience or ITI + 1 year apprenticeship = Diploma 2nd year direct admission. Diploma mudicha piragu = B.E./B.Tech 2nd year. LEET (Lateral Entry Entrance Test) sila states-la ulladhu. TN-la marks basis lateral entry available. Career ladder: ITI → Diploma → B.E. → M.Tech.

instruction: 'IPO allotment guarantee - 5000 கொடுத்தால் definitely allotment கிடைக்கும்' என்கிறார்கள். உண்மையா?
output: IPO allotment random lottery. யாரும் guarantee செய்ய முடியாது. இது scam. SEBI registered broker மூலமே IPO apply செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: காவல் நிலையத்தில் FIR எப்படி பதிவு செய்வது? மறுத்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்: எழுத்துப்பூர்வ புகார் (2 நகல்கள்), ஆதார அச்சுப்பிரதிகள், அடையாள அட்டை, வங்கி அறிக்கைகள், திரைப்பிடிப்புகள், சைபர் குற்ற ஒப்புகை. குறிப்பிட வேண்டிய பிரிவுகள்: IPC 420 (மோசடி), IPC 406 (நம்பிக்கை மீறல்), IT சட்டம் 66C (அடையாளத் திருட்டு), IT சட்டம் 66D (கணினி மூலம் மோசடி). காவல்துறை மறுத்தால்: படி 1: CrPC பிரிவு 154(3) குறிப்பிட்டு எழுத்துப்பூர்வ விண்ணப்பம். படி 2: SP/DSP சந்திக்கவும். படி 3: நீதித்துறை நடுவர் முன் CrPC பிரிவு 156(3) விண்ணப்பம். படி 4: மாநில மனித உரிமை ஆணையம். படி 5: உயர்நீதிமன்ற மனு.

instruction: Wrong side surgery (wrong leg, wrong kidney) - legal action?
output: Serious negligence! "Never event" in medical terms. Action: 1) Document immediately (photos, records), 2) Consumer Forum - high compensation, 3) Criminal case (Section 338), 4) Medical Council complaint. Protocols violated: WHO surgical safety checklist. Hospitals have: Marking protocols, time-out procedures. Failure = gross negligence. Compensation: Significant damages awarded in such cases.

instruction: MRP-kku mela charge panraanga - complain eppadi?
output: Illegal! Legal Metrology Act violation. MRP = Maximum Retail Price (inclusive of all taxes). Action: 1) Point out MRP printed on pack, 2) Refuse to pay excess, 3) Complaint: Weights and Measures Department (Legal Metrology), 4) Consumer helpline: 1800-11-4000. Evidence: Bill + photo of MRP on pack. Penalty: Fine on seller. Hospital pharmacy also bound by MRP.

instruction: Sondha thozhil aarambikka enna training irukkudhu?
output: Entrepreneurship training: 1) MSME-DI (District Industries Centre) - free EDP (Entrepreneurship Development Programme) 2) TNSDC business skills 3) NIESBUD courses 4) PMEGP training before loan 5) Startup TN programmes. Duration: 1-4 weeks. Topics: Business plan, finance, marketing, legal compliance. DIC-la register panninaal subsidies, loans easier. Free mentorship available.

instruction: 'EPFO la irundhu pesuren ayya, Life Certificate submit pannanum, illa na pension stop aaidum. Video call la face verification pannanum' nu sonnanga. Enna pannanum?
output: EPFO video call la verification pannaadhu ayya. Jeevan Pramaan app use pannalam, illa bank la submit pannalam, illa postman door la varuvaaru. 'Pension stop aaidum' nu bayamudhuthuraanga. Video call pannina face data misuse aagum. EPFO office ku direct ponga.

instruction: 'Diwali bonus from PM Modi - 7500 Rs direct transfer! Apply now' - WhatsApp-ல வந்துச்சு. Real scheme-ஆ?
output: 100% scam! PM name use பண்ணி Diwali-ல இந்த scam viral ஆகும். Government direct transfer-க்கு WhatsApp link கிடையாது. Official portal apply தான் valid. 'PM bonus' forward எல்லாம் fake.

instruction: TATA Scholarship for students என்ன?
output: TATA Group Scholarships: 1) Tata Capital Pankh - ₹10,000-12,000/ஆண்டு for Class 6-12 2) Tata Trusts Higher Education - ₹50,000-2 lakh/ஆண்டு professional courses 3) Lady Tata Memorial Trust - Medical research. Eligibility: Income ₹4 lakh கீழ், 60%+ marks. Apply: Buddy4Study portal or direct application. Deadline varies.

instruction: Free laptop scheme-க்கு எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: Tamil Nadu-ல் government school 11th, 12th students-க்கு free laptop scheme உண்டு. Separate application தேவையில்லை, school மூலம் automatically பெறலாம். Aadhaar linking கட்டாயம்.

instruction: Employer-கிட்ட mental health issue சொல்லணுமா?
output: Not mandatory to disclose. Rights: 1) No termination for mental illness (disability discrimination), 2) Reasonable accommodation (flexible hours, WFH), 3) Medical leave like any illness, 4) Confidentiality if disclosed. When to consider: If need accommodation, if affecting work significantly. Protection: RPD Act 2016 + MHCA 2017. Termination for mental illness: Challenge in labor court.

instruction: 'Network marketing - product sell செய்து, members சேர்த்து lakhs சம்பாதியுங்கள், joining fee 10,000' என்கிறார்கள்.
output: Product-ஐ விட member சேர்ப்பதில் focus இருந்தால் pyramid scheme. அடி-level members எப்போதும் பணம் இழப்பார்கள். Joining fee கட்டாதீர்கள்.

instruction: JEE Main vs JEE Advanced - என்ன difference?
output: JEE Main: NITs, IIITs, GFTIs admission. JEE Advanced: IITs only. Eligibility: JEE Main top 2.5 lakh → JEE Advanced eligible. Difficulty: Advanced >> Main. Pattern: Main - 90 Qs, 300 marks, 3 hours. Advanced - 2 papers, 3 hours each, complex patterns. Attempts: Main - 6 (3 years × 2 sessions), Advanced - 2 consecutive years. Strategy: First secure good Main rank, then focus Advanced.

instruction: திருமூலர் yoga பற்றி என்ன சொல்லியிருக்கிறார்?
output: திருமந்திரத்தில் yoga-வுக்கு அர்ப்பணிக்கப்பட்ட பகுதிகள் உள்ளன: 1) அஷ்டாங்க யோகம் - 8 படிகள் விளக்கம், 2) பிராணாயாமம் - breathing techniques, 3) குண்டலினி யோகம் - chakra activation, 4) சமாதி நிலை - highest state. 'உடம்பை வளர்த்தேன் உயிர் வளர்த்தேனே' - உடல் பேணுவதும் ஆன்மீகம் என்று சொன்னவர். Hatha yoga-வின் தமிழ் roots இங்கே உள்ளன!

instruction: Interview-la common questions enna? Eppadi answer panrathu?
output: Common questions: 1) Tell about yourself - 2 min summary, relevant points 2) Strengths - with example proof 3) Weakness - genuine + improvement action 4) Why this company - research based answer 5) Where do you see yourself in 5 years - realistic goals 6) Why should we hire you - value proposition 7) Any questions - always ask 2-3 thoughtful ones. Practice: Mirror practice, record yourself, mock interviews. Dress: Formals, neat appearance.

instruction: PMAY-Urban எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Interest subsidy for first home buyers. EWS/LIG: 6.5%, MIG-I: 4%, MIG-II: 3% subsidy on home loan. Apply through bank or pmay-urban.gov.in. Condition: No pucca house anywhere in India. Affidavit required. Wife as co-owner recommended. Saves ₹2-2.5 lakh!

instruction: ITI join aaga enna pannanum-pa? Free-vaa irukkuma?
output: 10th/8th pass pannirukkanum. www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in-la apply pannu/pannunga. Government ITI full free - fee illai, tools, books ellam free. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. June-July-la admission start aagum.

instruction: Instant e-PAN eppadi vaanguvadhu? (Free method)
output:
Completely FREE - Only for Aadhaar holders:

1. Go to: eportal.incometax.gov.in
2. Click: 'Instant e-PAN'
3. Select: 'Get New e-PAN'
4. Enter: Aadhaar Number
5. Accept: Terms and Conditions
6. OTP: Aadhaar registered mobile-la varum
7. Validate: Enter OTP
8. Done! e-PAN PDF download ready

Time: 10 minutes!

Conditions:
- Aadhaar-la mobile linked irukkanum
- Never had PAN before
- Individual applicants only (not company)

Already PAN irukka, download seiyya:
1. eportal.incometax.gov.in → Instant e-PAN → 'Check Status / Download'
2. Enter PAN number
3. OTP validate
4. Download PDF

instruction: Scam aana aprom inime secure aa irukkanum. Enna measures follow pannanum?
output: Immediate: Change ALL passwords, enable 2FA everywhere, check bank standing instructions, cancel unknown auto-pay mandates, change ATM PIN, request new cards if details shared. Device: Scan for malware, uninstall suspicious apps, check app permissions, update OS, check browser extensions. Accounts: Review login sessions, revoke suspicious connected apps, set login alerts, check email forwarding rules. Financial: Transaction alerts (every transaction), set limits, disable international if not needed, enable SIM lock, consider CIBIL lock. Data: Check haveibeenpwned.com, Google Alerts for your name, Aadhaar lock at uidai.gov.in, check CIBIL for unauthorized loans. Long-term: Password manager, never share OTP, verify calls via official numbers, two-person rule for large transactions, monthly statement review.

instruction: ITI admission-க்கு என்ன தகுதி தேவை?
output: தகுதி trades வாரியாக மாறும்: 1) Engineering trades (Electrician, Fitter) - 10th pass 2) Non-engineering trades (Welder, Painter) - 8th pass. Age: 14-40 years. Apply: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. Selection: 10th/8th marks basis. No entrance exam. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. Government ITI-ல் seats limited, apply early.

instruction: Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme (CMCHIS) endraal enna?
output: CMCHIS = Free health insurance for TN families. Coverage: Rs.5 lakh per family per year. Eligibility: Annual income below Rs.72,000 (rice card holders automatic). Benefits: 1,027 procedures covered - surgeries, treatments, follow-up. Cashless treatment at empanelled hospitals. Card: Family smart card issued. Renewal: Automatic for eligible families.

instruction: Infosys Foundation scholarship students-ku kidaikkuma?
output: Infosys Foundation Programs: 1) Merit scholarships through partner NGOs 2) Rural education support 3) Research grants for PhD students 4) Infosys Prize - established researchers. Direct student scholarship: Through Buddy4Study partner programs. Engineering students: Campus recruitment preference. Apply: Check www.infosys.org annually for specific programs.

instruction: Online child abuse report எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Report: 1) cybercrime.gov.in (select child-related crime), 2) NCPCR helpline: 1098, 3) Police. POCSO Act: Strict punishment for child exploitation. Platforms: Report + block. Evidence preserve பண்ணுங்க. Don't forward content - possess பண்றதே illegal.

instruction: Marriage registration eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Apply at tnreginet.gov.in or Sub-Registrar Office. Documents: Age proof (groom 21+, bride 18+), address proof, wedding photos/invitation, 2 witnesses with Aadhaar. Both parties must be present at SRO. Fee: ₹100-500. Same day certificate.

instruction: Kaadhali/Kaadhalan kobamaa irukkum bodhu enna kural ninaikkalam?
output: 'Oodalin thondrum siruthuni nallali vaadinum paadu perum'. Siriya oodal (fight) kaadhalai innum inimaiyaakkum. Normal-thaan! Melum: 'Thanindhamai sellaadhu ulagam thalarnDhamai ooduvadhu ellaarkum varum'. Cool down, then talk. Love grows after reconciliation!

instruction: நான் திருமணம் செய்ய போகிறேன். திருமண பதிவு, documents மாற்றம், benefits எல்லாம் என்னென்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?

திருமணத்திற்கு பின் (1 மாதத்திற்குள்):

instruction: Mukkiya health helplines ennenna?
output: Emergency: 108 (ambulance), 102 (pregnant women). Health info: 104 (general health helpline), 1075 (COVID - still active). Disease specific: 1097 (HIV/AIDS), 1800-599-0019 (TB). Mental health: 9152987821 (iCALL), 1800-599-0019 (NIMHANS). Poison: 1066 (Chennai). Child: 1098 (Childline). Women: 181 (women helpline). All 24x7 and free.

instruction: Virtual ID (VID) என்றால் என்ன? எப்படி பயன்படுத்துவது?
output: VID என்பது 16 digit temporary number, actual Aadhaar number-க்கு பதில் பயன்படுத்தலாம். myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in-ல் generate செய்யலாம். Privacy protection-க்கு நல்லது.

instruction: Krishnavoda vennai urundai (Krishna's Butterball) enna?
output: Mamallapurathil ulla oru piramaanda paarai. 250 ton edai. Slope-la nirkkiradhu - aanaal vizhadu! Gravity-a meeruvathu pola therikiradhu. 1200+ varudangalaaga appadiye nirkkiradhu. Pallavar kaalathilaye attraction. Elephants kondu thalla muyarchiththum nagaravillai endru kadhai. 'Vaan Irai Kal' endru Tamilil peyar. Perfect photo spot - tourists favorite!

instruction: Property வாங்கும்போது பொதுவான தவறுகள் என்ன?
output:
Before Purchase:
1. ❌ EC 13 years மட்டும் பார்ப்பது → ✅ குறைந்தது 30 years EC பாருங்க
2. ❌ Patta இருந்தால் போதும் → ✅ Patta = Possession, Title = Ownership (Both different)
3. ❌ Seller-ன் வாக்கை நம்புவது → ✅ Lawyer மூலம் independent title search
4. ❌ Guideline Value-க்கு register → ✅ Under-reporting = Black money, legal issues
5. ❌ Agricultural land verify இல்லாமல் வாங்குவது → ✅ Land ceiling, conversion check

During Registration:
6. ❌ யாரையாவது witness-ஆக கூட்டிட்டு போவது → ✅ Trusted persons மட்டும்
7. ❌ Document படிக்காமல் sign → ✅ Every clause படிங்க, Lawyer present-ல் sign

After Purchase:
8. ❌ Patta transfer செய்யாமல் விடுவது → ✅ 3 months-க்குள் transfer application
9. ❌ Property tax miss → ✅ Penalty + legal issues
10. ❌ PMAY subsidy claim செய்யாமல் விடுவது → ✅ First home buyers-க்கு lakhs save

instruction: விதவை ஓய்வூதியத்திற்கு எப்படி விண்ணப்பிப்பது?
output: கணவர் இறப்பு சான்றிதழ், Aadhaar, ration card, bank passbook copy எடுத்து taluk office-ல் விண்ணப்பிக்கவும். Online-ல் tnpensions.gov.in-ல் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Siddhar samaadhigal engellam ullana?

instruction: TNPSC free coaching enge kidaikkum?
output: Free coaching centres: 1) Government Free Coaching - Chennai, Trichy, Madurai, Coimbatore (Apply through Employment Exchange) 2) BC/MBC Welfare Department coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare (SC/ST) 4) District Collectorate coaching programs 5) IAS Academy free batches. Online free: TNPSC Shouters, Group Exam Tamil YouTube channels, Telegram groups. Selection: Merit + income based. Apply early - limited seats.

instruction: National Scholarship Portal (NSP) மூலம் எந்தெந்த scholarships கிடைக்கும்?
output: NSP scholarships: 1) Pre-matric SC/ST/OBC 2) Post-matric SC/ST/OBC 3) MHRD Merit scholarship 4) PM scholarship for wards of defence personnel 5) Minority scholarships 6) Top class education scholarship. Apply: www.scholarships.gov.in. One portal for 100+ schemes. Documents: Aadhaar, bank account, income certificate, caste certificate, marks. Deadline: October-November usually.

instruction: Siva Vaakkiyar yaar? Avaradhu paadalgal sirappu enna?
output: Siva Vaakkiyar migavum controversial siddhar. Samaya sadangukalai, poojaikkalai kadumayaga vimarsithavar. 'Jaadhi illai, samayam illai' endru pesiyavar. 'Natta kallai deivam endru naalu poo saaththiye, sutri vandhu munumunutthaal sollumO mundhai vinai?' - idol worship-a kelvi ketkum vari. Rational thinking-a 1000 varudangalukkku munnbae pesiyavar!

instruction: Roommate-ஓட problem இருக்கு. Handle பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Tips: 1) Communication first - politely discuss issues 2) Set ground rules - sleep time, study time, cleanliness 3) Respect personal space 4) Compromise needed from both sides 5) If serious issue - approach warden 6) Room change request (last resort) 7) Avoid gossip, direct conversation better. Remember: You're both adjusting. Patience required. Good roommate = lifelong friend possible.

instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Government school-la padichaa success aaga mudiyaadhu
output: Fact: Fact: Pala IAS officers, Doctors, Engineers government school products. 7.5% reservation pona piragu government school NEET toppers athigaritthullanar. Quality depends on student effort + teacher dedication. Many district toppers from government schools. Free education + scholarships = excellent opportunity.

instruction: Divorce-la wife-kku enna rights irukku?
output: Rights: 1) Maintenance (permanent alimony), 2) Streedhan (gifts given at marriage), 3) Share in husband's property (if jointly acquired), 4) Child custody preference (especially below 5 years), 5) Residence right till divorce. Interim maintenance during case nadakkumbodhe kidaikkum.

instruction: Bharathidasan yaar? Yaen 'Puratchi Kavi' endru azhaikkappadugiraar?
output: Bharathidasan (1891-1964) - 'Puratchi Kavi' endru azhaikkappadubavar. Sirappugal: 1) Tamil mozhi patru - 'Tamizhukku amudhenru per', 2) Samooga seerthiruththam - jaadhi ethirppu, moodanambikkai ethirppu, 3) Pen urimai - 'Kudumba Vilakku', 4) Dravidian movement poet, 5) Bharathiyaaroda seedar. 'Irupadhu Nootraandu', 'Pandiyan Parisu', 'Kudumba Vilakku' famous padaippugal. Schools-la paadappadugiradhu.

instruction: HIV/AIDS treatment enge free-yaa kidaikkum?
output: Free at ART (Anti-Retroviral Therapy) Centres. TN has 100+ ART centres. Services: 1) HIV testing (free, confidential), 2) ART medicines (lifelong free), 3) CD4 count tests, 4) Opportunistic infection treatment, 5) Counseling, 6) PPTCT (pregnant women). Location: District hospitals, medical colleges. TANSACS: State AIDS control body. Helpline: 1097 (AIDS helpline). Confidentiality guaranteed.

instruction: எந்த vaccines adults-க்கு வேணும்?
output: Recommended: 1) Influenza (flu) - yearly (especially elderly, diabetics), 2) Pneumococcal - 65+ years, 3) Tetanus booster - every 10 years, 4) Hepatitis B - if not taken earlier, 5) HPV - up to 26 years, 6) COVID - as per current guidelines. Pregnancy: Tetanus, Pertussis. Travel: Yellow fever, etc. based on destination. Cost: Some free at government, others subsidized. Consult doctor for personalized schedule.

instruction: விவசாயி குடும்பத்தில் பிறந்தவர்களுக்கு admission-ல் preference உண்டா?
output: ஆம். TNAU-வில் farmer quota இருக்கு. விவசாயி சான்றிதழ் (farmer certificate) வைத்து apply செய்யலாம். Rural area students-க்கு weightage கிடைக்கும். Krishi Vigyan Kendra-வில் free training-உம் உண்டு.

instruction: TNPSC free coaching எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: Free coaching centres: 1) Government Free Coaching - Chennai, Trichy, Madurai, Coimbatore (Apply through Employment Exchange) 2) BC/MBC Welfare Department coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare (SC/ST) 4) District Collectorate coaching programs 5) IAS Academy free batches. Online free: TNPSC Shouters, Group Exam Tamil YouTube channels, Telegram groups. Selection: Merit + income based. Apply early - limited seats.

instruction: Bank Jobs-ku ennenna exams irukku? Eligibility enna?
output:
**Bank Exams:**

1. **IBPS PO:** PSB Officer, Degree, 20-30 age, ₹52,000+ salary
2. **IBPS Clerk:** PSB Clerk, Degree, 20-28 age, ₹28,000+ salary
3. **SBI PO:** SBI Officer, Most prestigious
4. **SBI Clerk:** SBI Clerical
