instruction: Counseling/therapy எங்கே கிடைக்கும்? Cost என்ன?
output: Options: 1) Government hospitals - free (limited slots), 2) NGOs - free/subsidized (iCall, Snehi, etc.), 3) Private practitioners - Rs.500-3000/session, 4) Online platforms - Rs.300-1500/session (Practo, Amaha, YourDOST). Types: Clinical psychologist, counselor, psychiatrist (for medicines). Verify: RCI registration for psychologists. Tip: Many offer sliding scale fees based on income.

instruction: BC/MBC/SC/ST Scholarship எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or scholarships.gov.in through school/college. Documents: Community certificate, income certificate, marksheet, Aadhaar, bank account. Benefits: Full fee waiver + monthly stipend ₹500-1,500. Apply within deadline each year.

instruction: Employment Exchange-ல் register செய்வது worth-ஆ?
output: Benefits: 1) Government job notifications 2) Seniority based on registration date 3) Free career guidance 4) Skill training opportunities 5) Private job placement 6) Self-employment scheme guidance. Register: District Employment Office with certificates. Renewal: Every year or seniority lost. Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar. Online renewal available now. Some government jobs require Employment Exchange registration.

instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Film industry card registration. 3000 fee for FEFSI/TFPC membership.' Industry card kedaikum aa?
output: FEFSI/TFPC membership through proper union process with verification. Membership requires industry introduction and work history. No SMS-based instant registration. Visit official union offices. Scammers know artists want industry recognition - selling fake memberships.

instruction: Facebook-ல் அழகான profile picture உள்ள ஒருவர் friend request அனுப்பினார், பணம் கேட்கிறார். நம்பலாமா?
output: இது classic romance scam. Profile pictures stolen ஆக இருக்கலாம். Online-ல் யாருக்கும் பணம் அனுப்பாதீர்கள். Video call கேளுங்கள் - மறுத்தால் scam.

instruction: Job மாறும்போது PF transfer எப்படி?
output: Same UAN continue ஆகும் - transfer தேவையில்லை (auto-transfer). Old account + new account merge: EPFO portal → Online Services → Transfer Request. New employer-கிட்ட UAN கொடுங்க. Transfer: 10-15 days. Withdrawal பண்ணாம transfer பண்றது tax-efficient.

instruction: Employer experience letter/relieving letter thara marukkiraar
output: Steps: 1) Written request (email/letter), 2) HR head escalation, 3) Labour Commissioner complaint, 4) Civil Court mandatory injunction. Documents rightfully yours. Background verification-la issue varum - previous employer-kku new employer-kitta explain pannunga.

instruction: UPI fraud aanaal udane enna seyyanum?
output: Golden hour (first 24 hours mukkiyam): 1) Bank-kku immediately call - transaction block, 2) 1930 helpline (cyber fraud), 3) cybercrime.gov.in-la complaint, 4) UPI app-la report, 5) Nearby police station FIR. Amount recover chance: 24 hours-la report = higher chance.

instruction: JEE Main & Advanced endraal enna? IIT-ku eppadi povadhu?
output:
**JEE Exam:**

**Two Levels:**
1. **JEE Main:** For NITs, IIITs, State colleges
2. **JEE Advanced:** For IITs only (after Main qualify)

**JEE Main Pattern:**
- Physics, Chemistry, Maths - 100 marks each
- Total: 300 marks, 90 questions
- Online exam, 3 hours
- Negative marking: -1

**IIT Path:**
12th PCM (75%) → JEE Main (Top 2.5L) → JEE Advanced → IIT

**TN Students:**
- TNEA uses JEE Main score option
- Anna University through TNEA: tneaonline.org

**Attempts:** 2 per year, Max in 3 consecutive years

instruction: Thiruvalluvar yaar? Avar eppo vaazhndhar?
output: Thiruvalluvar ulagap pugazh petra Tamilk kavignar, gnaani. Tamil marabinpadi avar 3000+ aandugalukkku mun vaazhndavar. Avar Mylapore-la pirandhadhagavum, nesavu thozhil seidhadhagavum korapadugiradhu. Ovvoru varudamum Thai 2-m thedhi (January 15/16) Thiruvalluvar Dhinamaga kondadapadugiradhu. Tamil naatkattiyinpadi Thiruvalluvar Aandu kanakkeedu seiyappadugiradhu.

instruction: Sore throat-க்கு gargle options?
output: Gargle remedies: 1) Salt + warm water (most common), 2) Turmeric + salt + warm water, 3) Honey + warm water, 4) Apple cider vinegar diluted, 5) Licorice (Athimathuram) decoction. Frequency: 3-4 times daily. Drinks: 1) Warm water throughout day, 2) Honey + lemon + warm water, 3) Tulsi tea. Avoid: Cold drinks, spicy food, shouting. Persistent: If >1 week, see ENT doctor.

instruction: JEE Main & Advanced-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
output:
**JEE Preparation:**

**Class 11:** Foundation - NCERT mastery, Concepts clear

**Class 12:** Intensive - Complete by Dec, Mock tests from March

**Books:**
- Maths: NCERT → RD Sharma → Cengage
- Physics: NCERT → HC Verma → DC Pandey
- Chemistry: NCERT (Must!) → MS Chouhan → OP Tandon

**Daily Routine:**
- 5:30 AM: Maths (Best time)
- Afternoon: Physics
- Evening: Chemistry + Revision

**Weekly:**
- Sunday: Full mock test
- Mistake analysis
- Weak topic revision

**JEE Advanced:** After Main, 2-month intensive, Complex problems

instruction: பதினெண் சித்தர்கள் (18 Siddhars) யார் யார்?

instruction: அரசு திட்டங்கள் பற்றிய பொதுவான தவறுகள் என்ன?
output:
PM-KISAN:
❌ எல்லா விவசாயிகளுக்கும் → ✅ Income Tax payers, Govt employees விலக்கு
❌ ₹6,000 ஒரே தவணையில் → ✅ ₹2,000 x 3 தவணை
❌ Apply செய்தால் போதும் → ✅ State Govt verification கட்டாயம்

Ayushman Bharat:
❌ எல்லா Hospital-லும் valid → ✅ Empanelled hospitals மட்டும்
❌ எல்லா treatment covered → ✅ 1,500 specific procedures மட்டும்
❌ OPD free → ✅ IPD மட்டும் covered
❌ எல்லோருக்கும் eligible → ✅ BPL (SECC 2011 data) மட்டும்

MUDRA Loan:
❌ Government கொடுக்கும் → ✅ Banks கொடுக்கும், Govt guarantee மட்டும்
❌ கண்டிப்பாக கிடைக்கும் → ✅ Bank's discretion
❌ Subsidy உள்ளது → ✅ No subsidy, only collateral-free

PMAY:
❌ Free வீடு → ✅ Subsidy மட்டும், full cost அல்ல
❌ ஏற்கனவே வீடு இருந்தாலும் eligible → ✅ Pucca house இருந்தால் ineligible

instruction: Packaged food-la foreign object kidaichadhu, action enna?
output: Serious matter! Steps: 1) Product preserve pannunga (don't throw), 2) Photos/videos edunga, 3) Batch number, manufacturing date note pannunga, 4) Company complaint + social media, 5) Food Safety Officer complaint (local municipal office), 6) Consumer Forum - compensation claim. FSSAI: Manufacturer license cancel aagalam. Health affected: Medical bills + additional compensation.

instruction: 'Call center job - English தெரிந்தால் போதும், training period-ல் தங்க வசதி, security deposit 10,000' என்கிறார்கள்.
output: Security deposit கேட்கும் employers-ஐ நம்பாதீர்கள். Training-க்கு legitimate companies பணம் கேட்காது. Company reviews online-ல் check செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Infosys Foundation scholarship students-க்கு கிடைக்குமா?
output: Infosys Foundation Programs: 1) Merit scholarships through partner NGOs 2) Rural education support 3) Research grants for PhD students 4) Infosys Prize - established researchers. Direct student scholarship: Through Buddy4Study partner programs. Engineering students: Campus recruitment preference. Apply: Check www.infosys.org annually for specific programs.

instruction: Scholarship எந்த websites-ல் தேடுவது?
output: முக்கிய websites: 1) scholarships.gov.in (NSP) - Government schemes 2) buddy4study.com - All scholarships aggregator 3) vidyalakshmi.co.in - Education loans + scholarships 4) respective state welfare department sites 5) University websites. Apps: Buddy4Study app, ScholarPlus. Set Google alerts for 'scholarship Tamil Nadu [year]'. Follow scholarship pages on social media.

instruction: Journalism/Mass Communication padikka sirantha college?
output: Top colleges: 1) Asian College of Journalism Chennai 2) Loyola College MA Journalism 3) Stella Maris 4) Anna University Media Sciences 5) SRM Mass Comm. Courses: BA/B.Sc Mass Comm (3 years), PG Diploma (1 year), MA Journalism (2 years). Jobs: TV channels, Newspapers, Digital media, PR agencies, Advertising. Skills: Writing, communication, current affairs knowledge. Internships important.

instruction: India-la padippuku education loan eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Steps: 1) Admission letter vaangunga 2) Bank-la application 3) Documents submit (mark sheets, fee structure, income proof) 4) Loan sanction 5) College-ku direct disbursement. Up to ₹4 lakh - no collateral. ₹4-7.5 lakh - third party guarantee. Above ₹7.5 lakh - property collateral. Interest subsidy available for EWS.

instruction: Project/Thesis work எப்படி approach பண்றது?
output: Project success: 1) Choose topic early - guide consultation 2) Literature review first - Google Scholar, journals 3) Weekly meetings with guide - progress show 4) Documentation parallel - don't wait till end 5) Plagiarism check - Turnitin/iThenticate 6) Presentation practice - viva preparation 7) Backup data - multiple locations 8) Deadline buffer - submit before last day. Tip: Original contribution expected, not just copy. Industry internship projects valuable.

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar Link eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar → Enter PAN and Aadhaar → OTP verify → Pay ₹1,000 late fee. SMS method: Send 'UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN>' to 567678. MANDATORY - unlinked PAN becomes inoperative!

instruction: பொதுப் பாதையை block பண்ணிட்டாங்க - யாரை approach பண்றது?
output: Public road block: Corporation/Panchayat complaint. Right of way dispute: Tahsildar. Private encroachment on public land: Police + Revenue Department. Court: Easement right case. Documents: Old survey records, photos of traditional path use.

instruction: Ayurveda/Siddha medicine safe-aa? Regulation irukkaa?
output: Regulated under AYUSH Ministry. Safety: Licensed products from registered manufacturers = regulated. Risks: 1) Heavy metals in some (lead, mercury), 2) Unlicensed products dangerous, 3) Interactions with allopathy. Verify: 1) AYUSH license number on pack, 2) Manufacturing license, 3) Batch number, expiry. Government: AYUSH hospitals provide regulated treatment. Caution: Inform allopathic doctor if taking AYUSH medicines.

instruction: Domicile certificate vs Nativity certificate - என்ன difference?
output: Nativity: Born in Tamil Nadu என்று prove. Issued by: Tahsildar. For: Reservation benefits, state quota seats. Domicile: Residing in state for specified period (usually 5+ years). For: Some central institution admissions. Both different! Don't confuse. TN admissions mostly need: Nativity OR studied in TN for specific years (varies by counselling). Documents: Birth certificate, school TC, Aadhaar showing TN address.

instruction: Doctor prescription படிக்க முடியல - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Ask doctor to write clearly/print, 2) Request pharmacist to explain, 3) Ask doctor to explain each medicine - when, how many, how long, 4) Take photo and ask family member/friend, 5) Pharmacy apps can help identify. Rights: Doctor should explain medicines in your language. Tip: Ask doctor to write in capital letters. Important: Understand dosage, timing, food relation (before/after meals).

instruction: QR scan panna cashback kidaikkum-nu stranger solraanga
output: Reverse scam ithu! QR scan panna panam varaadhu, pogum. Cashback-ku QR scan thevai illa. Stranger QR scan panna sollaa - fraud.

instruction: Fee கட்ட முடியல, college-ல் exam எழுத விடமாட்டேங்கறாங்க
output: Immediate options: 1) Talk to Principal - installment arrangement 2) Education loan - bank/college tie-up 3) Student Aid Fund (most colleges have) 4) Scholarship if eligible - pending payment proof show 5) NGO support - Rotary, Lions Club. Legal: College cannot deny exam for genuine financial difficulty. Escalate: University Registrar, UGC grievance. Documentation: Keep written request, college response. Prevention: Apply for scholarships, loans in advance.

instruction: Wrong medicine கொடுத்துட்டாங்க - action என்ன?
output: Pharmacy negligence! Actions: 1) Don't use if noticed, 2) Return with bill, 3) If used and harm occurred - medical treatment first, 4) Complaint: Drug Inspector, Consumer Forum. Compensation: Medical expenses + damages if harm. Severe harm/death: Criminal case possible (Section 304A). Evidence: Wrong medicine pack, prescription, bill. Pharmacist license: Can be cancelled.

instruction: Sexual assault-kku piragu medical help enge?
output: Immediate: 1) Any hospital emergency (government or private), 2) One-Stop Centre (OSC) at district hospitals. Services: 1) Free medical examination, 2) Emergency contraception, 3) STI prevention, 4) Forensic evidence collection, 5) Counseling. Rights: 1) Treatment cannot be refused, 2) Female doctor if requested (if available), 3) Privacy maintained. Police: Hospital can help file FIR. Time: Evidence best collected within 72 hours.

instruction: IBPS PO/Clerk Exam Pattern enna? Eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
output:
**IBPS PO/Clerk Pattern:**

**PO:**
- Prelims: English 30 + Quant 35 + Reasoning 35 = 100 (1 hour)
- Mains: 200 marks (3 hours) + Interview 100

**Clerk:**
- Prelims: Same 100 marks
- Mains: 200 marks (2 hrs 40 min)
- No Interview!

**Books:**
- Quant: RS Aggarwal
- Reasoning: RS Aggarwal, MK Pandey
- English: Wren & Martin
- Banking: Arihant

**6-Month Plan:**
- Month 1-2: Basics + Current affairs
- Month 3-4: Advanced + Speed
- Month 5-6: Mock tests daily

**Daily:** Quant 2hr + Reasoning 2hr + English 1hr + GK 1hr + Mock 1hr

instruction: Employer notice illaama terminate pannalaamaa?
output: Mudiyaadhu (except gross misconduct). Notice period: Agreement-la ullapadiye (usually 1-3 months). Notice illaattal notice pay kodukkanum. Probation period-lum reasonable notice venum. Termination reason writing-la kelunga.

instruction: Scholarship apply seiyum bodhu common mistakes enna?
output: Avoid pannunga: 1) Deadline miss panrathu - calendar-la note podunga 2) Incomplete application - ella fields nirappunga 3) Wrong documents - size, format check 4) Bank account mismatch with Aadhaar 5) Income certificate expired 6) Multiple applications same scheme 7) Fake certificates (blacklist aaveenga). Tips: Apply early, keep scanned copies ready, check status regularly.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Nursing council license renewal overdue. Pay 8000 immediately or face suspension.' License suspend aagidumaa?
output: TN Nursing Council renewal through official council office and portal. Renewal fees much lower than 8000. Suspension requires proper show cause notice, not phone threats. Check tamilnadunursingcouncil.com for actual process and fees. Never pay phone callers.

instruction: தமிழ்நாடு பொறியியல் சேர்க்கை (TNEA) கவுன்சிலிங் எப்படி நடக்கும்?
output: TNEA கவுன்சிலிங் படிகள்: 1) www.tneaonline.org-ல் பதிவு செய்யுங்கள் 2) +2 மதிப்பெண் அடிப்படையில் தரவரிசை 3) ஆன்லைன் சாய்ஸ் ஃபில்லிங் 4) ஒதுக்கீடு முடிவு 5) கல்லூரியில் சேர்க்கை. கட்டணம்: ₹500 (SC/ST இலவசம்). முக்கியம்: கட் ஆஃப் மார்க் கவனியுங்கள், பிரபலமான கல்லூரிகளுக்கு அதிக மதிப்பெண் தேவை.

instruction: En paiyan 10th padikkiran. Future planning eppadi panrathu? Wrong decision edukka koodaadhu?
output: Balanced approach: 1) Child's interest observe pannunga - Science/Arts/Sports 2) Aptitude test - free online available 3) Career counselling - school/district level 4) Multiple options explore - don't fix one path early 5) Financial planning start - education costs rising. Avoid: 1) Forcing your dreams on child 2) Neighbour's child comparison 3) One exam = end of world mentality. Support: Encourage exploration, failure tolerance, self-discovery. Best investment = supportive environment. Trust your child!

instruction: முதல் தலைமுறை பட்டதாரி scholarship எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Scheme: பெற்றோர் யாரும் degree படிக்காத குடும்பத்தின் முதல் பட்டதாரிக்கு. Amount: ₹2,000-5,000/ஆண்டு + fee concession. தகுதி: 1) Parents non-graduate certificate (Tahsildar) 2) Income ₹2 lakh கீழ் 3) UG படிப்பு. Apply: College scholarship committee மூலம். Documents: Parents education declaration, income certificate, community certificate, Aadhaar.

instruction: Police FIR poda maruthal enna seivathu?
output: Options: 1) Written complaint koduthu acknowledgment vaangunga, 2) SP/DSP-kku complaint, 3) Judicial Magistrate-kku complaint (Section 156(3) CrPC), 4) State Human Rights Commission, 5) Online: tnpolice.gov.in. FIR maruppathu offence - police-kku action aagum.

instruction: Generic medicine vs Branded - quality same-ஆ?
output: Yes! Same active ingredient, same dose, same effect. Difference: Brand name vs chemical name. Why cheaper: No advertising cost, no brand royalty. Quality: WHO-GMP certified generics = equal quality. Example: Paracetamol (generic) = Crocin/Dolo (branded). Verify: ISI mark, batch number, expiry date. Jan Aushadhi: Government generic stores - same quality, 50-90% cheaper.

instruction: Password hack aanaal enna seyyanum?
output: Immediate: 1) Password change (all linked accounts), 2) Enable 2FA, 3) Check login history, 4) Bank accounts verify, 5) Linked devices remove. If money lost: 1930 + bank + cybercrime.gov.in. Recovery email/phone verify pannunga.

instruction: Ayurveda doctor qualification enna?
output: Qualification: BAMS (Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery) - 5.5 years. Higher: MD (Ayurveda), MS (Ayurveda surgery). Registration: Central/State Ayurveda Council. Verify: CCIM register online, displayed certificate. In TN: Fewer Ayurveda practitioners than Siddha. Colleges: Limited in TN - most trained elsewhere. Practice: Registered practitioners can practice across India.

instruction: Meenavar (fishermen) family students-ku scholarship ulladha?
output: Aam, Fisheries Department Scholarships: 1) Pre-matric - ₹500-1,500/year 2) Post-matric - ₹2,000-5,000/year 3) Professional courses - ₹10,000-30,000 4) Higher education abroad - ₹10 lakh. Eligibility: Fishermen community certificate, registered fisherman's child. Apply: www.fisheries.tn.gov.in. Special quota in Anna University marine courses.

instruction: Senior citizen-ஐ பிள்ளைகள் பார்க்கல, maintenance கேட்கலாமா?
output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act 2007: 1) Children/relatives maintenance தரணும், 2) Tribunal: SDM/Collector level, 3) Max: Rs.10,000/month per child, 4) Non-compliance: 1 month jail + fine. Property transfer-க்கு பின் neglect: Transfer cancel பண்ணலாம். Free legal aid: District Legal Services Authority. Helpline: 14567 (Elder helpline).

instruction: CMCHIS (Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme) endraal enna?
output: ₹5 lakh health insurance per family. Coverage: 1,000+ procedures, All family members. Eligibility: TN ration card holder, Annual income below ₹1.2 lakh. Hospitals: Empanelled Govt + Private hospitals. Cashless: Show card for cashless treatment. Card: Check/download at cmchistn.com. Documents: Ration card, Aadhaar linking. Ayushman Bharat: CMCHIS + PMJAY merged in TN.

instruction: Police FIR போட மறுத்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Written complaint கொடுத்து acknowledgment வாங்குங்க, 2) SP/DSP-க்கு complaint, 3) Judicial Magistrate-க்கு complaint (Section 156(3) CrPC), 4) State Human Rights Commission, 5) Online: tnpolice.gov.in. FIR மறுப்பது offence - police-க்கு action ஆகும்.

instruction: கொங்கணர் pulse diagnosis-ஐ எப்படி explain பண்ணியிருக்கிறார்?
output: கொங்கணர் 'நாடி பரிட்சை' (pulse diagnosis) பற்றி விரிவாக எழுதியுள்ளார். மூன்று விரல்களால் மணிக்கட்டில் நாடியை உணர்வது - வாத நாடி, பித்த நாடி, கப நாடி. 'எந்த நாடி எப்படி அடிக்கிறது, என்ன நோய்' என்று formulas கொடுத்துள்ளார். Modern doctors-ம் appreciate பண்றாங்க இந்த ancient technique-ஐ. Without any equipment-ல் diagnosis செய்ய முடியும்!

instruction: RTI-ல் என்ன information கேட்க முடியாது?
output: Exemptions (Section 8): 1) National security, 2) Foreign relations, 3) Trade secrets, 4) Cabinet papers, 5) Personal information (no public interest), 6) Investigation documents (pending case), 7) Fiduciary relationship. Public interest override possible for some exemptions.

instruction: என் பிள்ளை marks குறைஞ்சு படிக்குது. Pressure கொடுக்கணுமா?
output: Approach wisely: 1) Understand reason first - health, interest, teaching quality, personal issues 2) Comparison avoid - every child different 3) Effort appreciate, not just results 4) Tutoring arrange if academic gap 5) Career alternatives discuss - marks ≠ only path 6) Mental health priority - pressure causes anxiety 7) Realistic expectations set. Reality: Many successful people were average students. Support > Pressure. Love unconditionally.

instruction: Live-in relationship-ல் பிறந்த குழந்தைக்கு rights இருக்கா?
output: ஆம். Supreme Court: Long-term live-in-ல் பிறந்த children legitimate. Father's property-ல் share உண்டு. Maintenance கேட்கலாம். Birth certificate-ல் father name போடலாம். DNA test மூலம் paternity prove பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: வழக்கறிஞர் நியமிக்க பணம் இல்லை. இலவச சட்ட உதவி எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: மாவட்ட சட்ட சேவைகள் ஆணையம் (DLSA): ஒவ்வொரு மாவட்டத்திலும் உள்ளது, தகுதியானவர்களுக்கு இலவச வழக்கறிஞர்கள் (ஆண்டு வருமானம் <₹3L), மாவட்ட நீதிமன்ற வளாகத்தில் விண்ணப்பம். தாலுகா சட்ட சேவைகள் குழு: தாலுகா மட்டத்தில். மாநில சட்ட சேவைகள்: tnsla.gov.in (தமிழ்நாடு), உதவி எண் 15100 (NALSA). சட்டக் கல்லூரி கிளினிக்குகள்: NLU, NLSIU - இலவச ஆலோசனை. NGO-க்கள்: Human Rights Law Network, Alternative Law Forum, PUCL. தகுதியானவர்கள்: SC/ST, பெண்கள்/குழந்தைகள், மூத்த குடிமக்கள், மாற்றுத்திறனாளிகள், தொழிலாளர்கள், கடத்தல்/பேரிடர் பாதிக்கப்பட்டவர்கள், வருமான வரம்புக்கு கீழ் உள்ளவர்கள்.

instruction: Salary தர மாட்டேங்குறாங்க, 3 months pending - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Written demand to employer, 2) Labour Inspector complaint, 3) Labour Court (if >Rs.15,000 dispute), 4) Civil Court recovery suit. Payment of Wages Act: Salary delay = interest + penalty. Documents: Appointment letter, salary slips, bank statements.

instruction: Dementia patient-க்கு legal protection என்ன?
output: Protections: 1) Guardianship: Court can appoint guardian for person/property, 2) Power of Attorney: Execute while still competent, 3) Senior Citizens Act: Protection from exploitation, 4) RPD Act: Disability rights. Financial: 1) Joint account with trusted person, 2) Nomination in all accounts, 3) Will execution early. Healthcare: Advance directive possible. Abuse: Report to police, Senior Citizens Tribunal.

instruction: Instagram-ல் 'binary options trading - 60 seconds-ல் profit' என்று ads வருகிறது. Try செய்யலாமா?
output: Binary options India-ல் illegal. இவை gambling போன்றவை, investment இல்லை. 90% people பணம் இழக்கிறார்கள். தொடாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Chennai-ல் free coaching centres எங்கே இருக்கு?
output: Free coaching Chennai: 1) Government Free Coaching Centre - Nungambakkam (UPSC, TNPSC) 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare coaching - Saidapet 3) BC/MBC coaching - Egmore 4) IAS Academy free batches - Anna Salai 5) Employment Exchange coaching - various locations. Apply: Respective department websites. Selection: Merit + income based. Also: Marina Library study hall, Connemara Library resources free.

instruction: 'பிரிவூர நாணம் துடைப்பது' - பிரிவின் வலி பற்றிய குறள் என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'பிரிவுற்றுக் கண்ணூட்ல் வேறுள்ளான் கண்ணூட்ல் புணர்வது சிந்திப்பான் போன்று'. அர்த்தம்: காதலன் பிரிந்து சென்றாலும், அவன் திரும்பி வருவான் என்ற நம்பிக்கையில் காதலி காத்திருக்கிறாள். Long-distance relationship-ஐ 2000 வருடங்களுக்கு முன்பே வள்ளுவர் புரிந்துகொண்டார்.

instruction: 'BGMI Tournament - Entry fee 200, prize pool 50,000' nu Discord la post paathen. Entry fee pay potten, tournament nadakkala, admin kaanama poyittaan.
output: Fake gaming tournaments Discord, Telegram la romba varum. Entry fee collect pannitu server delete panniduvaanga. Verified organizers - Skyesports, Nodwin - trust pannunga. Random Discord admins avoid. Entry fee low nu risk worth illa.

instruction: Bharatanatyam, Carnatic music படிக்க government institution இருக்கா?
output: Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University, Kalakshetra Foundation (Chennai), Government Music Colleges உள்ளன. Diploma, Degree courses available. Fee மிகக் குறைவு. Talented students-க்கு scholarship உண்டு.

instruction: ரங்கநாதர் கோயில் (ஸ்ரீரங்கம்) சிறப்பு என்ன?
output: ஸ்ரீரங்கம் ரங்கநாதஸ்வாமி கோயில் உலகின் மிகப்பெரிய functioning Hindu temple. சிறப்புகள்: 1) 7 பிரகாரங்கள் (walls) - 156 acres பரப்பு, 2) 21 கோபுரங்கள், 3) ராஜ கோபுரம் - 236 அடி (Asia's tallest), 4) 108 திவ்ய தேசங்களில் முதலாவது, 5) Vaikunta Ekadasi - ஒரே நாளில் 10 lakh+ பேர் வருவார்கள். காவேரி நதி நடுவில் island-ல் உள்ளது. Vishnu temples-ல் மிக முக்கியம்.

instruction: Mental illness treatment government hospital-la kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! Free psychiatric services available. Where: 1) Institute of Mental Health (Kilpauk - Chennai), 2) District Mental Health Program (DMHP) centres, 3) Medical college psychiatry OPD. Services: 1) Consultation, 2) Medicines, 3) Counseling, 4) Admission if needed. DMHP: Every district has mental health team. Helpline: iCALL - 9152987821, Vandrevala - 1860-2662-345. Stigma-free treatment encouraged.

instruction: Agriculture padikkanum-pa, enna college nalladhu?
output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) best-pa. Coimbatore main campus, Thanjavur, Madurai-layum colleges irukku. Admission: 12th Biology marks basis counselling. Fees kammi - ₹5000-10000/year. Farmers pillaikku priority irukku. Scholarship, hostel free. Modern farming techniques learn pannalam. Own land irundha double benefit.

instruction: Call vandhuduchu yi - 'Unga account block aagudhuyyi, KYC update pannungayyi' nu. OTP kekkuraangayyi. Enna pannurathu?
output: Fraud yi idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekkumaa yi? Kekaadhu yi! 'Block aagudhu' nu bayamudhuthuraanga. Branch ku nee poi pesuyyi. Perundurai, Bhavani la textile owners ipdi maatikirukkanga yi. Phone la details kudukkaadhe yi.

instruction: Porumaiyoda palan enna?
output: Kural: 'Unnaadhu norpaar periyar pirarsollum innaachol norpaarin pin'. Kadunchorkkalai poRuppavargal viradham iruppavargalai vida periyavargal. Melum: 'Oruththaarai ondraaga vaiyaarae vaippar poruththaaraip pondraga vaippar'. Revenge eduppavarai makkal madhikka maattaargal, poRuppavarai madhippaargal. Patience earns respect!

instruction: Government school student NEET crack panna mudiyumaa?
output: Absolutely yes! 7.5% reservation + determination = success. Resources: 1) Free coaching - Government NEET centres (apply through school) 2) Online free - NPTEL, SWAYAM, YouTube 3) NCERT books sufficient for Biology 4) Previous year papers - NTA website free. Success stories: Many govt school students top NEET. Challenges: English medium switch, lab exposure. Solutions: Tamil medium NEET option available, virtual labs online. Believe in yourself!

instruction: சிம் ஸ்வாப் மோசடியில் கணக்கு காலியானது. சிறப்பு நடைமுறை என்ன?
output: படி 1 (முதலில்): தொலைத்தொடர்பு நிறுவனத்தை அழைக்கவும் - Airtel: 121/1800-103-4444, Jio: 198/1800-889-9999, Vi: 199/1800-119-1199, BSNL: 1800-180-1503. சொல்லுங்கள்: 'அங்கீகரிக்கப்படாத சிம் மாற்றம் நடந்தது, என் எண்ணை உடனே தடுக்கவும்.' படி 2: அனைத்து வங்கிகளையும் ஒரே நேரத்தில் அழைக்கவும், கணக்குகளை முடக்கவும், மொபைல்/UPI வங்கியை நிறுத்தவும். படி 3: அசல் அடையாள அட்டை மற்றும் காவல் புகாருடன் தொலைத்தொடர்பு கடைக்குச் சென்று புதிய சிம் பெறுங்கள். படி 4: FIR - IT சட்டம் பிரிவு 66C (அடையாளத் திருட்டு), IPC பிரிவு 420 (மோசடி). மீட்பு வாய்ப்பு: 2-3 மணி நேரத்திற்குள் நடவடிக்கை எடுத்தால் 30-50%.

instruction: TNPSC-ku Free Coaching enga kidaikkum?
output:
**TNPSC Free Coaching:**

**Government:**
1. **TNSF:** Residential, SC/ST/MBC - tnsf.org.in
2. **Dr. Ambedkar:** SC/ST - adwelfare.tn.gov.in
3. **BC/MBC Coaching:** bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in
4. **Minorities:** tamilnaduminoritywelfare.org

**Universities:** Anna, Madras, Bharathiar - For students

**District Collector:** Free weekend classes in all districts

**Online Free:**
- tnpsc.gov.in official materials
- TNSF YouTube
- Target TNPSC YouTube

**Documents:**
- Community Certificate
- Income Certificate (< ₹2-3 lakh)
- Education certificates
- Aadhaar

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Medical Council license renewal overdue. Pay 15,000 penalty now or license suspended from tomorrow.' Panic aagudhu, enna pannanum doctor?
output: State Medical Council sends renewal notices months in advance through registered mail. Check NMC/SMC portal for actual status. Scammers create urgency targeting doctors' fear of license issues. Never pay without verifying from official council website.

instruction: என் விவசாய நிலத்தை வீட்டு மனையாக மாற்ற என்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output:
**விவசாய நில மாற்றம் (Land Conversion):**

**எங்கே Apply செய்வது:**
- District Collector Office
- Online: eservices.tn.gov.in

**வகைகள்:**
1. **NA Conversion (Non-Agricultural)**
   - விவசாயம் → Residential/Commercial
   
2. **Layout Approval** (பல மனைகள்)
   - DTCP approval தேவை

**தேவையான ஆவணங்கள்:**
- Patta (உங்கள் பெயரில்)
- Chitta & Adangal
- FMB (Field Measurement Book)
- EC (30 years)
- Tax receipts
- Location sketch
- NOC from Agriculture Dept (சில cases)

**கட்டணம்:**
- Conversion fee: Land value-ன் 1-3%
- Market value-ன் 50% stamp duty difference

**Process:**
1. Application submit
2. Revenue Dept verification
3. Agriculture Dept NOC
4. Site inspection
5. Collector approval
6. Patta-ல் land type மாற்றம்

**காலம்:** 2-6 மாதங்கள்

**தடைகள்:**
- Wet land (நஞ்சை) → கடினம்
- Prime agricultural zone → Not allowed
- 2 acre-க்கு மேல் → Special permission

**Penalty (without conversion):**
- Unauthorized construction
- Panchayat action
- Legal issues during sale

instruction: Fake product vitra e-commerce site-kku case podalaamaa?
output: Aama. Counterfeit/fake products virpathu illegal. Consumer forum-la compensation claim seyyalam. Trademark owner-kkum report pannalam. Police complaint (IPC 420 - cheating) podalam. E-commerce platform-um liable.

instruction: வாடகை ஒப்பந்தம் (Rental Agreement) கட்டாயமா?
output: ஆம், 2017 சட்டப்படி கட்டாயம். எழுத்துப்பூர்வமான ஒப்பந்தம் இல்லாவிட்டால் சிக்கல் வரும். 11 மாதத்திற்கு மேல் இருந்தால் Registration கட்டாயம். Stamp paper-ல் எழுதி Sub-Registrar office-ல் register செய்ய வேண்டும்.

instruction: NEET preparation-ku what should I do-nga? Free options?
output: NCERT Biology, Physics, Chemistry - line by line read pannu/pannunga. Free coaching: Government centres-la apply pannu through school. Online free: YouTube (Physics Wallah), SWAYAM. 7.5% reservation govt school students-ku. Daily 6-8 hours padikka venum. Previous year papers practice important.

instruction: Insurance policy lapse aagum-nu call vandhudhu, renew panna OTP venum-nu solraanga
output: Insurance company OTP kettuka maattaanga sir. Policy details official website-la check pannunga. Caller-ku OTP kodukkaadheega - scam ithu.

instruction: Ayurvedic products reliable brands எவை?
output: Established brands: 1) Arya Vaidya Sala (Kottakkal), 2) Arya Vaidya Pharmacy (AVP), 3) Dabur, 4) Baidyanath, 5) Himalaya, 6) Patanjali (controversial but licensed), 7) Nagarjuna, 8) Kerala Ayurveda, 9) SNA Oushadhasala. Check: 1) AYUSH license on pack, 2) Manufacturing date/expiry, 3) Batch number. Avoid: Unbranded, loose, online unknowns. Government: IMPCOPS (TN government pharmacy) for Siddha/Ayurveda.

instruction: Exam முந்தின நாள் என்ன செய்யணும்? என்ன செய்யக்கூடாது?
output: Do: 1) Light revision - formula sheet, key points only 2) Organize hall ticket, pens, watch 3) Check exam centre route 4) Early dinner, light food 5) Sleep by 10 PM (7-8 hours) 6) Positive thoughts 7) Relaxation - music, walk. Don't: 1) New topics - creates confusion 2) Heavy study - exhaustion 3) Late night - affects performance 4) Junk food, caffeine excess 5) Negative friends/news 6) Panic discussions with peers 7) Social media overthinking. Trust your preparation!

instruction: கிசான் கிரெடிட் கார்டு (KCC) எப்படி வாங்குவது? என்ன benefits?
output: விவசாயிகளுக்கு குறைந்த வட்டியில் கடன். வட்டி: 4% (Subvention பிறகு - 7% base, 3% interest subvention for timely repayment). Credit Limit: ₹3 லட்சம் வரை (Land area-க்கு ஏற்ப). Uses: விதை, உரம், பூச்சிக்கொல்லி, equipment, harvest expenses. Repayment: Flexible - crop cycle-க்கு ஏற்ப. Apply: Bank branch with land documents, Aadhaar, passport photo. PM-KISAN beneficiaries-க்கு simplified process. Fishermen, Animal husbandry-க்கும் KCC உண்டு.

instruction: Kayakalpam (Rejuvenation) endraal enna?
output: Kayakalpam enbadhu udalai puththunarchiyaakki, vayathai thaamadhappaduththum murai. Siddhargal neenda aayulodu vaazhndhathaga korappaduvatharkku idhuvae kaaranam. Idhil adangum: 1) Kurippittta herbs utkollal, 2) Detox seidhal, 3) Yoga matrum praanaayaamam, 4) Diet restrictions, 5) Manadhai suththappaduththudhal. Modern anti-aging research-la sila siddhar herbs study seiyappaduginrana!

instruction: PM-AJAY grama sugadhara thittam endraal enna?
output: Pradhan Mantri Ayushman Arogya Yojana - Rural healthcare. Components: Health & Wellness Centres (HWC) - Primary healthcare, Teleconsultation. Services: 12 essential services - Maternal care, Child health, Communicable diseases, NCD screening (Diabetes, BP), Mental health, Dental, Eye care. Free: All services free at HWC. Location: Sub-centre/PHC within 30 min travel. Access: Aadhaar/ration card enough, registration required.

instruction: Agriculture education padikka enna vazhi?
output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) Coimbatore-la BSc Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry courses irukku. 12th Biology group padichirundha TNAU counselling moolam seralam. Government job opportunities niraiya.

instruction: Online degree programs தமிழ்நாட்டில் எங்கே கிடைக்கும்?
output: UGC-approved online programs: 1) SWAYAM platform (free courses) 2) NPTEL (IIT courses) 3) Anna University online 4) Madras University online 5) Private universities (Amity, Manipal online). SWAYAM courses-க்கு credit transfer possible. MOOCs certificate-க்கு மதிப்பு அதிகரித்துள்ளது. Coursera, edX courses-ஐயும் பயன்படுத்தலாம்.

instruction: AC room-la irundhaa cold varum - unmaiyaa?
output: Myth! Cold caused by: Viruses, not temperature. AC connection: 1) Dry air irritates throat, 2) Poor AC maintenance = allergens, 3) Indoor crowding = virus spread, 4) Temperature shock going in/out. Prevention: Clean AC filters, adequate humidity, proper ventilation. Cold = viral infection - spread by contact/droplets, not AC itself.

instruction: PM-KISAN scheme enna?
output: Direct cash transfer of ₹6,000/year (₹2,000 x 3 installments) to land-owning farmers. Register at pmkisan.gov.in with Aadhaar, land records, bank account. Exclusions: Income tax payers, govt employees, professionals. State verification required.

instruction: Hospital-la cleanliness illa, infection risk - complain pannalaamaa?
output: Yes! Infection control mandatory. Complaint: 1) Hospital management first, 2) DHS office (District Health Services), 3) Clinical Establishment Authority, 4) Municipal health officer (for general sanitation). Evidence: Photos, videos (if possible). Severe: Hospital license can be suspended. Also check: Bio-medical waste disposal, hand hygiene stations, clean linens.

instruction: புதிய ரேஷன் கார்டு எப்படி விண்ணப்பிப்பது?
output: tnpds.gov.in website-ல் online விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம். அல்லது அருகிலுள்ள taluk office-ல் form 1 நிரப்பி கொடுக்கலாம். Aadhaar, address proof, income certificate தேவை. 30 நாட்களில் கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Vehicle fitness certificate எப்போது வேணும்?
output: Transport vehicles: Every year (8 years-க்குப் பிறகு every 6 months). Non-transport: 15 years-க்குப் பிறகு every 5 years. Test: Emission, brakes, lights, etc. Expired fitness: Rs.2,000 fine. Online booking: parivahan.gov.in.

instruction: Abroad படிக்க scholarship கிடைக்குமா?
output: BC/MBC overseas scholarship, Dr. Ambedkar overseas scholarship (SC), national overseas scholarship உண்டு. TOEFL/IELTS scores, admission letter தேவை. ஆண்டுக்கு Rs.15-20 lakh வரை கிடைக்கலாம்.

instruction: Corporate training-la Thirukkural eppadi use aagudhu?
output: Pala multinational companies Thirukkural-based training nadaththugindrana: 1) Leadership workshops - Arasiyal adhigaarangal, 2) Ethics training - Araththuppaal, 3) Team building - Natpu adhikaaram, 4) Communication skills - Solvanmai, 5) Decision making - Therindhu seyalvagai. Infosys, TCS pondra IT companies Tamil Nadu offices-la idhu popular. 'Ancient Indian wisdom meets modern management' endru promote panraanga.

instruction: ஒன்றுக்கு மேற்பட்ட PAN இருந்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: சட்டவிரோதம்! ₹10,000 அபராதம் விதிக்கலாம். Duplicate PAN Surrender செய்ய: 1. onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Request for New PAN Card or/and Changes' 2. Item 11-ல் surrender செய்ய வேண்டிய PAN numbers எழுதவும் 3. Original PAN Cards அனுப்பவும் 4. கட்டணம்: ₹107. ஒரே PAN மட்டும் வைத்துக்கொள்ளவும்

instruction: 'TRAI - உங்கள் mobile number block ஆகும், Aadhaar verify செய்ய 1 press செய்யுங்கள்' என்று IVR call வந்தது.
output: TRAI இப்படி call செய்யாது. Mobile block செய்ய direct action எடுப்பார்கள், IVR அல்ல. இது scam call. Disconnect செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: எங்கள் கிராமத்தில் வேலை இல்லை. MGNREGA Job Card எப்படி வாங்குவது? வேலை எப்படி கேட்பது?
output:
**MGNREGA - 100 நாள் வேலை உத்தரவாதம்:**

**Job Card பெறுதல்:**

**Step 1: விண்ணப்பம்**
- எங்கே: Gram Panchayat Office
- Family-க்கு ஒரு card
- 18+ வயது உறுப்பினர்கள் சேர்க்கலாம்

**Step 2: ஆவணங்கள்**
- Address proof (Ration Card/Aadhaar)
- Age proof
- Family photo
- No income proof needed!

**Step 3: Card issue**
- 15 நாட்களுக்குள் card கிடைக்கும்
- இலவசம்
- Photo laminated card

**வேலை கேட்பது:**

**Step 1: எழுத்துபூர்வ விண்ணப்பம்**
- Gram Panchayat-ல் எழுத்தில் கொடுக்கவும்
- குறைந்தது 14 நாட்கள் வேலை கேட்கவும்
- Acknowledgment வாங்கவும்

**Step 2: வேலை ஒதுக்கீடு**
- 15 நாட்களுக்குள் வேலை கொடுக்க வேண்டும்
- 5 km சுற்றளவில் வேலை
- இல்லாவிட்டால் 10% extra wage

**Step 3: வேலை செய்தல்**
- Muster roll-ல் attendance
- பகல் வேலை, shade facility
- குடிநீர், First Aid கட்டாயம்

**கூலி:**
- TN: ₹294/நாள் (2024)
- 14 நாட்களுக்குள் Bank-ல் செலுத்த வேண்டும்

**வேலை கிடைக்கவில்லை என்றால்:**
- Unemployment Allowance கேட்கலாம்
- 1/4 to 1/2 wage rate
- Block Development Officer-க்கு புகார்

**புகார்:**
- Gram Sabha-ல் எழுப்பலாம்
- nrega.nic.in - online complaint
- District Programme Coordinator

instruction: Emergency contraceptive pill - எப்படி use பண்றது?
output: When: After unprotected sex to prevent pregnancy. Time: Within 72 hours (3 days) - earlier = more effective. Available: 1) Pharmacy (no prescription for most), 2) Government hospitals - free. Brands: I-pill, Unwanted-72, etc. How: Single dose or two doses 12 hours apart. Not for: Regular use (regular contraception better). Side effects: Nausea, period changes - temporary. NOT an abortion pill.

instruction: என் அம்மாவுக்கு (60+) 'Ayushman Bharat card-ல் problem, OTP கொடுங்கள் fix பண்ணுவோம்' என்று call வந்தது.
output: Ayushman Bharat team OTP கேட்காது. Senior citizens-ஐ target செய்யும் health scheme scam. OTP கொடுக்காதீர்கள். 14555 helpline-ல் verify செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: 'Fasal Bima claim ready irukku, 1000 processing fee pay pannungappa' nu call vandhirukkappa. Claim apply pannirukkenbappa, genuine aappa?
output: Crop insurance claim ku phone la fee kekaadhuappa! Agriculture office la irundhu official communication varumappa. Processing fee nu call panradhu fraudappa. Thiruvaiyaru la farmers ipdi maatikirukkanga. Agriculture office ku poi verify pannungappa.

instruction: 'இன்சொலால் ஈரம் அளைஇ' - நல்ல பேச்சின் சக்தி என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'இன்சொலால் ஈரம் அளைஇ படிறிலவாம் செம்பொருள் கண்டார்வாய்ச் சொல்'. அர்த்தம்: இனிமையான சொற்கள் அன்போடு கலந்து, வஞ்சனை இல்லாமல் உண்மையைப் பேசுவதே நல்ல பேச்சு. Communication skills பற்றிய குறள் இது. Words + Love + Truth = Perfect communication.

instruction: FSSAI License eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Mandatory for food business. Basic (up to ₹12L turnover): ₹100/year. State (₹12L-₹20Cr): ₹2,000-5,000/year. Apply at fssai.gov.in with ID proof, address proof, business proof. Display license number on food products. Renewal annual.

instruction: Fee comparison table
output: Engineering: Govt ₹50K/year, Private ₹1-2 lakh. Medical: Govt ₹13.5K/year, Private ₹10-20 lakh. Arts/Science: Govt ₹2-5K/year, Private ₹20-50K. MBA: Govt ₹30-50K/year, Private ₹2-5 lakh. ITI: Govt Free, Private ₹20-40K. Polytechnic: Govt ₹1.5-3K/year, Private ₹30-50K.

instruction: Mother's Day offer - 'Free gold chain for mom! Just pay making charge 2999' ad வந்துச்சு. Order பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam! 'Free gold + making charge' trap. Mother's Day sentiment exploit பண்றாங்க. Gold chain deliver பண்ண மாட்டாங்க or fake piece அனுப்புவாங்க. Trusted jewellers மட்டும் buy பண்ணுங்க. Online gold offers avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Bogar samaadhi engge ulladhu?
output: Bogar samaadhi Pazhani Murugan kovilukkullaeyae ulladhu. Sanctum sanctorum-kku keezhae underground-la Bogar indrum dhiyaanathil iruppathaga nambappadugiradhu. Andha idaththil darshan seiyalam. 'Bogar' endra 2020 Tamil movie idhaippatriyathu. Pazhanikku ponaal Bogar samaadhiyai dharisikka marakkaadheeargal!

instruction: Bogar Siddhar yaar? Avar sirappu enna?
output: Bogar Siddhar migavum pugazh petra Siddhargalil oruvar. Rasavaathathil (alchemy) expert. Pazhani Murugan kovilil ulla Moolavar silaiyai Navapashaanam (9 vagai vishangal) kondu seidhathaaga nambappadugiradhu. China-vukkum sendru Tao thaththuvathai karrathaagavum, angge 'Lao Tzu' endru azhaikkapattathagavum silar nambugiraargal (controversial claim).

instruction: Motor Accident Claim eppadi file seivathu?
output: File at: Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT) - District Court. Documents: FIR, medical records, bills, death certificate (if applicable), income proof, insurance details. Time limit: No strict limit (reasonable time). Lawyer not mandatory. Lok Adalat-lum settle aagalam.

instruction: திருக்குறளில் எத்தனை குறள்கள் உள்ளன?
output: 1330 குறள்கள். 133 அதிகாரங்கள், ஒவ்வொரு அதிகாரத்திலும் 10 குறள்கள். இந்த எண்ணிக்கையை நினைவில் வைக்க: 133 x 10 = 1330.

instruction: PhD சேர்க்கை தமிழ்நாட்டில் எப்படி நடக்கிறது?
output: படிகள்: 1) PG படிப்பு 55% marks (SC/ST 50%) 2) UGC NET/CSIR NET/GATE/SLET தேர்ச்சி (fellowship-க்கு) 3) பல்கலைக்கழக entrance test + interview. Fellowship: JRF ₹31,000/மாதம், SRF ₹35,000/மாதம். Part-time PhD working professionals-க்கு available. Major universities: Anna, Madras, Bharathidasan, Bharathiar.

instruction: Site vaangap poren, ennenna paakkanum? (Chennai casual)
output: Mudhalila: 1) Patta yaar perla irukku, 2) EC 30 years clear-aa, 3) Survey number match aagudhaa, 4) Poramboke illaiye, 5) Approval (DTCP/CMDA) irukkaa. Ellaathaiyum lawyer-kitta verify pannunga. Rush-la vaangaadheenga.

instruction: 12 ஆழ்வார்கள் யார் யார்?
output: 12 ஆழ்வார்கள்: 1) பொய்கையாழ்வார், 2) பூதத்தாழ்வார், 3) பேயாழ்வார் - இம்மூவரும் 'முதலாழ்வார்கள்', 4) திருமழிசையாழ்வார், 5) நம்மாழ்வார் - திருவாய்மொழி பாடியவர், மிக முக்கியமானவர், 6) மதுரகவியாழ்வார், 7) குலசேகராழ்வார், 8) பெரியாழ்வார், 9) ஆண்டாள் - ஒரே பெண் ஆழ்வார், திருப்பாவை பாடியவர், 10) தொண்டரடிப்பொடியாழ்வார், 11) திருப்பாணாழ்வார், 12) திருமங்கையாழ்வார்.

instruction: Insulin storage எப்படி? Travel-ல் carry பண்ணலாமா?
output: Storage: Refrigerator (2-8°C), not freezer. In-use vial: Room temperature okay for 28 days (most). Travel: 1) Carry in hand luggage (flight), 2) Cooling pouch for long journeys, 3) Doctor letter for security check, 4) Carry extra supply. Signs of spoilage: Discoloration, particles, frosted appearance. Airport: Insulin + syringes allowed with prescription letter.

instruction: Hotel Management padippu Tamil Nadu-la enge ulladhu?
output: Top institutes: 1) IHM Chennai - Central Government 2) IHM Guruvayur - Private 3) SIHM Madurai - State 4) SRM Hotel School. Admission: NCHM JEE entrance + counselling. Eligibility: 12th pass 45-50%. Duration: 3 years BSc HM. Fees: Govt ₹50,000-80,000/year, Private ₹1-3 lakh/year. Jobs: Hotels, airlines, cruise ships, resorts. Good starting salary: ₹20,000-35,000.

instruction: Hall ticket missing, exam-ku poga mudiyumaa?
output: Emergency solutions: 1) Download duplicate from exam portal (DigiLocker link) 2) Contact exam centre - they have candidate list 3) Carry Aadhaar + Photo ID as backup 4) School/College principal letter 5) Reach early, explain to centre supervisor. For board exams: School coordinator can help. For competitive exams: Most allow with ID proof + declaration. Prevention: Download multiple copies, keep in phone, email to self. Last resort: Exam board helpline.

instruction: Appointment letter kodukkala - sattavirodhamaa?
output: Aama. Written employment contract kodukkanum. Appointment letter contents: Designation, salary, probation period, notice period, duties. Oral appointment-um valid aanaal prove panradhu kashtam. Always insist on written letter + copy vaangunga.

instruction: Pudhiya PAN Card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Easiest: Instant e-PAN at eportal.incometax.gov.in using Aadhaar - FREE and instant! Alternative: Apply at onlineservices.nsdl.com or pan.utiitsl.com - ₹107 for physical card, 15-20 days. Need ID proof, address proof, DOB proof, photo, and signature.

instruction: Exam day-la sick aayitten, alternative option irukkaa?
output: Options vary by exam: Board exams - No re-exam, arrear attempt only. Competitive exams - Generally no re-test. College internal - Medical certificate submit, re-test possible. Medical emergency: 1) Get doctor certificate immediately 2) Inform exam authority same day 3) Apply for special consideration. Some exams: PWD/Medical emergency provisions exist. NEET/JEE: One attempt lost, next year continue. Prevention: Health priority before exams, insurance coverage.

instruction: Varmam therapy என்றால் என்ன?
output: Varmam = Vital points in body (108 main points). Uses: 1) Treatment of pain, paralysis, injuries, 2) Martial arts (Varma Kalai), 3) Emergency first aid. How: Pressure, manipulation on specific points. Conditions treated: Back pain, joint problems, neurological issues, sports injuries. Training: Requires specialized Varmam training. Caution: Wrong application can be harmful - only trained practitioners.

instruction: Arts படித்தால் என்ன வேலை கிடைக்கும்?
output: Arts படிப்பின் வேலை வாய்ப்புகள்: 1) Government jobs - TNPSC, SSC, Banking 2) Teaching - B.Ed செய்து ஆசிரியர் 3) Journalism/Media 4) Civil Services - IAS, IPS 5) Law - LLB சேர்ந்து வழக்கறிஞர் 6) Social work 7) HR/Administration. NET தேர்வு எழுதி Professor ஆகலாம். UPSC-க்கு Arts background சிறந்தது.

instruction: Heart attack symptoms enna? Enna seyyanum?
output: Symptoms: 1) Chest pain/pressure (elephant sitting on chest feeling), 2) Left arm/jaw pain, 3) Breathlessness, 4) Sweating, 5) Nausea. Women: May have different symptoms - fatigue, back pain. Action: 1) Call 108 immediately, 2) Chew aspirin if available (not allergic), 3) Loosen tight clothes, 4) Don't drive yourself. Golden hour: Treatment within 1 hour saves heart muscle. Don't ignore 'gas' feeling!

instruction: TN Employment Exchange-ல் பதிவு செய்வது எப்படி?
output: Govt job notification-க்கு Registration. Online: tnvelaivaaippu.gov.in-ல் register. Age: 18-40 (reservation-க்கு relaxation உண்டு). தகுதி: Educational qualification-க்கு ஏற்ப. Renewal: ஒவ்வொரு 3 வருடமும் renew. Benefits: Govt job notifications, Interview call, Unemployment assistance (some categories). Documents: Education certificates, Community certificate, Aadhaar. Priority: Seniority + Marks-based. Local Employment: Private companies-க்கும் referral.

instruction: Certificate delay ஆனால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: TN Right to Service Act: Specified time limit-க்குள் service கொடுக்கணும். Delay ஆனால்: 1) Appellate Authority-க்கு appeal, 2) Penalty: Rs.250/day delay, 3) CM Cell complaint. Income certificate: 7 days, Community certificate: 15 days (approximate).

instruction: Nativity certificate என்ன? எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: தமிழ்நாட்டில் பிறந்தவர் என்று நிரூபிக்கும் certificate. SSLC certificate, birth certificate proof-ஆக கொடுக்கலாம். Tahsildar office-ல் apply செய்யுங்கள். Government jobs-க்கு தேவை.

instruction: Child custody order மாற்ற முடியுமா?
output: ஆம், circumstances மாறினால். Modification petition file பண்ணலாம். Grounds: Custodial parent neglect, child's preference change, better opportunity with other parent, relocation. Court child's welfare basis-ல் decide செய்யும்.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu 'Ola/Uber premium driver program. Pay 5000 registration for higher earning zones.' Income increase aagum nu solluraanga, join pannalama?
output: Ola/Uber premium programs announced through official app only. No external 'registration fee' for driver programs. Higher earning depends on location and time, not paid programs. Scammers target drivers' income improvement hopes. Check official app for any programs.

instruction: Job offer vandhudhu abroad-ku, visa-vum ticket-um free, agent fee 1 lakh matum
output: Gulf job scam ithu. MOIA website-la registered agent-a check pannunga. Advance panam kudukkaadheega. Fake visa documents koduppanga.

instruction: ICU-ல் patient பார்க்க விடல - rights இருக்கா?
output: Limited visiting is normal, but complete denial is not. Rights: 1) Regular updates from doctor (minimum once daily), 2) Brief visits allowed (usually 2-3 times/day, 10-15 mins), 3) One attendant may stay (not inside ICU). If denied: 1) Request meeting with treating doctor, 2) Escalate to hospital admin, 3) Get updates in writing. Exception: Highly infectious cases - isolation needed.

instruction: Warranty period முடிந்த பிறகும் complaint செய்யலாமா?
output: Manufacturing defect-க்கு warranty period முடிந்தாலும் complaint செய்யலாம். Product reasonable lifespan-க்குள் fail ஆனால் complaint valid. Example: TV 6 மாதத்தில் blast ஆனால், warranty 3 months முடிந்திருந்தாலும் case போடலாம்.

instruction: SIM card KYC fail aagum-nu message vandhudhu, link click pannanum-nu irukku
output: Fake message ithu! Telecom company link anuppaadhu. SIM problem irundhaa direct service center poonga. Link click pannaa phone hack aagum.

instruction: எட்டுத்தொகை என்றால் என்ன? அவை என்னென்ன?
output: எட்டுத்தொகை - எட்டு நூல்களின் தொகுப்பு: 1) நற்றிணை - 400 பாடல்கள், 2) குறுந்தொகை - 401 பாடல்கள், 3) ஐங்குறுநூறு - 500 பாடல்கள், 4) பதிற்றுப்பத்து - சேர மன்னர்களைப் பாடியது, 5) பரிபாடல் - திருமால், முருகன் பற்றியது, 6) கலித்தொகை - கலி விருத்தப்பா, 7) அகநானூறு - 400 அகப்பாடல்கள், 8) புறநானூறு - 400 புறப்பாடல்கள். வெவ்வேறு புலவர்கள் பாடியவை.

instruction: Kitchen herbs-in medicinal uses enna?
output: Common kitchen medicines: 1) Turmeric - Antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, immunity, 2) Ginger - Digestion, nausea, cold, 3) Pepper - Cold, metabolism, 4) Cumin - Digestion, iron source, 5) Coriander - Cooling, digestion, 6) Curry leaves - Diabetes, hair health, 7) Fenugreek - Blood sugar, lactation, 8) Garlic - Heart, infection, 9) Tulsi - Immunity, respiratory, 10) Neem - Skin, blood purifier. Daily use: Prevention better than cure!

instruction: Traffic fine list Tamil Nadu-la enna?
output: Major fines (2019 MV Act): Helmet illaama - Rs.1,000, Seat belt illaama - Rs.1,000, Signal jump - Rs.1,000, Drunk driving - Rs.10,000 (first), Over-speeding - Rs.1,000-2,000, Without license - Rs.5,000, Without insurance - Rs.2,000.

instruction: செட்டிநாடு (Chettinad) architecture சிறப்பு என்ன?
output: செட்டிநாடு - Sivaganga district-ல் உள்ள பகுதி. நாட்டுக்கோட்டை செட்டியார்கள் வசிக்கும் இடம். Architecture சிறப்பு: 1) பிரமாண்ட மாளிகைகள் - 50-100 rooms, 2) Burma teak, Italian marble, Belgian glass, 3) Athangudi tiles - handmade, 4) Spacious courtyards, 5) Ornate pillars. 19th-20th century-ல் வணிகத்தில் பணக்காரர்களாக இருந்தார்கள். இப்போது பல houses heritage hotels. Karaikudi famous for Chettinad food too!

instruction: Builder pona loan EMI kattikittu irukken, possession tharala - enna option?
output: RERA-la complaint podunga. Builder EMI interest compensate seyyanum endru order vaangalam. Parallel-aa bank-kitta loan restructure/moratorium kelunga. Extreme case: Full refund + EMI interest compensation kidaikkum.

instruction: Marks card-la name/DOB wrong, correct panna eppadi?
output: Correction process: 1) Apply to examination board (DGE for board exams) 2) Documents: Original marks card, Aadhaar, birth certificate, school bonafide 3) Affidavit (court/notary) 4) Newspaper advertisement (name change) 5) Processing fee ₹100-500. Time: 15-30 days. Portal: Online application available on DGE website. For university: Controller of Examinations. Gazette notification: For legal name change.

instruction: Property sell aanaal tenant enna aagum?
output: Registered agreement irundhaal new owner-um adhai honor seyya venum. Agreement period mudiyum varai tenant continue seyyalam. New owner arbitrary eviction seyya mudiyaadhu. Sale-kku mun tenant-kku inform seivathu good practice.

instruction: Income tax refund pending-nu email vandhudhu, bank details update pannanum-nu link irukku
output: Phishing email ithu! IT department email-la bank details kettuka maattaanga. incometax.gov.in-la direct-a login pannunga. Link click pannaadheenga.

instruction: 'Oodalin thondrum siruthuni' - oodal patriya kural enna solludhu?
output: Kural: 'Oodalin thondrum siruthuni nallali vaaadinum paadu perum'. Artham: Siriya oodal (love fight) kaadhalai melum inimaiyaakkum. Siriya varuththam vandhaalum, adhu mannippim bodhu innum aazhamaana anbaaga maarum. Healthy arguments strengthen relationships!

instruction: Cognizable vs Non-cognizable offence என்ன வித்தியாசம்?
output: Cognizable: Serious crimes (murder, rape, theft, assault) - Police FIR போட்டு warrant இல்லாம arrest பண்ணலாம். Non-cognizable: Minor crimes (defamation, cheating under Rs.500) - Court permission வேண்டும். NC case-க்கு NCR (Non-Cognizable Report) பதிவு செய்வார்கள்.

instruction: UGC scholarship MA/MSc/PhD students-க்கு என்ன?
output: UGC Scholarships: 1) Non-NET Fellowship - ₹8,000/மாதம் MPhil/PhD 2) JRF (through NET) - ₹31,000/மாதம் 3) SRF (2 years after JRF) - ₹35,000/மாதம் 4) Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship (SC/ST PhD) - ₹31,000-35,000/மாதம் 5) Maulana Azad National Fellowship (Minorities PhD). Apply: www.ugc.ac.in. NET தேர்வு pass ஆனால் automatic JRF.

instruction: கங்கைகொண்ட சோழபுரம் கோயிலின் சிறப்பு என்ன?
output: ராஜேந்திர சோழன் தந்தையின் நினைவாக கட்டிய கோயில். சிறப்புகள்: 1) தஞ்சை கோயிலை போன்றே ஆனால் சற்று சிறிய அளவு, 2) Lion base pilasters - unique feature, 3) சிற்பங்கள் மிக அழகு - Nataraja, Saraswati, 4) கங்கையை வென்றதன் நினைவாக இந்த பெயர், 5) ஒரு காலத்தில் புதிய தலைநகரம் இங்கேதான். Ariyalur district-ல் உள்ளது. தஞ்சை அளவு crowd இல்லை - peaceful visit possible.

instruction: கடன் கொடுத்தேன், திரும்ப தர மாட்டேங்குறாங்க - legal option?
output: Amount based: <Rs.20,000 - Small Causes Court. >Rs.20,000 - Civil Court (money suit). Documents: Promissory note, acknowledgment, bank transfer proof, witnesses. Cheque bounce: NI Act 138 (criminal). Interest: 18% per annum claim possible. Limitation: 3 years.

instruction: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at any bank or through pmkisan.gov.in. Documents: Aadhaar, PAN, land records (Patta/Chitta), sowing certificate. Loan up to ₹3 lakh collateral-free at only 4% interest (with subvention). Crop insurance auto-enrolled. Repay after harvest.

instruction: Minor child-kku yaar consent kodukkanum?
output: Parents/legal guardians. Rules: 1) Both parents equal right (married), 2) Single parent: That parent, 3) Guardian: Court-appointed guardian, 4) Emergency: Hospital can proceed without consent (life-saving), 5) Mature minor doctrine: 16+ may consent to some treatments. Conflict between parents: Court decides best interest of child. Orphan/abandoned: Child Welfare Committee.

instruction: Treatment refuse pannalaamaa? Doctor force pannalaamaa?
output: Yes, can refuse! Patient autonomy respected. Conditions: 1) Must be mentally competent, 2) Must understand consequences, 3) Must sign refusal form (LAMA - Leave Against Medical Advice). Doctor cannot force treatment (except psychiatric emergency). Blood transfusion refusal: Allowed (Jehovah's Witness cases). Children: Parents decide, but court can override for life-saving. Emergency: Implied consent applies.

instruction: Apartment Association-la enna rights irukku?
output: TN Apartment Ownership Act padi: 1) AGM-la vote seyya, 2) Committee member aaga, 3) Accounts inspect seyya, 4) Common area use seyya, 5) Decisions-la participate. Arbitrary rules-kku object seyyalam. Discrimination-kku legal action edukkalam.

instruction: ஓனர் கூட சண்டை போட்டுட்டேன், இப்ப என்ன பண்றது?
output: Calm-ஆ இருங்க. எல்லா communication-உம் writing-ல வச்சுக்கோங்க - WhatsApp, SMS, email. Verbal fight-க்கு evidence இல்ல. Legal action-க்கு written proof வேணும். அடுத்த step-ஆ Rent Authority-க்கு complaint போடுங்க.

instruction: State board vs CBSE - edhu better preparation?
output: Comparison: State Board - Regional language strong, local competitive exams friendly. CBSE - National level exams (JEE, NEET) aligned, English medium uniform. For NEET/JEE: CBSE syllabus closer. For TNPSC: State board better. Reality: Both boards students crack all exams - preparation matters more than board. State board + NCERT combination = best for competitive exams. TN State board now NCERT aligned.

instruction: Hostel mess sappaadu othhuvarala. Enna panrathu?
output: Solutions: 1) Initially stomach upset common - adjust period 2) Mess committee-la complaint raise 3) Healthy snacks keep - fruits, biscuits 4) Weekend home food bring 5) Nearby canteen/restaurants (budget friendly) 6) Cooking allowed rooms-la simple items prepare 7) Mess rebate apply if eating outside regularly. Health: Don't skip meals, drink boiled water, maintain hygiene.

instruction: போனில் 'நான் HDFC-லிருந்து, உங்கள் loan approve ஆனது, processing fee transfer செய்யுங்கள்' என்கிறார்கள்.
output: வங்கி loan-க்கு முன்கூட்டியே பணம் கேட்காது. இது loan scam. பணம் transfer செய்யாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Fake website-ல் shopping பண்ணி fraud ஆனது - complaint எப்படி?
output: Steps: 1) Payment bank-க்கு chargeback request, 2) cybercrime.gov.in complaint, 3) Consumer forum (seller fraud), 4) Police FIR (IPC 420). Evidence save பண்ணுங்க: Website screenshots, payment receipts, communication. Domain registrar-க்கும் report பண்ணலாம்.

instruction: Endha kaaranangalukkaga owner evict seyyalam?
output: Valid reasons: 1) Rent thodarndhu 3 months kattaavitta, 2) Veetai damage seydhaal, 3) Illegal activity nadathinaal, 4) Agreement terms meerinal, 5) Owner sondha use-kku thevaipattal (genuine need prove pannanum), 6) Major renovation thevaipattal.

instruction: Mental illness-kku treatment rights enna?
output: Mental Healthcare Act 2017 rights: 1) Access to mental healthcare, 2) Community-based treatment (not just hospitals), 3) Informed consent, 4) Humane treatment, 5) No discrimination, 6) Confidentiality, 7) Legal aid, 8) Complaint mechanism, 9) Advance directive right. Government duty: Provide affordable mental healthcare. Insurance: Must cover mental illness like physical illness.

instruction: 'CBI officer பேசுகிறேன், உங்கள் Aadhaar money laundering-ல் use ஆகிறது, arrest warrant ready' என்று call வந்தது. என்ன செய்வது?
output: CBI போன்-ல் இப்படி அழைக்காது. இது digital arrest scam. போனை வையுங்கள். பயப்படாதீர்கள். Cyber crime 1930-ல் report செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: PG/Hostel-க்கு rent laws apply ஆகுமா?
output: PG/Hostel license agreement-under வரும், standard tenancy laws fully apply ஆகாது. ஆனால் basic rights (security deposit refund, notice period, harassment protection) apply ஆகும். Specific PG rules follow பண்ணணும்.

instruction: GPA (General Power of Attorney) moolam property sale valid-aa?
output: Supreme Court ruling (2011): GPA moolam property sale NOT valid. GPA holder sale deed execute pannalam, but final ownership transfer Principal neril vandhu sign seyyanum or properly registered Special Power of Attorney venum.

instruction: Naan Tuition Center / Coaching Institute thodanga virumburen. Enna permission vendum?
output:
**Coaching Center Permissions:**

**Basic Requirements:**
1. **Shop & Establishment** - tnlabour.tn.gov.in (₹500-1,500)
2. **Trade License** - Corporation (₹1,000-5,000)
3. **Fire Safety NOC** - If 50+ students
4. **Building Safety** - Structural certificate

**Large Institute Additional:**
5. **Trust/Society Registration** - If structured entity
6. **GST** - If turnover > ₹20 lakh
7. **PF/ESI** - If employees

**Staff:** Qualified teachers, Background verification

**Infrastructure:** Ventilation, Drinking water, Toilets, Space

**Timeline:** Basic 2-4 weeks, Large 1-2 months

**No special license for:** IAS/JEE/NEET coaching, Language classes, Computer training

instruction: Daughter wedding fix aachhu, budget shortage. 'Wedding loan - instant approval, no income proof, 3 lakh in 24 hours' nu ad paathen.
output: 'No income proof' loans usually illegal lending apps with 100%+ interest. '24 hours disbursement' - desperation exploit pannuvaanga. Harassment, contact list access, morphed photo blackmail varum later. Bank personal loan apply pannunga - legitimate lenders income verify pannuvaanga.

instruction: A-Register என்றால் என்ன?
output: Village-level land record maintained by VAO. Contains: All survey numbers, owners, area, classification. Public document - anyone can inspect. Patta transfer, mutation எல்லாம் A-Register-ல் update ஆகணும். Discrepancy இருந்தால் Tahsildar-க்கு complaint.

instruction: Driving license eppadi peruvathu?
output: Steps: 1) Learner's License (LL) - parivahan.gov.in online apply, 2) 30 days wait, 3) Driving test - RTO, 4) Permanent License issue. Age: Two-wheeler - 18 years, Car - 18 years, Commercial - 20 years. Documents: Aadhaar, address proof, medical certificate (commercial).

instruction: Family member-kku patient condition sollalaamaa?
output: Only with patient consent (if patient is conscious/competent). Rules: 1) Adult patient decides who gets information, 2) Unconscious patient: Next of kin informed, 3) Minor: Parents/guardians informed, 4) Psychiatric patient: Rules vary. Sensitive info (HIV, mental health): Extra careful - patient must specifically consent. Nominated person: Patient can designate specific family member for communication.

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Coaching இல்லாம NEET/JEE crack பண்ண impossible
output: உண்மை: Fact: Self-study toppers exist every year! Free resources: YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy), NPTEL, SWAYAM, Government free coaching. Key factors: Discipline, proper study plan, consistent practice. Coaching helps but not mandatory. Many poor students crack using library + free online resources. Your determination > coaching centre brand.

instruction: ஆன்லைன்ல வாங்குன phone-ல problem, return பண்ண மாட்டேங்குறாங்க
output: First screenshot எல்லாம் எடுங்க. App-ல complaint raise பண்ணுங்க. Email-ல grievance officer-க்கு complaint அனுப்புங்க. 7 days-ல response இல்லன்னா NCH-ல complaint போடுங்க. Consumer forum-ல case போடலாம் - free-தான் 5 lakh வரை.

instruction: Property வாங்கும் முன் என்னென்ன documents check பண்ணணும்?
output: Must check: 1) Title deed chain (30 years), 2) EC (30 years), 3) Patta & Chitta, 4) Survey sketch, 5) Tax paid receipts, 6) Approved building plan, 7) NOC (if apartment), 8) RERA registration (new projects), 9) Power of Attorney (if applicable). Lawyer verification recommended.

instruction: Upwork la client - 'Big project 50,000, but need you to buy specific software first, I'll reimburse with payment.' Software ku 10,000 upfront kekkuraan.
output: Classic freelance scam. Legitimate clients project tools provide pannuvaanga or cost include pannuvaanga in budget. 'Buy first, reimburse later' - reimbursement varaadhu. Upwork outside payment request = violation anyway. Decline and report.

instruction: Income Certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, self-declaration of income, salary slip (if employed). VAO enquiry at home possible. Time: 7-15 days. Fee: ₹20. Valid for 6 months to 1 year.

instruction: Ondrukku merpatta PAN irundhaal enna seyvadhu?
output: Illegal! ₹10,000 penalty possible. To surrender duplicate PAN: 1. onlineservices.nsdl.com → 'Request for New PAN Card or/and Changes' 2. In Item 11, write PAN numbers to surrender 3. Send original PAN Cards 4. Fee: ₹107. Keep only one PAN

instruction: Yearly evvalavu percentage rent increase niyaayamanadhu?
output: Sattathula fixed percentage illa. Practice-la 5-10% yearly increase normal. But market rate, inflation, property value increase ivai consider aagum. Unreasonable increase-a Rent Authority moolam dispute seyyalam.

instruction: Class 8-க்கு பிறகு என்ன படிக்கலாம்? எந்த stream select செய்வது?
output:
**Class 8-க்கு பிறகு Options:**

**Option 1: Regular Schooling (Class 9-12)**

**Class 9-10:** General curriculum (same for all)
- Tamil/English, Maths, Science, Social Science
- 10th Board Exam முக்கியம்!

**Class 11-12 Streams:**

| Stream | Subjects | Career Path |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| Science (Maths) | Phy, Chem, Maths, Bio/CS | Engineering, Architecture |
| Science (Bio) | Phy, Chem, Bio, Maths | Medicine, Pharmacy, Nursing |
| Commerce | Accounts, Economics, Commerce | CA, Banking, Business |
| Arts | History, Economics, Pol Science | Law, Civil Services, Teaching |
| Vocational | Trade-specific | Direct employment |

**Option 2: ITI (Industrial Training Institute)**
- After Class 8/10
- Trades: Electrician, Fitter, Mechanic, etc.
- Duration: 1-2 years
- Direct job opportunity

**Option 3: Polytechnic (Diploma)**
- After Class 10
- Engineering diploma
- Duration: 3 years
- Lateral entry to engineering

**எப்படி decide செய்வது?**
1. Interest என்ன?
2. 10th marks based eligibility
3. Career goal என்ன?
4. Family situation consider

**Guidance:**
- School counselor
- Career guidance centers
- tnsdc.in for skill courses

instruction: Pudhiya PAN Card eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Online application: 1. NSDL: onlineservices.nsdl.com 2. UTIITSL: pan.utiitsl.com 3. e-Filing Portal (Instant e-PAN): eportal.incometax.gov.in (Aadhaar based - FREE!). Documents needed: ID Proof (Aadhaar/Voter ID/Passport), Address Proof, DOB Proof, Photo & Signature. Fee: Physical PAN ₹107 (India), e-PAN Free. Time: 15-20 days (Physical), Instant (e-PAN)

instruction: Great Living Chola Temples endraal enna?
output: UNESCO World Heritage Site-aaga declare seiyappatta moondru Chozhar kovilgal: 1) Brihadeeswara Kovil, Thanjavur (1010 CE) - Rajaraja Chozhan, 2) Gangaikonda Cholapuram Kovil (1035 CE) - Rajendra Chozhan, 3) Airavateswara Kovil, Darasuram (12th century) - Rajaraja Chozhan II. 'Living' enbadhu indrum poojai nadakkum kovilgal enbadhaik kurikkum.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'ICSI membership upgrade offer. Company Secretary certification with 50,000 fast-track fee.' Career advancement ku useful aa?
output: ICSI membership only through official exam and training route, no 'fast-track' exists. Company Secretary is regulated profession with mandatory exams. Check icsi.edu for genuine membership process. Shortcuts to professional certification are always fraudulent.

instruction: Accident case-la police illaama treat panraangalaa?
output: Yes! Supreme Court ruling - treat first. Good Samaritan Law: 1) Bystanders can help without legal hassle, 2) Hospital must treat without police clearance, 3) MLC formalities = AFTER stabilization, 4) No detention of patient/helper. Police role: Come to hospital for statement - not a condition for treatment. Refusal to treat: Report to police, Health Department, media.

instruction: Engineering-ல் 5 arrears இருக்கு. Parents-கிட்ட சொல்ல பயமா இருக்கு. என்ன பண்றது?
output: First: Panic வேண்டாம், solve பண்ணலாம். Steps: 1) Anna University arrear exam schedule check - multiple attempts available 2) Subject-wise weak areas identify 3) Previous year papers - pattern same 4) Senior notes, YouTube tutorials 5) Group study effective. Parents-க்கு: Honest-ஆ சொல்லுங்கள் - support கிடைக்கும். Clearing strategy: Easy subjects first, confidence build. Max arrears allowed: 12 (can continue). Final year placement-க்கு clear பண்ணணும். Time இருக்கு.

instruction: Marks card-ல் name/DOB wrong, correct பண்ண எப்படி?
output: Correction process: 1) Apply to examination board (DGE for board exams) 2) Documents: Original marks card, Aadhaar, birth certificate, school bonafide 3) Affidavit (court/notary) 4) Newspaper advertisement (name change) 5) Processing fee ₹100-500. Time: 15-30 days. Portal: Online application available on DGE website. For university: Controller of Examinations. Gazette notification: For legal name change.

instruction: Minority scholarship (Muslims, Christians, Sikhs) eppadi apply seivathu?
output: Ministry of Minority Affairs Scholarships: 1) Pre-matric - Class 1-10, ₹1,000-6,000/year 2) Post-matric - Class 11 onwards, ₹3,000-11,000/year 3) Merit-cum-Means - Professional courses, ₹20,000+/year. Eligibility: Minority certificate, income ₹2-2.5 lakh/year kizha. Apply: NSP portal moolam. Muslims, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists, Parsis, Jains eligible.

instruction: 11th & 12th padikkumbodhum enna scholarship kidaikkum?
output:
**Plus Two Scholarships:**

**1. SC/ST Post-Matric:**
- Day: ₹230/month, Hostel: ₹750/month
- Income < ₹2.5 lakh

**2. BC/MBC Post-Matric:**
- Full fee + ₹500/month stipend
- Income < ₹2 lakh

**3. Minorities:**
- ₹500-1,000/month
- Fee up to ₹7,000

**4. Free Laptop:** All Govt school 11th students (auto)

**5. First Gen Graduate Scheme:**
- Free education + ₹1,000/month

**6. INSPIRE:** Top 1% in 10th - ₹5,000/year

**7. Pragati (Girls):** ₹50,000/year for tech

**Apply:** scholarships.gov.in, tneservices.tn.gov.in
**Deadline:** August-October

instruction: Polytechnic-la endha branch select seivathu? Job opportunity eppadi?
output: Branch wise opportunities: 1) Mechanical - Manufacturing, automobile companies 2) Civil - Construction, PWD, real estate 3) Electrical - TNEB, industries, electrician 4) Electronics - IT companies, telecom 5) Computer Science - Software, IT support 6) Automobile - Service centers, companies. Highest demand: Mechanical, Civil. Growing: Computer Science. Government jobs: TNPSC Diploma level posts available.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'NCTE registration update mandatory for all teachers. Pay 3000 processing fee through this link.' School la principal pressure podraanga, genuine aa?
output: NCTE registration done through colleges and official NCTE portal, not individual payments. Inform your principal this is a scam. NCTE fees go through institutional channels, not individual teacher payments. Check ncte.gov.in for genuine requirements.

instruction: Bail conditions என்னென்ன இருக்கும்?
output: Common conditions: 1) Court dates attend, 2) Don't leave jurisdiction without permission, 3) Don't tamper evidence/threaten witnesses, 4) Passport surrender (if flight risk), 5) Periodical police station visit, 6) Don't contact victim. Violation = bail cancel + arrest.

instruction: TATA Scholarship for students enna?
output: TATA Group Scholarships: 1) Tata Capital Pankh - ₹10,000-12,000/year for Class 6-12 2) Tata Trusts Higher Education - ₹50,000-2 lakh/year professional courses 3) Lady Tata Memorial Trust - Medical research. Eligibility: Income ₹4 lakh kizha, 60%+ marks. Apply: Buddy4Study portal or direct application. Deadline varies.

instruction: NEET Tamil Medium-ல் எழுதலாமா? Translation problem இருக்குமா?
output:
**NEET Tamil Medium:**

**ஆம், Tamil-ல் எழுதலாம்!**

**Available Languages:**
- Tamil, English, Hindi
- Assamese, Bengali, Gujarati
- Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi
- Odia, Punjabi, Telugu, Urdu

**How to Choose:**
- Application form-ல் medium select
- Exam day-ல் bilingual paper கிடைக்கும்
- Tamil + English இரண்டும் printed

**Translation Issues (Past):**
- Some years translation errors reported
- Medical terms translation சில நேரம் confusing
- NTA has improved over years

**Tips for Tamil Medium Students:**

1. **NCERT Tamil Version படிக்கவும்**
   - TN Textbook Corporation version
   - Terminology same as NEET

2. **English Terms-உம் தெரிஞ்சிருக்கணும்**
   - Scientific names English-ல் தான்
   - Chemical formulas same
   - Diagrams labeling English

3. **Both Versions படிக்கவும்**
   - Tamil-ல் concept புரிஞ்சுக்கவும்
   - English terminology remember

4. **Mock Tests Tamil-ல் எழுதுங்க**
   - Translation style புரியும்
   - Time management practice

**Exam Day Tips:**
- Question confusing-னா English version பாருங்க
- Both languages printed in same booklet
- Scientific terms same in both

**Success Stories:**
- Many Tamil medium students cleared NEET
- Govt school 7.5% reservation helps
- Language is not a barrier!

instruction: Online child abuse report eppadi seivathu?
output: Report: 1) cybercrime.gov.in (select child-related crime), 2) NCPCR helpline: 1098, 3) Police. POCSO Act: Strict punishment for child exploitation. Platforms: Report + block. Evidence preserve pannunga. Don't forward content - possess panradhe illegal.

instruction: Acid attack victim-க்கு என்ன rights/compensation?
output: Rights: 1) Free medical treatment (government hospitals), 2) Compensation: Rs.3 lakhs minimum (state victim compensation), 3) Disability pension, 4) Acid sale regulation - ID proof mandatory, 5) Fast track court trial. TN: CM's Public Relief Fund additional support. Accused: 10 years to life imprisonment. NGO support: Stop Acid Attacks, Chhanv Foundation.

instruction: படிப்பை நிறுத்த நிர்பந்தமாக இருக்கிறேன், emergency scholarship உள்ளதா?
output: Emergency options: 1) HDFC ECSS - crisis support ₹75,000 2) PM CARES (COVID affected) 3) Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund - apply to Collector 4) College Student Aid Fund 5) Rotary Club scholarships 6) Lions Club education support. Immediate help: District Social Welfare Officer-ஐ சந்தியுங்கள். NGOs: Pratham, Smile Foundation. Fee postponement request to college principal.

instruction: B.Ed admission Tamil Nadu-la eppadi nadakkudhu?
output: Eligibility: Any degree 50% marks (SC/ST/OBC 45%). Steps: 1) TNTEU announcement 2) Online application 3) Merit-based counselling 4) College allotment. Govt college fee: ₹4,000-10,000/year. Duration: 2 years.

instruction: Education loan திருப்பிச் செலுத்துவது எப்படி?
output: Repayment: படிப்பு முடிந்த பிறகு + 6 மாதம் முதல் 1 வருடம் moratorium. EMI தொடங்கும். Repayment period: 5-15 ஆண்டுகள். Tax benefit: Section 80E-ல் வட்டிக்கு deduction (அதிகபட்ச வரம்பு இல்லை, 8 ஆண்டுகள் வரை). Pre-closure penalty இல்லை பெரும்பாலான வங்கிகளில். Auto-debit setup செய்து EMI தவறாமல் கட்டுங்கள்.

instruction: Gratuity தர மறுத்தால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Written application to employer, 2) 30 days-க்குள் pay பண்ணணும், 3) Refuse பண்ணால் Controlling Authority (Labour Commissioner)-க்கு complaint, 4) Labour Court appeal. Delay-க்கு 10% interest கிடைக்கும். Forfeiture: Only if dismissed for serious misconduct.

instruction: Two-wheeler-kku pillion rider helmet kattaayamaa?
output: Aama. Driver and pillion rider iruvarukkum ISI marked helmet kattaayam. Fine: Rs.1,000 + 3 months license suspension (repeat offence). Children-kkum helmet venum. Fashion helmets not acceptable.

instruction: PM Vidya Lakshmi Portal endraal enna?
output: Education loan portal. Website: vidyalakshmi.co.in. Features: 40+ Banks, 125+ loan schemes, Apply to multiple banks with one application, Scholarship info available. Loan types: Up to ₹4 lakh - No collateral, ₹4-7.5 lakh - Co-borrower needed, Above ₹7.5 lakh - Collateral needed. Interest Subsidy: Govt pays interest during moratorium for EWS students

instruction: Police station-la complaint kudukka poren, enna pannanum? (Chennai casual)
output: Mudhalla enna nadandhuchunnu clear-aa ezhudhi vachukonga. ID proof, evidence (photos, messages) eduthutu ponga. FIR copy kelunga - free-dhaan. Register panna maruttha SP office-kku complaint podunga. Calm-aa irunga.

instruction: அருள் / கருணை (kindness) பற்றி என்ன குறள்கள் உள்ளன?
output: குறள்: 'அருட்செல்வம் செல்வத்துள் செல்வம் பொருட்செல்வம் பூரியார் கண்ணும் உள'. கருணை என்ற செல்வமே உண்மையான செல்வம். பணம் கெட்டவர்களிடமும் இருக்கும். மேலும்: 'மறத்தலும் இன்னா பிறர்நெஞ்சு மன்னாத பொற்றும் கருணை'. கருணை இல்லாத வாழ்க்கை வாழ்க்கையே அல்ல. Kindness = true wealth!

instruction: Maintenance கொடுக்காவிட்டால் என்ன action எடுக்கலாம்?
output: Options: 1) Execution petition - salary attachment, property attachment, 2) Contempt of court - imprisonment up to 3 months, 3) Section 125 CrPC - Magistrate can order payment + imprisonment. Arrears + future maintenance கேட்கலாம். Don't delay - act immediately.

instruction: Life insurance claim reject ஆனால் appeal எங்கே?
output: Steps: 1) Company grievance cell, 2) IRDAI IGMS portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (Rs.30 lakh வரை), 4) Consumer forum, 5) Civil Court. Common rejection reasons: Non-disclosure, policy lapse, suicide clause. Documents: Policy, medical records, rejection letter.

instruction: Theft vs Robbery enna vithiyaasam?
output: Theft (IPC 379/BNS 303): Secretly taking property - 3 years imprisonment. Robbery (IPC 392/BNS 309): Theft + force/fear - 10 years imprisonment. Dacoity (5+ persons): 10 years to life. House breaking: Additional charges. Recovery of property possible.

instruction: NEET/JEE coaching-க்கு லட்சக்கணக்கில் செலவாகும், எங்களால் afford பண்ண முடியாது. Chance இல்லையா?
output: Hope உள்ளது! Free/Low-cost options: 1) Government free NEET/JEE coaching centres 2) School-based free coaching (apply through HM) 3) YouTube: Physics Wallah complete course free 4) NPTEL, SWAYAM free courses 5) Scholarship-based coaching: FIITJEE, Allen poor student schemes 6) Library resources - reference books available. Success stories: Many toppers from poor families using free resources. Key: Self-discipline and hard work. Money doesn't guarantee success.

instruction: COVID போல emergency-ல் price capping இருக்குமா?
output: Government can cap prices in emergencies. COVID example: TN government capped - room charges, oxygen, medicines, CT scan rates. Authority: Epidemic Diseases Act, Disaster Management Act. Violation: License suspension, heavy fines. Current: Some COVID caps may still apply. Check: DHS notifications. Overcharging complaint: DHS, Consumer Forum.

instruction: 'தன்னுயிர் நீப்பினும்' - உண்மை பற்றிய குறள் என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'தன்னுயிர் நீப்பினும் செய்யற்க தான்பிறிதோர் இன்னுயிர் நீக்கும் வினை'. அர்த்தம்: தன் உயிர் போனாலும், பிற உயிர்களை கொல்லும் செயலை செய்யக்கூடாது. அஹிம்சையின் உச்சம். Even at the cost of your own life, don't harm others. Non-violence-ஐ இவ்வளவு strongly சொன்னவர் வள்ளுவர்!

instruction: Government office-ல் வேலை நடக்கல, யாருகிட்ட சொல்றது?
output: Steps: 1) அந்த officer-ன் higher officer-கிட்ட complaint, 2) Collector office petition, 3) CM Cell - 1100, 4) RTI போட்டு file status கேளுங்க. எல்லாத்தையும் writing-ல கொடுங்க, acknowledgment வாங்குங்க.

instruction: Government hospital-ல் free dialysis கிடைக்குமா?
output: ஆம், PM National Dialysis Programme கீழ் government hospitals-ல் free dialysis உண்டு. CMCHIS card-ல் private hospitals-லும் claim செய்யலாம். District hospital-ல் register செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Company PF கட்டல, complaint போடணுமா?
output: First salary slip check பண்ணுங்க - PF deduction இருக்கா பாருங்க. Deduct பண்ணி கட்டலன்னா serious offence. EPFO portal-ல் EPFiGMS complaint போடுங்க. Regional PF office-லும் போகலாம். Company-க்கு heavy penalty + criminal case ஆகலாம்.

instruction: என் தந்தாவுக்கு pension வரவில்லை. எங்கு கேட்பது?
output: முதலில் bank account-ல் credit ஆனதா check செய்யுங்கள். வரவில்லை என்றால் taluk office-ல் விசாரிக்கவும். Life certificate கொடுத்திருக்கிறீர்களா என்று பாருங்கள்.

instruction: Nursing padippuku (B.Sc Nursing) Tamil Nadu-la admission eppadi?
output: Eligibility: +2 Biology 45% marks (SC/ST 40%). Admission: TN Health Department counselling. Steps: 1) Online application 2) Merit list 3) Counselling 4) College allotment. Duration: 4 years. Govt nursing college fee: ₹2,000-5,000/year. Job guarantee - govt hospital-la appointment.

instruction: Private hospital registration check பண்றது எப்படி?
output: Check: 1) TN Clinical Establishments Registration (mandatory), 2) Display: Registration certificate must be displayed, 3) NABH accreditation (optional but quality indicator), 4) Fire safety certificate, 5) Bio-medical waste authorization. Verify: Directorate of Medical Services (DMS) website or office. Unregistered hospital: Illegal - report to DHS. Also check: Doctor registrations displayed.

instruction: 'வஞ்ச மனத்தான் படிற்றொழுக்கம்' - நடிப்பு பற்றிய குறள் என்ன?
