Strategy: First secure good Main rank, then focus Advanced.

instruction: HIV/AIDS patient-ஐ hospital refuse பண்ணலாமா?
output: ILLEGAL! HIV/AIDS Act 2017 + Supreme Court judgments. Hospital must: 1) Provide all necessary treatment, 2) Not segregate discriminatorily, 3) Follow standard precautions (for all patients anyway), 4) Maintain confidentiality. Refusal = criminal offence + license action. Report: TANSACS, State Medical Council, police. Private hospitals also bound by this law.

instruction: நன்றி மறப்பது பற்றி என்ன சொல்கிறார்?
output: குறள்: 'எந்நன்றி கொன்றார்க்கும் உய்வுண்டாம் உய்விலை செய்நன்றி கொன்ற மகற்கு'. எல்லா பாவங்களுக்கும் மன்னிப்பு உண்டு, ஆனால் நன்றி மறந்தவனுக்கு இல்லை. மேலும்: 'நன்றி மறப்பது நன்றன்று நன்றல்ல தண்றியும் மறப்பது நன்று'. நன்றியை மறக்கக்கூடாது, தீமையை மறக்கலாம். Forgetting kindness = unforgivable sin!

instruction: பிரதான் மந்திரி ஆவாஸ் யோஜனா (PMAY) - TN-ல் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: PMAY-Urban: தகுதி - EWS (₹3 லட்சம் வரை வருமானம்), LIG (₹3-6 லட்சம்), MIG-I (₹6-12 லட்சம்), MIG-II (₹12-18 லட்சம்). நன்மை: வட்டி மானியம் 3-6.5%. விண்ணப்பம்: pmay-urban.gov.in/CSC/Bank. PMAY-Gramin: SECC data படி வீடில்லாதவர்கள். உதவி: ₹1.20 லட்சம் (Plain)/₹1.30 லட்சம் (Hilly). விண்ணப்பம்: Gram Panchayat/Block Office. TN Specific: TNHB மூலமும் விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம்

instruction: Polytechnic Diploma என்ன? ITI-யிலிருந்து என்ன வித்தியாசம்?
output: வித்தியாசம்: ITI = Trade training (practical focused), Diploma = Technical education (theory + practical). Diploma: 3 years after 10th. Branches: Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science, Automobile. Job level: Supervisor/Junior Engineer. ITI: Technician/Operator level. Salary difference: Diploma holders ₹5,000-10,000 more starting. Higher studies: Diploma → B.E. lateral entry possible.

instruction: Sports quota-வில் college admission வாங்க என்ன தகுதி வேண்டும்?
output: State/National level-ல் participate பண்ணியிருக்கணும். Sports certificate (SAI/Association certified) வேண்டும். District, State, National எந்த level-ல் play பண்ணியிருந்தாலும் quota-க்கு apply பண்ணலாம். Trials நடக்கும்.

instruction: SSC Exams endraal enna? TN students apply pannalaamaa?
output:
**SSC Exams:**

**What:** Central Govt job exams, TN students can apply!

**Major Exams:**

1. **SSC CGL:** Inspector, Auditor - Degree - ₹44,900+
2. **SSC CHSL:** DEO, LDC - 12th - ₹25,500+
3. **SSC MTS:** Peon - 10th - ₹18,000+
4. **SSC GD:** BSF, CISF - 10th - Physical test
5. **SSC Steno:** Stenographer - 12th - Skill test

**TN Advantage:**
- Chennai posting preference
- South zone vacancies

**CGL Pattern (Tier-1):**
Reasoning 25 + GK 25 + Quant 25 + English 25 = 200 marks, 1 hour

**Apply:** ssc.nic.in (SSC Southern Region Chennai)

instruction: 'Write product reviews, 100 per review, unlimited earning' nu website paathen. 500 registration fee.
output: Review writing legit irundhaalum - registration fee kekaadhu. Paid review sites direct pay pannuvaanga. 500 fee site - either no payment later or endless 'premium membership' demands. Swagbucks, Toluna - legit survey sites irukku, free registration.

instruction: Cutoff marks quick guide
output: NEET 2024 (approx): General OC 720-137, BC 136-107, MBC 136-107, SC/ST 136-107. JEE Main: 90+ percentile for NITs. TNEA: Top colleges 195+, average 180+, minimum 150+. TNPSC Group 4: 80+ marks out of 150 safe. Engineering cutoff = Maths + Physics + Chemistry (max 200).

instruction: Farmer Producer Organization (FPO) எப்படி தொடங்குவது?
output: குறைந்தது 300 farmers சேர்ந்து FPO form செய்யலாம். NABARD, state agriculture department support கிடைக்கும். Rs.15 lakh grant, Rs.2 crore credit guarantee உண்டு.

instruction: 'நல்லவை எல்லாம் தீயவாம்' - சோம்பல் பற்றிய குறள் என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'நல்லவை எல்லாம் தீயவாம் தீயவும் நல்லவாம் செல்வம் செயற்கு'. அர்த்தம்: சோம்பேறியிடம் நல்ல வாய்ப்புகள் வந்தாலும் கெட்டதாக மாறும். ஆனால் active-ஆக இருப்பவனுக்கு கெட்ட சூழ்நிலையும் நல்லதாக மாறும். Your attitude determines outcome, not circumstances!

instruction: Copyright registration eppadi seivathu?
output: Online: copyright.gov.in. Categories: Literary, artistic, musical, cinematograph, sound recording. Fee: Rs.500-5,000 (work type based). Process: Application → Diary number → Objection period (30 days) → Registration. Note: Copyright automatic - registration = evidence.

instruction: Community Certificate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Parent's community certificate, school TC, Aadhaar, address proof. VAO verification, RI check, Tahsildar approval. Time: 15-30 days. Fee: ₹25-50. Essential for reservation benefits.

instruction: Informed consent endraal enna? Edhukkellam consent venum?
output: Informed consent = Patient understanding and agreeing to treatment. Required for: 1) Any surgery, 2) Anesthesia, 3) Blood transfusion, 4) Invasive procedures, 5) Clinical trials, 6) HIV testing. Must explain: Procedure, risks, alternatives, success rate. Language: Patient's language (Tamil). Without consent: Medical negligence. Exception: Life-threatening emergency - implied consent.

instruction: LinkedIn la oru IT recruiter message pannirukku 'Senior Developer role at Microsoft, $150K package. Send resume and current company credentials for background verification.' Legit recruiter aa?
output: Never share company credentials for 'background check'! Real recruiters ask for resume, not passwords. Microsoft recruits through official channels with @microsoft.com emails. This is credential harvesting disguised as recruitment.

instruction: 5 lakhs fraud la poachu. Maximum recovery ku enna ellam pannanum?
output: Day 1: All standard steps PLUS lawyer consultation, multiple bank calls (yours + beneficiary), social media warning post. Week 1: Detailed FIR with all sections ✓, Cyber cell case assignment ✓, Personal visit to cyber cell ✓, Newspaper complaint ✓, RTI to bank ✓. Week 2-4: IO follow-up ✓, SP Cyber Crime application ✓, Banking Ombudsman parallel ✓, Find other victims ✓, Collective complaint ✓. Month 2: Legal notice to bank ✓, Consumer Forum prep ✓, ED complaint if >5L ✓, Media approach ✓. Month 3-6: Consumer Forum case ✓, Court attendance ✓, Bank settlement negotiation ✓. Recovery: 40-60% with aggressive pursuit. Timeline: 6-18 months.

instruction: Pre-existing disease claim eppodhu kidaikkum?
output: Waiting period: Usually 2-4 years (policy varies). Pre-existing = condition before policy started. Rules: 1) Must declare at proposal, 2) Non-disclosure = claim rejection + policy cancellation, 3) After waiting period, fully covered, 4) IRDAI: Max 4 years waiting period. Tip: Disclose honestly, buy policy early when healthy, continuous renewal maintains benefits.

instruction: Abhyanga massage vs regular massage - difference?
output: Abhyanga = Ayurvedic whole body oil massage. Difference: 1) Medicated oils specific to condition/Prakriti, 2) Specific direction strokes (towards heart), 3) Marma points included, 4) Part of treatment protocol (not just relaxation), 5) Followed by steam bath typically. Benefits: Toxin removal, circulation, joint lubrication, skin health, relaxation. Self-Abhyanga: Daily oil massage at home recommended in Ayurveda. Professional: For treatment purposes.

instruction: RTI fee எவ்வளவு? எப்படி pay பண்றது?
output: Central Government: Rs.10 (postal order, DD, cash). Tamil Nadu State: Rs.10. BPL card holders: Fee exempted. Additional: Rs.2 per page for copies. Online: rtionline.gov.in (central), rtionline.tn.gov.in (state). Court fee stamp-உம் accept.

instruction: LinkedIn-ல் recruiter 'interview-க்கு வர flight ticket book செய்கிறேன், உங்கள் card details கொடுங்கள்' என்கிறார்.
output: Legitimate companies candidates-க்கு travel arrange செய்யும், card details கேட்காது. இது scam. Company HR-ஐ நேரடியாக contact செய்து verify செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: TikTok/Instagram la 'Send 1000 to this UPI, get 2000 back - money doubling challenge' nu viral aagudhu. Friends try pannuvaanga.
output: Money doubling impossible - basic logic. 'Viral' because scammers promote heavily. Friends who 'got money' - either lying or part of scam. 1000 anuppina - gone forever. Report such videos, warn friends.

instruction: Thirukkural UN-la recognize aanadha?
output: Thirukkural formally UN-aal recognize aagavillai, aanaal: 1) UN conferences-la Thirukkural quotes cite aagiyullana, 2) UNESCO Tamil-a classical language-aaga recognize panniyabodhu Thirukkural-a highlight panniyathu, 3) International scholars Thirukkural-a 'Universal ethical text' endru praise panraanga. Thirukkural-a UN officially recognize panna vendum endru campaign nadakkiradhu.

instruction: Velayila irundhu nirutitaanga, F&F eppa kidaikkum? (Madurai style)
output: Full and Final settlement: 30-45 days-la kidaikkanum. Include: Salary, leave encashment, bonus, gratuity (if eligible), notice pay, reimbursements. Delay aanaa Labour Commissioner-kku complaint. Documents: Relieving letter, experience letter, salary slip, Form 16 - ellam kelunga.

instruction: NEET-க்கு class 11 இருந்தே prepare ஆகணுமா?
output: Ideal: Class 11 start. Why? NEET syllabus = 11th + 12th. Class 11 weightage: 45-50%. Strategy: 1) 11th: Concepts strong, NCERT master 2) 12th: Revision + new topics + mock tests 3) After 12th: Full revision + test series. Late starter (12th)? Focus 50% important topics, daily 10-12 hours. Dropper year: Structured coaching + self-study balance. Never too late - many crack in 2nd/3rd attempt.

instruction: திருக்குறளை தினசரி வாழ்க்கையில் எப்படி பயன்படுத்தலாம்?
output: 1) காலை ஒரு குறள் படிக்கலாம் - motivation கிடைக்கும், 2) பிரச்சனை வரும்போது சம்பந்தப்பட்ட அதிகாரத்தைப் படிக்கலாம், 3) குழந்தைகளுக்கு ஒவ்வொரு நாளும் ஒரு குறள் கற்றுக்கொடுக்கலாம், 4) Office-ல் decision எடுக்கும்போது பொருட்பால் குறள்கள் உதவும், 5) திருக்குறள் apps download செய்யலாம் - Tamil, English explanation கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Free borewell scheme எப்படி apply செய்வது?
output: SC/ST, small/marginal farmers-க்கு free borewell scheme உண்டு. Agriculture department-ல் apply செய்யவும். Land document, caste certificate தேவை. Waiting list இருக்கும்.

instruction: COD order reject பண்ணலாமா? Penalty இருக்கா?
output: Product open பண்ணாம reject பண்ணலாம் - penalty இல்லை. ஆனால் repeated COD rejection செய்தால் account block ஆகலாம். Product damaged/wrong என்றால் கண்டிப்பாக reject பண்ணுங்க, delivery person முன்னால் video எடுங்க.

instruction: Free coaching எங்கே கிடைக்கும்? Government schemes இருக்கிறதா?
output: Free coaching options: 1) Tamil Nadu Government Free Coaching Centres - UPSC, TNPSC, SSC-க்கு major cities-ல் 2) BC/MBC Welfare Dept coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare free coaching (SC/ST) 4) District Employment Office coaching 5) TNSDC skill centers. Online: NPTEL, SWAYAM, Unacademy free tier. Apply through respective department websites. Selection based on marks and income.

instruction: NEET-க்கு எப்படி prepare செய்வது? எந்த books படிக்கணும்?
output:
**NEET Preparation Strategy:**

**2-Year Plan (Class 11-12):**

**Class 11:**
- NCERT thoroughly (Most important!)
- Concept clarity focus
- Regular practice
- Foundation building

**Class 12:**
- NCERT revision
- Previous years papers
- Mock tests
- Weak areas focus

**Subject-wise Books:**

**Physics:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT Class 11 & 12 | Foundation (Must!) |
| HC Verma | Concept + Problems |
| DC Pandey | Practice |
| Previous Years | Pattern understanding |

**Chemistry:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT | Must read multiple times! |
| MS Chouhan (Organic) | Organic mechanisms |
| VK Jaiswal (Inorganic) | Reactions |
| N Awasthi (Physical) | Numericals |

**Biology:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT | 90% questions from here! |
| Trueman's Biology | Extra MCQs |
| MTG NEET Guide | Practice |
| Previous Years | Must solve |

**Daily Schedule (Class 12):**
```
5:00 AM - Wake up, Fresh
5:30-7:30 AM - Physics/Chemistry (Alternate)
7:30-8:30 AM - Break, Breakfast
8:30-1:00 PM - School
2:00-4:00 PM - Biology
4:00-5:00 PM - Break, Snacks
5:00-7:00 PM - Weak subject
7:00-8:00 PM - Dinner, Relax
8:00-10:00 PM - Revision/MCQs
10:00 PM - Sleep
```

**Key Tips:**
1. NCERT = Bible (Read 5-6 times minimum)
2. Biology diagrams daily practice
3. Physics numericals daily
4. Chemistry equations balance
5. 50-100 MCQs daily
6. Weekly full-length test

instruction: En paiyanukku 6 vayasu aachu, Government school-la eppadi serpathu?
output: Class 1 admission: Age 5+ (as on June 1st). Process: 1) Nearest government primary school-la neradigava sellunga 2) Application form vaangunga 3) Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent ID, address proof, photos 4) Admission free - no donation 5) TC not needed for new admission. RTE Act: 25% seats private schools-layum EWS/DG category-ku reserved. Online: www.tnschools.gov.in for RTE admission.

instruction: Second-hand Car வாங்கினேன். RC Transfer எப்படி செய்வது?
output:
**RC Transfer Process (Used Vehicle):**

**Seller செய்ய வேண்டியவை:**

1. **Form 29 & 30**
   - Transfer of Ownership forms
   - Seller signature
   - parivahan.gov.in download

2. **NOC (if different state)**
   - Original RTO-யிலிருந்து
   - Loan இருந்தால் Bank NOC

3. **Deliver to Buyer:**
   - Original RC
   - Insurance transfer letter
   - PUC Certificate
   - Signed forms

**Buyer செய்ய வேண்டியவை:**

**Step 1: Online Application**
1. parivahan.gov.in → Online Services → TN
2. Transfer of Ownership
3. Fill Form 29 & 30
4. Upload documents
5. Pay fee online

**Step 2: Documents**
- Form 29 & 30 (signed by both)
- Original RC Book
- Insurance (transferred or new)
- PUC Certificate
- Seller's Aadhaar + Address proof
- Buyer's Aadhaar + Address proof
- Sale receipt / Agreement
- NOC (if applicable)

**Step 3: RTO Visit**
- Book slot online
- Both parties present (or POA)
- Document verification
- Vehicle inspection (HPT check)
- Biometric/Photo

**Step 4: Fee Payment**

| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Transfer Fee | ₹300-500 |
| Smart Card | ₹200 |
| Road Tax (if applicable) | Varies |

**Step 5: New RC**
- Processing: 7-15 days
- Collect or by post

**Timeline:** 14 days from sale (legal requirement)

**Penalty for Delay:**
- ₹50/day after 14 days
- Maximum ₹500

**Loan Vehicle:**
- Bank NOC mandatory
- Hypothecation removal first
- Or transfer with hypothecation

**Insurance Transfer:**
- Within 14 days
- Or take fresh policy
- NCB transfer possible

instruction: Engineering padithu velai kidaikkavillai, enna seivathu?
output: Alternative options: 1) Skill upgrade - Online courses (Coursera, NPTEL) 2) GATE ezhudhi PSU/ME admission 3) MBA padithu management-ku switch 4) Government jobs - SSC JE, RRB JE 5) Startup/Freelancing 6) TNSDC free skill training 7) Entrepreneurship - PMEGP loan moolam own business. District Employment Exchange-la register pannunga.

instruction: Friends எல்லாரும் phone use பண்றாங்க, study time waste ஆகுது, என்ன செய்வது?
output: Phone/Social media management: 1) Study time-ல் phone வேற room-ல் வையுங்கள் 2) App blockers use (Forest, Freedom) 3) Scheduled screen time - 1 hour/day 4) Study group with serious friends 5) Parents-கிட்ட phone control கொடுங்கள். Reality: Toppers also use phones - difference is discipline. Educational use OK: BYJU'S, Khan Academy, Doubt clearing. Self-control = life skill. Start with small goals.

instruction: Old age home-ல் abuse நடக்குது, complain எங்கே?
output: Complaint options: 1) Police (if physical/sexual abuse), 2) District Social Welfare Officer, 3) State Commission for Senior Citizens, 4) National Commission for Elderly. Old age home registration: Social Welfare Department-கிட்ட - unregistered homes-ஐ report பண்ணலாம். Elder helpline: 14567. Documentation: Photos, medical reports, witness statements.

instruction: Home healthcare service legal-ஆ? Reliable-ஆ?
output: Legal, but verify. Check: 1) Company registration, 2) Nurse/attendant credentials, 3) Doctor supervision (for nursing care), 4) Agreement/contract terms, 5) Emergency protocols, 6) Insurance/liability coverage. Services: Nursing care, physiotherapy, doctor visits, sample collection. Caution: Verify ID of persons coming home. Complaint: If fraud/negligence - police + Consumer Forum.

instruction: Meenakshi Amman Kovil (Madurai) patri sollungal?
output: Meenakshi Sundareswarar Kovil Madurai-oda heart. Sirappugal: 1) 14 gopurangal - therku gopuram 170 adi uyaram, 2) 33,000 sirpangal, 3) Porthamarai Kulam - punidhanaana tank, 4) Aayiram Kaal Mandapam - 985 pillars, 5) Chithirai Thiruvizha - 1 million+ per varuvaargal. Nayakkar kaalathil virivupaduththappattathu. World's new 7 wonders-la shortlist aanadhu!

instruction: Builder से common area handover வாங்காம இருக்கு - என்ன செய்வது?
output: RERA-ல் complaint போடுங்க - builder conveyance deed execute செய்யணும் என்று order வாங்கலாம். 50%+ flats occupied ஆனால் association form பண்ணி legal notice அனுப்புங்க. Non-compliance-க்கு penalty, imprisonment provisions உண்டு.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'GST portal special access offer for CAs. 20,000 annual fee for priority processing of client returns.' Client work ku useful aa?
output: GST portal access same for all registered practitioners - no 'priority processing' tier. GSTN doesn't offer special CA packages outside official registration. This could be selling illegitimate access or simply fraud. Use official gst.gov.in only.

instruction: Arya Vaidya Sala, Kottakkal branch TN-la irukkaa?
output: Yes! AVS Kottakkal branches in TN: 1) Chennai - Multiple clinics, 2) Coimbatore, 3) Madurai. Services: 1) OPD consultation, 2) Panchakarma, 3) Pharmacy. Other Kerala chains in TN: 1) Arya Vaidya Pharmacy (AVP), Coimbatore, 2) Nagarjuna, 3) SNA Oushadhasala. Authentic: These are established, registered organizations. Products: Available in many pharmacies.

instruction: Call vandhirukkappa - 'Unga account block aagumappa, KYC update pannungappa' nu. OTP kekkuraangappa. Enna pannalaamappa?
output: Fraud appa idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekkumappa? Kekaadhuappa! Branch ku neengappa poi pesungappa. Big Temple area, Vallam pakkathu la farmers ipdi maatikirukkanga. Phone la details kudukkaadheengappa.

instruction: Anganwadi-ல் children-க்கு என்ன services?
output: ICDS (Integrated Child Development Services): 1) Supplementary nutrition (hot meal/take home), 2) Growth monitoring (weight/height), 3) Immunization support, 4) Health referral, 5) Pre-school education (3-6 years), 6) Nutrition education for mothers. Beneficiaries: Children 0-6 years, pregnant/lactating women. Free: All services. Location: Every village/urban ward has Anganwadi centre.

instruction: De-addiction centre-ல் treatment எப்படி?
output: Government centres: Free treatment at district/medical college hospitals. Services: 1) Detoxification (medical supervision), 2) Rehabilitation (21-90 days), 3) Counseling, 4) Family therapy, 5) Aftercare. TN: Alcohol/drug de-addiction centres in major hospitals. Private: Verify registration with State Mental Health Authority. Helpline: De-addiction helpline for guidance. Forced admission: Only if danger to self/others.

instruction: Government Arts and Science colleges-la BA/BSc admission eppadi?
output: Steps: 1) www.tngasa.in-la online apply 2) +2 marks basis rank 3) Counselling date announcement 4) Certificate verification 5) College allotment. Fee: Govt colleges-la yearly ₹500-2000 only. 7.5% reservation government school students-ku irukku.

instruction: Doctor prescription எவ்வளவு நாள் valid?
output: General rule: 1) Acute illness prescription - use immediately, 2) Chronic medicines - usually for prescribed duration (30-90 days), 3) Controlled substances - single use only. Refills: Some pharmacies refill for chronic conditions (diabetes, BP) without new prescription. Best practice: Regular doctor checkup for chronic medicines. Expired prescription: Pharmacist discretion, usually won't dispense.

instruction: 5 வயது குழந்தைக்கு Aadhaar எடுக்கலாமா?
output: பிறந்த குழந்தைக்கும் Aadhaar எடுக்கலாம். 5 வயதிற்கு கீழ் biometric இல்லாமல், photo மட்டும் எடுப்பார்கள். 5 மற்றும் 15 வயதில் mandatory biometric update உண்டு.

instruction: Builder specification மாத்தி flat தந்தார் - complaint போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். Agreement/Brochure-ல் சொன்ன specification மாறினால் RERA complaint போடலாம். Options: 1) Specification match செய்ய order, 2) Price reduction, 3) Compensation, 4) Full refund. Photos, videos, original brochure evidence-ஆ வைங்க.

instruction: 12th படிக்கும்போதே என்ன competitive exams-க்கு prepare ஆகலாம்?
output:
**12th-ல் இருக்கும்போதே Prepare செய்யக்கூடிய Exams:**

**1. NEET (Medical):**
- For: MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, Nursing
- Subjects: Physics, Chemistry, Biology
- Exam: May (usually)
- Prepare from: Class 11 itself!

**2. JEE Main & Advanced (Engineering):**
- For: IIT, NIT, IIIT, GFTIs
- Subjects: Physics, Chemistry, Maths
- JEE Main: January & April
- JEE Advanced: After Main qualify

**3. CUET (Central Universities):**
- For: Delhi University, JNU, BHU, etc.
- Subjects: Domain subjects + Language + General Test
- New exam - gaining importance

**4. CLAT (Law):**
- For: National Law Universities
- Subjects: English, GK, Legal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, Maths
- Exam: December
- Can start from Class 11

**5. NDA (Defence):**
- For: Army, Navy, Air Force
- Age: 16.5 - 19.5 years
- Exam: April & September
- 12th appearing can apply!

**6. KVPY (Kishore Vaigyanik):**
- Science scholarship + IISc admission
- For: Class 11 & 12 science students
- Exam: November

**7. NTSE (National Talent Search):**
- Scholarship exam
- For: Class 10 students
- Good for building competitive exam mindset

**Preparation Timeline:**

| Exam | Start Prep | Peak Prep |
|------|------------|----------|
| NEET | Class 11 start | Class 12 |
| JEE | Class 11 start | Class 12 |
| CLAT | Class 11 | Class 12 |
| NDA | Class 12 | After 12th |

**Parallel Preparation Tips:**
1. Board syllabus = 60-70% competitive syllabus
2. Extra topics identify & cover
3. Test series join early
4. Balance board + competitive

instruction: Telegram group la join aanaen - 'Like YouTube videos, earn 50 per like, daily 500-1000 possible.' Initial la payment vandhudhu, now 'premium task ku 5000 invest' nu solraanga.
output: Classic task scam - initial payments hook you. Premium investment ku endless demands varum - 'withdraw ku more invest pannu.' Students thousands lose pannuraanga. STOP NOW - don't invest more. Already paid aa - recovery very difficult.

instruction: Heart attack symptoms என்ன? என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: Symptoms: 1) Chest pain/pressure (elephant sitting on chest feeling), 2) Left arm/jaw pain, 3) Breathlessness, 4) Sweating, 5) Nausea. Women: May have different symptoms - fatigue, back pain. Action: 1) Call 108 immediately, 2) Chew aspirin if available (not allergic), 3) Loosen tight clothes, 4) Don't drive yourself. Golden hour: Treatment within 1 hour saves heart muscle. Don't ignore 'gas' feeling!

instruction: 'Work from hostel - Data entry job, daily 3 hours, monthly 15,000, registration 1000' nu Instagram ad. Pocket money ku useful, join pannalama?
output: Legitimate data entry jobs registration fee kekaadhu. 1000 vaangitu simple work kuduppaanga initially - then 'software fee', 'certification fee' more demands. Monthly 15,000 for 3 hours - too good, basic math fail. Internshala, LinkedIn verified internships try pannunga.

instruction: Kudumbathula oruvar irandhuittaar. Ennenna formalities seiyya vendum? Enna benefits kidaikkum?
output:
Immediately (24-48 hours):
1. Medical Certificate - Hospital / PHC Doctor

Within 21 days (Mandatory):
2. Death Certificate Registration - Municipality/Panchayat (Free)

Within 1-3 months:
3. Bank Account Claim - Death Certificate + Nominee ID
4. Legal Heir Certificate - Taluk Office (15-30 days)
5. Ration Card name removal - tnpds.gov.in
6. Property Transfer - Legal Heir Certificate + Taluk Office

Benefits for family:
7. PMJJBY Claim - ₹2 lakh (if enrolled)
8. PMSBY Claim - ₹2 lakh (accident death)
9. EPF Claim - If employed
10. Family Pension - Govt employees
11. Widow Pension - ₹1,000/month (BPL)

instruction: WhatsApp message 'NPS withdrawal issue detected. Pay 5000 for account rectification or pension affected.' NPS la money invest pannirukkene, serious aa?
output: NPS issues resolved through NSDL/CRA portal or nodal officer in your office. No 'rectification fee' exists. Check your NPS statement through official app. Government pension systems don't ask arbitrary payments. Contact your PAO for genuine issues.

instruction: Stray dog bite aanaal compensation kidaikkumaa?
output: Corporation/Municipality nilai poruthadhu. Complaint: Corporation + Animal Welfare Board. Compensation: Civil Court suit against local body (negligence). Medical expenses claim. ABC (Animal Birth Control) program failure prove pannanum. Police complaint-um possible.

instruction: Phone vandhudhu, crying voice la 'Thatha, naan Ravi pesuren, accident aaiduchu, police station la irukken, 50,000 bail vendum, yaar kittayum sollaadha please' nu. En pera voice maadhiri irukku, enna pannanum?
output: Ayya, idhu 'grandparent scam' - voice imitate pannuvaanga or AI voice clone use pannuvaanga. 'Yaar kittayum sollaadha' nu solradhu red flag - verify panna vidaama irukkuraanga. Phone cut pannitu unga pera ORIGINAL number ku call pannunga. Real emergency na family ku theriyum.

instruction: PM Janaushadhi Kendra என்றால் என்ன?
output: மலிவான மருந்துகள் வாங்கும் இடம். MRP-யில் 50-90% குறைந்த விலை. 1,800+ மருந்துகள் + 285+ Surgical items. Quality: NABL tested, WHO-GMP certified. கண்டுபிடிக்க: janaushadhi.gov.in → Store Locator. Tamil Nadu-ல் 1,000+ கடைகள். உதாரணம்: Paracetamol 500mg (10 tabs) - Market ₹15, Janaushadhi ₹2.50; Metformin 500mg - Market ₹25, Janaushadhi ₹3.50

instruction: Cancer treatment-க்கு government support இருக்கா?
output: Yes! Multiple supports: 1) CMCHIS - cancer treatment covered (Rs.5 lakh), 2) Government cancer hospitals - free/subsidized, 3) PM-JAY for eligible, 4) State Cancer Institute (Adyar) - subsidized, 5) CM's Relief Fund - apply for additional support. Free screening: Breast, cervical cancer at PHCs. Support: Transport allowance, free medicines (chemo). Apply: Hospital social worker will help with paperwork.

instruction: Mediation vs Arbitration என்ன difference?
output: Mediation: Neutral person facilitates, parties decide, non-binding. Arbitration: Arbitrator decides, binding like court order, faster. Pre-litigation mediation: Compulsory for some cases. Arbitration agreement: Contract-ல் clause இருக்கணும். Both: Court-ஐ விட faster, cheaper.

instruction: OTP share panni money pochu - thirumba kidaikkumaa?
output: Bank approach: RBI circular-padi, unauthorized transaction-kku customer negligence irundhaalum limited liability (Rs.25,000 max). Aanaal OTP voluntary share = customer liability higher. 3 days-kkul report pannunga. Banking Ombudsman appeal undu.

instruction: Mental illness reason-aa job reject panninaanga - action?
output: Illegal discrimination! RPD Act + MHCA protection. Action: 1) Written reason kelunga, 2) State Commissioner for Disabilities complaint, 3) Labour court if existing job, 4) Court (writ petition). Exceptions: Very limited safety-critical jobs with specific requirements. Proof: Email/written rejection citing mental health. Remedy: Reinstatement, compensation, policy change order.

instruction: 'Catering for wedding - 50% advance only! Best price guaranteed' unknown caterer. Deal பண்ணலாமா?
output: Risky! Wedding caterer scams அதிகம். Advance வாங்கிட்டு disappear or substandard food. References வாங்குங்க. Taste testing போங்க. Written agreement எடுங்க. Known caterers prefer பண்ணுங்க. Full advance தராதீங்க.

instruction: 'Ayya, naan unga relative Murugan friend, Murugan daughter wedding ku shortage, 30,000 urgent loan vendum, direct aa kekka kovama irukkum nu en kitta sonnaru' nu call vandhudhu.
output: Ayya, 'relative friend' scam idhu. Murugan ku DIRECT call pannunga verify panna. Real shortage irundhaa Murugan own aa kepparu. 'Direct aa kekka kovama' excuse - verify panna vidama irukkuraanga. Unknown callers through money anuppaadhenga.

instruction: En kuzhanthai methuvaga padikkudhu, school-la special help irukkaa?
output: Slow learners support: 1) NEET programme - remedial classes 2) Resource teachers in schools 3) Learning disability screening available 4) Extra coaching hours - afternoon sessions 5) IEDSS for special needs. School-la class teacher-a santhiyunga. BRC special educators ullana. Private assessment: Rs.500-2000 at government hospitals. Early intervention helps - don't delay.

instruction: 'Pre-launch offer - Plots near Chennai airport, 1 lakh per cent, value double in 2 years' nu ad paathen. Small investment start pannalama?
output: 'Pre-launch' often means no proper approvals yet. 'Near airport' - could be 50km away. 'Value double' - no guarantee in real estate. DTCP/CMDA approval verify pannunga, site physically visit pannunga, legal opinion vaangunga. Paper la nalla theriyum, ground reality different.

instruction: HIV status employer-kitta sollanuumaa?
output: NO! HIV status = highly confidential. HIV/AIDS Act 2017: 1) No mandatory testing for employment, 2) No disclosure to employer without consent, 3) No termination based on HIV status, 4) Anti-discrimination protection. Violation: Legal action against employer. Medical fitness: Can be declared fit without disclosing diagnosis. Exception: Healthcare workers - restricted duties (not termination).

instruction: De-addiction centre-la treatment eppadi?
output: Government centres: Free treatment at district/medical college hospitals. Services: 1) Detoxification (medical supervision), 2) Rehabilitation (21-90 days), 3) Counseling, 4) Family therapy, 5) Aftercare. TN: Alcohol/drug de-addiction centres in major hospitals. Private: Verify registration with State Mental Health Authority. Helpline: De-addiction helpline for guidance. Forced admission: Only if danger to self/others.

instruction: 'Post Office Super Senior Citizen Scheme - Double your money in 3 years' nu pamphlet vandhudhu. Post office safe la, join pannalama ayya?
output: Post Office schemes money double pannave pannaadhu ayya - 3 years la impossible. Official schemes - SCSS, MIS - fixed returns only. Fake pamphlets senior citizens ku target pannuvaanga. Post office branch ku poi verify pannunga - random pamphlets trust pannaadheenga.

instruction: PM-KISAN திட்டம் என்றால் என்ன?
output: Direct cash transfer of ₹6,000/year (₹2,000 x 3 installments) to land-owning farmers. Register at pmkisan.gov.in with Aadhaar, land records, bank account. Exclusions: Income tax payers, govt employees, professionals. State verification required.

instruction: ITI-la seera enna documents vendumay? Free training irukkumaa?
output: 10th/8th pass pannirukkanum. www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in-la apply pannu/pannunga. Government ITI full free - fee illai, tools, books ellam free. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. June-July-la admission start aagum.

instruction: Aadhaar pattriya thavraana nambikkaigal enna?
output:
Wrong Beliefs vs Truth:

1. ❌ Aadhaar is citizenship proof → ✅ Only identity proof, not citizenship
2. ❌ Mobile change online possible → ✅ Must visit Aadhaar Seva Kendra
3. ❌ School can deny admission without Aadhaar → ✅ RTE Act prohibits this
4. ❌ Hospital can deny treatment without Aadhaar → ✅ Cannot deny emergency treatment
5. ❌ Sharing Aadhaar number = money loss → ✅ Need Aadhaar + OTP both
6. ❌ DOB can be changed multiple times → ✅ Only once allowed
7. ❌ e-Aadhaar is not valid → ✅ e-Aadhaar = Physical (legally same)
8. ❌ Enrollment center charges fee → ✅ New enrollment is free

instruction: பிரதான் மந்திரி ஜீவன் ஜோதி பீமா யோஜனா (PMJJBY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Life Insurance திட்டம். Premium: ஆண்டுக்கு ₹436 மட்டுமே. Coverage: ₹2 லட்சம் (மரணம் ஏற்பட்டால்). வயது: 18-55 வயது. தகுதி: Jan Dhan/Savings Account உள்ளவர்கள். சேர: Bank-ல் படிவம் நிரப்பவும், Auto-debit consent கொடுக்கவும். ஒவ்வொரு வருடமும் June 1-ல் renew ஆகும்

instruction: Neighbour waste என் வீட்டு பக்கம் போடுகிறார் - action என்ன?
output: Corporation/Municipality complaint: Solid Waste Management Rules violation. Police: IPC 268 (public nuisance), 269 (negligent act spreading disease). Photos/videos evidence. Tahsildar complaint-உம் possible. Fine up to Rs.5,000 for waste dumping violation.

instruction: Hospital infection (hospital-acquired infection) - claim?
output: HAI claim possible if: 1) Infection clearly hospital-acquired, 2) Poor hygiene/sterilization, 3) Contaminated equipment, 4) Staff didn't follow protocols. Common HAI: Surgical site infection, catheter infection, ventilator pneumonia. Proof: Culture reports, timing of infection, hospital records. Defense: Some HAI unavoidable despite best practices. Key: Was protocol followed?

instruction: Inter-caste/Inter-religion marriage register eppadi seivathu?
output: Special Marriage Act 1954-in keezh register seyyalam. 30 days notice period undu. Any religion/caste manamaakkal register pannalam. Parents consent not required (if major). Inter-caste marriage-kku TN government Rs.50,000 incentive scheme undu.

instruction: Polytechnic Diploma enna? ITI-lirundhu enna viththiyaasam?
output: Difference: ITI = Trade training (practical focused), Diploma = Technical education (theory + practical). Diploma: 3 years after 10th. Branches: Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science, Automobile. Job level: Supervisor/Junior Engineer. ITI: Technician/Operator level. Salary difference: Diploma holders ₹5,000-10,000 more starting. Higher studies: Diploma → B.E. lateral entry possible.

instruction: IT company-ல் bond sign பண்ணினேன் - valid-ஆ?
output: Training bond: Valid if genuine training provided. Employment bond (2-3 years): Generally unenforceable - Indian Contract Act under 'restraint of trade'. Reasonable training cost recovery: May be valid. Exorbitant penalty: Not enforceable. Consult lawyer before paying.

instruction: Competitive exam preparation-ku daily routine eppadi irukka venum?
output: Ideal routine: 5:00 AM - wake up, fresh topics study (2-3 hrs). 8:00 AM - breakfast, current affairs. 9:00 AM - Practice/mock tests. 12:00 PM - lunch, short rest. 2:00 PM - revision, notes making. 5:00 PM - exercise/break. 6:00 PM - optional subjects. 9:00 PM - light revision, daily news. 10:00 PM - sleep. Weekly: 1 full mock test. Monthly: syllabus completion target vaiyunga.
